Title: Oasis Treehouse Atlanta
Description:
['About this space', 'When you step into our little forest sanctuary it is easy to forget that you are only 10 min from downtown Atlanta. Nestled in the forest, across a bridge over a little creek, is a beautiful little modern treehouse that sleeps 4 people. There is a composting toilet and a small kitchenette with running water. Across the bridge are a private outdoor shower with hot/cold water and a heater for amazing winter showers, next to it is a heated bath house all for your use only.', 'The space', 'The space
A true urban oasis, beautiful nature all around without having to leave the comfort or proximity of the city. Visit, eat and enjoy everything Atlanta has to offer, then sit on the treehouse balcony, swing in the hammock take in the bird song and the forest... enjoy the rays of sunshine through the trees and the mesmerizing rain as it comes down...

An authentic treehouse, held up by two oaks, heated in the winter and cooled in the summer, with a cosy loft bed, a composting toilet, and everything you need for a comfortable stay.

A walk down the magnificent suspended bridge leads you to secluded, charming outdoor shower with hot running water.

The treehouse is small, but comfortably sleeps up to four (two in the queen bed in the loft and two on the the pull out sofa (queen).', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Plenty of parking is available on our quiet street']

Title: Sugar Creek Treehouse with hot tub
Description:
['About this space', 'Surely the place you dreamed of as a child! The treehouse sits above a beautiful mountain stream. Close to parks, art and culture, great views, and restaurants and dining. You‚Äôll love the treehouse because of the romantic coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).', 'The space', "The space
Idyllic 600 sq. ft. artist‚Äôs treehouse deep in the forest, 35 feet above a mountain stream with gently cascading waterfalls ‚Äì just 45 minutes northeast of Asheville, NC. Just 45 miles west of Boone, NC. Perched high in the sky, this home offers sleeping for up to six. Follow the floating log staircase to a romantic upstairs loft with Romeo and Juliet balcony. Lounge in the window seat there, enjoying the best view in the house. Or enjoy the cozy sleeping loft tucked away off the living room. It's the perfect place to curl up with a good book. Stroll along the wrap around deck for magnificent views of the stream immediately below. Sit by the crackling wood stove and enjoy it's cozy warmth. The modern kitchen was made for a master chef. All the cookware, organic spices, and oils are provided to whip up an amazing meal. This is the place you surely dreamed of when you were a child!
Designed and built by two imaginative and experienced natural builders, this tiny treehouse hamlet sits on 6 wooded acres with south ‚Äì facing slopes at a comfortable elevation of 2,150 feet. It is near Mt. Mitchell, the tallest mountain east of the Mississippi and only twenty minutes away from the renowned Penland School of Crafts and the community of Celo, in Yancey County, where more artists per capita live than anywhere in the U.S. The Blue Ridge Parkway will get you within 20 miles of the home. The newly paved highways take you the rest of the way.
With easy access to state-maintained roads and just 7 miles from all the conveniences in Burnsville, NC, this quiet, tucked-away eden offers the best of both worlds. An inspiring wildlife and birdwatcher‚Äôs paradise, its‚Äô other features include: a view of the beautiful North Toe River from mountain plateau, magnificent rock outcroppings, a small sounding cave, nature trails and many edible wild plants.
Simply walk across the street to enjoy the Toe River. It offers refreshing deep waters for swimming and excellent trout or bass fishing. Walk along the pebble shores and simply enjoy the beauty.
The Appalachian Trail is within 15 miles of the home running along the NC and TN border. Take a short drive for a worthwhile hike. The home is also within 20 miles of the Roan Mountain State Park for another beautiful hike.

*** please note the sleeping loft (not bedroom) is accessed by a fixed ladder. Best for school age children or mobile adults. Not suitable for younger children and older adults.", '', '', '', '']

Title: La Paz at Treehouse Mountain!
Description:
['About this space', 'Enter this colorful treehouse in the mountains for your next getaway! Perfect for trips with friends, family, and couples. Completely dog friendly! Walk across a suspension bridge into this magical treehouse that offers a main floor and a loft as well as a spacious porch and the perfect view of the mountains.

There are four treehouses total on this property. Let me know if you have questions about renting more than one together for larger groups!', 'The space', "The space
Treehouse La Paz is one of four treehouses located on this 29 acre property backed up against a wooded mountain-side.

Treehouse Mountain Retreat is a relaxing getaway for every type of traveler. Guests are welcome to inquire about booking more than one treehouse during their stay in case their party is larger than four. We can accommodate up to 11 guests with all three treehouses.

All treehouses are dog friendly and we do not charge an extra fee to bring your pets. All you have to do is let us know if you're bringing any dogs and if they're friendly with other dogs as well!

There is a kitchenette which features a half-size refrigerator, a COLD sink (no hot water in treehouse), a microwave, a coffee maker, a water boiler for tea and hot chocolate, a mini rice cooker, and a toaster. On the connecting platform, there is a flat top griddle that is great for cooking breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
**We will provide tea, coffee, creamer, sugar, and coffee mugs, as well as basic cooking items such as rice, salt, pepper, spices, oil, utensils, plates, a pot, a pan and a cast iron skillet. **

This treehouse has access to a half bathroom located on the platform connected to the main treehouse as well as use of the 2 shower, 2 bathroom climate controlled bathhouse.

There is a pond on our property and multiple firepits for guests to use. Each treehouse has their own private firepit with firewood and firestarter included.


Here at Treehouse Mountain, our goal is to provide everything that we would want if we were to travel to other Airbnbs. During your stay, you can find that we are readily available if there's anything we can help out with or want help planning your trip to the area as well.

If you have questions about any of our treehouse rentals (we have four total), send me a message! We also offer discounts* for military, weekly stay, return guests, or renting more than one treehouse during a stay.

*Guests can use up to two discounts for a reservation*", '', "Our property is 29 acres of mostly forest, with some open fields as well. Guests have full access to our property, except for the other treehouses that may be rented out by other guests.

Quiet hours:
To respect all guests vacationing at our property, we have a quiet time of 9 PM. You're still welcome to enjoy camp fires or sitting out on the porch, etc. We just ask that there's no loud music or anything that may cause a disturbance to other guests.

Areas of interest guests may enjoy:
9 hole disc golf course (map can be found on the UDisc App) *we have discs available for guest use
Walking trails throughout the property
A slack line (balancing line)

Games/Activities available upon request:
Corn Hole
Giant Jenga
Bocce Ball

Other things to note:
I have a pottery studio on the property. If this interests you, you're welcome to come check it out, just let me know!
We do our best to maintain the grounds without disturbing guests (leaf blowing, cutting grass, cutting firewood, etc. We aim to do this when all guests are out and about during the day. If you arrive back and we're still working, just send me a message as we may not have noticed your arrival back. Our goal is to provide a relaxing environment .

We are constantly looking for new things to add to this list, so this may change over time.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The other two treehouses may be booked during your stay and other guests may have dogs off leash on the property because we are fully dog friendly. If this is a concern to you (due to fear of dogs or your dog is not friendly towards other dogs) let me know and I would be glad to request any guests staying to keep their dogs on leash.']

Title: Magical Treehouse - winter wonderland getaway!
Description:
['About this space', 'Sleep up in the trees in our cozy Magical Treehouse. This place is the perfect base camp for your next adventure, or a unique spot to curl up with a good book. The perfect place to be in the woods, but not isolated. Cook your meals in the nearby cookhouse (40‚Äô away, unheated) on a camp stove or over an open campfire. A heated bathroom/shower is 20‚Äô away. We provide you with linens, cookware, plus help you plan your trip. Property includes miles of hiking trails and beautiful places to explore!', 'The space', "The space
Rural, but centrally located, The Magical Treehouse is seven miles north of Paul Smiths College on Rt. 30. You‚Äôll be in one of the most varied wilderness areas of the park.

The Paul Smith‚Äôs College Visitors Interpretive Center is five miles away with wonderful hiking trails and educational programs for the whole family.

You‚Äôll be 25 minutes to Saranac Lake or Malone; 35 minutes to Lake Placid and its Olympic venues; 50 minutes to Whiteface Mountain. The Natural History Museum of the Adirondacks (the Wild Center) is 40 minutes away in Tupper Lake.

The Magical Treehouse has a single room with a beautiful, comfortable handcrafted queen-size bed, a table, and cozy chairs. Your bathroom/shower is in a separate building 20' away, and your cookhouse is in a screened in area and is 40' away. (Wintertime- mini fridge, microwave and snowshoes provided).

There is a nice campfire spot for summer marshmallow roasts or quiet fire gazing. A complimentary bundle of campfire wood is provided for your use, more for purchase.

You can cook meals in the screened in cookhouse (not heated in winter) and a spigot nearby provides water. The cookhouse has all the pots, dishes, utensils and tools you'll need to make a great meal.

There are over 5 miles of hiking/xc ski/snowshoe trails on the property to explore and nearby trails are excellent for mountain biking with both back country roads and single-track. The property is home to a bog, an old quarry and a river runs nearby. Designated horseback riding trail heads are less than a mile away. A ‚ÄúWild and Scenic Study River,‚Äù the Osgood, flows nearby with put-in and take-outs within a couple of miles of our driveway. Drop-off and pick-up arrangements can be made. This is a ‚Äúmust paddle‚Äù for those interested in wildlife and scenery. Many have spotted the bald eagle who has a nest at the river‚Äôs edge. We are surrounded by many great fishing spots.

Your hosts, Bob and Sheila, are a former professional wilderness guide, and a life-long resident of the Paul Smith‚Äôs area. Between the two of them, good advice‚Äîconnecting you to great experiences and unique destinations is as close to a ‚Äúsure thing‚Äù as you can get. The temporary use of their brains is complimentary!", '', "You'll have 27 acres to explore, including purpose-built mountain biking trails!", 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Everything that you'll need is here. All you have to do is bring your food and your adventurous spirit."]

Title: Varena Treehouse West
Description: ['About this space', 'The Treehouse is a perfect place for a vacation in the middle of the old pine trees forest. It offers a retreat from an intensive city life and a short getaway to the wild less than one hour away from Vilnius.', 'The space', 'The space\nThe place itself is a romantic room suited for an unforgettable moments with a loved one. It contains a lovely terrace with the fantastic view to the landscape, hammocks, fire-place and many other things that will make your time amazing. Moreover, the place offers a perfect working place with a free wi-fi and working desk for those who are looking to change their usual office day into peaceful and untraditional work place.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note\nFor those who enjoy more active leisure time, we offer a bike tour to the nearest village Pamerkiai located on the cost of a river Merkys. There you are going to find not only a beautiful village established in the beginning of XX century but also ‚ÄôGrikucis‚Äô farmstead famous for its traditional kitchen and educational programs.']

Title: Treehouse Lika 1
Description:
['About this space', "If you're looking to spend your vacation in unspoiled nature, in a luxuriously equipped house among the trees, listen to the birds, to ride a bicycle, to walk along the forest trails, to explore Velebit's peaks and other particular characteristics of this region of exceptional beauty, then you've come to the right place. The sea is only 20 minutes away by car. Plitvice Lakes National Park is within 1 hour drive. 4 more national parks are also within an hour drive.", 'The space', 'The space
The house is situated in Velebit Nature Park. It is unique because you stay between the trees at the height of 4 meters. You experience the nature in a totally different and special way. The location is perfect because in summer time, you are close to the sea (20 minutes) but you sleep in the freshness.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The whole house is available for stay with its surrounding area where is the barbecue and big covered terrace with garden furniture.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The house is new and fully equipped for maximum comfort.']

Title: ER69 - Rachel's Tree House - Great location...close to all the action!
Description: ['About this space', "One of our most unique 1 bedroom 1 bathroom log cabins, you're sure to remember that # 69 is a real treat. Upon entering, on the bottom level, you're in for quite a surprise. This cabin was built around a tree!!! Yes, a tree goes from the bottom level, in the middle of your dining area, all the way up through the top level, right past the foot of your bed. Ground level consists of an incredibly well thought out style of kitchen and dining area, with mason jars as light covers, and an old washtub sink equipped with a hand pump water spout and all! Upstairs, on one side you'll find a cozy loveseat and TV with fireplace in your sitting area, and your bedroom with a queen sized bed and Jacuzzi on the other. There is also a steaming hot tub out on your private deck. Staying in this cabin makes for a splendid vacation you'll always remember. Our resort area swimming pool and clubhouse is within walking distance for those hot summer days. Area restaurants and attractions are all just minutes away by car."]

Title: Romantic Treehouse Getaway with Treetop Views
Description:
['About this space', 'Enjoy breathtaking and one-of-a-kind lodging in our Whispering Pines Treehouse. This unique treehouse rental in Ohio towers 22 feet in the air and offers luxury, adventure, and comfort. Featuring a stone two-person jetted tub with a ceiling tub filler, king-size rustic Amish Crafted pillow-top mattress, cherry hardwood floors, and rustic furnishings. Privately tucked away in a grove of White Pines, relax and refresh yourself while sitting on your deck.', 'The space', 'The space
Living Room:
Step into luxury with your first step over the threshold and onto the beautiful cherry hardwood floor. Roughhewn beams and split pine planking surround you as you relax in the comfy sofa and matching chair in front of a live edge coffee table. Flip the switch to ignite the fireplace encased in hand-cut stone and curl up with a good book or take a much-deserved nap. You can also catch up on your favorite shows on the large screen TV with cable channels that are mounted above the mantle.

Windows on each wall allow plenty of natural light and outdoor beauty to enter your hideaway. But make sure you spend lots of time outside on the wrap-around balcony. Allow the peacefulness of your wooded retreat to soothe your mind and soul as you rock gently in the rockers and absorb the serenity that surrounds you.

Before snuggling into the King size bed featuring an Amish-made pillow-top mattress resting on an elevated pinewood base, make sure you unwind in your private two-person jetted tub. The ceiling-high waterfall fill supplies the hot water that will be jetted over tired muscles creating just the right mood for the perfect night.

Kitchen:
Your kitchen is home to a collegiate-sized refrigerator with a freezer and a 2-burner stovetop. There are ample pots and pans if you feel like making your favorite vacation meal, or a microwave oven for heating up the leftovers from one of our amazing restaurants in town. A toaster and drip coffee maker round out the appliances which are at your disposal. The Amish-made wood table and chairs are the perfect spots for breakfast for two.

Bathroom:
A sliding barn door opens to reveal your tiled floor bathroom. An artisanal counter rests on legs made from logs. The expertly tiled shower is large enough for two and can start your day or end your night on just the right note.', '', '']

Title: The Owl Cabin
Description:
['About this space', 'Welcome and enjoy your stay in our perched hut.
This small wooden hut was built entirely by its owner in 2019. The materials come from nearby trees and recovery.
Winter as well as summer, it allows you to recharge your batteries, breathe and spend a night in calm and high...
Then enjoy an Ardennes breakfast.
If the weather is right, a barbecue is available on the terrace.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
There is a large yard so either you can park your car in the yard or if the weather permits, you can park it in the lawn right next to the cabin.']

Title: Mink Cove Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'A unique adult adventure awaits in this cozy hand crafted tree house! Nestled 12 feet off the ground amongst the chirping birds, red oaks & breathtaking views of Mink Cove in Buzzards Bay. The tree house is accessible by a suspension bridge that leads you to a partially covered porch where you can enjoy a cup of coffee or sit back & take in the sunset with a glass of wine. Step inside to the living space & snuggle up on the couch for an intimate evening.', 'The space', "The space
To get up to the sleeping area you'll have to climb a VERY NARROW spiral staircase. We demonstrate how narrow the stairs are by photos. Upstairs houses a double bed and a loft area with a twin. The tree house is equipped with a compostable toilet, bathroom sink and outdoor shower.
The 2.5 acre property is adjacent to miles of walking & hiking trails.
The treehouse is not handicapped accessible. Our place of residence is right next door to the treehouse and guests will share our stone driveway.
On arrival each guest must sign a release of Liability Agreement.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The treehouse is at the end of a dirt road. Parking is right in front of our house on stone gravel driveway beside large barn/workshop.
IN CASE OF HURRICANE WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO CANCEL']

Title: Magpies Nest Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'Treehouse overlooking the Dal√§lvan river on an organic farm. In a secluded setting. Treehouse is fully equipped with microwave two burner hot plate and conventional oven. Inside toilet and shower, hot/cold running water. Electric radiators. Electric blanket. The bed is made up ready, towels gowns & slippers. Sauna and hot tub included. Car park next to the treehouse. Outside grill. Meals on request. Nearby busses. Transport on request.
Pets by arrangement.', 'The space', 'The space
Private Entrance to the treehouse.
A treehouse overlooking the Dal√§lvan river with spectacular views. Set in woodland on an organic farm in Sweden. Private and secluded among forests. Bubble pool included and sauna included.
Skatboet Treehouse Magpies Nest is 36 square meters and 6 meters high.
All modern conveniences in the treehouse. Hot and cold running water. Electric radiators for heating. Shower and toilet.
No internet inside the treehouse. Internet within the farmhouse area.
King size bed. Room for extra guests. Fully equipped with oven microwave two burner hot plate. The bed is made up ready with bed linen towels slippers and gowns and an electric blanket. Watch the Northern lights aurora borealis during December to March.
From December to March the temperature outside is normally minus -25c degrees Celsius. In the winter there is flat skiing. Ski resorts nearby. Roma alpine and others. Visit the copper mines and Silver mines a short drive away. Bison farm 6 kilometres away.
Therapy treatments offered Swedish body massage, happy feet at 500 krona for an hours treatment.
Cows horses two cats and chickens on the farm. Moose springbok swans and many other wild life. Walks in the forests and around the farm.
Mushroom, apple and berry picking in season in the forests around.
Enjoy the tranquility in your own space and time. Beautiful sunrises and sunsets.
Pets by arrangement.
Meals by arrangement.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Villa Terdeho, 2 bedrooms, private spa.
Description:
['About this space', 'Five spacious villas in red wood and a cabin perched in the heart of a mango tree, with a shared infinity pool and its lounges.

Each villa is designed for privacy and calm, you can enjoy the swimming pool and spa for villa D√©sirable and the private spa for the other four villas.

The hut perched', 'The space', 'The space
Terdeho is a villa of 90 m2 for 4 people maximum.
From 275 ‚Ç¨ to 295 ‚Ç¨ the night depending on time of year.

Two air-conditioned bedrooms with a large bed and mosquito net, sheets provided.
Living room with a lounge with TV and dining kitchen, overlooking terrace.
A bathroom with shower and separate toilet, towels, bathrobes.
A barbecue area.
Villa equipped with salt, pepper, butter oil, coffee to start your stay, charcoal, toilet paper, tea towels, tablets washing machines, candle anti mosquito ...
Cleaning every 3 days, change of sheets to 6 days.
The Spa (hot tub) with terrace and sun loungers.
Access to the pool at Overflow.

Free crib for baby, check the booking availability.']

Title: Cottonwood Tree House
Description:
['About this space', '‚Ä¶nestled right up to Jamaica‚Äôs vibrant flora and fauna‚Ä¶

Tucked at the edge of the bush, Cottonwood Tree House is nestled right up to Jamaica‚Äôs vibrant flora and fauna. Sleep well in your king sized bed, awake to the sound of the birds, and spend the morning on your ocean view deck, sipping Blue Mountain coffee.

-- Part of Hermosa Cove Villa Resort. More at https://hermosacove.com --', 'The space', 'The space
Cottonwood Treehouse is part of Hermosa Cove, one of the Caribbean‚Äôs most distinctive handcrafted resort, offering the discerning traveler a private island home.

Nestled in twelve lush acres on Jamaica‚Äôs Gold Coast, our secluded villas evoke the intimate charm of an idyllic seaside village. Luxurious art-filled interiors open to tropical gardens with glistening dip pools. Several villas have spectacular ocean views, and all are just a short stroll from the water. The resort‚Äôs reef-studded cove features two pristine beaches with complimentary kayaking and snorkeling.

Christopher‚Äôs, our award-winning signature restaurant, serves up locally sourced cuisine with international flair, and The Broken Rudder offers the atmosphere of a cozy jerk shack down by the beach.

A seaside paradise with unmatched seclusion, Hermosa Cove is conveniently located in Ocho Rios just minutes from Jamaica‚Äôs most popular attractions and most breathtaking natural wonders.

Our friendly staff will help arrange your personal adventure, and even accompany you as a tour guide. Whether your dream getaway involves adventure or solitude, romance or reconnection, come indulge your senses and revive your spirit‚Ä¶your way.']

Title: La Pitalaya hut, perched at 7m, romantic night
Description:
['About this space', 'High perched in two century-old oaks, Pitalaya will welcome the most romantic of you...
A spiral staircase will lead you to the heart of the cabin connected by a bridge suspended from an interlaced terrace in the heart of the branches of a majestic leaning oak.
Perched at a height of almost 7m, it can accommodate 2 people and its access is reserved for adults.', 'The space', 'The space
3 cabins perched in the trees, in the heart of the Pyrenees, in the Barousse Valley, a magical place to stay with family, friends or lovers.
All our cabins are equipped with lights (solar and battery), dry toilets, water point and washbasin for the extra toilet, with locally made handmade soap, tables, chairs and deckchairs, as well as additional gas heating. Towels, linens, duvets, plaids and blankets are provided and beds are made upon arrival.
La Pitalaya cabin (7m high, 2 people): the romantic with a four-poster bed formed by the branches of the tree, access by a spiral staircase, 2 terraces including one covered, connected by a suspension bridge.
Cabane du Brame (5m, 3/4 pers): the "cocooning" with a bed in 140, a bed in 90*200 on the mezzanine, accessible by a rope ladder, a "junior" bed in 70*160 and a large semi-covered terrace
Peyre Hitte cabin (3m, 2 to 7 pers) : the "fairytale", perched on 3 trees, with a bed in 140*200, 2 bunk beds and 1 single bed in 90*200', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Site with an exceptional environment very frequented by deer and other animals of the forest located 20min from the motorway exit, in the heart of the Pyrenees, 400m from the village center and 700m above sea level.
Car parking on arrival on site, access to the cabins on foot (70 to 120m from the car park), reception building with office and sanitary facilities open 24 hours a day. 2 ha landscaped site that promises privacy and moments of relaxation with a Nordic bath (reservation required) and wooden games (free access).', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Restoration options:
Breakfast is included in the overnight rate, we carry it in a basket that you lift with a pulley to the cabin for an indoor or outdoor tasting.
As an option, you can book a warm and hearty evening meal basket made with local produce.
For groups of 4 to 10 people we offer an atypical form of catering in the Kota Grill : all-inclusive meal from aperitif to dessert, around grills in a small hexagonal chalet, with a grill in the center of the table, topped with a host, for a memorable and very friendly meal.', '', '']

Title: Forest Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'Have You ever experienced sunrise waking up in the trees? Here is Your chance. Our treehouse is place to relax and commune with nature and all this only 35 min drive from Tallinn city center. The treehouse provides an intimate, simple and calming retreat for 2 people.', 'The space', "The space
Our quests has described the treehouse as being truly relaxing, romantic, and unique place you'll ever stay. What could be better than falling asleep in the trees and waking up to birds singing around you ‚Äì all this near the city?
You have whole apartment in trees with kitchen, bathroom, sleeping area, fireplace and deck.
The treehouse from the main house, parking lot, summer kitchen, saunas and pond is about a 200m walk.

Guests will have free parking in our parking lot and access to outdoor kitchen. Bikes to ride with during the rental time. Pond for swimming and cooling down in hot summer days."]

Title: Prestige Cabin *Les Amoureux Perch√©s * summer/winter-2p
Description:
['About this space', 'Ten minutes from St Emilion. SUMMER and WINTER. Treat yourself to A DREAM stay in A LUXURY hut, equipped with A REAL toilet- bathroom- Private terrace. An UNUSUAL way to experience an UNFORGETTABLE moment 8M from the ground, in a bicentennial tree. Enjoy unobstructed views of the Domaine du Moulin de Rioupassat of XVII, its park, swimming pool, vineyards and the slender horses in the fields, sunsets, birdsong. This cabin with refined decor is UNIQUE in Gironde.++ Gift Certificate', 'The space', 'The space
*Room for 2 people. Nespresso, porcelain teapot,
* At the Mill you can book WELLNESS MASSAGES with ORGANIC essential oils (duration 1h) absolute relaxation. Rate/ 65‚Ç¨ per person. To be paid on site.
* A Champagne formula with homemade ovens Price/ 69‚Ç¨
*An Art shop is available for your use. GIVE a UNIQUE gift and sign BY NICKY the Painter Artist, your Mill Host.
* Spillway pool, bath linen available.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
All public areas are at your disposal.
The pool is open in season. For security, the pool is closed at 6pm.
***Your attention, UNIQUE in Gironde, our "Prestige" cabin is equipped for WINTER with 37cm of sheep wool, even with a minus 10¬∞ you will never be cold***
If you want to book on 31 December for New Year's Eve, you must do it at least 3 months before> Same for Valentine's Day and bridges.', '', "Other things to note
If there are strong winds or thunderstorms, we'll take you back to one of our guest rooms at Le Moulin."]

Title: TreeHouse in the Cloud, (Close  toTheme Parks
Description:
['About this space', 'The treehouse is a private getaway for a couple that want to experience the magic.
For a video tour type the following link into your browser:
https://tinyurl.com/a72vevp5
There have been several movie and other photo shoots done on property. Please text request and details, and we can negotiate fees.
Our other AirBnB is just next door; meemaws-country -cottage which sleeps six.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The Treehouse has a full wrap around walk, and a deck. Inside is a bedroom, table and chairs, a full bathroom, and a kitchenette. You have choice of stairs or a fixed ladder.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
There are 4 horses on the property that you can enjoy. In the refrigerator you will find carrots for you to feed the horses. (They will be your forever friend :))
There is a fire pit in the common area and we will be glad to set one for you.
Although we do not have a built in stove and oven, we do have a large toaster oven with air cook and an electric frying pan. These items along with the microwave can make almost anything you need.']

Title: Rainforest Tree House with Hot Springs
Description:
['About this space', 'No children under 5 years of age for safety reasons. The Tree House is hand-crafted, one of 3 casitas and 3 treehouses at the Bio Thermales natural resort organically integrated into our 35 acre rainforest. Guests enjoy free access, from 9 am to 10 pm to the 15 natural hot and cool springs pools of various temperatures and rainforest trails.', 'The space', 'The space
Please message us if we will be your first or last destination in Costa Rica. We highly recommend booking on weekdays for more privacy and tranquility, as we have more day visitors from 9 am to 6 pm to our hot springs on the weekends, especially Sundays. If your reservation includes a Sunday, we highly recommend planning a day outing to the many wonderful nearby activities.

We are three hours north of San Jose (airport), 45 minutes east of Fortuna and Volcano Arenal, and the many activities there and nearby.

Guests enjoy 24/day access* to our hot springs and trails in our 35 acre rainforest at no extra charge. The pools are cleaned every morning starting at 6 am, but one hot spring will always be available. Many factors may dictate scheduling, including weather. We do not charge for children 17 and under -- but we will not accept reservations for the Tree House for families with children under 5 years old for whom a 20 foot fall from the balcony would be very serious.

Our hot springs are ancient ‚Äúdeep Earth‚Äù sources that bubble up through the rainforest floor, laden with mineral-rich waters that have been in the Earth for at least 10,000 years. Our waters are rich in bicarbonates, calcium and magnesium, low in sulfur, and slightly acidic -- qualities shared by many of the world's best hot springs.

Five of our 9 organic form hot springs pools are located in the rainforest, and 4 hot springs pools as well as a small and a large cool spring swimming pool are located in a meadow, surrounded by rainforest (see below for more information). The small and large cool springs pools both have water slides, and there is a small water slide in one of the shallow and moderate temperature pools for small children.

The Tree House is built to strict Costa Rican building codes, but as with all tree houses, there is some movement when the wind blows, and this could be uncomfortable for people very sensitive to motion sickness.

You may see our other listings on Airbnb at:

Tucano Casita (Toucan Casita) is listed as "Rainforest Casita with Hot Springs": airbnb.com/rooms/30358

Mariposa Casita (Butterfly Casita) is listed as "Rainforest Casita2 with Hot Springs" airbnb.com/rooms/51518

Colibri Casita (Hummingbird Casita) is listed as "Rainforest Casita3 with Hot Springs"
airbnb.com/rooms/1896911

Tree House: "Rainforest Tree House with Hot Springs" airbnb.com/rooms/50435

You can check availability of each accommodation by clicking on the "Calendar" tab above the main photo on each listing.

Tree House features: (see floor-plan for all details):
‚Ä¢ Perched high among the rainforest trees, the Tree House has large screened areas for circulation of naturally cooler breezes. It also has fans.
‚Ä¢ All onsite hot springs and recreation activities included, including 24 hour access to the hot springs and cool spring swimming pools
‚Ä¢ The Master bedroom with a Queen sized bed with orthopedic mattress and hypoallergenic bedding is in a loft
‚Ä¢ One the main floor, two twin-sized beds that can double as settees with hypoallergenic bedding
‚Ä¢ Hand-crafted rustic furniture from naturally harvested trees on the land
‚Ä¢ Main floor kitchen with refrigerator, micro-wave, coffee maker, basic kitchenware
‚Ä¢ Bathroom with flash on-demand hot-water heater
‚Ä¢ Wrap around balcony for relaxing and animal and bird watching
‚Ä¢ Maid service every 3 days included
‚Ä¢ Laundry service at extra charge per load
‚Ä¢ Short walk to rainforest and hot springs pools
‚Ä¢ No telephone or television
‚Ä¢ WiFi internet for your laptop -- if reliable 24 hour internet is essential to you, please message us for suggestions.
‚Ä¢ Hosts Kathy and Bernie live onsite
‚Ä¢ Languages: English, Spanish, German, limited French

One time $10 cleaning fee; thereafter housecleaning services every 3 days are free.

Bio Thermales Hot Springs features:
‚Ä¢ Our hot springs pools are all-natural mineral water just as it flows from the Earth
‚Ä¢ Rainforest Pools from 90¬∞ - 105¬∞F (31¬∞ - 40¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Grotto Pools in meadow flow from the 112¬∞F/45¬∞C source pool onward into two larger and progressively cooler pools which are handicap-accessible and suitable for small children.
‚Ä¢ Cool Pool in meadow is 90¬∞F/31¬∞C mineral water flowing from the thermal creek
‚Ä¢ 2 Swimming pools with continuous flow of natural cold spring water (88 degrees) - one is 1 to 1.5 meters deep, and the larger is 3 meters deep.
‚Ä¢ Bathhouse in meadow with handicap accessible bathrooms and showers
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúRanchos‚Äù ‚Äì roofed tables with concrete floors and grills for picnics

Other Activities on our 35 acre rainforest reserve:
‚Ä¢ Bird-watching: many types of toucans, oropendulas, parrots, hummingbirds, and the rare green macaw
‚Ä¢ Rainforest: enjoy it from the casita porch or hot springs pools, take easy walks on paths or more adventurous hikes
‚Ä¢ Fossils ‚Äì enjoy our collection or hunt (gently) for your own
‚Ä¢ Wildlife: two-toed sloths, iguanas, capuchin and mantled howler monkeys, tree frogs, birds, butterflies, and many others.

We are a 45 minute drive from the many activities in Fortuna and Volcano Arenal -- such as ziplines, hanging bridges, white water rafting, slow river floats or kayaking through wildlife sanctuaries -- or a 1.5 hour drive to La Paz Waterfall Gardens and Volcano Poas.

Bio Thermales Hot Springs is open to the public for day use of the hot springs, and most of our day visitors are Costa Ricans, so you may also meet new Tico friends. Bio Thermales is generally not crowded, however, except on major holidays and Sundays.

Food/Meals: The Tree House has a kitchen. There are many restaurants and a good supermarket within a 15 minute drive. Traditional Costa Rican meals can be delivered from a local caterer for very reasonable prices (Costa Rican food is tasty but not spicy). Otherwise, for those without cars, we can call a taxi or synchronize a food shopping trip when we go to town for errands.

Driving from SJO airport: Please message us before booking if we are your first and/or last destination in Costa Rica.

We recommend at least a small 4 wheel drive car. The last 3 kilometers are country roads.

Three hours of daylight are needed to safely drive here from the SJO airport before sunset at 5:30 pm. The drive through mountainous cloud forests is splendid in daylight, but prone to fog and rain, especially at night, creating hazardous visibility conditions after dark. Finding our countryside location will also be far easier if you arrive the first time before sunset. If your plane lands in the morning to noon, you can drive here directly from the airport. Otherwise, it is safer to book a room near the airport on your first night, or ask us to book a private driver ($145) and have a rental car delivered at no extra charge.

Last night in Costa Rica:
Driving directly to the SJO airport on the same day is possible if you book a flight in the afternoon. Please be aware that you must be at the airport 2.5 hours before departure. If you have an early morning departing flight it is basically necessary to stay near the airport on the night before.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Five of our 9 organic form hot springs pools are located in the rainforest, and 4 hot springs pools as well as a small and a large cool spring swimming pool(with water slides) are located in a meadow, surrounded by rainforest and one cool fresh spring pool in the rainforest (see below for more information). Tree House guests can enjoy the hot springs pools from 9am to 10 pm, and 35 acres of rainforest access at no charge. The pools are cleaned daily from 6 am to 9 am but one pool is always available -- there are many factors involved, including weather, that may dictate when the pools are ready. We have a staff operated laundry facility and guests may give clothes for washing/drying/folding for $5/load.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Day visitors and groups are permitted entrance to use the hot springs and cool springs pools from 9 am to 6 pm. There are usually more day visitors on weekends, especially Sundays, and we recommend booking week days for more tranquility and privacy. If guests book a longer reservation that includes a Sunday, we recommend planning a day tour in the many nearby activities on Sundays. Day visitors must leave by 6 pm, and only casita and Tree House guests may use the pools after 6 pm and enjoy unlimited access to the pools, with the exception of no nighttime use of the forest pools, and cleaning schedule as noted above.

We recommend either ordering a catered dinner in advance for your first evening and/or next morning breakfast, or buying and bringing groceries to cook because we are 4 km from the main paved road and driving after dark is highly discouraged until drivers have quite some experience on Costa Rican roads. Also, most guests prefer to settle in upon arrival and not to have to get back in the car and drive out to dinner. We provide a Catering Menu to each guest once reserved, but the caterer requires advance notice of selected meals and TIMES guests would like meals delivered. We do not have a liquor license and guests must bring their own beer/wine/rum etc. The tap water is safe to drink, and we sell soft drinks, fruit juices, and other non-alcohol beverages, snacks and ice cream.']

Description:
['About this space', 'CHECK IN DATES ARE;

Monday -two night minimum
Wednesday-two night minimum
You can book 2‚Äì3-4 nights or more!
Designed to be the most romantic getaway tucked deep in the woods of Tennessee. Come experience Sulfur Ridge, Tennessee‚Äôs first luxury treehouse! Perched 15 feet above the forest floor, the treehouse offers a private, intimate space to relax and be immersed in nature.

PlEASE NOTE-
WE ARE AN ADULT ONLY PROPERTY.
No pets.

THREE NIGHT MINIMUM ON WEEK ENDS

The treehouse is built with your comfort in mind, from a luxury mattress to a cast iron claw foot tub large enough for two!
Dance the night away to your favorite songs on the jukebox.
Spend your evening underneath the stars sitting at the fire pit.
Soaking in the hot tub designed for only two will be the ending of a perfect day!

If you are a group of six or less- We also have on our property our retro inspired ‚ÄúShasta Camp‚Äù three 1962 inspired campers are available as a separate Listing to book all three campers. Think of it like a three bedroom house.

Title: Celesterra: Transformation Amidst Heaven and Earth
Description:
['About this space', 'Celesterra is a spiritual retreat treehouse for people feeling the need to experience deep rest and contemplation, healing from grief, a new direction in life, a more powerful connection with nature and/or yourself, a vision you wish to clarify, etc.. To spend time in retreat here, you MUST include two or three paragraphs about why your heart is calling you here. Also, please let us know you have read the description and agree to our guidelines. This is a magical place for your retreat!', 'The space', 'The space
Celesterra is a 230 sq. ft. sacred space that floats between earth and sky about 15 feet off of the ground. Built by the television show Treehouse Masters, it is a beautiful, serene space that is cozy, warm and inviting. PLEASE NOTE: All food and cooking are strictly vegetarian with no garlic or onions (so the next guests might be able to appreciate the space as well). No meat on the land at all, please.

Celesterra features a beautiful living area with wood stove and leather club chairs, a dining table, fully stocked kitchenette and a bathroom with a composting toilet. IT HAS NO RUNNING WATER, but glorious spring water is supplied for drinking, washing dishes and cleaning hands. There is a full bathroom available in the main house exclusively for your use (about a three minute walk - try a walking meditation back and forth each day!). It features a beautiful walk-in shower and flushing toilet and sink with hot and cold water. You can restock up on water there, or walk about 1 minute from the treehouse to where the spring overflows into the creek and fill up there. Celesterra also features a large front deck with fabulous views of the mountains.

The bedroom is located in a loft above the kitchen area. It features a queen size memory foam mattress (like a cloud), with all natural bedding. It is accessed by a 9-foot ladder. If you have physical limitations, using the ladder might prove difficult for you, please let us know. See photos included here or we can send photos.

This is a wonderfully quiet space that enhances your meditations, reflections and relaxation. Only serious intentions to do deep personal work will be considered. We ask for 7 days notice before booking, but apply if you feel a deep need to come within the 7 day limit. Also, we are happy to discuss financial costs for retreats longer than a week. We will try and work with you in any way to help make this a transformational experience.

NO DOGS, please. We have a hunting dog, Winston (rescue) who is human friendly but not dog friendly. Also, while we love the energy of children, we do not allow them to come on retreat.', '', '', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The application is simple: Please write a thorough explanation to the question: What is my innermost heart yearning for during my retreat in Celesterra and why? If we feel your application is sincere and earnest and gives us enough information to come to a sense of right alignment, we will notify you of your acceptance.']

Title:
The best in tiny living!
TreehouseTopia
Description:
['About this space', 'The Barkhouse is the only fully tree supported structure in the Gatlinburg/Pigeon Forge area. Located just minutes from all the major attractions in the area and only 5 miles from the Greenbriar entrance to the GSMNP. Enjoy the seclusion of 25 acres of trees with amazing views of the river and the mountains plus all the comforts of home.
The Barkhouse is engineered with a beautiful live White Pine growing through the center of the treehouse. Enjoy stargazing through the skylight.', 'The space', 'The space
The Barkhouse has a kitchen area with a microwave, refrigerator/freezer combo, toaster oven, single electric burner, and coffee maker. Enjoy charcoal grilling outdoors on your private deck or using the fire pit shared with the other treehouse located on the property. Spend time inside resting on yoga mats in the suspended cargo net area.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
A door code will be given prior to arrival to enter the premise. Once inside the treehouse the entire (black circle) locking mechanism will need to be turned clockwise or counterclockwise to unlock or lock the door.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
No pets!']

Title: Tree house safari
Description:
['About this space', 'Perfect for a wedding night, an engagement request, a big reunion or a moment you will never forget in your life. Come live the experience of being a bird in the trees and let the wind rock you in the leaves in the heart of nature.

CITQ number : 304228', 'The space', 'The space
Magic Tingwick is a 15 acre maple forest bordered by a stream, a nearby forest and two market gardening fields. In this vast space, we offer for rent only 3 dwellings separated from each other in the forest so that everyone can enjoy the calm of nature in complete privacy.
We also live on site in a small house near the alpacas to answer your questions and welcome you.

CITQ number : 304228', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Superb central spa pavilion with fireplace, a large living room with cathedral ceiling and two kitchens, one interior with dishwasher and induction hob and one outside with sink, barbecue and view of the pond.
This common space is shared with the three mini-dwellings in our large forest.

CITQ number : 304228']

Title: Suburban Treehouse Getaway - Newly Renovated!
Description:
['About this space', 'Owl in the Oak Treehouse was renovated in January to give our guests a completely modern experience while maintaining the uniqueness and charm of a real treehouse overlooking a small stream in a quiet valley.', 'The space', 'The space
The treehouse is secluded more than 300 feet from the closest house. In the winter, several neighborhood homes are visible from the treehouse, but summer foliage cloaks the treehouse in almost total privacy.

The main floor of the treehouse is 120 square feet and has a sitting area, bathroom, and kitchenette. There is also a small writing desk that folds out of the way when not in use.

The 50-square-foot sleeping loft is accessed via ladder and gives guests some of the best views of the forest and stream.

The kitchenette features a sink, minifridge, microwave, and Keurig coffee maker.

The small bathroom has a composting toilet and a shower. Towels, body wash, shampoo, and conditioner are included.

Outside the treehouse is a sitting area with stunning views out over the forest and down to a small stream 30 feet below!', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have access to the entire treehouse and platform. There is also a short side path with a bench overlooking the stream.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Guest parking is on the street, and the two-minute walk to the treehouse takes you down a stone path through the woods, up and down several flights of uneven steps, and across a small footbridge.

Access to the treehouse itself is up a spiral staircase, and it‚Äôs necessary to climb a ladder to get to the sleeping loft.

Children under the age of 10 are not allowed to access the sleeping loft for safety reasons.

The water heater tank only holds 7 gallons of water, so showers need to be kept short. The toilet in the treehouse is a composting toilet.

This property is a real treehouse, actually suspended in trees. If it happens to be windy during your stay, you will feel the sway and hear some creaking sounds.']

Title: THE BELLA LUNA Romantic Mountain Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'Come Sleep in the Trees - Luxury Romantic Treehouse above Walhalla, SC is just minutes from Stumphouse Tunnel, Stumphouse Mountain Bike Park, Issaqueena Falls & white water rafting. Oconee County has many beautiful waterfalls & hiking trails. We are close to Clemson, Lake Keowee, Lake Hartwell & Lake Jocassee and located just inside Sumter National Forest.

An AMAZING ROMANTIC GETAWAY for HONEYMOONS, ANNIVERSARIES & BIRTHDAYS!

See our sister treehouse The Stella Vista.', 'The space', "The space
PLEASE READ ENTIRE DESCRIPTION
BEFORE YOU BOOK.

This is a romantic retreat for COUPLES ONLY.
We are not PET friendly due to guests that may have pet allergies and due to the high decks we are not KID friendly.

Our romantic little house in the trees is designed with our guests‚Äô comfort in mind. It sleeps 2 people. There is a beautiful king-size custom built bed with a Rainbow Poplar live edge headboard. We chose to dress our Tuft & Needle mattress with soft comfy cotton linens and soft blankets. The white flowing drapery surrounding the sleeping area makes this a dreamy and romantic space. Hanging over the bed is a stunning vintage crystal chandelier. If you happen to catch the sun streaming in the upper windows just right in the morning or late afternoon, you may see a beautiful show of rainbow prisms cast by the crystals dancing all over the room. The french door from the sleeping area leads out to a west facing deck where you can enjoy your morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evenings in the treetops on a pretty little bistro set.

Inside the cozy sitting area has a small dining table for 2 and small loveseat for relaxing and kicking your feet up.

The KITCHENETTE has a mini fridge, microwave and a toaster. The wake up station is stocked with a french press, coffee maker, burr coffee grinder and an electric water kettle. We have whole bean coffee, ground coffee, flavored teas along with cream and sugar and sugar substitutes. We have plates, bowls, coffee cups, glasses, cool bronze flatware and glass stemware and of course wine & bottle openers. If you prefer to paper plates and plastic utensils we have those too. We leave snacks, a few goodies, juice and water. These are for you and there is no extra charge so please enjoy.

For OUTDOOR COOKING there is a Weber electric grill and an electric griddle for cooking on the lower deck. We have grilling utensils, spices, foil, and cooking oil. All cooking must be done outside as there is very limited counter space indoors. After all this is a treehouse so enjoy the ‚ÄúGlamping‚Äù experience! There are two great outdoor dining spaces with bistro tables and chairs. One is on the upper deck off the bedroom and the other is a dedicated covered dining area downstairs that overlooks the fire pit.

The bathroom has a huge WALK-IN SHOWER with natural fossil stone tile and a river rock floor. Over the shower are copper fairy wire lights for a fun showering experience. Wrap yourself in the large fluffy bath sheets after showering. There is a petrified teak vessel sink and standard traditional potty just like you have at home. Soap, shampoo, hairdryer and all towels and linens are provided, just bring your toothbrush.

If you want a more adventurous showering experience, grab a robe and head downstairs to our new OUTDOOR SUMMER SHOWER. You will love the cool copper rain head and lighting for showering at night.

Off the back deck you can stroll across the laurel branch bridge to a private NAPPING DECK complete with a raised Double-Stack Net custom-made for just two people. Grab a pillow and blanket and snuggle up!

On the downstairs deck you can relax in the 2 cedar rocking chairs or hang out on the porch swing.

The FIRE PIT is just off the lower deck and we provide firewood and a little basket of goodies to make S'mores.

You will find utensils and cooking supplies in the utility room off the lower deck.

There is NO TV or WiFi but we have a basket of games, playing cards, and a vintage style record player and few old records for you to enjoy. On the lower deck there is an addicting hook & ring on a string game.

Quiet hours are 10pm to 8am.

I only allow 2 guests. There is not a sleeper sofa or any room for a cot or air mattress. The treehouse is a cozy 300 square feet.

I have poured my heart into building this treehouse. I want my guests to enjoy all the wonderful and carefully thought out things I have placed here for them.

Please respect my property, follow the house rules and PLEASE LEAVE EVERYTHING LIKE YOU FOUND IT.

I provide a nice clean place for you when you arrive. Fresh clean linens, cozy blankets, towels, dish towels, and dishes. All hard surfaces, door knobs etc. are wiped down with sanitizing wipes between every guest. Please clean up after yourself and leave everything in good order before checking out.

I only book out 6 months in advance, so if you look on the calendar and the dates you want are more than 6 months away that doesn't mean they are not available, it just means the dates haven't been released yet. Please check back and grab your dates once they become available to book.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You will have access to the area around the treehouse.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
My dream when designing and building this little getaway was to provide a comfortable and relaxing space where you can unwind and enjoy some downtime. I carefully thought out all the things I wanted my guests to enjoy. All the fun little details and interesting things mean a lot to me and I want you to enjoy them as well.

I know accidents happen and that is okay as long as you let me know about it. If you do happen to break something PLEASE just let me know. Just leave me a note or message me. I need to be able to replace things before I host my next guests.

*Failure to report broken/damaged items will result in replacement fees.*

We do not have WiFi.

Cell service is best with Verizon.']

Title: Caba√±a Treehouse Mountain View
Description:
['About this space', 'The dream when we were children, a treehouse, surrounded by trees where the main habitat is birds, you will get unparalleled peace and tranquility, awakening with the view to the mountain and birdsong, is a unique experience, far from the noise of the city in the middle of the mountain.
In the background you will hear the sound of a river of crystal clear water just 70 metres from the cabin, ideal for relaxing and sharing, being an extremely quiet and safe place.', 'The space', 'The space
Quanta with kitchen equipped for cooking, and all kinds of utensils, additional sugar, coffee, salt, oil.
The bed with all its equipment, the bathroom has a hot tub, gel towels.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
We have the Horseback Tour Service, on the slopes of the Braulio Carrillo National Park, visiting the river, the waterfall and a spectacular view of the central valley.
We also have guided hikes to Cerros Tib√°s, Caricias, Tur√∫. where you can enjoy mountaineering and its great landscapes.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
700 metres from the property is part of the Braulio Carrillo National Park, a 30-minute drive, you can reach the Braulio Carrillo National Park and the cable car, as well as the Barva Volcano within an hour's drive.
A horseback riding tour is offered on the slopes of Braulio Carrillo.
we are 15 minutes from Toucan Rescue Ranch."]

Title: Cozy West Virginia Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'Thanks for checking out our treehouse! It‚Äôs 4 minutes from downtown Shepherdstown and 15 minutes from downtown Harpers Ferry. We are excited to share it with other fun-loving folks! The treehouse has heat and AC, a tiny kitchen with a mini fridge, stove top, toaster oven, gravity-fed sink and kitchenware. There‚Äôs a bathhouse built on the back of the host‚Äôs home with a conventional toilet and shower. There‚Äôs also an outhouse with a light and essentials. We provide wood for the fire pit also.', 'The space', 'The space
The treehouse sits between oak and hickory trees 20 feet above a rock outcropping that overlooks our little holler. There is a 12x5 front porch with a good sunset view and lighting for nighttime enjoyment. Inside there is a nook with large windows to relax by, a mini kitchen with a gravity fed sink, mini fridge, dual cook top and toaster oven along with four stools. We provide kitchenware, pillows, bedding, towels and firewood for the outdoor fire-pit. The loft is more suited for kids but is fine for able-bodied adults as well. We do not provide bedding for the full mattress in the loft, only pillows. The bathhouse is on the back side of the host‚Äôs house and is about a 30 second walk from the treehouse. The outhouse is 50 feet from the treehouse and has a light and other essentials.

When you arrive, use the gravel driveway just beyond our home‚Äôs paved driveway that has two silver gates. You will see a sign that reads ‚ÄúWillbillys‚Äù and a school bus that you can park beside. The path to the treehouse begins along the left side of our large red workshop.

I live on a country road and my neighbors are like family, so make yourselves at home and feel free to check out our property. We have one other Airbnb, ‚ÄúCozy School Bus‚Äù, on the other side of our property.', '', '']

Title: Treehouse at Bliss Ridge Farm - Best View in VT
Description:
['About this space', "Dr. Seuss-inspired, luxury treehouse perched at the top of an 88-acre, organic hill farm, further surrounded by 1000s of acres of wilderness. Designed by B'fer Roth, DIY network TV show host of The Treehouse Guys, this is an authentic treehouse built within and around living trees. Enjoy private hiking from your door, & panoramic views of VT's Worcester range (Camel‚Äôs Hump, Mt. Mansfield, etc). You are truly secluded, yet only a 15-min drive from the heart of the Mad River Valley & Waterbury.", 'The space', 'The space
The treehouse is nestled in the edge of the woods at the top of the farm‚Äôs hay fields. Enjoy seclusion and incredible views, hiking, and quietude. There is a spring-fed pond available for swimming nearer to the farmhouse and farm events and dinners can be arranged.

The indoor space:
the queen bed, fold-out sofa, kitchen, living, bathroom, and patio with hammock, are all part of the main floor. There are two (10ft) lofts above; one with a double bed and one with a twin. The "bedrooms" are not closed off from one-another - see photos. The house is built within the trees, which move and creak subtly if it is windy. The toilet is the best composting toilet available ‚Äî it looks like a regular toilet and the waste closes behind a door, but note that it does not have a water flush. The shower is a hot (outdoor) shower on the front porch, with a curtain.

*Important Information Regarding The Treehouse at Bliss Ridge Farm*
We would like for you to understand a few important facts before you arrive...Being a tree house guest has its benefits and its limitations.
Building and caring for a treehouse in nature was a labor of love and not an easy endeavor. We hope that you will appreciate how special it is, enjoy the majesty of mother nature and at the same time will understand its limitations and respect our operating instructions. There is an explicit information sheet when you get here but we want you to be prepared ahead of time.
There is no electricity and no plumbing. However, there is a solar panel to provide you with lights and cell phone charging. Please note that cell phone service is limited to texting and sometimes a phone call.
There is a composting toilet which is very modern and clean but you need to follow the directions that are clearly posted.
There is hot and cold water for a kitchen sink, and an outside shower.
Because the treehouse is in the woods, nature will take over when it can, i.e. mice may come in in the fall to try and nest in warm places in Vermont. We hope that you do not leave food around to entice them. We monitor mouse traps so you will not have to deal with that.
Sometimes some rainwater may come down the large inside tree if it is windy and raining hard. We provide towels to put on the floor around the tree if this happens. (It stays in a small area around the tree)
If you have small children, we trust that you will take responsibility for them. Please monitor them on the loft stairs, help them to use the toilet properly, and don‚Äôt let them take food away from the dining tables that are inside and on the deck.
Being mindful of being in nature will help prevent mice, ants, and bugs and it will help us to keep the treehouse clean and smelling fresh.
We have an organic farm and respect nature and do not want to be wasteful. We hope that you will divide your garbage into recycling, trash, and compost (receptacles are clearly marked on the bridge) and please do not bring plastic water bottles onto the property. We will provide you with two x 2 gallon containers of fresh spring water and refill whenever you would like.
No smoking in the treehouse or on the decks please.
We wish you a wonderful, adventurous experience. If you have any questions,
please do not hesitate to ask.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
***we supply fresh, tested spring water! Please do not bring plastic water bottles! (Please do not buy or use plastic water bottles at all - they are ruining the earth!)

**We open the calendar for the following season at the end of the current season (late October). Our season runs between late April and late October.']

Title: Magical Treehouse: Secluded Mountain View Off-Grid
Description:
['About this space', 'You will have a truly unique experience sleeping 30 feet above the forest floor. Rock-a-bye, baby!

You get to go totally off-grid in this treehouse perched between two beautiful maple trees in a wooded forest in the countryside, with amazing views over a fields all the way to the stunning Endless Mountains.

This is your opportunity to reconnect. This is your chance to be in touch with the environment.

We are proud to be rated as Gold Key SuperHosts by Airbnb since 2014.', 'The space', 'The space
Your stay in the treehouse is off‚Äìgrid, thoroughly insulated and heated by a wood-burning stove, also we do supply you with a Jackery 1000 lithium battery generator to power the shower, or to charge your phone or laptop. We also use a composting toilet for the cleanest and most environmentally sensitive relationship to the surroundings.
You will learn firsthand what off‚Äìgrid glamping is like‚Ä¶and that includes a hot-water shower.
We will supply you with bed linens, towels, bath soap, shampoo, plates, cups, utensils, at least 2 1/2 gallons of fresh drinking water, pots and pans, grill utensils, salt and pepper, paper towels, a sink and dish soap, dish towels, toilet tissue, hand sanitizer, a camping percolating coffee pot, coffee cups, a flashlight, and some firewood (for the mini wood stove‚Äîsee amenity limitations).
Mobile phone service is definitely adequate for working from a tree. :-)', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have access to the entire treehouse area and surrounding 2 acres of woods. The field (downhill from the treehouse) is not our property. It is the field for our neighbor‚Äôs cows. Please respect his property by not trespassing.
This area of Mehoopany is referred to as Mehoopany Mountain. Atop the mountain sit wind turbines which power the local area with green energy.

The closest public transportation available is either in Scranton or Wilkes-Barre. Our guests drive their cars or rent one to get to the country.
Check in time is from 4 to 7 PM.', '', '']

You will find up there all this:
separate and isolate bedroom with double bed, kitchen with fridge and cooker, a shower with hot water, compost toilet, gaz heater and large terrace.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access

Title: Whispering Pines Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'Whispering Pines

One of a kind, beautiful, 2 storey tree house built on 8 pine trees, overlooking a ravine with an amazing view. Located only minutes from St. Catharines and Jordan Station in the heart of wine country. The tree house can sleep 2 adults and 1 child ( age 3 and up).', 'The space', 'The space
Your private space is located over 1000 feet (300 m) back from the road with easy access to free parking . Sitting 10 feet (3 m) off the ground, the treehouse is a perfect place to relax and unwind and spend time with nature.
The treehouse comes with 1 queen size bed on the upper level and the possibility of a fold out mattress for a child. The main floor has an eating area and basic kitchenette equipped with a bar fridge, Keurig coffee maker, toaster and microwave. No stove supplied. A bathroom with a shower is located on the main level. Enjoy your morning coffee on a large balcony overlooking the wooded ravine. Along the creek below you may hear or see ravine wildlife. The fully insulated premise has both heating and air conditioning for your comfort. Early luggage drop off available.
Children aged 3 and over are welcome.
Major grocery stores and restaurants are located 5 mins drive from treehouse.
Bring your bikes and enjoy the scenery of the beautiful Jordan area.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guest Access: self check-in with keypad,
guest can access the entire space', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Of Note
UNIT IS THOROUGHLY CLEANED AND DISINFECTED AFTER EACH GUEST LEAVES
*must navigate stairs to enter treehouse and bedroom (10 ft)
*no smoking or vaping on property
*no pets allowed
*no fires of any type because of treehouse location including candles and incense
*potential of noise - Treehouse is located on a farm property, adjacent to orchards and vineyards and there may be noises related to agricultural operations.']

Title: Mountaintop Luxury Treehouse at Selah Ridge
Description:
['About this space', "Located in Ringgold, Georgia, the treehouse sits in 16 acres of private property. It is minutes from Georgia's best wineries and some of the most desirable hiking, whitewater, and scenic activities in Chattanooga and the Tennessee Valley. Escape to our mountaintop retreat for solitude and tranquility.

All Military, Police, and Firefighters will receive a 15% discount on all week day stays. Thank you for your sacrifice and service!", 'The space', 'The space
For a full tour of the treehouse, please visit our Instagram (@SelahRidgeTreesort) and click on the "Tour" bubble below the profile.

Though plenty of activities are nearby for adventure, the treehouse provides sanctuary for the weary soul. An arched bridge connects the treehouse to the hot tub, custom-built in Alaska by Zen Bathworks. Made from aromatic cedar, you'll sooth away your worries as you breathe in the sweet mountain air.

Take in the views and sounds of the rustling trees while experiencing our spacious outdoor shower. Top off the night with a nice glass of wine, or roast smores on the balcony fire pit. At our treehouse you will not only enjoy the breathtaking views and the melodies of nature, but also unwind to the sound of the waterfall underneath. Bundle up in the warmth of the cozy indoors or bring in nature by sliding open the giant picture window. Our sweet escape makes kicking back in nature easy.

The treehouse is the perfect place for a romantic getaway for two. However, it can accommodate up to four guests comfortably with a full size trundle bed that pulls out from below the king bed if needed.

Our Treehouse is not currently equipped with wifi. It is our hope that this provides a much needed escape from the world and that you will enjoy being off the grid. However, if you find that plugging in is a necessity during your stay, there is great cell service. Any hotspots you provide should work well.']

Title: Modern Tree Dwelling w/Water Views+Cedar Hot Tub
Description:
['About this space', 'Stay in our custom designed tree dwelling w/ wood-fired cedar hot tub up among the trees! This unique structure is perched atop a 21-acre wooded hill sloping to water views. Enjoy stunning views from the King size bed through a wall of windows. Located in a classic coastal Maine village w/ Reid State Park's miles of beaches + famed Five Islands Lobster Co. (See 2 other tree dwellings on our 21 acre property listed on AirBnb as "Tree Dwelling w/Water Views." See our reviews!).', 'The space', 'The space
Part modern tree house, part tiny house, this abode is called "Souhegan" (which means "Watching Place") because of the gorgeous views of the river and neighboring conservation land. The dwelling consists of two elevated structures connected by a rope bridge (structures are elevated on posts and trees); a second rope bridge leads to a wood-fired cedar hot tub elevated up among the trees. We've used vintage and salvaged materials when possible. STRUCTURE #1: a two-story structure: master bedroom on the second floor (accessed via a SPIRAL STAIRCASE), with a wall of south facing windows affording stunning river views; includes KING SIZE BED (or two twin beds upon request); on the first floor is a small kitchen and dining area (with large windows for water views), a small full bathroom, and a screened-in porch with rockers and river views. Kitchen includes: two-burner stove, sink, small fridge, pots, pans, dishes, toaster oven (no regular oven) and, importantly, cork screw! STRUCTURE #2: is a convertible space with a wall of water-facing windows. UPON REQUEST (for an extra fee of $20 per person/per night, this fee includes labor of converting the living room space into a bedroom + extra linens and towels for the extra guests), we can set it up as a second bedroom (with either King size bed or two twins, do let us know at least one day in advance) or we can set it up as a living room space with sofas and coffee table. There is a water-facing veranda off the front of Structure #2.

PLEASE NOTE: as much as we love pets we have a strict no-pet policy in our dwellings!

There are 2 other tree dwellings on our 21 acre property listed on AirBnb as "Tree Dwelling w/Water Views." See our reviews!

AUTUMN VISITS: Come stay in the tree dwelling in Autumn for stunning views of foliage and crisp walks along the marsh back to the tree dwelling to warm up in the cedar hot tub. The dwelling is well insulated and warms up quickly with our top quality wall mounted heating units.

WINTER VISITS: The tree dwelling is open all year round. They stay super cozy on cold nights, and there is no better time of year to sit in the hot tub, snow flakes swirling around you. Warm up after a day of cross country skiing or snowshoeing.

THE VIEWS: Both structures have views across down the large tidal Back River. In the distance you can see where the Back River meets up with Kennebec River just before both flow into open ocean and past Seguin Island (where a light house was commissioned by George Washington). Across the Back River from the land lie hundreds of acres of pristine conservation land. Part of the year, this tree dwelling will be used for the Seguin Artist in Residence Program at the Seguinland Institute, which is under development. Use of KAYAK's and CANOE's are included with rental and available at anytime during your stay', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The space and the 21 acre property are yours. There are two other one-bedroom tree dwellings on the property, each well spaced out to give plenty of privacy. In addition, guests have access to adjoining 40 acre peninsula with docks, trails and cottages. The two other tree dwellings are also listed on AirBnb as "Tree Dwelling w/Water Views." Take note of our reviews.']

Title: Cottage in the Woods B&B "The Owls Nest"
Description:
['About this space', "This beautiful, newly constructed treehouse lifts guests into the trees with the peak of the structure reaching 30 feet into the air. This private, tiny home and balcony is all yours with no shared spaces.
Enjoy the ground level covered patio complete with furniture and a gas grill perfect for cookouts after long hikes at Rickett's Glen. Immerse yourself in the beautiful landscapes of this woodland experience. Perfect base for your outdoor adventure to Ricketts Glen State Park, only 2.5 miles.", 'The space', 'The space
The treehouse has a sleeping loft with two twin mattresses that easily slide together into a king bed (king sheets provided).
Also, the sofa on the main floor converts to a full sized bed. Comfortably sleeps a total of 4 guests.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The treehouse is accessed by many stairs and may not be suitable for small children or those with disabilities.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Yoy will have your own private patio area and firepit. Extendable forks for the firepit can be found in a black bag hanging on the grill. Breakfast is served at the main house and you are welcome to join.']

Title: Eagles Nest Treehouse ~ Hike/ Relax / Climb!
Description:
['About this space', 'Take in the rustic, fairy tale vibe of this custom-made treehouse in the midst of towering trees! Recline in a rocking chair and watch the sunset over the mountains, or try your hand at some stargazing on the "NEST" deck overlooking the forest while listening to the nightly sounds of the forest. In the morning, step out on the trailhead and explore the stunning forest. BOOK SOON!

If your travel dates are not available on this calendar, visit one of our sister properties by visiting our profile!', 'The space', 'The space
Relax at night while you listen to gentle owls and enjoy the twinkling stars above while you warm up near a home-made stone fireplace area with bulb strung lights encircling the area. In the morning, walk to the national trailhead location while the sun breaks through the trees as you hear the gentle stream of a nearby creek!

We are a RARE find in the area located on PRIVATE land, and one of the only rentals in the Red River Gorge that is located so conveniently INSIDE the National Park just walking distance to great nearby hiking trails! If your dates are unavailable, be sure to check out our other listings as well such as "The EY Breeze" and "Lions Lair" each providing its own unique accommodations.

This treehouse is one of our original builds and receives high reviews due to its unique build and amenities such as a swing underneath, a separate bedroom called "the nest" which is 16ft off the ground, and a handmade stone fireplace with ambient lighting.

We guarantee you this combination of outdoors & amenities provides a truly unique, adventurous, magical, and relaxing getaway experience with your friends or and loved ones! We look forward to having you stay with us, and be sure to book soon before it fills up fast!!

We look forward to having you stay with us, and be sure to book soon before it fills up fast!!', '', '', '', '']

Title: Little Goldies
Description:
['About this space', 'Free Whitewater Rafting Tour + Cozy, Charming Cabin + Glorious View', 'The space', "The space
Free Activities Included Every Day! To enhance your vacation experience, free admissions are included every day of your stay to some of the most popular attractions the area has to offer such as the Biltmore, Smoky Mountain Railroad, white water rafting, jeep excursions, and more! Daily value of $250.

Cabin is pet friendly ‚Äì Pet Fees Apply.

When you just need to sit back and enjoy the great outdoors on a modest budget, Little Goldie's is the place. This unassuming cabin is perched perfectly on the side of a rocky hill with an expansive view of the Great Smoky Mountains. But don't let the simplicity fool you, at Little Goldies cabin you have a steaming hot tub on the ample deck, and a comfortable queen bed inside. The basic kitchenette with washer and dryer, dishwasher, and small cooktop, added to the propane grill, are all you'll need to survive comfortably in the woods, so to speak. The housekeeping standards and luxury linens are included, and up to the standards of Watershed. What is even better, is that while you may seem hidden away in nature, miles from civilization, you can be wifi connected, have satellite TV, and are just 15 minutes to Bryson City.

All bookings are subject to local restrictions in place at the time of the stay. We may not be allowed to accommodate all bookings that are made if local rules change after you make a booking. We make every effort to communicate current, local rules and any changes to them."]
