Title: Treehouse Village - The Arrow
Description:
['About this space', "The Arrow is a classic, hit you in your heart, A-frame with the addition of a swinging rope bridge! What more could you want? This treehouse is a favorite and you'll see why! It is simple, yet cozy and comfortable. There is a queen-sized bed and a bathroom with a beautiful claw-foot bathtub. This is the perfect retreat for couples! (Not designed for children).", 'The space', 'The space
The Arrow is a classic A-frame with the addition of a swinging rope bridge. It is simple, yet cozy and comfortable. There is a queen-sized bed and a bathroom with a beautiful claw-foot bathtub.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You will have the whole treehouse to yourself!', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Since these are treehouses, you will need to e-sign a liability waiver. We are located in the woods so all animals and insects that come with nature, will be prevalent.
Since we are in a rural area, we have limited wifi available. Also, there is a long, hilly driveway. If the weather is rough, you will need to be careful. If you get stuck, we will assist you if we are available. A four-wheel drive vehicles is recommended if there is snow.']

Title: Bear's Pat'
Description:
['About this space', 'Cozy 15 m2 cabin on the edge of the forest perched 5 m on stilts.
Located at the Porte des Vosges, 25 minutes from Epinal, 40 minutes from Gerardmer Lake and the slopes in winter.
Many mountain bike trails in the village of Julien Absalon.
Possibility of booking by the week or on dates other than those displayed on request.', 'The space', 'The space
1 double bed on the mezzanine, 1 convertible bed in the living room. If you want to sleep on the net: provide a sleeping bag.
Kitchen with dining area, refrigerator, dishwasher, oven and microwave.
Bathroom with sink, shower and dry toilet.
Electric radiators for a warm atmosphere.

For cooking, you will have at your disposal organic eggs, olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper, herbs of Provence, flour, rice, pasta.
Breakfast is not served but you will find for your stay, homemade jam, 1/2 liter of milk as well as a serving of butter and a small brick of orange juice per person.
Coffee pods and tea will also be available in number.

No wifi, but very good 4G reception for SFR, good for Orange.

For reservations of 2 nights in winter we provide two bobs and will give you the location a toboggan spot 30 minutes away.', '', '']

Title: Icaco Treehouse:Rustic tiny treehouse by the river
Description:
['About this space', 'Icaco Treehouse is a tiny gem hidden away in the mountains of Rio Grande, just 25 minutes drive from the SJU airport and below the rainforest. The name comes from the first indigenous living here, meaning "God of the mountain"; who is said to protect us from natural disasters. It is nettled by the side of a peaceful arterial stream of the Esp√≠ritu Santo river, on a 9-acre farm with private entrance. A perfect place to relax, disconnect from the craziness out there and reconnect with nature.', 'The space', "The space
Because of the Covid situation, unfortunately, right now I'm not provided sheets, blankets, nor pillows for safety matters. Also, I don't host pets! I hope that you can understand me, and come to my place because you'll have the most amazing nature experience in the Caribbean. You'll love the beauty of the surrounds: including a rustic tiny house that comfortably fits 4 and provides basic amenities for a comfortable stay with a view of the Yunque National Rainforest. The first floor, is fitted with a small electric stove and water reservoir hand-pumped from the cristal clear stream connected to the sink and the shower below. Also, there is a basic bathroom with toilet paper.

The friendly, calm Esp√≠ritu Santo river lays at the doorstep. With its natural pools, it's the perfect place to chill with a beer and enjoy its shallow waters. Also, you'll be able to walk through a trail where you'll see many beautiful trees and birds.

Please be gentle with windows and mahogany surfaces. Take good care of this gem, so others can enjoy it as much as you, and you'll return. This is a property with full contact with nature. So insects, lizards and non-poisonous snakes bound around. The river is easily hike-able, but enjoy it at your own risk and be aware of rising water levels.", '', 'Guest access']

Title: Tradewinds Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'The Trade Winds Treehouse is simply our most luxurious getaway in the forest. Two twin treehouses perch side by side like owls roosting on a limb. It features full electricity, running water, heat, a private bathhouse, a slide, and even a hot tub!', 'The space', 'The space
*Important*
Access to this cabin requires driving up a gravel road with various steep sections. Most vehicles can make it, but we do recommend 4WD and/or high clearance. If your vehicle cannot make it, we can give you and your things a ride up.

Full Bathroom: featuring tile shower, flush toilet, hand sink, towel hooks, bath exhaust fan and more! Approximately 50 feet away from the two tree houses on a gravel path with night lighting. The bathhouse is a log cabin, which includes a living room area, loft with a full size bed, plus a comfy couch, & bar sink, (sleeps 3 total)

Full Compact Kitchen: featuring 3 burner stove, half size fridge, cookware, eating utensils, dish rack, kichten sink, rolling island with integrated cutting board, kitchen exhaust fan, and ample lighting. Interior seating in the kitchen is limited, but can accomodate 6 people with additional outside seating available.

Two treehouses: one master quarters with a queen mattress downstairs plus a sleeping loft for 1 additional person (sleeps 3 total), and the other features a kitchen downstairs, compact futon downstairs and sleeping loft with a full size mattress upstairs (sleeps 3 total)

Full electricity, plumbing, and flush toilet

SPRING-FED HOT TUB! Enjoy in the spring, summer and fall! We need to disconnect it when temperatures are below freezing. 

Amazing all natural location.

Ample parking for 3 or more cars.

Easy access to exceptional hiking trails and climbing areas, including several within walking distance.']

You have an open living and sleeping area, a kitchen, bathroom with walkin shower, a separate compost toilet and a large sunny terrace. In the garden barbecue, hammocks and a small pool to cool down.', 'The space', 'The space

Title: The Reed ‚Äì Cozy Cabin in the Woods
Description:
['About this space', 'Secluded cottage near Hocking Hills attractions. Scenic woods and ravines. Private stocked lake open for swimming, catch and release fishing and non-motor boats. Great for cozy nights inside by the fire or as a home base for exploring the Hills. There is a large gravel hill at the entrance to our cabin. 4-wheel drive is required with any severe weather conditions (ice, snow, heavy rain). Get ready to unwind and enjoy nature.', 'The space', 'The space
Stocked pond for fishing and swimming. Scenic views. Community area with shelter house and picnic tables. Plenty of books, movies, and games.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Full access to cabin and lot. Access to private lake and community areas including dock, shelter house, picnic area and basketball hoop.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
4WD is required for all severe weather conditions (ice, snow, heavy rain)']

Title: Skyview garden Tree House - Casa Kalitero
Description:
['About this space', 'Skyview Tree House - Casa Kalitero is a unique accomodation surrounded by olive groves and green. 5 to 10 min distance from Airport, Zakynthos town and Kalamaki Beach.

The Tree House is located behind a cypress hill, therefore not on a busy street. Zakynthos town is in 30 min walking distance. The combination of the ambience and privacy, makes Casa Kalitero Tree House the ideal place for an extraordinary and relaxing holiday. Enjoy the romantic nights with the panoramic sky view from your bed.', 'The space', "The space
The tree house is next to the main House Casa Kalitero. It's surrounded by the garden of the property with plenty space to relax. The tree house is fully lockable and weatherproof. Access is very easy and possible for everyone.

The tree house:
-Electricity
-Coffee machine with coffee and tea
-Water heater
-Flowing water
-Mini fridge & freezer
-Dishes
-Double bed (1.30 x 2m) with panoramic sky view
-Mini Bathroom with toilet and hairdryer
-WIFI
-Fan
-Insect screens on the windows
-Mini balcony with garden view

Outside the tree house:
-Free parking
-Private outdoor rain shower with warm water and changing room including bathrobes
-Covered terrace with relaxing area and dining table
-Sunbeds and umbrellas in the garden
-Access to the organic garden fruits", '', '', '', '', '', '']

Title: Peaceful Harbour Town Treehouse with Marsh Views
Description:
['About this space', "*Bathroom and kitchen renovations coming Spring 2022.*

Our Sea Loft is a great opportunity to stay in a unique treehouse-like space. It has the privacy of a single-family home, yet it's close to many amenities!

Please read the full detailed description for more information before booking. Hope to see you soon!", 'The space', "The space
Our home is unique because it offers the privacy of a single family home that is surrounded by trees and peaceful marsh views, but it's also in a fantastic location close to great dining, shopping, and activities in Harbour Town.

The Sea Loft is bright and airy inside with an open-concept kitchen/dining/living area with floor to ceiling windows throughout the home. It has one bedroom with a queen bed, but we are able to accommodate up to four people with a murphy bed and sleeper sofa in the living area.

Our home is clean, comfortable, and quiet. Please note that the current photos do not reflect the updates coming Spring 2022. New pictures to come!", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please note that the Sea Loft is pet free and smoke free. There are stairs on the property. There is a driveway area, but please note that it is not paved.']

Title: Hemlock Hill Hideaway - Treehouse Glamping Style!
Description:
['About this space', 'Welcome to Hemlock Hill Hideaway - a unique glamping experience while being minutes from Boone city limits!!

A perfect place to connect with nature!', 'The space', "The space
The treehouse is approximately 10'x10'. There is a loft consisting of a full-size mattress while facing a clear semi-see-through roof. A futon with a full-size memory foam mattress sits below it.

DURING THE WINTER MONTHS (NOVEMBER 7 TO TBD), there is a non-water portable toilet in a tent off the treehouse but NO sink or shower amenities. (Please see the picture provided.) We do not have the means to keep water from freezing when temperatures fall below freezing and do not want to risk damaging our bathroom items. You will need to bring water for cleaning and drinking.

PLEASE REMEMBER THAT WINTER IN THE MOUNTAINS CAN BE UNPREDICTABLE. We might have snow. We might not. We might have ice. We might not. If you decide to venture out here during the winter months, please be prepared to deal with snow and ice. The steps to the treehouse can get treacherous. We work very hard to keep our guests informed of the weather conditions - particularly bad weather. We are also not responsible for any accidents or injuries or damages to your vehicles that might occur as the result of the bad weather.

(During the spring, summer, and fall months, the bathroom will consist of a portable toilet and sink in a tent off the treehouse. A shower station sits on the other side of the treehouse. Although there is no plumbing, both have water. You would only need to bring drinking water for yourselves.)

There is electricity and WiFi. There is a cooler and an electric kettle available for you to use. Outside of the treehouse, there is a fire pit, a grill, a hammock, and a slide - plenty to do while relaxing in nature!

Please bring blankets/sleeping bags and pillows to sleep. (Both the foam mattress & futon will have freshly laundered sheets.)

A space heater is provided, but you will still need to make sure you bring plenty of blankets to keep warm. Also - be aware that plugging in too many devices along with the space heater can trip the breaker.

If you plan to use the grill, please bring your own charcoal. Grilling utensils are provided.

Firewood is provided for the fire pit.

Although smoking is allowed on the premises, we ask that you do not smoke inside the treehouse. If you decide to smoke, please clean up after yourselves.

Checking out is easy! We ask that you throw away your trash & recycles and return the key to the lockbox. We will take care of the rest! There is no need to refill the water or take the sheets off of the mattresses.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Please park in the designated parking area as shown in the picture.

We are located at the end of a quiet street - although we are minutes away from US-421 and all of the amenities the High Country has to offer!

1 mile - Pine Run Paddle Access for kayaking, canoeing, and tubing
2 miles - Food Lion
~4 miles - Blue Ridge Parkway entrance (we are close to two BR Parkway entrances)
4 miles - Rocky Knob Mountain Bike Park
4 miles - Brookshire Park
7 miles - Starbucks', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The hideaway is behind our backyard so you may see/hear us from time to time. There may be a cat or a dog running around although we find that they do not go out there as much without us.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask. Thank you!']

Title: Yocah√∫ Treehouse: rustic tiny house by the river
Description:
['About this space', 'Yocah√∫ Treehouse is a tiny gem hidden away in the mountains of Rio Grande, just 25 minutes drive from the SJU airport and below the rainforest. The name comes from the first indigenous living here, meaning "God of the mountain"; who is said to protect us from natural disasters. It is nettled by the side of a peaceful arterial stream of the Esp√≠ritu Santo river, on a 9-acre farm with private entrance. A perfect place to relax, disconnect from the craziness out there and reconnect with nature.', 'The space', "The space
Because of the Covid situation, unfortunately, right now I'm not provided sheets, blankets, nor pillows for safety matters. Also, I don't host pets! I hope that you can understand me, and come to my place because you'll have the most amazing nature experience in the Caribbean. You'll love the beauty of the surrounds: including a rustic tiny house that comfortably fits 4 and provides basic amenities for a comfortable stay with a view of the Yunque National Rainforest. The first floor, is fitted with a small electric stove and water reservoir hand-pumped from the cristal clear stream connected to the sink and the shower below. Also, there is a basic bathroom with toilet paper.

The friendly, calm Esp√≠ritu Santo river lays at the doorstep. With its natural pools, it's the perfect place to chill with a beer and enjoy its shallow waters. Also, you'll be able to walk through a trail where you'll see many beautiful trees and birds.

Please be gentle with windows and mahogany surfaces. Take good care of this gem, so others can enjoy it as much as you, and you'll return. This is a property with full contact with nature. So insects, lizards and non-poisonous snakes bound around. The river is easily hike-able, but enjoy it at your own risk and be aware of rising water levels.", '', '']

Title: Harbour Town Treehouse - Sea Loft in Sea Pines
Description:
['About this space', 'This unique treehouse, Le Beau Marais, has been featured on the hit TV Show, Island Life¬©, on HGTV¬© and is what vacation dreams are made of. Enjoy the newly expanded spacious deck where you are one with nature and where the deer will greet you as you sip your morning coffee. Walk to many shops and restaurants, HERITAGE PGA golf tournament, and the iconic Lighthouse in Harbour Town Yacht Basin. You have access to 3 private beaches in Sea Pines.', 'The space', 'The space
This 2022 renovated home features 2 private ensuite bedrooms and is a unique escape destination and one of Travel & Leisure‚Äôs¬© top Islands in the Americas with top-of-the-line comforts of any 5-star luxury rental or hotel suite. The treehouse is only rented out a few months of the year. If you find this, book it.

Le Beau Marais is in the thick of everything yet tucked away into a private and tranquil world that is perfect for clearing your mind and refreshing your soul.

You should not need to pack anything other than your, flip-flops, golf clubs, and a toothbrush. We hope we have included everything and anything you could ever desire or ask for.

Some of the luxuries featured in this home offers are:
Unique to Deer Island homes, this home features full-sized appliances.
A large deck has 4 Polywood¬© chairs to watch and enjoy the tides wildlife
Weber grill¬©
Premium Nector¬© memory foam/colling gel mattress
Bath products are Beekman 1802¬© bath amenities with make-up wipes
Sonos¬© Wi-Fi superior speaker system
Alexa¬© pucks
Apple TV¬© with Spectrum¬© App and upgraded cable
200Mg+ High-Speed internet
Secure eero¬© mesh Wi-Fi throughout
Propane Fire-pit (by request, extra fee)
Keurig¬© and Nespresso¬© machines
4 Tommy Bahama¬© backpack beach chairs, with umbrella, towels, etc.
USB¬© charging stations throughout
High thread count linens with several pillows
Each bedroom has alarm clocks, ceiling fans, earplugs, etc.
Fully provisioned kitchen including cookware, bakeware, drinkware, wine and beverages, coffee, condiments, breakfast necessities, snacks, and the usual condiments.', '', '', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
This home is pet-free, smoke-free, and not a good fit for families with children under 2. The exterior staircase will be difficult for small children.']

Title: Ti Kas (small house)
Description:
['About this space', "Ti Kas is all wood, with one bedroom with a king size bed, complete kitchen, saloon with smart TV with WiFi connection & sofa. In case of a third person, an extra bed will be provided. One toilet inside & bath on the balcony. From the guest balcony there's a wonderful view of the ocean & neighbouring Martinique. Lush greenery & birds surrounds our property, including seven varieties of mangoes, Lime, Lemon & sour orange trees. Yoga & mediation place is available. Please see pics for more.", 'The space', "The space
You will have an opportunity to be one with nature. Bamboo plants, bird song and clean fresh air. Tropical rains are also welcome since it helps maintain the lush green so abundant all around. It's also a quiet getaway from all the distractions. Tropical plants are on location,...Coconut, six varieties of Mangoes, Bananas, Avocado, Lime, Lemon, Soursop and the famous sour Orange trees among other trees. . . . .", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Please see pictures of entire property that are listed.. Since the gate is automatic, an electronic key will be issued to guests upon arrival, for their convenience.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Private parking is available to all guests. The La Toc and Vigi beach can be reached after 10 minutes driving. There's a hospital nearby where COVID-19 test can be done if YOUR country requires it for reentry."]

Title: Cabin Sutton 252 - In harmony with nature!
Description:
['About this space', "Right in the heart of nature!!
Beautiful luxury chalet perched in the trees. A beautiful place to relax in complete privacy with the sound of the small adjacent river. The cottage has all the amenities, a king bed, as well as a spa among trees. Located in the heart of nature, you will find relaxation and fresh air! Come on a romantic or family getaway, you'll want to come back!
CITQ: 295137", 'The space', 'The space
The cottage is located close to several beautiful hiking trails at the edge of a small river and at the foot of Mount Sutton where you can do many outdoor activities such as downhill skiing, mountain biking and hiking.
For golf lovers Les Rochers Bleus awaits you.
For a different activity, try the Au Diable Vert aerial hike.
Guests can also enjoy microbrewery beers in the village of Sutton and other surrounding villages.

Weekly, monthly or seasonal rental.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access

Title: Cozy Treehouse near Helen, Ga
Description:
['About this space', 'This treehouse is one of a kind and made out of recycled materials placed 20ft up a tree! It is a cozy place to relax and be completely surrounded by nature, there is no water or electricity. It is located about a 1/2 mile from our check-in office/parking. Cars are not allowed at the camping sites, and parking is available at the main office. They are hike in or we will provide transportation only once at check in and once at check out.', 'The space', 'The space
Made of of recycled materials and placed 20ft up a tree, the treehouse is a cozy place with one bedroom, three beds, and back deck with table and chairs for relaxing. Please be aware that there is no water or electricity. Sometimes in summer months it still be very warm at night! The treehouse is in a remote location. Commercial vehicles are not allowed at the site. You must leave your car at our main office and then either hike in or be shuttled in.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests cannot drive their car to the treehouse. Parking is available in a gravel lot at our main office. We will transport guests once upon check-in and once at check-out. Any other time you must walk.

There is an outhouse directly across from the treehouse and regular bathrooms and showers are conveniently located at our main office along with wi-fi.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The Treehouse is located about a 1/2 mile from our check-in office/parking. We will provide transportation once at check-in and once at check-out. We have maps to get you to downtown Helen from via the Hardman Farm trail located across the street from our main office.

Guests need to bring pillows and sleeping bags. They are not provided. All that is provided is the shelter and mattresses.

This is just like camping except instead of a tent you are using our shelter. Plan to bring any supplies you would need if you were camping.

Tents can be pitched next to the treehouse for an extra $10 per tent.

Please let us know if you will be arriving after hours so we can make arrangements for you. You can check in late via no contact check in!']

Title: Chasing Fireflies Treehouse- NEW!! Treehouse sits adjacent to the Great Smoky Mountain National Park
Description: ['About this space', 'Newly constructed in 2021...the Chasing Fireflies treehouse is perched over 15 feet up among the trees! Complete with modern amenities and oversized windows, enjoy the calm peaceful view from this treehouse bordering the Great Smoky Mountains National Park. Let nostalgic memories of your youth come back to life when you stay at the Chasing Fireflies treehouse. This Farmhouse style treehouse has oversized windows that will bring the outdoor beauty in and is full of modern amenities, while providing you whimsical and enchanting experience.The Chasing Fireflies treehouse sits adjacent to the Great Smoky Mountains National Park at the base of Cove Mountain in Wears Valley. This open concept 1 bedroom, 1 bath treehouse sleeps up to 4 people. The treehouse is full of amenities. In addition to a queen bed and sofa bed, it offers a full size bathroom & shower and kitchenette. Chasing Fireflies has oversized windows which provide a feeling of having the National Park in your living room. Regardless of the season, relax in the air-conditioned or heated treehouse after your day‚Äôs activities. The kitchen has a 2 burner cook-top, refrigerator, and combo convection/microwave oven. Enjoy your favorite show on the 55" big screen smart-TV or use the free WI-FI. When you arrive at the Chasing Fireflies treehouse, you will experience the life-like flashing and flickering lights of fireflies; along with firefly decor in the treehouse. While your treehouse sits in the trees, you access Chasing Fireflies via the set of stairs (30 steps) & catwalks or a service set of 15 stairs. The outsides decks provide ample outdoor seating and viewing areas. Use the decks to sit and relax, or dine outside in the fresh mountain air. At night, Chasing Fireflies transforms into a nightly light display with over 150 feet of outdoor lights.', '', '']

Title: Tree house eco lodge
Description:
['About this space', "If you're looking for an immersive jungle experience while retaining creature comforts and staying close to civilisation, this gorgeous open-plan tree house is just the place!", 'The space', 'The space
Highlights:
- Open plan bedroom and living area with chairs and table comfortably situated to witness the magnificence of nature
- The space can accomodate 2 to 4 people with 1 double bed and 1 extra double matress
- Proper bathroom with a WC and a shower overlooking the jungle
- Fall asleep and wake up to the sounds of the jungle
- Live among tree tops
- Observe the unique flora and fauna', 'Guest access', "Guest access
You can easily get here without a 4x4 and park on the property. A quiet gravel road takes you from the main road (costanera) to the tree house (1km drive).

What's nearby:

You're really well connected here - there is a choice of restaurants around here (including the famous farm to table gourmet reservation only dining experience), one of the most beautiful beaches in the area (Playa Hermosa 2km away) with great surf, cacao tour, medicinal plants tour and more.

Uvita is just 8km away - with Ballena Marine National Park is nearby, known for its humpback whale migration and the land bridge that appears at low tide to Punta Uvita and its iconic whale-tail rock formation.

Domincal surfer town with a good choice of vegan and non-vegan restaurants, bars, good surf and cool vibe. - 14km", '', '']

Title: Hacienda in the branches
Description:
['About this space', 'Have you ever dreamed of sleeping in the trees? Like a Peter Pan?
As a little child you wanted to have your house high in the branches?
Our "hacienda in the trees" makes your dream come true.
But when it blows, that the hell's moves. Are you ready for it?', 'The space', 'The space
We offer, not just overnight accommodation, in a unique building. Nowhere else in the Giant Mountains such a facility to stay open throughout the year, you will not find.
There is NO NETWORKING: NO electricity, NO gas, NO water, NO stoves, NO fireplaces and even NO Wifi. Thats means NO HEATING !!! Just and only pure nature!
It is strictly forbidden to use open fire (candles, stoves, etc.)!!!! Only LED lamps please!', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
If you settle in our Hacienda in the branches, we will arrange for free, using of toilets and showers on Mountain chalet Port√°≈°ky (portasky.cz). You can order breakfast, lunch and dinner. You can also subscribe to our specialties delivered almost to your sleeping bag (all for fee).', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
You are not the usually forest. The behavior of visitors, subject to the rules of KRNAP. Our forest is unique in that it will stay overnight and in the morning you will be amazed at how much wildlife around you through. Of course you can not make a noise!']

Title: Treehouse Village - The Shack
Description:
['About this space', "The Shack is what dreams are made of! Enter over a 40 foot swinging bridge, then step into a house in the woods! There is a full bath, a kitchenette, and a day bed/ lounge area on the main floor. A European style ladder takes you up into the loft where you'll find your queen-sized bed sleeping area. Outside you can warm by the fire on a deck large enough for the family.", 'The space', "The space
The Shack is what dreams are made of! Enter over a 40 foot swinging bridge, then step into a house in the woods! There is a full bath, a kitchenette, and a day bed/ lounge area, that doubles as another bed to sleep at night, on the main floor. A European style ladder takes you up into the loft where you'll find your queen-sized bed sleeping area. Outside you can warm by the fire on a deck large enough for the entire family.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You will have the whole treehouse to yourself!', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Since these are treehouses, you will need to e-sign a liability waiver. We are located in the woods so all animals and insects that come with nature, will be prevalent.
Since we are in a rural area, we have limited wifi available. Also, there is a long, hilly driveway. If the weather is rough, you will need to be careful. If you get stuck, we will assist you if we are available. A four-wheel drive vehicles is recommended if there is snow.']

Title: The  treehouse of Cerro Verde. ECORREFUGIO
Description:
['About this space', 'You'll love my place because it has magic and is special. It is in the middle of a primary tropical wet forest at 3,000 meters above sea level at 33 km from Cll 82 with Kr. 7 of Bogota (+/- 55 min. ) or 25 min. from "La Calera", you will find a very comfortable and well-equipped cabin.
Built at 8 m high, in the canopy of the trees, with good views, birds, moss, bromeliads and ravines.
On a sidewalk of good and friendly farmers, easy to get to. It's an unforgettable experience.', 'The space', 'The space
You can arrive by car or there are public buses from La Calera that leaves you about 1 km from the Cabin.
It is very cozy and quiet.
It is a very beautiful region, very quiet and safe and very close to Bogot√°.
You can go for a walk to the Chingaza National Natural Park, where the water is born for Bogot√°.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The forest is beautiful and 300 m away there is a very clean and very cold water stream.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
It is recommended to bring boots and good raincoat to walk comfortably and warm clothes to be in the house.
It's always nice to wear warm clothes and a raincoat.
There are several very nice walks and walks in the region and sometimes very humid and cold.
The walk to Chingaza is very close, it is beautiful and unique...!! You need to buy the tickets in advance to enter the Chingaza Natural National Park. I can present them with a foundation that also allows you to enter the park more easily and they have very good guides."]

Title: Casa Cascada: a unique cabin with waterfall
Description: ['About this space', 'Casa Cascada is a unique cabin in the middle of the forest with a stuning waterfall just in front of the balcony. The place is located in a private green comunity with no neighbors. The place is perfect for couples who want to disconnect from the world and connect between them and nature. Get away from the hustle and bustle and enjoy this quiet cabin in the middle of the forest. Follow us on insta! @casa.cascada', 'The space', 'The space\nCasa Cascada is a wood cabin built right over a serene waterfall, and is a perfect private romantic getaway. The studio-sized cabin features a king bed, as well as a larger hanging covered patio suited for entertaining or lounging. The lounge chair on the terrace is a perfect place to sit and read while listening to the sounds of the waterfall and creek.']

Title: Magical Jungle Tree House with Hot Springs
Description:
['About this space', 'No children under 5 years of age for safety reasons. The hand-crafted Magical Jungle Tree House is one of 3 casitas and 2 treehouses at the Bio Thermales natural resort organically integrated into our 35 acre rainforest. Guests enjoy free 24 hour access to the 12 natural hot and cool springs pools of various temperatures and rainforest trails.', 'The space', 'The space
The Magical Jungle Tree House is handcrafted with many artistic wood work and furniture, a tile bathroom with a flash on-demand water heater for the shower, and a nicely laid out and well equipped kitchen. It is set back a bit in the rainforest, but still close to the hot and cool springs. The balcony almost completely surrounds the tree house.

Our hot springs are ancient ‚Äúdeep Earth‚Äù sources that bubble up through the rainforest floor, laden with mineral-rich waters that have been in the Earth for at least 10,000 years. Our waters are rich in bicarbonates, calcium and magnesium, low in sulfur, and slightly acidic -- qualities shared by many of the world's best hot springs.

Five of our 9 organic form hot springs pools are located in the rainforest, and 4 hot springs pools as well as a small and a large cool spring swimming pool are located in a meadow, surrounded by rainforest (see below for more information). The small and large cool springs pools both have water slides, and there is a small water slide in one of the shallow and moderate temperature pools for small children.

Note on wifi -- we have a fiber optic cable to the main office that is about 98% reliable, but had to install repeaters to bring wifi signal to the casitas and tree houses. The repeaters are not as reliable, especially in bad weather. However, we can help you send or receive email one way or another via the fiber optic cable.

The Treehouse is built to strict Costa Rican building codes.

To see all our listings, including the Colibri Casita3, please go to https://www.airbnb.com/users/show/54000 and on the left side of the page three listings will show. At the bottom of them, click on ‚ÄúView all listings‚Äù to see all 5 listings.

You can check availability of each accommodation by clicking on the "Calendar" tab above the main photo on each listing.

Treehouse features: (see floor-plan for all details):
‚Ä¢ Perched high among the rainforest trees, the Tree House has large screened areas for circulation of naturally cooler breezes. It also has fans.
‚Ä¢ All onsite hot springs and recreation activities included, including 24 hour access to the hot springs and cool spring swimming pools
‚Ä¢ The Treehouse2 is all on one floor, with a Queen sized bed with orthopedic mattress and hypoallergenic bedding.
‚Ä¢ There is also a twin-sized bed that can double a a settee with hypoallergenic bedding
‚Ä¢ Hand-crafted rustic furniture from naturally harvested trees on the land
‚Ä¢ Main floor kitchen with refrigerator, micro-wave, rice-cooker, coffee maker, basic kitchenware
‚Ä¢ Bathroom with flash on-demand hot-water heater
‚Ä¢ Wrap around balcony for relaxing and animal and bird watching
‚Ä¢ Laundry service at $5 charge per load
‚Ä¢ Short walk to rainforest and hot springs pools
‚Ä¢ No telephone or television
‚Ä¢ WiFi internet for your laptop -- if reliable 24 hour internet is essential to you, please message us for suggestions.
‚Ä¢ Hosts Kathy and Bernie live onsite
‚Ä¢ Languages: English, Spanish, German
One time $10 cleaning fee; thereafter housecleaning services every 3 days are free.
Bio Thermales Hot Springs features:
‚Ä¢ Our hot springs pools are all-natural mineral water just as it flows from the Earth
‚Ä¢ Rainforest Pools from 90¬∞ - 102¬∞F (31¬∞ - 40¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Grotto Pools in meadow flow from the 104¬∞F/42¬∞C source pool onward into two larger and progressively cooler pools which are handicap-accessible and suitable for small children.
‚Ä¢ Cool Pool in meadow is 90¬∞F/31¬∞C mineral water flowing from the thermal creek
‚Ä¢ 2 Swimming pools with continuous flow of natural cold spring water (88 degrees) - one is 1 to 1.5 meters deep, and the larger is 1.6 meters deep.
‚Ä¢ Bathhouse in meadow with handicap accessible bathrooms and showers
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúRanchos‚Äù ‚Äì roofed tables with concrete floors and grills for picnics
Other Activities on our 35 acre rainforest reserve:
‚Ä¢ Bird-watching: many types of toucans, oropendulas, parrots, hummingbirds, and the rare green macaw
‚Ä¢ Rainforest: enjoy it from the casita porch or hot springs pools, take easy walks on paths or more adventurous hikes
‚Ä¢ Fossils ‚Äì enjoy our collection or hunt (gently) for your own
‚Ä¢ Wildlife: two-toed sloths, iguanas, capuchin and mantled howler monkeys, tree frogs, birds, butterflies, and many others.

We are a 45 minute drive from the many activities in Fortuna and Volcano Arenal -- such as ziplines, hanging bridges, white water rafting, slow river floats or kayaking through wildlife sanctuaries -- or a 1.5 hour drive to La Paz Waterfall Gardens and Volcano Poas.

Bio Thermales Hot Springs is open to the public for day use of the hot springs, and most of our day visitors are Costa Ricans, so you may also meet new Tico friends. Bio Thermales is generally not crowded, however, except on major holidays and Sundays.

Food/Meals: The Tree House has a kitchen. There are many restaurants and a good supermarket within a 15 minute drive. Traditional Costa Rican meals can be delivered from a local caterer for very reasonable prices (Costa Rican food is tasty but not spicy). Otherwise, for those without cars, we can call a taxi or try to synchronize a food shopping trip when we go to town for errands.

Three hours of daylight are needed to safely drive here from the SJO airport before sunset at 5:30 pm. The drive through mountainous cloud forests is splendid in daylight, but prone to fog and rain, especially at night, creating hazardous visibility conditions after dark. Finding our countryside location will also be far easier if you arrive the first time before sunset. If your plane lands in the morning to noon at SJO airport ‚Äì or 11:00 am at Liberia airport -- you can drive here directly from the airport. Otherwise, it is safer to book a room near the airport on your first night, or ask us to book a private driver and have a rental car delivered at no extra charge.

Last night in Costa Rica:
Driving directly to the airport on the same day is possible if you book a flight in the afternoon. Please be aware that you must be at the airport 2.5 hours before departure. If you have an early morning departing flight it is basically necessary to stay near the airport on the night before.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests enjoy free access to the hot springs, swimming pools and rainforest trails from 9 am to 10 pm.

Laundry: we have a full laundry facility and we will do laundry for $5 per load (wash, dry and fold).', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Day visitors and groups are permitted entrance to use the hot springs and cool springs pools from 9 am to 6 pm. There are usually more day visitors on weekends, especially Sundays, and we recommend booking week days for more tranquility and privacy. If guests book a longer reservation that includes a Sunday, we recommend planning a day tour in the many nearby activities on Sundays. Day visitors must leave by 6 pm, and only casita and Tree House guests may use the pools after 6 pm and enjoy unlimited access to the pools, with the exception of no nighttime use of the forest pools, and cleaning schedule as noted above.

We recommend either ordering a catered dinner in advance for your first evening and/or next morning breakfast, or buying and bringing groceries to cook because we are 4 km from the main paved road and driving after dark is highly discouraged until drivers have quite some experience on Costa Rican roads. Also, most guests prefer to settle in upon arrival and not to have to get back in the car and drive out to dinner. We provide a Catering Menu to each guest once reserved, but the caterer requires advance notice of selected meals and TIMES guests would like meals delivered. We do not have a liquor license and guests must bring their own beer/wine/rum etc. The tap water is safe to drink, and we sell soft drinks, fruit juices, and other non-alcohol beverages, snacks and ice cream.']

Title: Private wooden cabin with power and double bed
Description:
['About this space', 'In our woods, 50 meters from the parking lot, you get your own tree house. Input power for charging mobile, computer, etc. We made your bed.
You will have access to hot water so that the outdoor shower will be comfortable.
The fire pan is ready outside. Electric heater in the cabin.
Very good breakfast on the door can be ordered.
For other cooking; bring primus or similar. We have plastic storage boxes for food etc. A really nice place, romantic. And completely private.', 'The space', 'The space
A great starting point for Romsdalseggen, Rampestreken and via ferrata at √Öndalsnes. Ice fjord is a gem!

We always respond quickly to messages and are excited to welcome you.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
You have the forest to yourself, romantically and privately.
Own electric heater in the cabin, so it doesn't get cold.

Parking between the garage and the black main house upon arrival.

Hot water can be found in the tap in front of the black main house.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
New this year:
* Sauna! We offer the riverside sauna, this one you can easily book yourself via our websites. There is also an outdoor shower with fresh river water included in the bath rental. Good cook, daring to swim in the river?

* Breakfast in bed? We offer homemade rolls, eggs from local farm, coffee, butter, juice, happy salmon and other snacks - high quality, lots organic - delivered in a great picnic basket at the gate of the tree house every morning at 8.30. 290 kr per person. To be ordered no later than 5 pm the day before.']

Title: Tahkuna tree-house
Description:
['About this space', 'A unique, cozy and modern tree house, located in a picturesque pine forest, will envelope you in peace and quiet and bring unforgettable memories. You will find yourself surrounded by nature, with easy access to secluded, endless beaches and crystal-clear sea. The rustling of trees, singing of birds and star gazing in the night will be all you need to forget the busy rhythm of city life. You will explore ancient lighthouses and see many other unique and abundant sights of Hiiumaa Island!', 'The space', "The space
Sorry, there is no electricity now. You will find comfort and peace in our cozy house. The lower spacious floor contains a kitchen with all the necessities, such as a gas grill, a washstand, a dinner table, as well as a hammock. The upper deck is a relaxation zone with two chaise lounges and a small table. Inside the living room is a fireplace/wood burner which can be used for cooking or boiling water. The room also has a double bed with a pull-out bed extension for two more people, a table with chairs and a storage chest. Big windows offer majestic views of the forest. The house is insulated, there's a fireplace inside, so you will be warm even in the colder months of spring and autumn. Electricity is supplied by solar panels. A lovely fire pit with benches is set up on a meadow near the house. Close by, there are an outside shower cabin and a toilet. You will find supermarkets, bars, cafes, a bank, a pharmacy, and a hospital in picturesque town of K√§rdla 15 km away. The sea is an easy 800 m walk from the house.
In addition to the wonderful forest and the sea, the island has a lot of amazing things to see - ancient lighthouses, the old Suuremeyza estate, an open-air ethno-museum (an old peasant farm), there are also tennis courts, a golf course, horses, excursions to seals and etc. and so on.
The cozy town of K√§rdla (15km) with supermarkets, bars, cafes, rental cars and bicycles.
All sorts of festivals are held on the island (jazz, classical music, etc.), Cafe Day, Jan Day, craft fair and many others.
Also yacht parking, beaches for surfers and kiters.
We hope you will enjoy staying at our tree house and have a great time on the magic Hiiumaa Island!"]

Title: A TREEHOUSE! Adventure! Support Organic Farming!
Description:
['About this space', 'Cozy, Rustic, Authentic Treehouse for two by a babbling brook. Full Bed w/Linens & Towels. Shared Bathrooms
11 acre Organic Vegetable Farm supplies local restaurants, French Broad Food Co-op, and Farmers Market.', 'The space', 'The space
Rustic, Cozy Treehouse has a full-size bed. Candlelight adds to the memorable experience. There is no electricity in the Treehouse. Shared Bathroom. Fire Ring. Charcoal grill. Two Bathrooms w/Showers (Outdoor Shower is closed in winter)', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests are welcome and encouraged to walk all 11 acres of our organic farm, including the woodlot, the creek, and the vegetable fields. Access to the greenhouses is restricted. Your room completely private. The farm itself is shared with other guests and farm family.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Common courtesy please.
Do NOT throw cigarette butts, garbage, cans, bottle caps, etc in the fire pits!
There is a dumpster at the Farm Entrance.
PETS must be friendly to other dogs and people.
Pets CANNOT be left unattended while you are off the farm - if you leave, they go with you.
If you consume alcohol, it must be confined to your personal space. All guests and residents must be enjoying themselves. Any excessive noise, obnoxious behavior, or general disrespect will not be tolerated. You will be put out for drunkenness. No refund. I am sole judge, jury, and Hangman if has to go that far.
Smoking allowed on the farm. Stay a reasonable distance away from buildings, crops, and other guests. No smoking - of any substance - in the Barn or the Treehouse - or the Bathrooms. No butts on ground, ever.
WARNING
Under North Carolina law, there is no liability for an injury to or death of a participant in an agritourism activity conducted at this agritourism location if such injury or death results from the inherent risks of the agritourism activity. Inherent risks of agritourism activities include, among others, risks of injury inherent to land, equipment, and animals, as well as the potential for you to act in a negligent manner that may contribute to your injury or death. You are assuming the risk of participating in this agritourism activity.']

Title: Nights of Cimes - La Grande Cabane du Mauret
Description:
['About this space', 'Unusual accommodation open all year round : dream cabins, just for you, perched 10 meters in the trees (easy and secure access). Isolated from everything, calm is guaranteed for an unforgettable night in the heart of the forest, as a lover, family or friends, ideal as a gift to those we love.', 'The space', "The space
Perched between two magnificent trees, the large Mauret hut is both comfortable and rustic. Access is from a wooden staircase and then from two walkways fully secured by a net that leads directly to a large terrace. Inside many windows create a bright atmosphere and allow you to fully enjoy the surroundings. And its great asset is its second terrace perched on a part of the roof, to fully live this unique adventure.
It is equipped with dry toilets, kitchenette with gas and sink, gas heating, tables and chairs inside and on the terrace, solar electricity (lamps).
This cabin doesn't have a shower. We provide towels and gloves for a rustic toilet at the kitchen sink.
The living area has two convertible sofas. Upstairs there is a large room under the roofs. In all, the hut is designed to accommodate up to seven people in a hotel formula, that is to say clean and prepared beds... you do not have to bring any sheets and breakfast is provided."]

Title: Treehouse 10 minutes from Biarritz
Description:
['About this space', 'Near the sea and the mountain, come and relax in a refuge 10 minutes from Biarritz. Perched on stilts at more than 3 m, surrounded by trees in a lush garden, the hut is fully equipped for you to enjoy a great comfort in the middle of nature. The fully-equipped summer kitchen is under the hut and the toilet is at its foot. You will wake up to bird song, optional organic breakfast at ‚Ç¨5, ‚Ç¨9 or ‚Ç¨12/pers. except from April 16 to May 2.', 'The space', 'The space
Come and try the unusual and poetic experience of living in a warm and comfortable hut.
High quality king size bedding of 180.
Linens and towels are of course included in the service.
Washable slippers are available for your stay.
For the toilet, you have the choice between the cosy of a bathtub inside and the exotic of an outdoor shower (but under shelter) .
A bottle of wine from our reserve or local apple juice is offered.
Ranked 2 Star furnished tourist accommodation.
From April 16 to May 2 without optional breakfast service.
Please read the house rules in full .', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You will also enjoy the lush garden, from sunny days a ping pong table, a slackline in summer, a barbecue...A small "grocery store" is available on request with local and/or organic products.
Possibility to buy bottle of champagne.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
A radiator will warm up chilly nights, and a ventilator will cool down hot days.
We do not accept credit cards for the payment of breakfasts or possible cleaning fees ( only cash, check ).
Please take a minute to read the rules of procedure .
For breakfast, you can choose the French breakfast at ‚Ç¨9 (tea or chocolate coffee, toast with honey jam butter, hot croissant, milk specialty, orange juice or local apple) or Canadian breakfast at ‚Ç¨12 (the same as the French with pancakes or eggs to choose from) or the autonomous menu at ‚Ç¨5 (like the French breakfast without the croissant or the milk specialty) arranged the day before in the summer kitchen. All 3 organic except croissants. (EXCEPT for April 16 to May 2, when the rental will be autonomous )']

Title: Tree House
Description:
['About this space', 'Tree House Rakhiv Plai is located in the mountains (5 km from the city of Rakhiv by mountain road). The booth has everything you need for a short and long stay. The house is located on a tree that leads to the stairs. There is a veranda with an incredible view of the city on one side and the Montenegrin Ridge on the other.', 'The space', 'The space
The house is located on a tree. Inside there is:
- Bathroom: shower stall, washbasin, toilet;
- Studio room: sofa, kitchenette, refrigerator, table, chairs;
- Beds are on the second floor of the house - under the attic.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
Guests can order a sauna, a vat, a phyto-barrel for a fee.
- Table tennis, trampolines, children's slides, swings - free of charge for guests"]

Title: Treehouse Resnice
Description:
['About this space', 'My place is close to public transport, the airport, the city center, parks, art and culture, Plitvice lakes, capital town Zagreb, 4 rivers. You‚Äôll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, the people, the outdoors space, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).', 'The space', 'The space
My place is situated in abandoned village, there is no electricity so it is ideal for robinson tourism.
Sorrounded with two pristine rivers, untouched nature, it is perfect for your relaxing time that you will always remember....
I also have canoes, bikes and quad vehicles to make your stay more adventures.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Once you arrived in town of Karlovac I will meet you and guide you to my place.']

Title: Providence area TreeHouse Farm Stay
Description:
['About this space', 'Unique, charming, spacious, private tree house overlooking working diversified family farm. Enjoy solitude surrounded by only the sounds of nature and our farm animals. Woodstove heats the space for cozy 4 season get-aways. Fire wood and lanterns are provided. This is a popular off-the-grid space. Please look at our Vintage Airstream and Providence Area Camper if you require additional space or electricity.
Ask about our special whole weekend or multiple night pricing!', 'The space', "The space
This is a spacious though rustic off the grid accommodation in the trees overlooking our farm fields to the south and the forest to the north. Fresh breezes blow through the open windows in the warm weather and the wood stove keeps the space cozy and warm in the cooler seasons. If light, air and views are what you are looking for this is the place. Working sustainable farm: vegetables, dairy goats, livestock guardian dogs, cats, heritage hogs, poultry, horses, sheep and a water buffalo! Please leave your pets home so as not to stress our animals.
If you need more space please see our other listings; Vintage Airstream and 28' camper.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The tree house has no electricity (lanterns are provided) or plumbing. The Tree House is marked with a sign on the driveway. There is no lock on the door. There is a composting toilet close by, a spacious outdoor shower on the pond side of our house and a "real bathroom" available in the house for cold-weather guests. There is a charcoal grill for use by our guests. You must provide the charcoal and ice.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
As a Tree House in the woods, on a working farm, please anticipate that u might experience some insects and hear various animal sounds. Please bring insect repellent if u think you might want it. Expect that u will hear the sounds of the crickets, katydids, tree frogs, song birds, wood peckers, owls, coyotes, rooster, peacocks, cats, dogs or other animals. If u would like to explore the farm, fields, woods, etc, you might want to bring boots depending on the weather...
There are several breakfast spots in close proximity. Both Providence and Warren RI are great destination spots and meccas of great restaurants. We are happy to give you recommendations.
Our daughter calls the Tree House home when she is on the farm. You will be staying in her personal space with her personal furnishings and possessions. Please be respectful!
If the TH is not available when you want it, please check out our Vintage Airstream and Working Farm Providence Area Campers']

Title: Caeiro's Tree by the Beach
Description:
['About this space', 'Beautiful self-built wooden tree house situated on top of a horizontally-grown pine tree. Only a 5 minute walk from the sea which borders the property. Two skylights allow you to enjoy the trees, the blue sky and the birds above. Plenty of privacy and space around the house and a sunbed for lazing about. The land is part of the natural park, has stunning views across the ocean & amazing sunsets.
The cabin is decorated with handmade details, has a comfortable double bed, a fridge & gas stove.', 'The space', "The space
Directly- on the sea-front this self-sustained Eco-treehouse is a 20 min walk away to nearby Foz beach and it is the last sea-front accommodation between Lisbon and Cabo Espichel. The rocky sea pools are only 5 min. away.
The treehouse is the proud highlight of the 'Cantinho Alberto Caeiro's' project celebrating the poetry & philosophy of our famous poet: Fernando Pessoa. The love for nature which he expresses can be found in this lovely space in the middle of a protected nature area. We let nature speak for itself without the need for any fancy adornments, keeping its wilderness and raw beauty. The shower outside is sun-warmed, using recycled scaffolding material and wood. We try to recycle and up-cycle: we used old wine bottles for lamps and restored an old Oak-tree door. The wooden bed is self-built and the kitchen counter has a grand view of the trees.
The tree house is run on solar energy (12v.)
Finishing touches are hand made details such as the cushions from local wool.

Key points:
-rocky sea pools where you can let the waves crash over you .
-Located on top of a rare horizontally grown & typically Portuguese pine tree.
-Table, chairs and hammock amongst the trees.
-Unforgettable sunsets.

-All basic amenities available: 2-pit gas stove for cooking, a fridge and your own sunwarmed outdoor shower (cold in winter).
-The (dry) compost toilet is shared.
-The tree house is situated within 15.5 acres (6.3 hectare) of agricultural land which gives you unparalleled privacy and sense of nature.
-All beaches are nearby.
-The Village has a small supermarket, a bakery, a coffee/lunch place and 2 restaurants. We have good contacts and are happy to advice and book you a table.

Location and transport:
-Merely 40 minutes from Lisbon. With your own car you have greater autonomy to explore the area.
-Otherwise a bus from Sete Rios or an Uber will get you here as well.

Please note there is no ATM in the village.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You have access to all the land.
The main entrance is accessed via a good dirt road from the village of Azoia. You can exit the bottom of the land to go down to the rock pools and walk to the beach.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Please note that under NO circumstances we will allow BBQ's / open fires during the hot & dry summer months.

The water on the land is good enough to cook with but we advice not to drink it. Bring enough drinking water.", 'Licence number', 'Licence number
Exempt']

Title: Creek Treehouse near Helen, GA
Description:
['About this space', 'This treehouse is one of a kind and made out of recycled materials! It is a secluded place to relax and be completely surrounded by nature. There is no water or electricity and it is located about a 1/2 mile from our check-in office/parking. Cars are not allowed at the camping sites, and parking is available at the main office. It is hike in we will provide shuttle when you check in and check out to get you and your gear to and from the site!', 'The space', 'The space
The treehouse is a cozy place with one bedroom, two beds, and deck for relaxing. On main level is one king size mattress, and in the loft is a full size mattress. Please be aware that there is no water or electricity. The treehouse is in a remote location. Commercial vehicles are not allowed at the site. You must leave your car at our main office 1/2mi away, and then hike in.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests cannot drive their car to the treehouse. Parking is available in a gravel lot at our main office 1/2mi away. During normal business hours, we will transport guests one time at check-in and once at check-out. Any other time you must walk.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
This is just like camping except in the trees! We only provide the space and the beds. Please plan to bring with you anything that you would need on a regular camping trip--i.e. linens/sleeping bags/pillows, lights/lanterns, cooking tools, etc. We do have firewood available to purchase for $5 a bundle, or you are more than welcome to bring your own!']

Title: ‚òÖTake to the skies in a Lov Nid‚òÖ
Description:
['About this space', "Come spend an unusual night in our treehouse : the LOV'NID.
A funny wooden sphere for 2, close to nature : an unusual bed and breakfast, ideal for lovers...
Our guesthouse is at 55 Beynac Road in the village of Lembras, 10 minutes from the center of Bergerac.
www.bellevue-cottage.com", 'The space', "The space
Less than 3 hours from Bordeaux, Toulouse, La Rochelle, Clermont Ferrand.
Near Bergerac, come and spend an unusual night in our cabin perched the LOV'NID¬Æ. Nestled in our park, this wooden bubble awaits you for a stay in harmony with nature.
It all starts with a walkway of about ten meters, then a terrace perched 3 meters high and you discover a cozy nest amid birds and trees, for a getaway for two.
Its transparent dome and portholes will give you a magical night, with the starry canopy for bed sky.
A dedicated bathroom is available nearby.
Back on land in the morning, we'll have a hearty breakfast.

Some practical information:
* In the current context, additional precautions have been put in place, particularly regarding disinfection of frequently touched surfaces.
* The Lov Nid is a cabin designed for up to 2 people (adult or child)
* Inside just a bed : impossible to eat.
* The cabin and the entire property are really non-smoking and non-smoking
* No water, electricity, heating, or air conditioning in the cabin.
* During the summer, the temperature inside the cabin can exceed 25¬∞
* In winter, it can be cool or even cold indoors
* Use a mosquito repellent if you attract them!", '', '', '', 'Other things to note']

Title: Rocky River Cotton Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', "Come stay for a Weekend getaway in a rustic treehouse on the heart of the Rocky River. We are located south of Cottonville on Plank Rd, Norwood. Treehouse has Queen size mattress in loft & queen size futon in living area. Comes with heat, ac, directv, mini frig, m/w, Weber grill, shower, toilet and an outdoor fire pit for your convenience. Enjoy outdoor porch sitting listening to the sounds of water flowing over rocks. There's a shelter for parking or camping. 4 Kayaks and 1 canoe available", 'The space', 'The space
Prices include access to canoe and 4 kayaks. During summer months, weather permitting.
You can launch a canoe or one of 4 kayaks just steps away from the treehouse and float the rocky river. 2 landings: one located about 45 minutes away or another thats approx 4 hours away for your convenience.
Fire pit outside for small campfire or cooking.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
I tell everyone that comes to stay, please prepare as if you are going camping.
I provide bed linens (no towels) a bed, a shower, a microwave, a coffee maker, a sink, a toilet, a charcoal grill and a fire pit. Those are the only things that are included with the rental.']

Title: Charming hut perched "Hiss√©o"
Description:
['About this space', 'A charming treehouse with an atypical (open-air) comfortable shower 5 minutes from Cousteau Reserve and its diving clubs enjoy the tropical garden and magnificent views of the pigeon islets from the top of the cheese maker.', 'The space', 'The space
Charming cabin perched in a cheese-maker overlooking the islets pigeon with its atypical shower (under the foliage, the stars) offering all the comforts for 2 to 4-6 people', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests can enjoy a large private heated saltwater swimming pool equipped with a waterfall and around the deckchair pool, a swing bed and a small relaxation lounge,under a pretty little carbet, surrounded by a magnificent tropical garden and relaxing where butterflies, hummingbirds, iguanas, sugar trees and our faithful fishing martin front of the eyes of our cat "Ulysses" and you can also enjoy the BBQ area and the small lounge located under the cabin, a swing for children, and you also have a court to play balls and petanque.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The 2 large king-size beds (2mx2m) are equipped with mosquito nets plus 1 BZ
You can have access to a "wellness" area, spa of 5 places and infrared sauna, for a small supplement
You have access to a petanque ground']

Title: Newport, Maine Lakeside Treehouse Near ATV Trail
Description: ['About this space', "This cozy treehouse is for outdoor lovers. It sits feet from the 4288 acre Sebasticook Lake; great for kayak or canoe trips, swimming, or bass fishing. On the other side we're right on the 4 Season Rail Trail; great for hiking, biking, or ATV riding. Close (1 +- mile) to stores and restaurants. We're also close enough to almost anywhere in the state for day trips. Travel to the ocean, Acadia National Park, Moosehead Lake Area, Baxter State Park, and more. Let your Maine adventure begin.", 'The space', "The space\nEver wanted to stay in a treehouse? This space is not very big but it makes up for size with a breathtaking view of the lake. It is not fancy but it's comfortable. You can bring your ATV. We have 2 kayaks or a canoe for you to use. There is plenty of space for parking of your vehicle and trailer. There's a firepit with wood provided, picnic table, and BBQ grill. We book only during the summer months. We start booking in June and end about mid September."]

Title: LYON COUNTRY HOUSE , LYON TREEHOUSE & SPA
Description:
['About this space', "Lyon country House is a 3 hectare property by the Sa√¥ne just across from Paul Bocuse's. We offer bed and breakfasts and a luxurious detached cottage and very soon a cabin perched 6 meters high among trees . The perched hut at the end of the park will have stunning views of the Sa√¥ne with a sublime sunset.
It should come as no surprise that you encounter deer or sheep on the property even 15 minutes from Bellecour !", 'The space', 'The space
Cabin for 4 people comprising a kitchenette, a dry toilet, a bar for dining with 4, a lounge area with two bench beds with 180 degree views of the sa√¥ne, a mezzanine of 11m2 with queen size bed with plunging views of the sa√¥ne, a terrace of 12m2 with weber barbecue. As the cabin is an ecological project in total connection with nature, we have provided a water reserve for the kitchen and small evening toilet.
For those wishing shower access, we have a dedicated shack in THE SPA area that is automatically privatized for shacks in the evening from 8pm to 9PM. This private access to THE SPA is included in the price of the cabin as well as the breakfast delivered in the morning in a pannier that you climb up to the terrace thanks to a pulley.']

Title: Lake Joseph Waterfront Cottage
Description:
['About this space', 'Lakeside cottage at the end of a private road. This charming 3 bedroom (sleeps 6) plus bunkie (sleeps 5) with southern exposure right on the water is the ideal location for a summer family getaway. A newly painted and refreshed cottage with a large deck perfect for evening supper or drinks.

Outside there is plenty of space to sit and soak up the sun. Along 300 feet of water frontage sits a large boathouse with plenty of furniture to lounge and relax or jump off the docks.', 'The space', 'The space
The kitchen has many amenities, including stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, toaster, coffee maker, cappuccino maker, and an ample supply of dishware. Outside of the kitchen is a screened in gazebo which is a perfect spot for dinner.

*** 7 day minimum Friday to Friday check in and check out required

***We will provide a clean set of sheets and towels, kitchen towels and beach towels. A cleaning crew will turn over the cottage prior to your arrival. If you require a change of sheets or additional cleaning throughout the week this too can be arranged for an additional $400 cleaning fee.

***Please note, you are responsible to take your garbage and other waste/recycling with you. You will be charged $20 per garbage bag left behind.

*** Paper products: the cottage will provide you enough to get started but vacationers must supply their own.

*** Life vests are supplied. Vacationers must bring their own children‚Äôs life jackets due to safety and liability concerns.

***Security deposit is $2,500 per booking.']

Title: Casa Mariposa- a large, bright, secluded treehouse
Description:
['About this space', "This listing is for a private tree home within the 'Finca Bellavista Treehouse Community'. This is not a resort. Please be sure to read thoroughly - additional information with links will be sent after making a booking and full refunds are offered 5 days prior to arrival.

Casa Mariposa is an ultra spacious treehouse on a sprawling riverfront jungle parcel in the Finca Bellavista neighborhood. This home offers privacy and romance. There is no electricity, no wifi and often no internet signal.", 'The space', "The space
PLEASE NOTE: CASA MARIPOSA HAS NO ELECTRICITY. IT HAS HOT WATER AND A FULL STOVE AND OVEN, RUN BY PROPANE.


Types of rental:

Short-term rate (2 - 6 nights / up to 4 people): $74.00 per night

Weekly rate (7 - 27 nights / 2 people): $345.00 per week

Monthly rate (28 nights / 2 people) $1035.00 per month

(Special price for weekly and one month rental will not activate if more than 2 people are selected - max 2 people allowed for special rates)


Important info:

- The last 3km leading up the Finca Bellavista community require a 4x4 vehicle

- There is no shop, restaurant or office onsite

- The home is about a 15-30 min hike from the car park - this is a pedestrian community

- You will be crossing a river on foot

- This is a private community with hiking trails, rivers and waterfalls to explore

- There is no internet and phone signal can be sparse

- I do not live in-country so you will be put in touch with local 'meet and greet' hosts who manage and maintain homes within the community

- The home has no electricity, which means we suggest bringing headlamps and a light, as well as a power bank to charge your devices. You can bring your own groceries or your meet and greet hosts can assist with food/meal options.

Home is prepared for arrival, you will be put in touch with your local meet and greet hosts ' Jesus and Francis. The cleaning fee is reserved for your hosts who maintain, prep and escort you to your rental. This is a pedestrian community and you will be required to walk from the car park to Mariposa (about a 15-30 min hike). Your meet and greet hosts will walk with you from the car park to the home - please note that you will be crossing a small river on foot, I recommend bringing boots/wellies.

Your hosts can also assist with local taxi rides, Finca Fresh bags (fresh produce), meal delivery, 3rd party excursions and will be your point of contact for the duration of your stay. Guests have access to trails, waterfalls and rivers within the community. Only a handful of homes are renting at present making the experience very intimate with the jungle.

A prearranged independent taxi service is also available from the community to several airports and destinations including Palmar, Uvita, Corcovado, Drake, Dominical, San Isidro, San Vito, Golfito Canoas (Panama), Puerto Jim√©nez.

More information will be provided after booking with additional links, suggestions and tips for your adventure (Airbnb does not allow us to share info regarding 3rd party websites. A full refund 5 days prior to your arrival date is available). At times, you may not run into anyone onsite, if you are uncomfortable being alone in the jungle then this place is not for you.


DESCRIPTION:

- The home offers a private main bedroom with a double bed.

- Additional sleeping space with bunk beds are available.

-Mariposa is situated on the red trail and is a 30 min hike from the car park, we highly recommend bringing comfortable boots (wellies) for a better experience.

-The home has a toilet with shower and hot running water (propane water heater).

-The kitchen has a gas stovetop and oven.

-Please remember this is a pedestrian community and guests/residents cannot drive to their homes - it is important to pack accordingly.


RECOMMENDED FOR:

A refreshing jungle vacation, couples looking for privacy, a family wanting to get back in touch with nature, artists, students writing papers - digital detox! Bird and wildlife enthusiasts, potential life change, come see if off-grid living is for you (other residents do live on the property). A comfortable base while exploring the Osa Peninsula / Southern Pacific Coast of Costa Rica, known as a world premier rainforest destination dubbed one of the most biologically intense places on earth by National Geographic. The pristine peninsula is bound on the northwest by Drake Bay, on the west by the Pacific Ocean, and on the east by the Golfo Dulce. The Osa Peninsula offers breathtaking, untouched scenery, secluded beaches, and abundant wildlife encompassing lush primary rainforest and a complex system of freshwater and marine resources.", 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Q&A


IS FINCA BELLAVISTA RIGHT FOR ME?

No, it's the jungle silly! Only us crazy people live here. This is the furthest place from a resort and you will quite possibly be just as far away from your neighbor. There are no restaurants, shops or even an office to greet you when first arriving, you are completely on your own in the middle of one of the most biologically diverse places on the planet.

That said, if you want to experience the jungle in its raw form, see something that may scare you, get hot and sweaty exploring the trails before cooling off in the rivers or under the waterfall while spotting wildlife in its natural habitat, then this is paradise.


WHAT ABOUT COVID-19

What about it - social distancing is not an issue here. Residents' lives didn't change one bit (other than they grew more stuff to eat). If anything, their lifestyle choice was reinforced and while sympathetic with the world, they appreciated their everyday lives even more. If you are looking for a vacation without having to be reminded about the pandemic - then this is the perfect place!


WHY ARE ONLY A HANDFUL OF RENTALS AVAILABLE AT FINCA BELLAVISTA?

Sadly, the former property management company shut down in early 2020. As the homes are privately owned, a selection of owners have got together to offer rentals privately in order to keep the spirit of Finca Bellavista alive and some of the previous employees with work (they offer services independently). Almost all employees have worked at least a decade at the community and no one knows the property better.


MEET AND GREET

Former Finca Bellavista employees Jesus and Francis will make sure you get to your rental hassle free. Once a booking is confirmed, you will be put in touch with Francis who will help prepare for your arrival. Francis is a co-host on this account and will follow up shortly after a booking is confirmed. You will also receive additional info through provided links with more info about the Finca Bellavista community.

Please note that Casa Mariposa's solar electricity system is currently not functional. Many guests bring a power bank to charge devices and an LED light. The stove and oven run on propane which is supplied."]

Title: A Little Closer to Heaven Primitive Tree house
Description: ['About this space', 'This little tree house is primitive with no electricity and no water but has a bath house nearby. This is tent camping in a tree house. Located behind the historic R.M. Brooks Store, it is the perfect place to find peace and beauty . Perfect for hikers. Rest in the huge branches of this nearly 100 year old Oak Tree. A Queen bed awaits you for your restful nights sleep. Underneath you can picnic at the table or swing in the swing that hangs below. This is the perfect place to unplug.', 'The space', 'The space\nThere is a queen size bed and two chairs for sitting and relaxing. A small table with two chairs for playing cards or eating. A dresser for storing clothes with a mirror above it. Two night stands on each side of beds. Very spacious and easy to move around in.']

['About this space', "Our 5500sqft home set on an acre in the middle of town is the perfect place to host your next trip to central Florida. Our home with it's incredible out door living space is a perfect place to relax and enjoy your family. Three story tree house with tiny house, in ground pool, picnic tables to eat and enjoy the great out doors. Enjoy a game of horse shoes, croquet, bocce ball, corn hole, or just relax around the fire. Title: The Willow in Treehouse Grove at Norton Creek
Description:
['About this space', 'Treehouse Grove is a Treehouse Resort designed and built by the ‚ÄúTreehouse Master‚Äù, Pete Nelson. The Willow Treehouse is the most private Treehouse in the lower grove and can hear the constant roar of the local favorite, Norton Creek. This Treehouse features a large swing under the treehouse while upholding the luxury creature comforts you‚Äôve become accustom to, such as high-speed Wi-Fi, a shower, toilet, heating and cooling, kitchenette and of course, your favorite streaming channels.', 'The space', 'The space
The Willow is your perfect Treehouse getaway in Gatlinburg! As you enter the Treehouse, you will find the well-equipped kitchenette with a mini fridge, microwave, coffee pot, utensils and murphy table for 4. With a queen bed in the master and a queen bed in the loft, this Treehouse comfortably sleeps 4. If you are fortunate enough to stay during the Great Smoky Mountain fall or winter, you are in for a treat. Snow occasionally turns the forest into a picturesque winter wonderland. Stand beneath the covered view deck and watch the cascading snowfall accumulate around you while enjoying a steaming cup of hot cocoa. Prepare a meal or another drink in the stocked kitchenette and fully enjoy each moment. Book your stay today!', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
All Guest at Treehouse Grove will have easy-to-use entry keypads into their Treehouse. Guest also have access to all the amenities at Treehouse grove, including but not limited to grills, firepits, picnic tables, hammocks, swings, walking and hiking trails and Norton Creek! The Pavilion at Norton Creek Resort is also available depending on the season.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
As much as we love pets and our furry friends, Treehouse Grove abides by a strict no-pet policy. The access into the grove can be steep for some and difficult to navigate depending on weather conditions. Different seasons and attractions include Winterfest, Autumn Foliage ,Freshwater Fishing, Outlet Shopping, Miniature Golf, Restaurants, Snowboarding, Snow Skiing, Water Tubing, Sledding, White Water Rafting, Churches, Caves, Forests, Library, Live Theater Museums, Rec Center, Theme Parks, Waterfalls, Winery Tours, Health Beauty, Spa, Antiquing, Cinemas']

Title: Unusual night in a Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'On a 2 hectare estate, located on the heights of the municipality of Ferdrupt, the hut is perched at 7 m 50. It will seduce you with its charm and comfort. It can accommodate 2 to 4 people. A panoramic terrace of 40 m¬≤ with stunning views of the meadow, the forest and the massifs. This is the place to recharge your batteries.
Options:
- Relaxation area (spa/sauna), wellness area with massages, Kota grill (for your barbecue in winter or in bad weather). All by reservation only.', 'The space', 'The space
For your convenience, the cabin is supplied with cold water (outside the freezing period if not we provide a water bottle in the cabin).
Powered by electricity, it features high-performance electric heating.
It is equipped with 4 sleeping accommodations, a mezzanine bed for 1 person, a bed for 2 and a folding bed (blanket duvet and pillows are available)
A kitchenette with sink, small kitchenware, dishes, electric hob (campsite type), electric kettle, fridge, coffee table and dining area for 4 people. Separate dry toilet inside the cabin. At the foot of the cabin a barbecue.
At your disposal, a communal sanitary area close to the car park is at your disposal with 4 showers 2 toilets and a diving area open 24 hours a day.
You can also approach the farm animals (rabbit, poultry. sheep, llama, horse...)
Options :
-Sauna relaxation area and private balneo by reservation.
- Wellness massages and Ayurvedic massages by reservation.
- Kota Grill by reservation.', '', 'Guest access
Easy access even in winters , on-site parking.
You can also approach the farm animals (rabbit, poultry. sheep, llama, horse...)', '', 'Other things to note
Option:
-Health cleaning:
-Any Meals : delivered on-site
-Breakfast : It is delivered on-site which includes: tea,coffee or chocolate orange juice, croissant, bread,butter and homemade jam.
-Rocation of good quality disposable sheets bed 2 pers and bed 1 pers.
-Rocation of toilet linen:
-Bois for fireplace to the hearth:
-Location baby bed
- High chair
- Relaxation area (Balneo and sauna) private session duration 1 hour 30 minutes
or 2 hours (only on reservation)
- Kota grill (for your winter barbecue)
- Massage area on reservation, with wellness massages and Ayurvedic massages performed by Catherine wellness practitioner.']
