Title: Indoor Pool near Goodwood  - Boxgrove Chichester
Description:
['About this space', 'Welcome to our lovely home, with indoor tropically heated swimming pool, and hot tub - Situated within a 15 minute walk or a 2 minute car drive from the Goodwood estate. We have 3 en-suite bedrooms and 2 smaller rooms - 4 bathrooms and masses of parking. The house is set in the historic village of Boxgrove, with great walks and a pub with a lovely warm fire. Ideal for a short break.

We also have a small room suitable for two at our annexe in Strettington - Look for Goodwood Barn on Airbnb', 'The space', 'The space
The house is perfect for a get away - We have an indoor, security covered swimming pool heated to 30 degrees and hot tub, and luxury bathrooms with power showers.

The house as 5/6 bedrooms with 3 double ensuite bedrooms with shower and/bath. Additional shower room and loo downstairs.

TV in large sitting room and conservatory, large American fridge and open fire in sitting room. Garden has BBQ and ample seating.

Driveway for 6 cars - Electronically Gated and secure

Outside there is a BBQ and Outdoor seating

Nearby attractions :-

- Tennis - 3 minute drive, Our private house has its own private Tennis court for your use at any time during your stay

- Goodwood Aerodrome - 2 minute drive - Fly a spitfire, or take a pleasure flight around the Isle of Wight

- Goodwood Motor circuit - 2 minute drive - Take your car around the historic track. The only original track in the world

- Goodwood Golf - 1 minute drive - Two high quality courses and driving range

- Goodwood Races 5 minute drive - The premier flat raving in the country

- Goodwood House - 2 minute drive. A fine example of a blend of Jacobean and Edwardian architecture - The Seat of the Duke of Richmond. Take afternoon tea there!

Tinwood Vinyard - 2 minutes - try our very own local fizz, with regular tasting and cheese afternoons - Not to be missed!

- West Wittering Beach - 20 minutes, the UK‚Äôs finest sandy beach

We have another property just down the road in Strettington. - See Goodwood Barn with Tennis', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Swimming Pool, hot tub, gated home', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
It's a brilliant place to be, so near Goodwood, with a super pub up the road! The Anglesey Arms is not to be missed for their food is awesome!"]

Title: The Pool House
Description:
['About this space', 'Set within the grounds of our Georgian Manor house, The Pool House provides a wonderful retreat for those looking to escape to the country whilst being a short drive from the seaside town of Sidmouth and nearby city of Exeter. The Pool House has just been renovated (May 2021) to a very high specification providing spacious contemporary accommodation with use of heated outdoor swimming pool (June to September) and sauna.', 'The space', 'The space
Guests will love the modern comfortable decor in the Pool House. Downstairs offers a great opportunity to drink your morning coffee at the kitchen bar, enjoying the vaulted ceilings and natural light from the bifolding doors leading straight onto the pool area. A huge walk in shower, marble counters complete the newly renovated bathroom. Upstairs is a very cosy living area, and bedroom with magical views over the church and fields opposite.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests are welcome to enjoy the pool area (shared) and the front gardens. The rear gardens are not for guests use other than when accessing the Pool House.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The kitchen area includes a 2 ring induction hob, and microwave for cooking. It does not have a oven or dishwasher.']

Title: One bed apartment use of hot tub & pool available
Description:
['About this space', 'Wraysbury is a beautiful village. Ideally located for Heathrow, Windsor, Ascot and mainline trains to London (45 mins)
LEGOLAND, Thorpe Park and Chessington.

Our apartment is walking distance of all village faclities and the station is a 15 min walk.

The property offers exclusive use of the pool during summer months.

The property has 1 double bedroom, open living area with smart TV incl Amazon Prime and Netflix and modern kitchen with granite worktops with views of the pool and gardens.', 'The space', 'The space
IMPORTANT

Hot tub
For new bookings from 12th March 2022 for March and April 2022. Charges for use for jacuzzi will be payable upon arrival.

Charges will be ¬£30 per overnight stay use from 8.00am to midnight.

24 hours notice required to ensure water is 38-40oC on arrival.


We do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noise.

*** New Inflatable hot tub area open from 1st October - End April*** The hot tub is then closed and the pool opened.


Pool open 1st May - closes 30th September. The pool is heated but heating is only switched on when outside temperatures are in the late teens. For further information please refer to guess access.


The apartment has a modern interior and layout. Comprising a large open plan living, dining and kitchen space. One double bedroom with double bed and compact en-suite bathroom with modern shower, basin & WC.

It is ideally suited to accomadate 2 adults or 2 adults & 2 children The children would sleep on the very large corner sofa, (see pics) or a folding bed can be provided.
Maximum 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children.

Facilities include a 55 inch smart tv, Netflix and free view channels, blue tooth sound system and free access to the Internet. A modern kitchen with hob, microwave combination and granite work tops, crockery etc.
Thermostaticly controlled electric heating throughout. Bedding and towels provided.
Please look at our photos for more details.

Please note due to close proximity to Heathrow. Guests may incur aeroplane noise.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have exclusive use of our heated outdoor swimming pool during the summer months (May-September) and exclusive e cross to the hot tub during from October to end April) (local charges apply). Use of all the facilities within the barn to prepare meals and make yourself comfortable. All we ask is that you respect the fixtures and fittings so that they are in as good a condition for the next guest as you found them during your stay.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
We do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noise.']

Title: Self contained Annex with log burner
Description:
['About this space', 'This really is the most beautiful of getaways - The space is beautifully decorated, cosy and clean.
Easily accessible, under 2 miles from junction 27 M5 and Tiverton Parkway.
Musicians and Writers find this a useful retreat to work in.
Dogs are not allowed in the bnb but they are welcome to stay with our dogs in the lobby next to the bnb where they can be as wet and muddy as they please, just so long as they are well behaved.', 'The space', 'The space
Although it is easily accessible, we are in the heart of the countryside, surrounded by farmland. There are no street lights so the stars look wonderful most nights.
The pool has a swim pump that was developed for Olympic swimmers so it can be fierce - or as gentle as you like. There is a boat building workshop on the premises, and I am about to renovate the old stable so there is usually something going on though you have your private space, with a garden. There are plenty of herbs growing, and I have labelled most of them, so do help yourselves.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You have the annex and there is a private garden just for guests.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
If you would like to bring your dog, please contact me. Your dog can stay in the lobby next to the annex with my dogs (or I can put my dogs in my kitchen) or in a stable or your car under shelter if they prefer.
If you want to bring a horse I have separate stables, paddocks and an arena. You will need to contact me to make arrangements, and I would prefer it if you could visit first.']

Title: Stunning Barn conversion with heated swimming pool
Description:
['About this space', 'Courage Cottage is a two bedroom detached barn conversion in a Georgian farmyard.The barn was converted in 2013 so has all modern conveniences including underfloor heating. It is very individual and situated in a quiet , rural setting. It has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The village of Martinstown has an excellent pub, shop and Post Office. Dorchester is 2 miles away and has every facility including good rail connections in all directions.Swimming pool (shared ) open May to Sept.', 'The space', 'The space
This quiet valley in an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty is located between Dorchester and Weymouth and therefore within easy reach of shops, restaurants museums and the numerous seaside activities available in and around Weymouth. The Abbotsbury Swannery and gardens are within easy reach as are many footpaths leading to the coast as well as the many remote beaches reached situated along the famous Jurassic Coastline which is a World Heritage Site. The properties are in the old farmyard and reached down a private road and therefore well away from traffic.

Golf: Several Golf courses within a few miles in stunning scenery', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The heated swimming pool is available form May 1st to September 30th. We can‚Äôt guarantee it will be available outside of these times.
Guests are free to enjoy the old walled garden which is a quiet, secluded haven.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The second bedroom has a steep spiral staircase which is perfectly accessible but not for anyone who is a little unsteady on their feet.
The swimming pool is only shared with owners who use it rarely. It is outdoor and open from May to September only.']

Title: Priors Mesne Coach House, Wye Valley
Description:
['About this space', 'Priors Mesne Coach House is a converted open plan loft barn space romantically located on a secluded farm estate, half a mile down a lime tree avenue and 100 yards from the main house. Breathtaking views over the Severn it is the perfect get away for a couple (plus dog) with easy access to walking and cycling in the Wye Valley and Forest of Dean or canoeing on the Wye. Dog walking and a picnic table are available in the adjacent field and there is a boules pitch with small terrace and seating.', 'The space', 'The space
The Coach House living space is located on the first floor accessed by an external stone staircase. The accommodation is open plan with far reaching views over the estuary. A cosy sitting room area equipped with log burner TV DVD and a large sofa and daybed. There is a candle lit dining table adjacent to a king size bed in the sleeping area with another TV and DVD. Micro kitchen for cooking, heating small meals with oven, sink, 4 hobs, microwave, fridge freezer, kettle, toaster and kitchen utensils, cutlery, plates etc. There is a separate bathroom with toilet, bath and shower.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
- Outside seating on Boules pitch garden
- Dog walking field with picnic table
- Tennis by arrangement
- Swimming by arrangement (Mid May until beginning of September )', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
There are long walks from the house as the Gloucestershire Way runs along the wood above.
We provide in the kitchen some bread, milk, eggs, filter and instant coffee, tea and sugar for your arrival as well as a basket of logs and kindling. More logs can be bought at the petrol station on the A48 in Alvington.']

Title: The Little Stable for 2  & Indoor Heated Pool
Description:
['About this space', "Edge of village converted stable at Flo's Cottages for 2 only 2K from town, countryside setting with rural views. A bolthole for couples with countryside walks from the doorstep.

A fully equipped kitchen, living area, shower room and indoor heated pool.

Enjoy the patio in the evening sun, enjoy the views or grab a blanket, snuggle up & enjoy a beautiful starry evening after a day out exploring the local countryside & coastline.", 'The space', 'The space
Only 10 minutes from the A303 but utterly peaceful, The Little Stable is tucked away down a quiet country lane on the edge of picturesque East Coker, only a mile from Yeovil. There are 2 pubs in walking distance (20 minute stroll) and plenty of excellent places to eat nearby and the beautiful Jurassic coast only half an hour away.

The heated indoor pool is just a few steps away with access reserved for Stable guests 9am-1pm. At 13 metres long, it‚Äôs enough to get a few laps in!

Please note The Little Stable is not suitable for babies, toddlers or children. It is what it says on the tin so if you‚Äôre after something palatial, The Little Stable might not be what you‚Äôre looking for!', '', 'Guest access', '', '']

Title: Priors Mesne, Keepers Yard, Wye Valley
Description:
['About this space', 'Keepers Yard is the perfect romantic or family break; a converted loft in the Coach House on a peaceful farm estate, 100 yards from the main house, half a mile down a lime avenue with lovely views over the Severn. It is ideally located for access to walking in the Wye Valley, Forest of Dean; canoeing on the Wye or bicycling on miles of off road tracks Dog walking & a picnic table are available in the field. There is access to an outdoor area, a pool and tennis court by arrangement(in summer)', 'The space', 'The space
The Keepers Yard living space is located on the first floor accessed by an external stone staircase. The accommodation is two bedrooms, a bathroom, boot room and an open plan living room and kitchen with far reaching views over the estuary; equipped with log burner, TV , DVD , WIFI and a large sofa and armchair. There is a candle lit dining table, a king size bed , open plan kitchen with oven, sink, 4 hobs, microwave, fridge, large freezer, dish washer, kettle, toaster and kitchen utensils, cutlery, plates etc. There is a separate bathroom with toilet, bath and shower. There is a laundry with clothes washer and dryer located directly beneath the property. All sheets and towels are provided with the rooms ready prepared and one basket of logs for the fire are provided for your arrival. More can be bought at the petrol station in Alvington on the A48.', '', 'Guest access
- Outside seating on balcony
- Dog walking field with picnic table
- Tennis by arrangement
- Swimming by arrangement (Mid May up to beginning of September)', '', 'Other things to note
There are long walks from the house as the Gloucestershire Way runs along the wood above.
We provide in the kitchen some bread, milk, eggs, filter and instant coffee, tea and sugar for your arrival as well as a basket of logs and kindling. More logs can be bought at the petrol station on the A48 in Alvington.']

Title: The Pool House at Upper Farm (near Thame/Oxford)
Description:
['About this space', 'Enjoy the tranquillity and seclusion of our spacious pool house chalet, complete with private seasonally heated (1 May to 30 September) outdoor swimming pool and all year round hot tub Jacuzzi spa, located on our 30 acre farm and equestrian centre in the rural hamlet of Henton on the outskirts of Chinnor, Oxfordshire.

The Pool House is an ideal location for couples, families, walkers, cyclists, coarse/carp anglers and business travellers.', 'The space', 'The space
COVID-19 Restrictions for England
Guests can book with confidence that we will refund any reservations that needs to be cancelled due to government COVID restrictions.

Due to the additional cleaning and sanitisation required to keep our guests safe, we are unable to offer any form of early check-in or late check-out.

Opened for the first time as a holiday let in 2016 (and refurbished again in 2021), we are sure that The Pool House at Upper Farm Henton will be your home away from home.

With its own private outdoor swimming pool (heated from 1 May to 30 September) and an all year round hot tub jacuzzi spa, you'll be surrounded by acres of green paddocks and with our 1 acre carp and coarse fishing lake, our self-catering chalet is the perfect setting for those who want to get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

The Pool House at Upper Farm Henton is ideal for couples looking for a romantic getaway, or as a base for families, walkers, cyclists, anglers and business travellers and as we are only 40 minutes from Heathrow airport it‚Äôs also ideal for international visitors.

Located in an area of natural beauty and with spectacular views over the Chiltern Hills to Bledlow Ridge, it is the perfect setting for those who want a relaxing break in the beautiful Oxfordshire countryside. The village of Chinnor is 1.2 miles away with convenience stores and a few eateries, plus we have the historic Chinnor Steam Railway, the town of Princes Risborough is just 4 miles away, with a good rail service into London Marylebone (40 to 50 minutes) and the historic market town of Thame is 7 miles away.

For birdwatchers, our fishing lake is surrounded by trees and is the home to red kites, kingfishers, sparrow hawks, woodpeckers, buzzards, kestrels, ducks, moor hens, pheasants and some very friendly robins and wrens. In the evening you are like to see foxes, badgers, rabbits and munt jack.

With two public footpaths running through the farm, walkers and cyclists can quickly and easily get on to the Phoenix trail and The Ridgeway, with miles upon miles of footpaths and bridleways to explore.

Angling guests at The Pool House have unlimited and inclusive access during their stay to fish our 1 acre carp and coarse lake located 100m from your holiday accommodation.

The Pool House is a studio chalet featuring:

Sleeps between 1 to 4 guests.

Main Studio Room (360 sq ft)
- King size bed with tempur memory foam mattress and bedside tables (bedding included)
- L shaped sofa
- 2 Large double wardrobes with 6 draws and plenty of hanging space
- 4 seater dining table and chairs
- 46" Wall Mounted Adjustable HD LED TV with Freeview and Sky+ HD (Movies, Sports & Entertainment Packs)
- Music system with AirPlay/Bluetooth streaming
- Large patio doors leading to Pool, Hot Tub and Garden

Kitchen (70 sq ft)
- Electric Induction Hob
- Electric Oven & Grill
- Full sized Fridge Freezer
- Slimline Dishwasher
- Kettle
- Microwave
- Pots, pans, crockery, glassware and cutlery
- Iron and Ironing Board
- Tea, coffee and sugar

Bathroom (47 sq ft)
- Electric shower
- Bathroom cabinet with LED lighting and shaver charging point
- Heated electric towel rail
- WC and hand basin
- Towels included
- Toiletries included (Body Wash/Shampoo, Conditioner, Handwash & Hand Cream)

Entrance / Boot Room (65 sq ft)
- Electric Radiator
- Storage for bikes, boots and soiled clothing
- Door leading to Pool, Hot Tub and Garden
- Optional small double folding bed - sleeps 2 adults or 2 children

Swimming Pool, Hot Tub & Garden
- Outdoor Seasonally Heated Swimming Pool - 12m (40ft) Long, 6m (20ft wide), Shallow End ‚Äì 90cm (3ft), Deep End - 2.1m (7ft)
- Hot Tub Jacuzzi Spa with Bluetooth Sound System (Available all year round)
- Non slip artificial grass garden area ‚Äì 21m (69ft) Long, 13.6m (44ft) Wide
- Pool loungers
- 4 Seat Patio Table, Chairs and Parasol

General
- Free WiFi
- Free off-road parking
- Minimum stay applies depending on time of year
- Maximum of 4 guests

IMPORTANT EXTRA INFORMATION
We have a zero tolerance policy on drugs. Anyone found smoking or taking drugs or any other illegal substance will be reported to the police and evicted from the property immediately. There will be no refund for any unused nights and you will forfeit the full security deposit.

There is no smoking permitted inside the accommodation. Smoking is permitted outside only. Please use the ashtray provided.

No excessive outdoor noise after 11pm.
Absolutely No parties or events.

Maximum of 2 well behaved dogs per property. ¬£15 per dog, per stay charge (payable on arrival).', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have private use of our outdoor seasonally heated swimming pool (May to September), year round access to the hot tub jacuzzi spa and 24 hour access to our carp and coarse fishing lake.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The Pool House is ideal for 1 to 4 guests. Please note that we will not accept any bookings with more than 4 people.
Please make sure that you are happy with the sleeping arrangements and bed configurations prior to booking.

Please contact the host if you require further information.

We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any booking where there are more than 4 guests in the party.

We also reserve the right to charge an additional ¬£15 per person, per night for extra guests not declared at the time of booking.']

It has an open plan living - kitchen area.\nThe single-storey cottages at Champernhayes have been created from the conversion of the original farmhouse buildings, which date back to 1482. Title: Beech Tree Cottage @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description:
['About this space', 'Beech Tree Cottage is a delightful cottage nestled in the beautiful hills of Somerset, on the south side of a wooded valley beside the River Tone. Nearly 200 years old, this lovely cottage has been newly updated to create a charming, well-equipped holiday home.
The shared grounds are a paradise of fields, water meadows and gardens, a haven for wildlife, and star-gazing in our dark skies. Our heated indoor swimming pool and play area are shared between our cottages and offer fun for everyone.', 'The space', 'The space
Originally the grain storage barn for the mill, Beech Tree Cottage nestles in the hillside, overlooked by a huge beech tree.
This charming and characterful cottage is approached from a flight of pretty stone steps. It has a comfortable sitting room with an original exposed stone wall and a dining area, leading into the new open plan, well-designed compact kitchen.
All on the same level a short inner hall leads to the bedrooms. Bedroom 1 has a king size bed and Bedroom 2 has a zip-link bed which can be twin beds or a super-king bed.
Beech Tree Cottage is south facing with river and garden views and an outside eating area. Guests are also welcome to take advantage of the rest of the beautiful grounds and river banks which are shared with our other cottages, Mill Coach House and Bankside Cottage.
Our facilities include:
‚Ä¢ Electric stove
‚Ä¢ Refrigerator with small freezer compartment
‚Ä¢ Microwave
‚Ä¢ Toaster and kettle
‚Ä¢ Smart TV
‚Ä¢ Free wifi and 4G mobile access
‚Ä¢ Bathroom with a shower, washbasin and WC
‚Ä¢ Shared heated indoor swimming pool
‚Ä¢ Shared children‚Äôs play area
‚Ä¢ Shared Barbecue
‚Ä¢ A separate shared utility has a washing machine and tumble drier.
‚Ä¢ Ample free parking

Linen and bath towels are included but please provide your own swimming and beach towels.
We‚Äôre sorry but dogs are not allowed. We do have two, very friendly, waggy tailed labradors who live on site and are a part of our family. They have free use of all the gardens so you will meet them wandering around.']

Title: Stunning beachside holiday home with heated pool
Description:
['About this space', 'Aldwick Beach House is a beautiful and well appointed holiday home with heated pool (open May to September) and just a minute from the beach.

It has been recently refurbished to provide a contemporary and relaxing home from home, and is extremely well equipped, so you should not need to bring too much, beyond your swimmers and a good book!

Ideal for 3 couples or 2 families.

Perfect location for Goodwood Events including the Festival of Speed, Goodwood Revival and Glorious Goodwood', '', "The space
Open, light and airy ground floor consisting of large and comfortable lounge, dining room with seating for 8 open to the large and very well appointed kitchen and utility room, and sun room overlooking the garden and pool.

Upstairs sleeps 6-8 in 3 bedrooms:
- Very generous master suite with super-king sized bed and double sofa bed, as well as dressing room, en-suite bathroom and balcony with sea views
- Bedroom with either king sized bed or twin beds, depending on guests preference, with view to front and back
- Double bedroom, with views over the garden and pool
- Family bathroom with bath and walk in shower

Outside the large patio leads to the pool house, with shower room, and heated pool.

Aldwick Beach House, Aldwick beach and the surrounding areas are perfect for children. The house is equipped with children's crockery and cutlery, toys, games and books, buckets and spades for the beach and toys for the pool. A travel cot, high chair and stair gates are available on request.

Clean linen is provided on each bed as well as a set of towels for each guest. Towels are also provided for use by the pool, but we ask that you bring your own beach towels. Picnic blankets, camping chairs and a cool bag are provided for use on the beach or day trips. If you need to do any washing during your stay there is a washing machine and tumble dryer available for your use.", '', '', '', '']

Title: Safari Tent at Pennard Hill Farm
Description:
['About this space', 'The Safari Tent offers an escape from the norm, with stunning views over the Mendip Hills offering you the chance to relax, rest and enjoy the tranquility of the Somerset countryside.
Please note the safari tent is off grid!', 'The space', 'The space
The Safari Tent is a brilliant place to bring children as there is endless space for them to run around. There is plenty to do, such as build a den in the woods, hunt for bugs, go for long walks, meet the cows, play hide and seek and climb trees.
A holiday in our safari tent is a great way to relax and and switch off from the fast pace of life. Take some deep breaths, inhale that fresh Somerset air and while away your days curled up with a good book or exploring the countryside.
The safari tent sleeps six people in total in two twin beds, one double and one king sized bed. Snuggle into crisp white sheets and fluffy feather duvets, this is glamping at its best! There is a kitchen with a wonderful wood burning stove which is perfect for cooking and it will keep you warm on the coldest of days. There is a seating area with a comfy sofa and lots of games for the children to enjoy. The kitchen is fully equipped with crockery, cutlery and everything you should need to cook a delicious meal and there is also a kitchen table to seat six. There is an undercounter fridge with a small freezer section too. At the back of the tent there is a hot shower and separate loo but these are all within the tent itself so there is no creeping across fields to find the loo in the middle of the night.
We‚Äôve decided not to have electricity in the safari tent. We use oil lamps and candles for light. We do provide battery powered phone charging packs but there is no need to tell the children that!



There is so much to do in the area surrounding Pennard Hill Farm from balloon rides to golf and clay pigeon shooting. Longleat Safari Park is only a 30 minute drive away and Fleet Air Arm museum is under 20 minutes. There‚Äôs an abundance of fantastic pubs and restaurants if you feel like a night off cooking.

Please note the Safari Tent is situated on a steep hill and is sadly not suitable for those with trouble walking.

No pets are allowed in the Safari Tent unless its been requested and agreed with the owner upon booking.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Hitchin Barn conversion
Description:
['About this space', 'Set in beautiful Hertfordshire countryside, yet only minutes away from Hitchin Town Centre and Luton Airport we offer a relaxed and peaceful stay in our detached 17th century tithe barn. Up to four bedrooms, one ensuite, one family bathroom, two shower rooms and a separate toilet, indoor private pool, games room with full sized snooker table, large kitchen/diner and galleried lounge overlooking pool.', 'The space', 'The space
Very near to A1 M1 and Luton airport, five minutes from the lovely market town of Hitchin, 30 minutes by train to London Kings Cross, yet tucked away in beautiful countryside. A totally detached 17th century barn which includes a private pool just for your use. A games room with a full sized snooker table up to four bedrooms and sleeps up to eight', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Price is for hiring whole barn conversion including exclusive use of pool.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The bedrooms are as follows. A first floor double bedroom with five foot bed, a second floor twin bedroom, both these have access to bathroom and toilet. On the ground floor is a large room with double sofa bed and a fold up bed to be used as required. Please bring your own bedlinen for these. Access to first floor bathroom and also two ground floor shower rooms and toilet. One newly added ground floor double bedroom with five foot bed and ensuite shower room and toilet.

Minimum booking is two nights
All bedlinen and towels provided.

Child safety
Due to a recent review we have now fitted child safety gates at the top of each staircase limiting access to the pool for children. There is also recently fitted Perspex in the viewing gallery area stopping children from climbing onto the room divider. A double door (lockable) has been fitted to the new ensuite bedroom for child safety and to limit noise.

Pets
We regret to say that we cannot have pets staying because of the swimming pool.

The pool is heated to between 24 and 30 degrees']

Title: Summer Lodge
Description:
['About this space', 'The Summer Lodge boasts uninterrupted and unrivaled views of the Fleet Lagoon and world famous Chesil Beach from its elevated position on the Jurassic Coast path. Located just one mile from the Isle of Portland, the home of the 2012 Olympic sailing events and a short drive from Weymouth town centre and harbour, our stunning holiday home is perfectly situated for anyone wanting a coastal escape.', 'The space', "The space
The Lodge

The Summer Lodge boasts a glass frontage, which allows guests to enjoy the changing tides and wildlife from the comfort and warmth of the large and tastefully furnished open plan living and dining area. Sunsets here really are an incredible spectacle not to be missed and a large verandah complete with outdoor sofas and dining table allows you to relax and take in the view.

Modern furnishings are a staple of the property, which is finished to a high spec throughout. The stylish kitchen contains everything you hcould possibly want and more for your stay, with pots, pans, crockery and glassware galore.

There are two double bedrooms each with large fitted wardrobe, dressing table and ample space for you and your belongings to spread out after a busy day. Additionally, there are two bathrooms, one with a bath and the other a double shower.

There is a small double sofa bed in the lounge area, which can also be used. Please note - there are no blinds on the large feature window. Please take this into consideration if you plan on using this space for guests to sleep.

All bed linen and towels are provided as well as toiletries and kitchen essentials, so there is no need to pack the kitchen sink, all you need to bring is yourself!


The Holiday Park

Summer Lodge is situated on the five star family run holiday park 'Chesil Vista', part of the Waterside Holiday Group. It is located in the private owner‚Äôs area, which is separate from the rest of the park and extremely quiet. Chesil Vista Holiday Park boasts plenty of facilities, which you are more than welcome to take advantage of during your stay.

As a guest at summer lodge you will have access to:

- Indoor leisure complex with gym, pool, sauna and solarium. *Please note* there is a small charge for use of this facility - ¬£5 adult day pass, ¬£4 child day pass, ¬£25 adult week pass and ¬£20 child week pass (Prices are correct as of January 2020)

- On site entertainment

- Bar & Breeze Restaurant

- Laundry

- Soft play area

- Amusement arcade

- Outdoor adventure play area

- Outdoor gym

- Chesil Venue

- Outdoor terrace area

- Sports field", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Summer Lodge is completely self contained. Guests have a private entrance, parking for two cars and complete use of the two bedrooms, two bathrooms, lounge, kitchen and veranda.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
- Wifi - You can use up to five devices on the Wi-Fi. To ensure everyone has a good experience each device can use up to 1GB of data per day, when you use up your data allowance the connection will be suspended until midnight when the allowance will be reset the following day. Any unused allowance does not roll over. Video applications and streaming will rapidly use up your allowance.

*Disclaimer* Wifi access is controlled by Chesil Vista rather than ourselves and as such any problems with accessibility should be directed at reception. Efforts will be made to ensure connectivity throughout your stay, however in the unfortunate event of breakdown refunds will not be offered.

- Laundry - washing machines and tumble dryers are located in an on site laundry rather than in the lodge itself.

- Pets - we are pet friendly and welcome one well behaved dog (sorry no very young puppies) into our home. We respectfully ask that pets are not allowed on the furniture and are not left unattended in the property for any period of time.

We endeavor to give your holiday experience a personal touch, providing complementary baked goods, snacks, refreshments and cosmetics during your stay so that the lodge feels like a home from home.

We are always here to help, therefore should you require any further information or have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.']

Title: Patch: Beautiful country cottage with outdoor pool
Description:
['About this space', 'This natural stone cottage is set in the beautiful countryside out the way of any noise making it the perfect place to relax. The cottage benefits from:
. Double bedroom
. Brand new fitted kitchen
. Log burner
. Free Wi-fi and Smart tv with Netflix
. Sofa bed
. Patio with tables and chairs
. Shared swimming pool access
. Shared games room
. Shared tennis court

There are lots of beautiful walks, if you fancy an explore. Including the strawberry line that stretches from cheddar to Congresbury.', 'The space', 'The space
Located in an area of outstanding natural beauty. Private drive . Beautiful views. 4 cottages located in 36 acres. Swimming pool and shower block, tennis court, games room and laundry.
The cottage itself has a brand new kitchen with breakfast bar. Open plan living area with log burner. Double bedroom and bathroom with bath/shower. Outside patio area with furniture and beautiful views

This beautiful region of Somerset offers walking for all abilities along with some great locations to visit including Crooks Peak, Cheddar Gorge, Clevedon Pier. Winscombe village is a short drive or 20-25 minute walk good range of shops including bakery, butcher, Pharmacy, local pubs, Co-op and cafes.
Close to Cheddar, Weston super mare and Bristol', '', '']

Title: Beautiful Cottage in Stokenham overlooking the Sea
Description:
['About this space', "A lovely attached cottage, own private garden, parking space, shared use of the main house gardens and pool looking out to sea in the heart of the South Hams. A beautiful historic house renovated with cool retro decor, super-fast WiFi, hardwired TV with Netflix in a cosy sitting room. As a charming old building, the cottage has some low doorways that the taller amongst us need to be aware of! Great bathroom. Well equipped 'eat in' kitchen and comfortable bedrooms with fresh linen and towels.", 'The space', 'The space
We live in the main house next door and are happy to help with any queries, local knowledge, transport info etc There are two pubs in walking distance in the village and the sea is a 10 minute walk.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Would recommend having a car but we are on a bus route that runs between Dartmouth and Kingsbridge. Guests have full use of all the grounds and of course the swimming pool which has been refurbished and upgraded for the 2021 season. It is closed normally from around October until things warm up in the spring.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The cottage is beautiful old and comfortable with all the mod cons. Important to know for any taller guests some of the doorways and entrances are lower so must take care and that there are two flights of stairs, one from the front door to the main landing and one up to the twin and single room. There is a stair gate on the top landing and on the lower landing, it is easy to close doors to it.

Also, the pool is open from the spring until about the end of September but our beautiful grounds are always here to explore.']

Title: The Bakehouse. Eco-friendly vegan country annexe
Description:
['About this space', 'The Bakehouse is a small, but beautiful self contained annexe on a quiet country lane with a private walled garden. Offering a comfortable double bed, living space with dining table for two, shower room and well equipped kitchen (fridge, sink, kettle, toaster, induction hob). Situated within gorgeous South Downs countryside with plentiful walking opportunities but just a 10 minutes drive from historic Lewes and 25 minutes from Brighton. Perfect for a rural retreat (No TV but fast guest WiFi).', 'The space', 'The space
The Bakehouse is a small but well equipped self-contained annexe with sunny private walled garden (chairs and table provided). Wake up to the sound of birdsong and have a chance to truly relax in this peaceful location.
There is also a heated outdoor saltwater pool available for exclusive hire (¬£20 per hour) during your stay. * Please note the outdoor pool is closed in the winter months. Enquire when booking as to pool availability.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The village of Barcombe is a mile walk away either over the fields or around the country lanes. A car or bike would be handy if you wish to venture further afield.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Owned and run by a vegan family, we try to be as earth-friendly and ecological as possible and being vegan is part of this philosophy of life.
Our space (inside and out) is vegan so we ask you to respect our beliefs and not to bring or consume any animal products on our property.
* Please note the outdoor pool is closed in the winter months. Enquire when booking as to pool availability.']

Title: Holiday cottage 2 people 30 m2 10 minutes from Honfleur
Description:
['About this space', '10 minutes from Honfleur, you will find an ideal place to recharge your batteries. The cottage 2 people (30m2) is located in the property on a landscaped and enclosed garden of almost 2 hectares.
Composed of a room (bed 160x200 and a lunch area with table and 2 chairs).
a bathroom and kitchen.
View of the park, garden table and chair, umbrella, deckchairs and weber barbecue.
Parking on the property and free access to the pool (from April to October - 11m by 5m) heated to 27 degrees.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Parking located inside the property, swimming pool heated to 27 degrees from mid-April to late October.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Numerous activities nearby:
Numerous hiking trails, St Gatien golf course, equestrian center 5 minutes away, museums, fishing, tennis .......
The charming town of Honfleur with its museums and lively poetic alleys, its small harbour, its Saturday market is a 10/15 minute drive.
Deauville/Trouville at 25 minutes.
You will be less than an hour from the majestic cliffs of Etretat.']

Title: Holiday Bungalow East Witterings  Bracklesham bay
Description:
['About this space', 'We would like to welcome guests to our Holiday bungalow, your canine friends will be very welcome.

Sleeps 4 with all bedding supplied. There is a TV with Freeview , free WiFi and fully equipped kitchen

The Park is situated near a nature reserve, and is 5 minutes walk from Bracklesham bay beach (East Wittering ) Onsite facilities Medmerry arms pub, seasonal heated outside pool
a Crazy Golf course, two tennis courts, table tennis and a dog agility course, plus a dedicated washroom for dogs.', 'The space', 'The space
You have the bungalow and free access to all facilities on the holiday park', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guest have free access to all facilities', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The pool is shut from end of September until the spring']

Title: Secluded hideaway, heated pool, walks, fossils
Description:
['About this space', 'The Annex is bright, comfortable and cosy with a new wood burner last winter. The public footpath crossing our garden next to the river Char links with many others - great for dog walkers. We are close to Charmouth beach and Lyme Regis ‚Äì renowned for their fossil treasures. Love swimming? our freshwater pool is generally heated to a very cosy 29 - 30 degrees (warm bath temperature) and can be used at all times of year.

With advance notice, the twin beds can be connected to form a king size bed', 'The space', 'The space
Whilst the Annexe is attached to the Main House, privacy would be respected at all times. Full refurbishment has recently been completed and a private deck added. There is plenty of off street parking and you will have a warm welcome from Stephen and Di. We have two friendly dogs of our own and your own dog/s are welcome too.
The Kitchen is well kitted out but but there are also a number of excellent places to eat in the area, including the famous River Cottage in Axminster.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests will have access to all parts of the garden and swimming pool. Please note that it is a freshwater pool so babies will need the double nappy system to ensure no pees in the pool!

Landscaping and garden improvements are ongoing!', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The historical town of Bridport is 5 miles away and offers excellent street markets on Wednesdays and Saturdays. Broadchurch, the drama, was filmed nearby at West Bay near Golden Cap cliffs - the highest point in Dorset with unparalleled views of the coastline. Eating out: the famous River Cottage in Axminster, the Tytherleigh Arms (our favourite about 15 mins by car), the Iilchester Arms on the nearby Symondsbury Estate, which also has its own excellent caf√©/restaurant, and the Railway Carriage in West Bay.

Note: there are no hidden charges in our pricing - e.g. no cleaning fee']

Title: Fingals Green Oak Barn with shared swimming pool
Description:
['About this space', 'We built this traditional Carpenter Oak green-oak framed barn in 1987. Constructed with heavy oak beams and trusses over a large open plan area it is glazed between the uprights giving it a wonderful light, rustic, warm and spacious feeling.

It is situated by the pool on two levels with the downstairs bedroom opening onto it‚Äôs own private patio garden.

The Barn has a private balcony overlooking the grass tennis court with stairs leading down to the shared indoor heated pool ... perfect!', 'The space', 'The space
The Fingals Barn is a unique living space - one huge room with green oak trusses in the roof. This is an early frame built by the local firm Carpenter Oak. The Balcony over looks the tennis court and the garden and during the Summer months is a wonderful spot to have your early evening aperitifs and eat alfresco. There are three bedrooms, two upstairs a twin with a toilet and a double with a shared bathroom. Downstairs is a kingsize bed with ensuite bathroom with shower. The large sitting room upstairs is open plan with a wonderful grand piano at one end. The dining area also upstairs adjacent to the sitting room has a large dining table and open plan kitchen with all mod cons. Larger parties might want to book The Wisteria suite (sleeps 4) next door to the barn and share meals.
Downstairs the double bedroom has its own private patio surrounded by greenery.', '', '', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
There is no mobile phone signal here - it is so peaceful and quiet! However, there is free wifi everywhere so you can stay connected to the outside world if you need to!']

Title: Pear Store cottage, rural location & indoor pool
Description:
['About this space', 'A beautifully furnished cottage in Oving, just 4 miles outside Chichester, 4 miles from Goodwood and great beaches / walks nearby. Large master bedroom with King Size bed and ample off road parking outside. Our local pub is 200 yards away. Pet free property', 'The space', "The space
A lovely self contained annex cottage attached to the main Farmhouse in Oving village. The open plan living, dinning and kitchen area has a great airy feel with it's high ceiling and is beautifully finished. The kitchen is well equipped with modern appliances. The large master bedroom offers a comfortable King Size bed, full wall fitted wardrobes, vanity table and luxurious White Company bed linen. The bathroom has a fitted shower over the bath to soak away the day. A stair ladder off the main living space leads to a further mezzanine level containing two single beds - perfect for two extra adults or children aged over 7 years (due to steepness of stair). Also Ideal for a couple with a baby to occupy the master bedroom with travel cot. Secluded location off road, with ample parking for up to 2 cars just outside.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Located on a private rural farm estate there is discreet parking for up to two vehicles outside the property. Your own separate patio and garden with seating and BBQ area.

The tennis court is available between 10am and 5pm only due to the proximity of another holiday let and ask you to respect other guests.
There are a selection of well loved rackets in the Laundry room for guest use but request they are wiped down after use with the spray provided. We suggest bringing your own balls to play.

The Pool is now available all year round (as from October 2020 - November 2021). It is shared with another 2 bedroom holiday lets all year as well as our home (which is also a holiday let July to September)
During peak seasons Swimming times will apply to ensure everyone has one slot per day There is also open swimming time but guests must only swim with their household and not enter if someone else is using the facility.
We suggest bringing robes and flip flops for ease of moving from your accommodation to the pool. Arrive swim ready', '', '']

Title: Three Bedrooms With Own Pool, Isle of Wight
Description:
['About this space', 'With the exclusive use of a heated swimming pool and three bedrooms, Willow Lodge will be a popular holiday home for families and is the best brand new holiday home we have seen on the island..
Designed and built in 2021 specifically for holidaymakers, Willow Lodge is south facing.

Willow Lodge is in the grounds of Westridge House - if Willow Lodge alone is booked Westridge House will not have holidaymakers, just the owners.', 'The space', "The space
The lodge comfortably sleeps six people with three bedrooms, two king size beds and a twin bedroom, with the king size bedrooms enjoying the use of a Jack and Jill bathroom with a walk-in-shower, there is also a family bathroom with a walk-in-shower.

While it may be tempting to stay in and around the lodge and swimming pool during a holiday, the beaches of Seaview and Puckpool Park are just a five minute drive away with Bembridge (Countyfile magazine's recent 'Village of the Year' winner) is ten minutes and ideally located to explore all parts of the island.

The spacious, light and comfortable living and dining room with a 50 inch television overlooks the swimming pool with bi-folding doors and leads to the modern well equipped kitchen which includes work surfaces, dishwasher, oven and hob, microwave, toaster, kettle and a fridge/freezer.

The doors from the living room can be opened on warm days to allow free flow from the lodge to the swimming pool area.

Also included in the utility room is a washing machine and tumble dryer.

Wifi, Linen and towels and central heating are included and there is free off road parking.

Willow Lodge is able to accept one small to medium size dog at ¬£50 a week.

The Latest Reviews:

Just wanted to say we had the most wonderful time at Willow Lodge. Many thanks for your help in arranging it. We were very sorry to have to leave and would definitely return. Luiza & Family 24th August 2021

Stylish and fresh property with clear attention to detail throughout. Liz and Graham really have thought of everything to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable. Lovely clean pool very much enjoyed by the children. Temperature of pool perfect for us. Big thanks to Roger for arranging the ferries for us. This was greatly appreciated. Would highly recommend. Sonia & Family 12th July 2021

Willow Lodge was a fantastic new holiday home, set in beautiful grounds. The place has been finished and furnished to a very high standard. The hosts Graham and Liz were so very welcoming, lovely hosts. The swimming pool was heated to 28 degrees and was the warmest pool I have been in. The whole place was immaculately presented. Thank you so much for having us. Nicholas & Family, 1st June 2021."]

Title: Cosy barn conversion with connecting indoor pool
Description:
['About this space', 'Pennard Hill Farm is a family farm with breathtaking views over the Mendip Hills. Our holiday cottages are very individual and have bags of character and charm.
The Haybarn is a beautiful barn conversation next to the indoor heated swimming pool, across the courtyard from the main farm house.
There is plenty to see and do nearby such as Longleat Safari Park, Hauser & Worth Art Gallery, exploring the local towns of Wells, Frome and Glastonbury and enjoying long walks right on the doorstep.', 'The space', 'The space
The Haybarn cottage is opposite the main farmhouse and next to a shared indoor pool. The open plan bedroom upstairs is large with space for a cot. There is a sofa, television and writing desk. There is a bath upstairs with a hand held shower.
Downstairs is also open plan with a fitted kitchen, farmhouse table and chairs, arm chairs and a television.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Parking is next to the property.
The pool is shared with our two other cottages between the hours of 10am and 6pm. Outside these hours it is exclusively for your use. You are of course welcome to use the pool during the day time too if you wish.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Small, well behaved dogs are welcome (a maximum of one unless otherwise arranged) but there is an extra charge of ¬£25 per dog. There is no garden at the Haybarn so dogs must be kept on leads at all times. This needs to be requested and agreed with the owner upon booking.

There is a pub within about 45mins - 1hr walk away, do ask for directions.']

Title: Cottage with tennis court and pool
Description:
['About this space', 'A tranquil environment to unwind and enjoy some peace and quiet. A single storage cottage close to Ashdown Forest offering an all weather tennis court and outdoor swimming pool (heated June - August). The cottage sits in its own enclosed garden.', 'The space', 'The space
Brickyard Farm Cottage is the perfect place for a memorable break. A single storage cottage on the edge of Piltdown golf course offering an all weather tennis court and outdoor swimming pool (heated between June and August). The local area offers excellent golf, cycling, fishing and walking. The cottage sits in its own enclosed garden. The heated swimming pool is within a separate secluded secure garden. There is a barbecue area and seating for al fresco dining. There is a barn which can be used for the safe storage of bikes and there is ample parking for a number of cars. (Minimum two night booking)

The neighbourhood

The Peacock Inn is in walking distance and is the quintessential country inn offering a wealth of historic features. Old Spot Farm Shop is one mile, stocking a wide variety of farmhouse produce, much of it sourced locally. Supermarkets are within easy distance.

Other things to note

The pool will be heated 27 May - 18 September. The temperature is set to 28 - 30 degrees but it is heated by a heat exchanger, we can never guarantee that it will achieve this temperature. Although we do our utmost to keep the pool in tip top condition, it has been known to get algae bloom and had to be closed for a couple of days until safe to swim again', '', '', '', '']

Title: Near Petworth, Cowdray Polo, Goodwood
Description:
['About this space', 'Very contemporarily styled small 2 room simple cottage on ground floor set on a rural farmstead. suited to a couple, single or couple with young baby.
Fresh white linen. Marshall iPhone compatible music speaker.
.', 'The space', 'The space
Our setting is unique, beautiful walks a few steps from the door. Our Highland Cattle, Goats and horses are part of the family. We welcome you to use our pool by arrangement. We provide coffee and tea.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Surrounding land and pool by arrangement.']

Title: Luxury Lake Side Holiday Lodge Sleeps 4
Description:
['About this space', 'This is a beautiful lake side luxury private holiday lodge. It has 2 bedrooms so can sleep up to 4 people. This is for the entire place.

It is situated in a quiet area of billing aquadrome holiday park. It has private parking for 1 car, private decking and a private garden area.

Situated on a private lake, you can relax on the decking. The area is quiet and tranquil with ducks, swans, moor hens on the lake.

55‚Äù smart tv with Netflix in main lounge and a tv and DVD player in master bedroom.', 'The space', 'The space
Detached Private Lake Side Lodge for private use. You are renting the whole unit privately. Our lodge provides wonderful, relaxing self catering accommodation with a fully fitted kitchen, central heating and a family bathroom and includes free parking right next to the lodge for 1 car plus free WiFi. Please note only one car will be permitted per stay.

The kitchen has all utensils and crockery you will need to cater for a lovely holiday. It also has a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and hob and large fridge and freezer.

There is private WiFi and two digital TVs, one 55‚Äù in the lounge (with Netflix included) and a smaller TV in the master bedroom with built in DVD player.

The bathroom has a bath and over bath shower with a rain head and also a hose head.

The master bedroom has a walk in wardrobe and double bed.

The second bedroom has two single beds.

There is also private decking with patio furniture so you can sit and enjoy the sun or watch the wildlife on the private lake.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Luxury 2 bedroom barn with pool and tennis court
Description:
['About this space', 'Cherry Tree Barn is located in the grounds of Hazeland Lodge, an old hunting lodge for Bowood House estate. A peaceful location, with stunning views and lots to do on the doorstep (including heated swimming pool available 1st May to 30th September and tennis court available all year), come and enjoy your own little piece of the Wiltshire countryside.', 'The space', 'The space
Cherry Tree Barn is a fantastic converted barn, with 2 bedrooms sleeping up to 4 (plus 1 infant in a travel cot) and 1 bathroom with shower/bath. One double with kingsize bed and one twin that can be made up as a super king double on request. Fluffy feather duvets and pillows (or anti-allergy bedding on request). Bath towels, hand towels and pool towels (when pool is open) all provided.

Minimum stay varies - 4 nights May to Sept (7 nights during summer holidays Sat-Sat), otherwise 3 nights (with some exceptions). For 2 week bookings a change of linen/towels is provided. For long stay discounted bookings, a charge for a weekly change of linen/towels can be added if required.

Mezzanine dining area overlooking the tennis court, lounge with wood burner, TV with sky package and free WiFi. Kitchen with dishwasher, microwave and washing machine. Please note that there are 5 steps from the main living area to the mezzanine dining area off which the 2 bedrooms and bathroom are located.

Patio and BBQ next to the heated swimming pool (open May to Sept) and tennis court (open all year). Playhouse, slide and swings for little ones. Large wooded garden to explore. Facilities are shared with owners.

Nearby fishing, horse riding, walks and a pub 5 minutes up the road for food and drink.

A 5 minute drive away is the wonderful Bowood House and Gardens with kids adventure playground. Also close to Lacock Abbey, Longleat, the City of Bath, Avebury and Stonehenge and many more local attractions.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Squirrel‚Äôs Den
Description:
['About this space', 'Lovely bedroom suite, beautifully fitted out with nespresso coffee machine, artisan teas and fridge with yoghurt, jam, fruit compote and milk, homemade granola and sourdough bread and toaster. Lovely cosy seating area and rural views. Comfortable bed with luxurious sheets.
We are located in the countryside and have beautiful walks to the river Thames and lovely country pubs with roaring fires and good food on our doorstep.', 'The space', 'The space
Lovely bedroom suite. Access to large indoor pool on request although not always available.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Guests must call before arriving for access to the property.
Not brilliant phone reception but access to WiFi.']

Title: The Buttery
Description:
['About this space', 'This luxury Grade II Listed award winning self catering holiday cottage is located three miles from the City of Cambridge, set in 23 acres of private parkland.
This Cottage is perfect for romantic getaways, business and solo travellers alike. Come home to a roaring log fire whilst enjoying a well deserved gin and tonic from the honesty bar.', 'The space', 'The space
The Buttery comprises of a Sitting room with a kitchen & dining area with a log burning stove along with a good sized double bedroom and ensuite shower room. There is underfloor heating throughout.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Parking is available in the Courtyard situated behind the Cottage.
Access to the Cottage is from the front garden area.']

Title: Norman cottage 10 minutes from Honfleur
Description:
['About this space', '10 minutes from Honfleur, you will find an ideal place to recharge your batteries. The cottage 4 people (85m2) is located in the property, on a landscaped and enclosed garden of almost 2 hectares.
On the ground floor : entrance, living room (TV, fireplace), toilet, large fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher.
Upstairs, 2 bedrooms :
1 with 1 bed 160 by 200 and 1 with 2 beds 90 X 200
bathroom, washing machine/dryer.
Park view, garden table and chairs, deckchairs, umbrella, weber barbecue.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have parking located on the property and have free access to the current pool April to the end of October (11m by 5m) heated to 27 degrees.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
There are plenty of activities nearby.
Numerous hiking trails, Saint Gatien golf course, equestrian center 5 minutes away, museums, fishing, tennis.......
The charming city of Honfleur with its museums, galleries and lively poetic alleys all year round.
Deauville/Trouville.
You'll be less than an hour from Etretat and its majestic cliffs."]

Title: Peace & Comfort within a Hampshire walled garden
Description:
['About this space', 'The Coach House sits within a beautiful walled garden. Both pool, ( heated from June 1st - Sep 30th) & garden are shared with the main 17th Century house. Just 1hr from London, 5 mins from the M3 & perfect for a break or business. Good local places to eat & country walks.

We operate a min. 2 night stay policy and sleeps 3. Cont. breakfast included.

Recently renovated. Luxury beds. Antique furniture and faded linens. Restful and relaxing. English afternoon Tea served Apr-Jul on Wed. & Thurs.', 'The space', "The space
The Coach House is separate from the main house and your own private space to enjoy for a minimum 2 night stay. Upstairs there is a light double aspect bedroom with 5ft Vi-Spring luxury bed & quality bed linen. Running the width of the building is an elegant relaxed sitting/dining room with TV, Wifi, comfortable sofa and furnishings, a generous table for dining/work space and views (double aspect) over the garden. A bright modern kitchen (with fridge, toaster, iron & board) leads off the dining area and tea & coffee making facilities are provided. You are welcome to prepare light meals if you wish.

A separate lobby leads to a newly-fitted bath room with power shower over the bath. There is also a shaving point.

Downstairs there is a small bedroom that can be rented in conjunction with the space upstairs (shares upstairs bathroom). There is a standard 3ft Vi spring bed and there are limited views over the garden.

We want you to feel at home and you are welcome to explore the lovely 1.5 acre garden, planted with yew hedges and to form a series of 'distinct garden rooms'. You can lounge on luxury chairs and day beds and swim in the outdoor heated pool in summer, shared with the hosts. There is a small Weber BBQ available for your use. Talking of eggs we keep rare-breed chickens up the garden and they lay tiny, pretty eggs that you can try!

Please be aware that whilst we are delighted to accept small children, parents are responsible for ensuring that the furnishings are not spoiled in any way or we will need to make a charge for replacements.", '', '', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Included in your stay:

As well as coffee and tea-making facilities, we provide a basket filled with things to get you started for breakfast including orange juice, milk, granola and muesli, sourdough bread, butter, jams, marmalade & local honey.

New for 2022! You may book AFTERNOON TEA in the main house at 3.30pm on Wednesdays and Thursday between the start of April and end of July. Tea is served as a series of 7 individual courses and needs to be booked in advance on our dedicated website. We are able to accommodate up to 10 people each afternoon and the price is ¬£25/head. Do let us know if you are interested and we can check availability over the time you are with us.']

Title: Elm Park Barn, Chewton Keynsham, BS31 2SS
Description:
['About this space', 'We are midway between the popular cities of Bristol and Bath with great views and a large indoor heated swimming pool and outdoor Jacuzzi for your exclusive use. (¬£30 sur-charge paid for heating).
3 charming outdoor seating areas.
Easy access to Bath and Bristol 'Park and Rides'.
TVs in bedrooms, 55" lounge TV. DVD, WIFI, Bluetooth Boom Box.
Equipped Kitchen with dishwasher, washing machine and microwave.
Not suitable for children under 18 or pets. Car essential', 'The space', "The space
We are a tale of two cities, Bath and Bristol, but there are many more places within an hour's drive. Wales, across the Severn Bridges; Exmoor in Devon; Thomas Hardy Country in Dorest; Westonbirt Arboretum and Prince Charles home in the Cotswolds; many National Trust stately homes. Plenty to provide a wonderful week or two' holiday, exploring the South West of the UK.

Cheltenham Races in March

Badminton Horse Trials in May (5th - 7th)

Bath Christmas Market - Thursday 24 Nov -Sunday 11 Dec, 20 mins away.

WESTONBIRT ABORETUM - Christmas Wonderland. Every Fri,Sat,Sun from 25 Nov -18 Dec. 45 mins away

Relax at Elm Park Barn afterwards, with open log fire in Winter; heated swimming pool and hot Jacuzzi. What could be better?"]

Title: Ivy's Sussex sleeps 8 Swimming Pool Pet friendly
Description:
['About this space', "Character property , semi rural location with lovely countryside views. Local to Horsham.
Amazing location for Sussex Adventures

Country Kitchen leads to a sun room afternoon sun with seating.
Relaxing sunny terrace dining for 8 & Gas BBQ. Quiet balcony space afternoon sun.
Large living room , dining for 8 & character bar.
Large front garden with outside games.
Heated private use swimming pool April - Sept
Secure large shed for bike storage. Wifi broadband , Amazon fire Sticks for TV's", 'The space', "The space
Ground Floor
Twin/double bedroom with en-suite shower room .Walk in shower with grab rail & shower seat available. Ideal for those who don't do stairs.
First Floor
Master bedroom king size bed with Jack & Jill shower room. Lovely private room with atmospheric LED lighting. Additional sofa bed sleeps two.
Double bedroom room with access to balcony with countryside view.
Twin room, the Aft Cabin with full size single beds with roof window with lovely views.
TV's in all rooms.
Wash Rooms
Ground floor large family bathroom, Bath & Shower
First Floor shower room with toilet/wash basin.
Ensuite shower room.
Living space
Country Kitchen with, double oven, ceramic hob , fridge, microwave , coffee machine , kettle , toaster , dishwasher & breakfast table.
Utility space , washing machine , tumble drier & large additional fridge/freezer. Afternoon & evening Sun room with seating tables and chairs leading to a secure & private rear garden with full size outside table tennis.
Quiet relaxing sunny terrace over looking the large front secluded garden. West facing Sunny quiet balcony space with country views.
Large living room , dining for 8 & character bar with fridge to cool your local Sussex Wine & Ales.", '', '', '', '']

Title: Mill Coach House @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description:
['About this space', 'Mill Coach House is a delightful cottage nestled in the beautiful hills of Somerset, on the south side of a wooded valley beside the River Tone. Nearly 200 years old, this lovely cottage has been newly updated to create a charming, well-equipped holiday home.
The grounds are a paradise of fields, water meadows and gardens, a haven for wildlife, and star-gazing in our dark skies. Our heated indoor swimming pool and play area with swings, mini fortress and trampoline offer fun for everyone.', 'The space', 'The space
Originally a barn for the horses and carts which transported the wool and corn from the mill, Mill Coach House is entered through a useful porch area. It has a new kitchen with dining area and a comfortable sitting room.
On the first floor, Bedroom 1 has a double bed and Bedroom 2 has a zip-link bed which can be twin beds or a super-king bed.
Mill Coach House is south facing with river and garden views and an outside eating area. Guests are also welcome to take advantage of the rest of the beautiful grounds and river banks. :
At Mill Coach House the facilities include:
‚Ä¢ Induction hob, electric oven and microwave
‚Ä¢ Dishwasher
‚Ä¢ Refrigerator with small freezer compartment
‚Ä¢ Toaster and kettle
‚Ä¢ Smart TV
‚Ä¢ Free wifi and 4G mobile access
‚Ä¢ New bathroom with a shower, washbasin and WC
‚Ä¢ Shared heated indoor swimming pool
‚Ä¢ Shared children‚Äôs play area
‚Ä¢ Shared barbecue
‚Ä¢ A separate shared utility has a washing machine and tumble drier.
‚Ä¢ Ample free parking

Linen and bath towels are included but please provide your own swimming and beach towels.
We‚Äôre sorry but dogs are not allowed. We do have two, very friendly, waggy tailed labradors who live on site and are a part of our family. They have free use of all the gardens so you will meet them wandering around.']

Title: Westcountry house, hot tub, & outdoor heated pool
Description:
['About this space', 'On the edge of Exmoor, Little Burston is a beautiful country home set in 110 acres of our own farmland close to Dulverton. Surrounded by nature, very comfortable and well equipped. It can sleep up to 6 people. Your own private garden with hot tub and patio, own drive and ample parking. Heated pool at the main house 1st May to end September. For your and our use only.
We welcome up to 2 well behaved dogs.
I charge extra for dogs as the house gets an extra clean after their stay.', 'The space', "The space
The cottage is secluded and surrounded by nature - red deer and roe deer, foxes badgers and a large variety of birds in and around the adjacent farmland. You are free to walk the farm, fish in the trout pond, play tennis and enjoy the heated pool at the main farmhouse during the summer (May to end of September). There is a heated games barn near the main house. Inside are table tennis and table football tables and gym rings. It‚Äôs a lovely space to do Yoga with a large window looking down the valley.

The cottage is cosy and warm with comfy sofas a 42'' plasma TV freesat and DVD player and bluetooth speaker. There are DVDs to watch and a selection of family games and books. There is a well equipped kitchen and a dining table and chairs. The cottage has wifi.

Upstairs are three rooms. 2 bedrooms - one with twin beds and ensuite bathroom with bath and shower. The other has a king size bed with ensuite bathroom with shower. In between is a study with a king size sofa bed. Linen and towels are provided.

The cottage has its own private garden with patio, pergola, table and chairs - a real sun trap when the sun shines. There is a barbecue for guests to use. The garden has a large grassed area with a netted trampoline, swing and football net for those with children. No hard ball games near the cottage please.

It's a place to relax, recharge your batteries away from the relentless pace of modern life.

The farm has horses grazing and neighbouring farms with sheep and for that reason we ask that dogs are on leads when near livestock.", '', '', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The cottage has wifi - the code is EVhJf4KTiVtvRn.
When walking the farm please close all gates and only walk in the areas we describe. We have several horses who live with us. Please especially close the deerproof fences as the red deer eat all the trees!']

Title: The Party Barn
Description:
['About this space', 'Wonderfully rural annex providing self contained accommodation comprising open plan Living/Dining Room/Kitchen and use of indoor swimming pool by arrangement. No pets allowed.', 'The space', 'The space
The Party Barn is modern yet cosy and very easy to relax in. Fully fitted kitchen, TV, WiFi its easy to stay in touch as well as switch off. The annex has a great double bedroom with en suite shower and ideal twin room with additional single bed.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The Party Barn has a separate access to our house so you can come and go at ease with keys to your own front door. There is an indoor swimming pool that can be used by arrangement but during term time it is limited due to the operation of my swim school that runs six days a week. I am a qualified ASA swimming teacher so lessons can also be arranged for children.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
If you want to arrange a babysitter then we can help as well as drivers to take you out to dinner.']

Title: Idyllic Dorset Hideaway
Description:
['About this space', "Our traditional English Shepherd's Hut sits deep in the rolling hills of the Dorset countryside. We have created an idyllic escape where you can switch off from the cares of the outside world with nothing but birdsong to disturb your peace. Take a walk around our beautiful gardens and lake, enjoy a dip in our pool, warm up next to the log burning stove or while away an evening around the fire pit as you barbecue your supper.", 'The space', "The space
Our Shepherd's Hut contains a very comfortable double bed, made up already for your arrival, with an electric blanket. The hut is warm and cosy even in winter with the log-burning stove lit. There is a microwave combi-oven and a single gas ring. There is also a fir pit outside to barbecue your supper. We provide tea and coffee and our own apple juice and milk can be found in the large cold box just outside. Our local pub The Mitre which serves good food will give you a warm welcome and is only ten minutes' walk away..

The bathroom is alongside the Shepherd's Hut and contains a shower, basin, loo and a sink for washing up. Towels are provided.


Outside, we have a prize-wining herd of grass-fed Dexter cattle grazing in our fields. People have commented that our beef tastes like it used to and that it is more delicious than any other beef ever sampled. Joints, steaks, stewing steak, mince, burgers and sausages are available (frozen) to our guests if ordered in advance or on arrival.
We can now also supply pork breakfast sausages (plain or with honey and apple) and pork chops from the pigs in our woods.", '', '', '', '']

Title: Self contained studio apartment
Description: ['About this space', 'A self contained first floor studio apartment with private entrance, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom located in the beautiful Painswick Valley. The studio is a attached to a large house and guests are welcome to enjoy our gardens and swimming pool when not in use by our family. It sleeps 4 (1 double and 1 sofa bed in the same room). Self catered- but can stock fridge in advance on request. Easy access to Stroud, Cheltenham, Gloucester, Tetbury, Cirencester. Beautiful local walks and pubs.', 'The space', 'The space\nThe studio apartment has solid oak flooring throughout. There is a large open plan space with a table and chairs, a sofa, dressing table and a large walk in wardrobe with ample hanging space and shelving. A small kitchen has a sink, dishwasher, fridge and an electric cooker with all basic utensils supplied. The bathroom has a shower, sink and loo and towels will be provided.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nThere is private access to the apartment with a entrance hall with coat racks, a storage area and stairs up to the first floor. Guests are welcome to walk through the extensive gardens and if the swimming pool is up and running guests are welcome to use it by arrangement with the family.']

Title: Lower Mill Estate.Cosy 1 Bedroom Cottage with Pool
Description:
['About this space', 'Tiny, cute, cosy 1 bedroom cottage in Lower Mill Estate. Use of Mill Village heated outdoor pool, tennis courts, lakes. The cottage is good for couples & solo adventurers but can sleep up to 3 people. Fantastic location in a 550 acre nature reserve with outdoor activities, cycling, lakes and restaurant. Gigaclear WiFi now installed at the cottage', 'The space', 'The space
Follow on Instagram @firefly_lowermillestate - Cosy, cute, 1 bedroom cottage (approx. footprint 5m x 5m) suitable for solo traveller, couples or 2 adults and 1 child. Fabulous location set in Lower Mill Estate with access to heated outdoor pool and the wider estate facilities (excluding ArtSpa).
My tiny cottage in the Mill Village area of Lower Mill Estate has 1 bedroom with a small double bed and a single bunk bed above. There is a separate shower room with loo and sink as well as a washing machine. The kitchen & lounge area is open plan with a sofa, tub chair and footstool, log burner, dining table and chairs, Freeview TV with a selection of DVDs and board games. The kitchen area is compact but has everything you will need - fridge with small freezer compartment, dishwasher, oven, portable induction hobs, kettle, toaster, microwave, iron, ironing board and all the essentials.Outside there is a communal courtyard with outdoor seating which is a real sun trap in the afternoon and evening.

Gigaclear wifi now installed at the cottage.

THE COTTAGE CAN NOT BE BOOKED TO USE AS A PLACE TO STAY FOR COMMUTING TO AND FROM A PLACE OF WORK.

THE MEZZANINE AREA IS NOT AVAILABLE FOR RENTAL GUESTS AND ACCESS IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN.

PLEASE NOTE WHERE I HAD TO CANCEL A BOOKING LAST DECEMBER IT WAS DUE TO A SMALL LEAK AND I WAS UNABLE TO RESOLVE IT OVER THE CHRISTMAS WEEK. I OFFERED THE GUEST A DISCOUNT IF THEY STILL WANTED TO STAY OR TO CANCEL WITH A FULL REFUND WHICH WAS WELCOMED BY THE GUEST.', '', '', '', '']

Title: The Duck Wing, quirky dog friendly apartment
Description:
['About this space', "The Duck Wing is a quirky, self contained apartment within Plenty Cottage. Ideal for two people (and pets) it's beautifully appointed for a relaxed, carefree stay in a wonderfully rural environment. Nothing is too much trouble. It sleeps two in double bed in a pretty bedroom and has a double sofa bed too. Own bathroom/shower, a separate WC and a warm spacious living area. The pub is 7 mins walk away and the beaches a 5 mins drive. The private, heated swimming is available 1st April - 31 Sept", 'The space', "The space
Pretty, self contained with everything you need. We have ample off-road parking and storage for bikes, equipment etc. You have your own access front door code. Deep in the countryside, it's the land of Peace and Plenty surrounded by The National Trust. The swimming pool is warm in a fantastic poly tunnel(!) and wonderful during the summer months (April to September inc) and the dog/child friendly pub is only a ten minute stroll down the lane. The garden is prolific and peaceful ( dogs love it!).", 'Guest access', "Guest access
The front door key code enables you to come and go as you wish and I am here to greet you. The large, abundant garden is at your disposal as too is the summerhouse, BBQ and pool. There's loads of parking and storage space", 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
The Five Bells serves home cooked food too and it's only a 10 minute stroll. We have no street lights (yeah!) but I'll provide a torch. There are wonderful restaurants in nearby Lyme Regis, Bridport and Seatown. Go to The Hive at Burton Bradstock too!"]

Title: Farm View - tranquil retreat near hills & coast
Description:
['About this space', "Farm View is located in the middle of Sampford Brett - a quintessential English village between Exmoor National Park, the Quantock Hills & Somerset's coast. It provides bright spacious accommodation and is fitted to a high standard with comfy beds, fitted carpets, modern bathroom & country pine furniture. Central heating keeps the property snug and warm even in the depths of winter. Outside there are spacious grounds with a swimming pool, trampoline and climbing frame. Free Type 2 EV charging.", 'The space', 'The space
Farm View has a spacious double bedroom with plenty of room for a cot which we can provide on request. The second bedroom is smaller and has bunk beds which are 3 foot wide. Both bedrooms have a wardrobe, chest of drawers and bedside tables.

The large, bright lounge has a comfy settee, matching bed-settee (which will sleep an extra 2 people), dining table and coffee table. There is a wall mounted TV with a DVD player and FreeSAT box. WiFi internet is available throughout the property.

There is a kitchen area off one end of the lounge (an L-shaped room) which is fully equipped with cooker, fridge, microwave oven, toaster etc.

The modern bathroom has a bath/shower, toilet, washbasin, shelving and heated towel rail.

Please note that access is up an external flight of 8 steps so the accommodation is not suitable for people who find steps difficult.', '', '', '', '']
