Title: Secluded luxury in New Forest with heated pool.
Description:
['About this space', 'A secluded, luxurious retreat located on a smallholding where you can interact with the animals. Once the loft of a Victorian stable set in the ground of a country house in a beautiful rural setting, with an outdoor heated pool to use in summer. Located in the northern tip of the New Forest National Park, close to Paultons Park and Salisbury. The added bonus of a country pub 2 min walk up the road!', 'The space', 'The space
The Retreat is a lovely sunny, self contained and very spacious (1100 sq ft) first floor converted stable loft which has been newly refurbished to a very high standard and everything within is there to provide you with the standard of quality you deserve. For 2022 we have added some additional touches including a replacement top quality mattress for an even more comfortable nights sleep!
The modern kitchen is new with all the facilities you need to cook and dine-in should you wish to. Tea, coffee, sugar, milk will be provide on arrival and we often offer a selection of fresh produce for sale from our smallholding.

You are welcome to visit the smallholding and share in the daily feeding of chickens and sheep or see where all the fresh produce is grown.
Alternatively you may wish to cook alfresco over the fire pit or on the barbecue whilst watching the sunset over the fields in your private garden, before retiring inside to the oak beamed living area. Relax watching TV (Talk TV included) or a DVD, challenge each other to a game of Scrabble or just spend quiet time snuggled into a luxury throw whilst reading a book ‚Äì all are provided for your enjoyment. There are two single sofa z beds in this space for younger children (hidden behind curtains to make their own special den) as well as a double sofa bed for older children - so plenty of options for guests.
The bedroom has a king size bed with top quality Angora wood 30,000 spring mattress and high quality bed linen and anti allergy duvet. Fitted wardrobes provide ample hanging and shelving space and a ceiling fan helps to ensure you are comfortable when the weather gets warmer.
The spacious shower room has a beautiful stripped wooden floor and views across the fields. There is a large walk- in shower and plenty of room for all your personal toiletries. A small selection of miniature toiletries are provided, along with good quality fluffy towels and of course loo rolls!
Downstairs, as you enter your front door, there is a boot room/utility room with plenty of coat hanging space, cupboards and sink with running hot and cold water and a washing machine. Outside, there is parking inside the gates and storage can also be provided for bicycles, if you bring these with you.
The private garden to The Retreat is well stocked with mature shrubs and beautiful flowering perennials with a lawn leading to a seating area overlooks the fields. Early in the morning you are likely to see deer roaming, rabbits, foxes, squirrels and a plethora of wild birds. In the evenings the sky is the domain of bats and owls or you may be lucky enough to see swallows swooping around.
From your garden you can take a stroll up The Avenue - a sweeping grass walkway edged with an enormous planted mixed border and ancient brick and stone wall - along the path and out through the private gate to a footpath leading to the road and further footpaths beyond. In Spring these paths provide a magnificent spectacle, covered in a carpet of Bluebells.

The heated outdoor swimming pool is available for your exclusive use
from 9am - 2pm and again 6pm-8pm during the summer months (usually May to end Sept). Swimming towels are provided and there are sun loungers by the pool as well as in your own garden. Guests use the pool at their own risk and any children should be supervised at all times.


Pets
Although we have a dog in our main house, it is with regret that we have decided not to accept dogs at The Retreat due to the close proximity of grazing sheep.

Arrival
The Retreat is available for a minimum of 2 nights (4 or 7 nights min in high season). Usual check in is after 3pm and is contact free. We hope to be there to meet you from a distance on arrival, but if this is not possible a key will be left for you. My husband and I will be around if you have any queries, or you need a good recommendation for eating out in one of the many pubs and restaurants near by!

Pricing
Prices provided here are for low season, at different times of the year price may vary. Summer is typically ¬£165/night for 2 and includes the use of the heated pool. Additional guests from ¬£30/night.

Departure
We ask all guests to strip their bed, clean the bbq (if used) and pop rubbish/recycling outside into the main bins. This helps reduce the contact our cleaners have with personal items whilst we are still battling the Covid pandemic.
Departure is by 10am to enable us the maximum time between guests to ensure the property is as clean and safe as possible.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The accommodation is primarily on the first floor with stairs.']

Title: Granary Cottage (6255)
Description:
['About this space', 'Complete with a shared swimming pool, this property is ideal for that escape to the countryside.. All on the ground floor.
Living/dining room: With wood burner.
Kitchen: With electric cooker, fridge and dishwasher.
Bedroom 1: With double bed and TV.
Bedroom 2: With twin beds.
Bedroom 3: With twin beds.
Bathroom: With bath and toilet.
Shower room: With shower cubicle and toilet.. Central heating, electricity, bed linen and Wi-Fi included. Cot and highchair. Laundry room (shared with other properties on-site). Sitting-out area with picnic bench and barbecue. Indoor swimming pool (shared, open from Easter, closed winter, please enquire when booking). Games room (shared). 2 dogs welcome, to be kept on a lead at all times (livestock). Private parking. No smoking. Please note: There is an unfenced, shallow stream in the grounds. WTB 3 Dragons. . Indoor heated swimming pool/hot tub. The ancient farmhouse at Werngochlyn dates back to the 12th century. It nestles in open farmland underneath the Skirrid Mountain and the four comfortable holiday cottages are sympathetically converted from stone farm buildings set around the farmyard. The setting is perfect for children of all ages (adults too!). There is plenty of room to run around and explore ‚Äì and plenty of animals to befriend‚Ä¶. a pair of Kune-kune miniature pigs, a donkey, goats, sheep, chickens (you can collect your own eggs for breakfast if you want to), ducks, dogs, cats and loads of horses and ponies ‚Äì including a tiny rescue pony named Tinkerbell.
You could stay around the farm all day ‚Äì with a heated, indoor swimming pool, hot tub, games room and then a BBQ in the evening. There are footpaths running directly from the farm and dogs are welcome. You are ideally place to explore the Brecon Beacons, Black Mountains, Usk and Wye Valleys and the fantastic countryside that surrounds the nearest market town of Abergavenny which is only 3 miles away ‚Äì home of the Food Festival. It boasts good shops and a market, a cinema, theatre, castle and museum as well as good choice of pubs, caf√©s and restaurants including Michelin starred ‚ÄòWalnut Tree‚Äô which is within walking distance of the farm. An 18-hole golf course and driving range is only ¬Ω mile away. An enjoyable stay that will have you wanting to return. Shop 3 miles.
Free WiFi']

Title: Drop Anchor
Description:
['About this space', ''Drop Anchor':

Drop Anchor is a light and airy property, decorated in cream and sea green colours. It is 38‚Äô x 12' and sleeps 4 guests, it can easily accommodate a baby in a travel cot, which can be supplied on request. A highchair, baby changing mat and bed guard can also be supplied on request.

The two bedrooms are both a good size and this property boasts two bathrooms, one of which has a bath with shower above. The main bedroom has a king size bed with en-suite bathroom and flat screen 32inch TV with DVD. There is plenty of wardrobe space. The twin bedroom has a shower room/toilet opposite.

There is a fully equipped kitchen with microwave oven and washing machine. The lounge area has a comfortable cream leather sofa facing a 40" smart TV - there is Wi-Fi available.
The property has gas central heating and is double glazed and has french doors leading to a large wraparound terrace. Here you will find rattan patio furniture, a great place to watch the world go by with a cold drink or for alfresco dining!

There is parking for one car adjacent to the property.

You can get glimpses of the sea from the lounge and the pool from the main bedroom

Sandhills Holiday Park has:

A fabulous heated outdoor swimming pool and separate heated children's pool
A family friendly Manor Clubhouse with bar, which also serves hot beverages and a small selection of hot food
Entertainment during the summer months

All set in peaceful woodland next to the Avon Beach and Mudeford Quay

Near by:

* 2 minute stroll along the adjacent promenade to the beach or quay
* A leisurely walk along the beach and you will come to a convenience store with a fresh bakery, The Coffee Cabin, a wonderful Ice Cream Kiosk serving delicious flavours by Marshfield and Purbeck
* You will also find the reputable Seafood Restaurant ‚ÄòThe Noisy Lobster‚Äô with it‚Äôs adjacent fish and chips/seafood takeaway']

Title: Traditional Sussex Barn with Pool
Description:
['About this space', 'Traditional black boarded barn in secluded grounds with beautiful views of Sussex countryside. Plenty of space to relax by the swimming pool, on the terrace or wander round the garden.', 'The space', 'The space
The converted hay barn is situated within private grounds offering extensive views over fields to the South Downs. The building features exposed oak beams and a galleried roof space so there is plenty of room for guests to spread out, socialise or relax. The cow shed is a separate building across the barn yard and contains 2 additional bathrooms (ideal to change for the pool), kitchen and lounge area.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have access to the barn, cow shed and gardens. The heated swimming pool is open summer months only, normally mid May to mid September. Please confirm dates in advance as weather dependant. There is a barbecue and fire pit on the terrace. Feel free to bonfire in the garden.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please supervise children at all times as there is a swimming pool, pond and river in the garden. Don‚Äôt swim alone or at night.']

Title: Hoarstone - Cosy country cottage
Description:
['About this space', 'Peaceful and with stunning views, you will find Hoarstone Cottage the perfect place from which to enjoy everything that the Cotswolds countryside has to offer with a wealth of walks, cycle routes, bridleways and wildlife right outside your window. You will also find yourself within easy reach of plenty of renowned towns, such as Burford, Woodstock, Bourton-on-the-Water and Stow-on-the-Wold, all of which will enable you to enjoy a fantastic Cotswold holiday. An ideal staycation post lockdown!', 'The space', 'The space
Cottage is a self-catering holiday cottage for upto 4 people. Located on the edge of the Cotswolds with stunning views across the Glyme Valley, yet only 5 minutes from the bustling market town of Chipping Norton, this cottage is the perfect setting for a luxury break. Soho Farmhouse, Daylesford Farm Shop, Blenheim Palace, many award winning pubs plus Cornbury, Feastival and Wilderness Festivals are all within 10 minutes of this beautiful hideaway.

Open plan, with high vaulted ceilings to let in plenty of light, the cottage is situated next to a synthetic surface tennis court and a shared swimming pool, and with footpaths crossing the farm, this is a great get-away to unwind and relax. Due to the ongoing situation with Coronavirus, the swimming pool is open but will be operated on a rota basis, and at our discretion.

There is ample parking and a private garden with outdoor garden furniture and BBQ (during summer months).

In the cooler winter months, a wood burning stove adds to a cosy feel within the cottage which is itself heated through underfloor heating from ground source heat pumps.

For those with young children, we can provide a travel cot, high chair and the cottage is fitted with a stair gate to prevent the more adventurous toddler exploring too far.

Dogs are welcome provided you let us know in advance, so that we can provide towels to help dry and keep your pet clean. We do have our own dogs and a cat so well behaved dogs only please!', '', '', '', '']

Title: Coach House with private indoor Swimming Pool
Description: ['About this space', 'The Coach House has been beautifully converted into the most unique, luxury detached self-catering holiday accommodation sleeps 4(+1) with exclusive use of its own private en suite heated indoor swimming pool and outdoor tennis court. Just 6 miles South of the County town of Shrewsbury, surrounded by unspoilt Shropshire countryside in an area of outstanding natural beauty, it provides a perfect base to explore the County, walk in the Shropshire Hills or just relax and get away from it all.', '', '', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nExclusive use of private heated indoor Swimming Pool situated within the Coach House itself. Free use of outdoor Tennis Court and adjacent Orchard in season.']

Title: Culver Reach 33 - cosy and warm caravan by the sea
Description:
['About this space', 'A light and airy caravan with a lovely sized lounge area (refurbished 2022) which has a TV with DVD player. Separate seating is set around a dining table which then leads into a galley, fully equipped kitchen. Down the hallway there is a bathroom with power shower, WC and basin, separate toilet, two twin bedrooms and the master double bedroom. The caravan is double glazed and benefits from gas central heating. There is parking for two cars. Beds are made up on arrival, please bring towels.', 'The space', 'The space
Culver Reach 33 is conveniently situated in the centre of the park - all park amenities are in easy reach and the secluded beach is a short 10 minute walk.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The caravan will be yours to use exclusively during your stay. On site there is a bar, shop, day and evening entertainment and indoor and outdoor pools. Access to the bar, entertainment & swimming pools requires passes available at reception at an extra cost.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The park do not assist owners in monitoring the gas bottles, please keep an eye on this during your stay and contact me should you find the window to be red and I will ensure the gas bottle is changed for you.']

Title: Spacious cottage, indoor pool, sauna
Description:
['About this space', "Characterful 2 bedroom barn conversion, sleeping 4 people (+ cot), with period features and wood burner set in the beautiful East Devon countryside. Shared use of 33ft indoor pool, sauna, fitness room, children's play areas, 12 ft trampoline and 2 acres of grounds. Rated 4 star by Visit England. Private patio and parking area. Located near Tiverton, 15 minutes‚Äô drive from the M5 (J27).

Central heating, free WiFi, flat screen TV, cot & highchair available. Pets welcome (charge applies).

We‚Äôre running our indoor pool, sauna and fitness room on a rota system at the moment with each cottage having exclusive use of the pool house for two 1-hour slots each day. The play area, trampoline and games room are open with parental supervision.

English, Spanish, French and Greek spoken.", 'The space', 'The space
The Granary at Three Gates Farm is cosy and comfortable, ideal for a family (+cot and h/chair available). A perfect base to stay for some R & R or explore this lovely part of Devon. Short breaks available upon request outside school holidays.', '', "Guest access
The cottage is self contained and has a patio area with table and chairs (BBQ available). Guests have access to 2 acres of shared grounds and facilities including indoor pool, sauna, fitness room, children's play area and games rooms.", '', '']

Title: Dellfield holiday cottage
Description:
['About this space', 'Self contained holiday flat. 2 bedrooms (1 double, 1 twin). Double room has en-suite shower room. Spacious sitting room looks out onto secluded shared garden. Off road parking for 2 vehicles next to the flat.

We are inside the South Downs National Park with lovely walks close by. We are also close to Goodwood for the Festival of Speed, Revival and Horse Racing - as well as the cathedral city of Chichester and sandy beaches at West Wittering.', 'The space', 'The space
The flat is self contained with its own access door. Fully equipped kitchen with a dish washer and a sitting room with TV. There is access to a laundry room with a coin operated washer and drier.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
We have a swimming pool (outdoor and only in the summer), tennis court, sauna and gym which guests can use by arrangement (extra charge for use of sauna due to electricity costs). We just ask for consideration as sometimes we would like to enjoy them either on our own or with friends. We do not expect guests to spend all day everyday by the pool.

The garden has a slide and trampoline and there is a shed with a few toys and bikes suitable for children.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Although the flat is all on the ground floor there is a small step down into the sitting room and there are 3 steps outside down from the car park area to the main access door.

The flat is not suitable for wheelchair users due to the steps noted above and also a narrow door between the kitchen and sitting room.

The sitting room and kitchen/dining room are spacious but the bedrooms are compact.']

Title: Vale Hornbeam - Farm with stunning mountain views
Description:
['About this space', 'One-Bedroom House This house with a balcony and mountain views of The Brecon Beacons, an open plan kitchen/living room, one bedroom with king size and single bed, also a double sofa bed in living room. There is a shared indoor heated swimming pool and indoor hot tub with changing rooms.
Due to Covid rules of no more than 6 adults staying in one house we offer our shepherds hut free of charge to keep within the Welsh government rules (child under 12 yr are not counted). Also parties and gatherings are not allowed within the cottages. Our hot tub and pool are open on a booking slot system for a private 1.5hr slot (only one cottage can use the facilities at only one time). Face masks and social distancing applies. Our cottages are cleaned to covid standards and hand sanitiser is in the cottage for your use.', 'The space', 'The space
The cottage features original oak beams in all the rooms and has a spacious living room with French doors opening onto a balcony with views of the Brecon Beacons, situated in a farm court yard setting, ideal for al fresco dining or a barbeque.
A great location to meet up with family and friends.
Situated on the Edge of the Brecon Beacons amongst beautiful countryside close to Brecon, Builth Wells, Hay on Wye, Crickhowell and Abergavenny. Located on a traditional working farm with cows, sheep, hens, goats, pigs and our donkey called Star. Our farm tours are very popular with the all the family and our play area with swings, slides, sand pit and football goals are situated by the cottages', '', '']

Title: The Beach Huts: Unique home with indoor pool
Description:
['About this space', 'A stunning & unique home in the pretty village of Oving! This Eco-build Beach Hut style property has 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a stunning large open living space. A private back garden terrace with beautiful unspoilt views across fields and separate BBQ sun deck. A tennis court is literally on your doorstep and a great local pub only 200 yards away! A quiet and truly unique place to stay and enjoy. We are only 4 miles from the Goodwood Estate and in easy reach of West Wittering Beach.', 'The space', "The space
This Eco build property has a lovely light open plan living area containing a modern fully equipped kitchen, dining area, seating and TV area with a cosy wood burning stove. The Master Bedroom offers a comfortable King Size bed with fully fitted wardrobes and space for a travel cot. The Second bedroom has 2 single beds (which can be pushed together if preferred) and equipped with blackout curtains AND blind to ensure a good nights sleep. All bed linen is The White Company for added luxury. The house is beautifully finished in Scandinavian style with picturesque views across the farm.

This is a truly stunning place to stay and relax - if you want peace and quiet then this is a perfect retreat (unless you bring your own little noise makers!). We are very child friendly and can provide everything from toys to high chair (NB: aren't providing Travel Cots due to Covid:19). We also have our Pear Store property situated nearby. Combined, they offer a great place to stay with friends and family, but have the added bonus of everyone having their own space.", '', '', '', "We are so lucky to have so many wonderful places to visit on out door step. From the spectacular beaches of the Wittering's to The South Downs and it's stunning walks to The Goodwood Estate and it's renowned events. The Beach Huts is ideally located to ensure easy drives to so many days out. A list of suggested places to visit (including family friendly and rainy days) is in our visitors book. This can also be emailed to you on request.

This is an Eco Build and our preferred method of heating the space is using our wood burning stove. There is plenty of wood available for your stay in our wood shed so please help yourself at no extra cost. We have a smart electric heating system if wood burners aren't your thing, to ensure your stay is a cosy one - we only use Green energy suppliers.

We are lucky to have a separate internet signal for The Beach Huts which offers fantastic WiFi for all your needs.

The Washing Machine & Dryer is located in a utility building adjacent to the property."]

Title: Chalet at  Selsey Golf and Country Club
Description:
['About this space', "57 Granada is a traditional holiday chalet situated at Selsey Golf and Country Club a popular, family-oriented holiday park. The facilities on site include an outdoor heated swimming pool and bar with a family seating area. There are two ball play areas, a tennis court and a children's playground. The chalet is suitable for both families and couples. The site is located just a few minutes drive or 15/20 minutes walk to Selsey village and the local beaches. The site is next to Selsey Golf Course.", 'The space', 'The space
The chalet has two bedrooms with a separate shower/toilet with a heated towel rail. A new kitchen was installed in January 2018 and this has a hob/oven and microwave. The chalet was also completely rewired in January 2018. The first bedroom has a double bed and second has a single bed with second pull out bed underneath. Unfortunately there is no cot available, guests are welcome to bring their own. The sofa also pulls out to a double bed. All bedding and towels are provided along with bathroom essentials and cleaning products. There is a TV/DVD player. An outside seating area on a paved patio is ideal for alfresco dining.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
A car parking space is available close to the chalet. All areas in the chalet are accessible.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
To use the two bars a temporary membership is required which can be arranged in advance.']

Title: Cosy cottage with stunning views and hot tub
Description:
['About this space', 'Pennard Hill Farm is a family farm offering fantastic views over the Mendips.
The Lamb is the perfect place for a luxurious romantic getaway with its roaring log fire and stunning views from bedroom.
There is plenty to do just a stones throw from Pennard Hill and some lovely towns to explore such as Bruton, Frome, Wells and Glastonbury. There are a huge array of pubs and restaurants on the door step and plenty of places for long or short walks in the countryside.
Breakfast is not provided.', 'The space', 'The space
There is a gorgeous private wood-fired hot tub!', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The pool is shared with our two other cottages and is available to use between the hours of 10am and 6pm.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please note small, well behaved dogs are welcome (a maximum of one, unless otherwise arranged) but there is an extra charge of ¬£25 per dog. This needs to be requested and agreed with the owner upon booking.']

Title: Linnets (E3870)
Description: ['About this space', 'This holiday property is a well-appointed, rural semi-detached property, with its own heated swimming pool, secluded gardens and has full facilities for the disabled (except a hoist) plus induction loop, and lies in the peaceful Vale of Taunton Deane. Ground floor: Living/dining room with patio doors. Kitchen. 1 double bedroom with TV. Wet room with shower chair, grab rails and toilet. First floor: 2 double (6ft zip and link, can be twin) bedrooms with TV, one with additional single. Bathroom with shower attachment and toilet.. Electric woodburner in living room included. Oil central heating, electricity, bed linen, towels and Wi-Fi included. Travel cot and high chair on request. DVD. Microwave. Washing machine. Dishwasher. Freezer. Welcome pack. Garden with patio and furniture. Summerhouse. Barbecue. Parking. Outdoor heated swimming pool (9.7m x 4.8m), open 1st May-30th September. Hot tub for 6 (private). No smoking. Wheelchair access.. Linnets is a rather special property in the heart of rural Somerset. It is a large, three bedroom semi-detached house with a modern Swedish hot tub that seats 6, as well as an outdoor swimming pool, set in a very pretty garden. Linnets is fully wheelchair accessible and has the following National Accessibility Scheme ratings: Assisted Wheelchair Access, Visual level 1, Hearing level 2. Downstairs there is a spacious wet room with grabs rails and shower chair. The kitchen also has some low level worktops and the living room is fitted with a hearing loop.\nThe pretty village of Fitzhead is a wonderful base to explore the stunning local area. There is an abundance of attractions including, The West Somerset Steam Railway at Bishops Lydeard, The Museum of Somerset in Taunton, Dunster, Minehead, the stunning Exmoor National Park, numerous National Trust properties including Dunster Castle, Fyne Court, Coleridge Cottage, Montacute and Knightshayes and there is also Tropiquaria, Diggerland, Butlins and Funland. There are two great country pubs within approximately 2 miles, or if you fancy staying by the pool and hot tub there is a large barbecue and chiminea. Firewood for the chiminea is provided. The pretty village of Milverton 2 miles and the town of Wiveliscombe 3¬Ω miles has shops, post offices, restaurants, pubs and banking facilities. Shop 3 miles and pub 2 miles.\nFree WiFi']

Title: Kanna, Quirky Oxfordshire Couples Treehouse
Description:
['About this space', 'Kanna is a quirky and totally unique Treehouse, built for a couple or small family, and part of a collection of ultra-modern eco-friendly treehouses that make up a new custom-built retreat in rural Oxfordshire. With an eco-design and custom exterior of green and rusty copper-coloured aluminum, giving Kanna a distinctive, standout look.', 'The space', "The space
Neighbouring the Cotswolds village of Chipping Norton, the area on the outskirts of Finstock, Oxfordshire is home to the boutique Treedwellers site. The site has seven separate and unique, boutique-style treehouses to suit a variance of moods, lending itself to different styles and tastes, and is located within a magical, peaceful woodland setting on acres of Oxfordshire's woodland. Designed to be seamlessly placed within the wider natural surroundings, it is possible to catch a glimpse of local deer and other wildlife from the raised deck of the treehouse.

Like all of the dwellings on the impressive site, Kanna is built from an eco-conscious perspective. It is a non-traditional, visually striking treehouse on an equally impressive site at Treedwellers Finstock. The structure itself is raised to a platform, and a living shell that has an eco-design, with a curved, half-circular canopy, finished in a cool, colourful veneer. An exterior, front-facing deck offers outdoor space and a lookout spot to breathe in all that the acres of spaces of the woodlands beyond.

The interior is a unique blend of contemporary design that creates a thoroughly modern, minimalist feeling to what the owners hope will be a timeless and welcoming space. High-end art pieces and touches of hotel luxury all combine to create a bespoke, high-end experience in a unique abode to match.

Treedwellers offers a place for diversity and a celebration of ‚Äòforward to nature‚Äô spaces that jar the senses, but also seamlessly blend into the tranquil surroundings of the Oxfordshire backdrop without impacting on the wildlife or habitats. Each treehouse is modern and non-traditional in appearance, but the dichotomy of the modern accommodation with the natural surroundings creates an irresistible juxtaposition that just works on every level.


Sleeping arrangements

Sleeps 2 on a luxury king-size bed, with linen and bedding provided.

Bathroom Facilities

Spacious, hot shower, toilet & hand basin with mirror. Towels will be provided.

Cooking Facilities

Stylish kitchen with under-counter fridge, coffeemaker, sink, cooking hob, and plenty of high-quality utensils, crockery, and cutlery.

Internet Access

Wi-Fi is available at this property.

Heating and Lighting

Power is provided by a 100% renewable energy source that produces electricity for the treehouse. There is underfloor heating, as well as a wood-burning stove, with a starter pack of logs included.

Child Policy

Children are welcome at the treehouse, up to the age of 16. A second, luxury pull-out bed is stored in the treehouse, allowing up to two children additionally.

Pets Policy

No Pets

Grounds and Nearby

The site is found set into the woodlands of Finstock, Oxfordshire which is home to some sublime wildlife such as deer and badgers.

Parking Information

Parking for one vehicle is found just 200m from Kanna. You are able to drive your car to the structure to unload, before returning to the car parking space.

Arrival Times

Check in from 17:30 and check out by 09:30

These are recommended check-in/out times to allow Covid-19 sanitisation, earlier/later times may be available by request with the owner.

Public Transport

The Finstock site is just an hour and half from London Paddington, via Worcester. The nearest station to the Cornbury site is Finstock Train Station around 1 mile away, via the B4022. Via bus, the X9 ‚ÄòWitney to Chipping Norton‚Äô bus service stops in Finstock.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests will have the entire treehouse available to them exclusively for the entire duration of the booking. Shared access to all outdoor areas on the site is also included.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Children who are able to sleep in beds are welcome at the treehouse, up to the age of 16. A second, luxury pull-out bed is stored in the treehouse, allowing up to two children additionally.

NB. The images used here are CGI composites, and as such, some features of the treehouse exteriors and interiors may be subject to change. Though this will not impact the quality, the finished product may alter in style or be visually changed. We expect to receive finished images in March 2022.']

Title: The original Spice Bus from 1997 movie Spice World
Description:
['About this space', 'This is the actual and original Spice Bus that fans will know and love from the movie Spice World - but with an interior makeover. Working with some incredible designers, we have turned it into accommodation, so that you can stay the night and live out every fan‚Äôs wildest dream. The bus has the bonus of being situated in a stunning location overlooking Island Harbour Marina. There is a Bar, Restaurant, and a small shop on site. You can reach us by land, sea, or air!', 'The space', 'The space
The outside of the bus shows off its famous Union Jack exterior, as it did in the Spice World movie. Inside, as huge fans of the band, we have tried to include as many little touches as possible, inspired by the girls and their music, to make the interior just as iconic as the outside!

Inside, guests will have the run of both floors, which have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the Spice Girls and some bold interiors. The bus can sleep up to three people, with two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bed.

Downstairs

The driver‚Äôs seat remains at the front of the bus ‚Äì sadly no Meatloaf! Towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three Union Jack cinema-style chairs, for relaxing in front of the TV or listening to Wannabe on repeat on the old-school CD player.

Upstairs

There is a double bed at the back of the bus, as well as a day bed, which can accommodate a third guest if needed. There is also a separate dressing room area, complete with rail and dressing table ‚Äì perfect for Spice Girl-inspired makeovers.

Please note, we have no official affiliation with the Spice Girls ‚Äì We just want fellow fans to enjoy the Spice Bus as much as we do. We are looking for guests who share our love of the Spice Girls, have a verified Airbnb profile, and have great reviews! Please also identify your guests when requesting to book.

The outside of the bus shows off its famous Union Jack exterior, as it did in the Spice World movie. Inside, as huge fans of the band, we have tried to include as many little touches as possible, inspired by the girls and their music, to make the interior just as iconic as the outside!

Inside, guests will have the run of both floors, which have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the Spice Girls and some bold interiors. The bus can sleep up to three people, with two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bed.

Downstairs

The driver‚Äôs seat remains at the front of the bus ‚Äì sadly no Meatloaf! Towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three Union Jack cinema-style chairs, for relaxing in front of the TV or listening to Wannabe on repeat on the old-school CD player.

Upstairs

There is a double bed at the back of the bus, as well as a day bed, which can accommodate a third guest if needed. There is also a separate dressing room area, complete with rail and dressing table ‚Äì perfect for Spice Girl-inspired makeovers.

Please note, we have no official affiliation with the Spice Girls ‚Äì We just want fellow fans to enjoy the Spice Bus as much as we do. We are looking for guests who share our love of the Spice Girls, have a verified Airbnb profile, and have great reviews! Please also identify your guests when requesting to book.

A facilities block is located a few steps from the bus for your private use. In the facilities block, there is a toilet, sink and shower room, as well as toiletries and towels. Within this block there is also a kitchenette area with a sink, kettle, microwave, cutlery, and crockery. There is a mini fridge inside the bus. Note, there are no bathroom facilities on the bus itself. As the bus still has its original structure, there are stairs and so unfortunately, it is not suited for all accessibility needs.

Other things to note:

‚Ä¢ There is no partition between the double and single bed, both situated on the top deck.

‚Ä¢ There are no kitchen facilities or running water on the bus.

‚Ä¢ There are shops and a restaurant within two minutes‚Äô walk.

‚Ä¢ There is no Wi-Fi on the bus, but there is free Wi-Fi at the onsite bar/restaurant.

‚Ä¢ The bus is located at Island Harbour Marina.

‚Ä¢ All guests must be 12 years or older.

‚Ä¢ The bus sleeps three people.

‚Ä¢ Height restrictions are 1.7 metres, so watch your head!

‚Ä¢ Towels will be provided in the separate facilities block.

‚Ä¢ The bus has electricity points.

‚Ä¢ Please also note that there is no smoking on the bus or within the grounds; and sadly no pets are allowed!', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Due to the originality of the listing, height restrictions apply. All guests must be age 12 or older, no pets and strictly no smoking!']

Title: Cow Shed: Daisy at Easton Farm Park
Description:
['About this space', 'A unique place to stay! The Cow Shed is a mix between camping, glamping and a caravan. Situated on a clean and quiet farm park, the Cow Shed provides a great place to escape to.

The accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a three-quarter bed above. Able to sleep four people, the Cow Shed provides a base in the Suffolk countryside with the benefit of included access to the farm park.

(please note that the Wi-Fi can be intermittent)', 'The space', 'The space
Daisy can sleep up to four people. The accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a three-quarter bed above. Linen and towels are provided, as well as tea/ coffee making facilities. BBQ and tools are available for hire, at an extra charge of ¬£10. The toilet block and shower shed are both within 20 meters. Admission to the farm park is included. Guests are welcome to have access to the park out of hours and see our team in action, feeding and mucking out the animals.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The Cow Sheds are situated within the grounds of Easton Farm Park. Guests have access to the toilet block and shower shed, both within 20 meters. Our cafe and gift shop is open during the day.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Enjoy the full farm experience. Guests can explore the farm out of hours and can even help give the animals breakfast and clean out their stables in the morning. Staff are on hand to answer any curious questions!']

Title: Bumble Barn at Great Field Farm
Description:
['About this space', 'Great Field Farm is set in 45 acres, including gardens, paddocks and the great field with different crops each year.
Bumble Barn is the newest addition to our eco-friendly holiday lodges. Built to Passiv house standards with smart technology and a beautiful living sedum roof that bees love.
The views from the sitting room and patio over open fields and sky are stunning, with wildlife all around.
Truly quiet and rural, yet Canterbury, Folkestone, Hythe, Channel Tunnel only 10 minutes drive.', 'The space', 'The space
Bumble Barn has a large sitting, dining and kitchen area, opening onto the patio with views of the horse paddocks, open field and trees.
Sitting Room has a smart 4K TV
Fully equipped kitchen with large fridge/freezer
Main bedroom with king sized double bed and en suite shower room. Optional colour changing LED lighting.
2 twin bedrooms. Main bathroom with bath/shower']

Title: NEW! Longhorn at Barrow Hill Barns- with Outdoor Bath
Description:
['About this space', 'Longhorn is nestled in the rolling hills of the South Downs National Park. This secluded retreat has all the creature comforts of home whilst enjoying unspoilt 360-degree views of Barrow Hill Farm.

Longhorns domed design with wooden interior has a cosy open plan living space and decking area to enjoy dinner with sunset views. The large outdoor roll top bath is perfect for romantic bathing under the stars.

Just a short walk from the famous South Downs Way and other stunning trail. Longhorn is also a short drive to the historical town of Petersfield and the cities of Winchester, Chichester, and Portsmouth.', 'The space', 'The space
Longhorn is situated on a working farm, however in a secluded corner with minimal disturbance. Access is via foot along a 400m track from Barrow Hill Barns (our cottages site) or along a track for suitable vehicles.

Longhorn offers a king-sized bed, kitchen, TV, Superfast WiFi and separate shower and toilet. Towels, sheets and REN toiletries are provided. There is also charcoal BBQ for alfresco cooking!', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Longhorn is designed for those looking to escape the ways of normal life, this is why we do not allow children or pets of any size.

There are a number of factors as to why but mostly because as parents we felt it was somewhere to enjoy a couple of nights off from the home life.']

Title: The Tree Tent
Description:
['About this space', 'Brand New Tree Tent!
If you are desperate for a change of scene and are yearning for some fresh countryside air, look no further.
The Tree Tent is a suspended spherical structure strung between two trees overlooking the gorgeous Mendip Hills. It offers the ultimate escape into the outdoors. It‚Äôs an absolutely magical retreat which captures the true romance and cosiness of a camping but in a luxurious and unique way.', 'The space', 'The space
The Tree Tent offers a comfortable double bed, LED lighting and a wood burning stove, perfect for those chilly evenings. The bed even folds into a sofa for daytime lounging!

Step out of the suspended bedroom pod across the rope bridge to find a gorgeous decked seating area nestled among the trees. Here there is a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, gas hob, sink, saucepans, crockery and cutlery. There is a firepit which is perfect for cooking your evening meal if you are keen to hone your inner Bear Grylls or start simple by toasting some marshmallows whilst sipping a hot chocolate.

There is no wifi or electricity here so it is the perfect place to switch off and really relax.

There is a wonderful outdoor shower with hot water and separate loo. We have ensured there is everything you could want to create the most memorable of stays. More pictures of this are coming soon!

Please note no pets allowed. The bed is a small double.', '', '']

Title: The Conker
Description:
['About this space', "Welcome to The Conker.

Set on the crest of a vast, 80-acre conservation private estate in mid-Wales, the gleaming Conker is an off-grid, state-of-the-art glamping pod that's been expertly engineered for comfort. Among it's many accolades, it was featured on George Clarke's 'Amazing Spaces' on Channel 4 and emerged the winner when it was featured on This Morning's 'Staycation Showdown' with Alison Hammond.", '', "The space
An off-the-grid glamping pod in a stunning Welsh mountain location. A truly spectacular pod for two with the emphasis on switching off from the trappings of technology, those who do need to can find electric points, and a Bluetooth soundbar and lighting help to set the perfect evening mood as you prepare a romantic supper in the deluxe micro-kitchen, or even in the newly added outdoor wood-fired pizza oven. Staying at the Conker allows you to enjoy the the escapism of the wilderness without the punishment of camping. But fear not, you're not totally left to your own devices; on arrival you can expect bed linen, towels and a load of dry wood and kindling for your out door fire pit. You can enjoy the simple things in life, without compromising on basic comforts.

The Conker is high on a hilltop but fully insulated and equipped with a cutting edge air recirculation heating system to keep the interior the perfect temperature all year round. If you're an early bird, catching the sunrise with a mug of steaming coffee must surely be the very best way to wake up, as you listen to the soothing sounds of wildlife, and watch the resident red kites as they fly gracefully through the air.

Inside the Conker, you will find hotel quality mattresses and a double bed which folds into a sofa during the day. the owners have not forgotten the little things that really make for a comforting stay, so you'll find your gleaming conker equipped with a cutting-edge air recirculation system to keep you toasty in winter, and cool in summer. All sheets, bedding and towels are provided.

There is a small, internal kitchenette with an induction hob for basic cooking. A welcome pack is provided, and includes milk, tea, coffee, marshmallows, welsh cakes, cooking oil, flour & yeast to make homemade pizzas in the wood-fired outdoor pizza oven.

The Conker has private hot shower facility in a scandi cabin and a sustainable, state of the art Swedish composting lavatory next door to it. You can re-charge your mobile devices with the USB ports in the Conker, as well as listening to your playlists through the Bluetooth-enabled sound bar. Set the LED lighting colour to suit your mood. Why not head out to the firepit for a spot of marshmallow-toasting, then relax on your terrace with a hot toddy as the first stars appear in the dark, unpolluted sky.

Adventurous guests can opt to start the day by squeezing into the outdoor feature copper bath for an eye full of morning mountain views.

Deliberately off-the-beaten-track and offering the 'off-grid' experience, The Conker is a couples retreat looking for a digital detox. As such, there is no wifi or TV. Your companions will be roving sheep, chomping squirrels and of course the wheeling red kites.

The drive up sets the tone aptly, a narrow lane winds up the valley, and two miles of roughish track with few passing places, two gates to open and an eventual ascent by foot to make you marvel.

The Conker is completely private and it not intruded upon by the main farmhouse and and that it sits within. If you do need to descend down into civilisation, the little village of Newbridge-on-Wye is just a 15 minute drive away, where there is a shop, pub and a well-stocked post office to buy essential supplies should you run out! Once you're done, perhaps while away a lazy afternoon sipping drinks in the seclusion of 'Conker land'?

If you are staying more than a few days and need a change of scenery immerse yourselves in the magic world of the Thomas Shop in Penybont! I won't spoil the surprise, just go.

Check website for opening times and be sure to try out some of the homemade cakes and savouries as well as superb coffee, indoors or on the banks of the river. The walking possibilities are as open-ended as the moors are extensive: once you've discovered the pathways, drovers roads and National Trust land on your doorstep, you've had a good intro as to whats on offer.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests will have the entire Conker structure and surrounding area available to them exclusively for the entire duration of the booking.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The Conker is dog-friendly, and 1 small, well-behaved dog is allowed but on request only. Please enquire BEFORE booking. Unfortunately no other animals are allowed.']

Title: 1920s Showmans living wagon,experience times past.
Description:
['About this space', "Set in the sussex countryside our beautiful showman's wagon is now resting. She has spent many years looking after showman travelling around the countryside housing show folk and fair ground people. Her history and that of the travelling community is a magical fascinating part of history. It is a privilege for us to own and gives us pleasure to be able to share with anyone who would like to stay.
The garden and surrounding countryside are part of the charm of our wagon in summer and winter.", 'The space', "The space
The wagon has a cosy seating area, a fold down table, we have equipped her with a double plug in electric hob, kettle and toaster for light cooking, saucepans cutlery plates cups glasses, there is a very small 4ltr fridge just big enough for a bottle of milk and a can or two, a 5ltr pump flask is there with water and can be filled from outside tap. There is two heaters that keep the wagon nice and warm. A picnic basket with picnic plates glasses and cutlery are also provided should you want to have a picnic.

Tea coffee and sugar, Bread ,Milk, Butter, Marmalade or Jam are all provided and we leave a welcome basket with a few extra goodies for you to enjoy.

The bedroom area has a standard double bed and there is a dvd tv with some dvds so you can watch some films should you wish to.
Clean bedding sheets and towels are all provided, we do ask that you don't take the towels to the beach and bring your own beach towel.


Outside is a table and chairs a small BBQ overlooking a large private garden which is reached by some steps for you to use should you wish to.
The old outside toilet has been turned into a wet room with a corner loo sink and shower. Please note that due to the rural location the water pressure can sometimes drop, if this does happen the shower may not work for a short time it is something that we are used to living with and does not happen very often, we apologise should this happen it is just part of living in such a beautiful setting. If you should be visiting us in the colder months the shower room can be a little chilly, but once the hot water gets going it soon feels warm.

The wagon unfortunately is not suitable for dogs so we have decided it is best that we don't allow them.
Unfortunately due to bad connection the wifi does not always work.", '', '', '', '']

Title: Comfortable riverside landed houseboat
Description:
['About this space', 'Converted World War 2 Landing Craft, giving modern en-suite 2 double/twin bedroom self-catering accommodation, on shore but in pleasant riverside location. Comfortably-heated throughout with fully equipped open-plan kitchen, living area and patio.', 'The space', 'The space
Truly unique! Accommodation is in a spacious modern converted WW2 landing craft, conveniently dry-docked in a riverside garden with two cosy en-suite double/twin bedrooms. An open-plan kitchen and living room offers ample space, opening to a sunny morning patio.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Single beds 2ft6in/Double 5ft.
Families warmly welcomed but parental supervision required in waterside location.
The AirBnB pricing section contains an immovable "extra guest" charging provision which can cause confusion. Although we have occasionally agreed to an extra child staying, the boat only has sleeping accommodation for four.']

Title: The perfect chalet
Description:
['About this space', 'Lovely fully equipped self catering chalet on a spacious holiday park 3 minutes walk from the sea.
Come to Kingsdown where you can enjoy the pebbly beaches, enjoy food and drinks at local pubs and restaurants, walk or ride on flat ground to Deal and beyond or walk onto the white cliffs for views over to France.
There are 3 King Henry VIII castles to explore - Dover Castle for lots of history and AV tours; Walmer Castle for beautiful gardens, cannons and tea room; Deal Castle for interest.', 'The space', 'The space
The chalet is in a great peaceful location within the park and is fully equipped with bed linens, towels, all kitchen crockery, oven, hob, microwave - step in and enjoy.']

Title: Breathtaking Mountain views in cozy Birdbox
Description:
['About this space', 'Enjoy the relaxed and comfortable enclosure of the Birdbox. Sleep right beside nature and its amazing surroundings. Lay down and look at the spectacular mountains all around you. Put on your skis and have a breathtaking journey around the nearby trails. Hike down to Langelandsvatnet in the summer and enjoy swimming in energizing water. Your imagination is the limit for what you can experience.', 'The space', "The space

The closest grocery store is in F√∏rde so it's important that you bring enough food for the stay.
Contact us for more information about this.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access

Title: The crystal dome under the stars, bed and breakfast
Description:
['About this space', 'Totally unusual accommodation.
Ideal for dreamy nights for couples, summer and winter.
A bubble three meters high in the middle of nature to observe the stars. What could be more romantic and restful.
You will have access to a nice en-suite bathroom a few meters from the bubble. From your cozy nest you will have seen the mountains, the natural pool and the horses.
A French breakfast will be served on the private terrace of your bubble.
The bubble is heated in winter.', 'The space', 'The space
The bubble has beautiful views of the forest, horses, the pool and the starry sky.
An extraordinary night not to be missed in all seasons.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
We are located in the middle of nature, on the edge of the forest, you will find all the shops and restaurants necessary for your stay in Th√¥nes about 6 km,
You can go to Lake Annecy via Menthon St Bernard and its castle just ten kilometers away.
Annecy is a little 15 minutes away and you ride the skis at La Clusaz or Au Grand Bornand in 20 minutes. You will understand, we are conveniently located between lake and mountain.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Magical night guaranteed.
Real comfort under the stars with real beds and heating in cool seasons.']

Title: The Arctic Hideaway - Lower fat pod -1 double bed
Description:
['About this space', 'Head north in Norway and experience our tiny-hotel on a remote island. The Arctic Hideaway is an architecturally playful and stunning collection of ten individual buildings, where four are sleeping cabins. The shared areas are the iconic Tower House, kitchen house, studio building, bathhouse, crab shack and sauna. In limited periods, we will offer single cabins for rent on Airbnb. Included in the stay is breakfast and use of the sauna, that we will fire up once a day for every guest to enjoy.', 'The space', 'The space
The Arctic Hideaway is an experience like few others. Our space is as much as a mindset as it is a physical location ‚Äî a place to unplug and unwind. It is a place that will give you visual tranquillity. It is truly a transformative experience staying here. We have a minimum 2-night stay as we believe this will provide you with the best experience at our unique place. And most of our guest wish they could stay longer, so maybe book a week?

The Arctic Hideaway is nestled into S√∏rv√¶ret of the Fleinv√¶r islands; these cabins provide guests with beautiful views of the Norwegian sea, nearby islands, birds, seals, sunrises and sunsets, the northern lights, the midnight sun and so much more. The architecture is designed to push you out into nature, which means that you move between the cabins for bathroom and kitchen usage. Look at the map for the location of your cabin in regards to the other buildings.

THE CALENDAR IS NOT OPEN ON THE DATES YOU WANT TO STAY
The whole compound can sleep up to 10 guests. And it is an ideal location for retreats and workshop, or maybe you want to rent the entire Hideaway by yourself? At this moment we only have availability during May here on Airbnb with four cabins with space for two people in each. If you are interested in visiting us at another time or arrange an event, please do send us an email and we will do our best to help you coordinate and epic experience at our facility.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Skylodge Adventure Suites
Description:
['About this space', 'Have you ever wanted to sleep in a condor‚Äôs nest? Here is the next best thing! A transparent luxury capsule that hangs from the top of a mountain in the Sacred Valley of Peru.

We have 3 pods, m√°ximum capacity on the lodge 12 people per night.', 'The space', 'The space
Have you ever wanted to sleep in a condor‚Äôs nest? Here is the next best thing! A transparent luxury capsule that hangs from the top of a mountain in the Sacred Valley of Peru.

Located in the Sacred Valley of Cuzco, Peru, the exclusive Skylodge Adventure Suites offers you the chance to sleep within a completely transparent hanging bedroom, that allows you to appreciate the impressive view of this magic and mystic valley.

To sleep at Skylodge, people must climb 400 mt. of Via Ferrata or hike an intrepid trail through ziplines. One night at this place will make your dreams come true. Packages includes breakfast & gourmet dinner with wine, transportation from Cuzco and our professional bilingual guides.

US$450 fee per person - 2017', '', 'Guest access
Equipment, snack, gourmet dinner and breakfast']

Title: Emotional Healing in Lee Cheon-si, Seoul
Description:
['About this space', 'Tongui-shaped cottage in a two-thousand pottery art village. A large monolithic house with a three-floor terrace of the Serra Guitar Cultural Museum, renowned for its distinctive facade in a two-thousand pottery art village that blends very well with nature.

Enjoy a relaxing emotional healing holiday in a cozy and welcoming room. You can take in the open nature on the third floor of a village without a tall building, or you can take a picnic on the lawn in front of a Tongui house.

If you prefer, you can also take Ukurelle lessons on the first floor of the building, a handcrafted workshop and other venue.

# Directions You

are 15 minutes by car from Lee Cheon Station and 8 minutes by car from Sindun Station. If you have a car, it should take less than an hour from Seoul, and you can park it.', '', '']

Title: Minimalist Modern Cabin - Amazing Views
Description:
['About this space', 'With some of the best views in the high desert, this unique dwelling situated in the hills of yucca valley has everything you could want in a desert getaway. Its clear walls take the "indoor - outdoor" experience to a whole new level. It has its own deck and propane fire pit, is completely off grid and generates its own power from the sun. The detached kitchen and full bathroom are just yards away. It is one of three other short term rentals on the property.', 'The space', "The space
Made out of corten steel and polycarbonate, this cabin is unlike anything you have stayed in. It comes with a detached full bathroom with hot water, a kitchen with stove, sink, all types of cooking equipment and a dining area. Because it is completely off grid, we are limited on a few things, mainly power. We have power for lights, water and heating, but we don't have enough for full time refrigeration or power outlets. We have USB chargers for your phone and tablets though. We do have a cooler so please bring ice. There is a Fire pit so make sure to bring plenty of firewood. The gas for the stove is provided.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The cabin is on a 100 acre property with three other short term rental locations. The cabin has its own detached yet private bathroom and kitchen and is a good distance from the other three locations. So you do have your own privacy but may see the occasional guest driving by or hiking. Speaking of hiking there are many hiking trails right off the property so you will never need to leave!', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
-Due to the property being off-grid we have water brought in for guest usage. Please be mindful of your usage! We DO NOT allow personal pools to be filled!
-There are two other short term rentals on the 100-acre property
-We are powered by 12 volt solar and battery backup so we do not have power outlets. We do have USB chargers for your phone and tablets.
-We do not have a fridge but we do have coolers so bring ice
-Our mini-split AC unit is on a timer due to power restrictions and is available from 8 am-5 pm. There is a swamp cooler available to use in the evenings and overnight.
-Please keep all doors or screens closed as we are in the desert and there are critters around. While we do have a pest control company out regularly, critters can still slip in through open doors from time to time.
-Events and photoshoots will only be allowed with written permission.
-Pets are allowed but we charge an extra $40 cleaning fee
-Please check the weather prior to your stay so you can be properly prepared. We are in an area that can get very hot in the summer, very cold in the winter and during certain times of the year can experience very high winds. We will not issue refunds for weather issues that are out of our control.']

Description:

This property, located in CArvoeiro, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom and a furnished balcony.
It is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration.

Title: Luxury suite overlooking the Wadden Sea, Harlingen
Description:
['About this space', 'The luxurious spacious suite is furnished with a cozy seating area, flat-screen TV, minibar, double box spring, double sink, jacuzzi, hairdryer, bathroom with spacious rain shower and toilet.
A luxury breakfast is served every morning.

From the suite you have a unique view of the largest tidal area in the world: the Unesco World Heritage Site "The Wadden Sea".
We will do everything in our power to ensure that you have an unforgettable stay in the Funnel!', 'The space', "The space
Enjoy a snack and drink with a unique view of the Nieuwe Willemshaven and one of the largest tidal areas in the world: the Wadden Sea. The Wadden Sea is special in its kind. No less than twice a day the world changes there. One moment you'll find miles of expansive mudflats and the other moment everything's underwater. From your room you have a direct view of arriving and departing ships and in clear view you can even see the Wadden Islands Vlieland and Terschelling. The setting evening sun creates a romantic ambience."]

Title: Luxe Boulder 'Barrett House' on Mtn Peak w/Hot Tub
Description:
['About this space', 'There‚Äôs no better place to experience Colorado than at ‚ÄòBarrett House,‚Äô a spectacular 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom vacation rental in beautiful Boulder! Nestled at an elevation of 7,000 feet on a scenic 3-acre mountain peak in the foothills, this stunning home borders Roosevelt National Forest, ensuring endless outdoor activities right outside the door. With a fireplace, theatre room, and unique decor, this lovely home promises a memorable getaway with your fellow outdoor-loving friends and family!', 'The space', "The space
Private Hot Tub | Unique Architecture | 3,000 Sq Ft

This eclectic, mid-century modern home is the perfect space for you and your loved ones to relax and restore in between outdoor adventures, offering all the space and modern luxuries needed for an unforgettable Colorado getaway!

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3 (Loft): 2 Full Beds

ARCHITECTURE: In 1971, 'Barrett House' was designed by celebrated Colorado architect Charles Haertling for noted artist Clotilde Barret, the house has maintained its architectural significance with recent earth-friendly renovations, including cork flooring and soft rugs made with recycled plastic bottles
OUTDOOR LIVING: 3-acre mountain peak, private balcony w/ outdoor dining table, forest & mountain views, hot tub, secluded location, outdoor seating, hammock
INDOOR LIVING: High ceilings, skylights & ample natural light, Mad Men-inspired bar & dining room, modern & trendy furnishings, open layout, office area, theatre room w/ 80-inch HD screen, Smart HD TVs, desktop computer, printer, Bose sound system, ceramic art, spa-like en-suite w/ petrified wood sink, spa jet shower & electric heated flooring, game room
KITCHEN: Fully equipped, stainless steel appliances, mid-century finishes, Keurig coffee maker, tea kettle, dishwasher, cooking basics, dishware & flatware, kitchen table
GENERAL: Free WiFi, linens/towels, in-unit laundry machines, central heating, complimentary toiletries, first aid kit, trash bags, paper towels
FAQ: Exterior security cameras (3, all facing out)
PARKING: Driveway (3 vehicles)"]

Title: Snow igloo
Description:
['About this space', "Snow igloo with real beds inside. Nice atmosphere with led lights and white walls. Outside the igloo is possibility to see northern lights if you are lucky. Come to Lapland and explore the wilderness.

It's always minus degrees' inside the igloo. We provide warm sleeping bag but you should bring your thermos layers, warm hat, socks and cloves. Also headlight or flashlight is handy. Warm apartment available 24 h in case of cold feet.", 'The space', 'The space
We are a small family run business located next to the lake Pyh√§j√§rvi and Pyh√§-Luosto National Park.
Once in a lifetime opportunity to sleep in a snow Igloo that we make ourselves every winter.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Each party/group have their own igloo (max 4 persons/igloo). Apart from the igloo there is a warm house with toilets, shower, living room and small kitchen that guests are free to use', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Lucky Ranch is a horse farm and activity center. We have two different base camps located 1 km from each other. Depending of the booking situation the location of snow igloo accommodation is either organized at the horse farm where the owners live or at Lucky Ranch Saloon next to the lake.

We provide light self service breakfast. Please note that all restaurants and a supermarket are 10 km away at the ski resort. If you want you can bring some food with you. There is a microwave and fridge in the kitchen but no oven or stove.']

Title: The Chaos Oasis
Description:
['About this space', 'The Chaos Oasis is the first construction made entirely from recyclable materials in the district. It is situated right next to the Mayan ruins and archeological park of Lubaantun. The village of San Pedro Columbia is a 10 minute walk from us, with chocolate making, river swimming and bird watching.
We welcome couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids), I say we are not suitable for pets as we have so many animals of our own: dogs, cats, a horse, ducks, chickens etc!', 'The space', "The space
We have a bottle / recycled house for your use, and will give you a tour of the Earthship and our whole recycling project. We are always working on a new project, so some spaces will be available and others under construction! We are completely off grid, so you can feel good about helping the environment if you don't mind the quirks that involves! So we have solar lights and cold showers, which can be great plus in the heat! and if you're into recycling it's the biggest recycling project in Southern Belize.
We also have a 25 acre farm with cacao, coffee and many fruit trees and our own ruins on the property.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Your casita has a double bed, however if you are a family and need more beds / rooms it can be arranged. There is a separate bathroom with two toilets and showers, but the bottle house catches its own rainwater and there is an outside shower adjacent to the house for those who wish to really experience the wild!', '', '']

Title: The Roundhouse : Rainforest & Mountains
Description:
['About this space', 'The Roundhouse is located in a place of spectacular beauty, with views of Quamby Bluff and the Great Western Tiers on all sides. The property is surrounded by World Heritage Rainforest which is a result of the protracted Jackeys Marsh Forest Protests. The fresh air, crystal clear water, abundant wildlife and pristine environment are all environmental values prized by the people of Jackeys Marsh. We would now like to share our unique heritage with the rest of the world.', 'The space', 'The space
The Roundhouse is a self-contained home set apart from the other buildings on the property. It gives you the privacy and independence to do your own thing. The interior is warm and comfortable with extensive windows to highlight the amazing views of the mountain valley of Jackeys Marsh.

The Roundhouse is full of architectural features. From the handmade stonewall basement, through the curved wooden features of the main floor, to the onion top cupola that caps off the building. It is a truly unique property that continues to create special memories for all who visit.

"People respond to the shapes that I make. They enjoy the playfulness and freedom of line, and see the resemblance of natural forms in the designs. They appreciate the skill required to make such shapes from straight timber, following Nature's design rules."
Kim Clark - Curved Wood Creations ( search this name to see website.)', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Our guests will have exclusive access to the entire house, and are welcome to explore the rest of the property, including the self-guided walk to the old Nut Garden and into the rainforest.

Guests are asked to respect the privacy of the other buildings on the property. Guided tours are available on request.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Unique 'Earthouse' Retreat w/ Spring-Fed Creek
Description:
['About this space', "Enjoy living at its finest with an unforgettable stay at this modern underground 3-bed, 3-bath home! Earthouse offers unique architectural design providing guests with an open inviting interior complete with high-end furnishings, modern decor, and abundant natural light. Whether you're exploring Springfield, visiting local colleges, making your way to Branson for the day, or getting away, this luxurious, one-of-a-kind abode will be your ideal home base!
NO PARTIES, EVENTS, OR LARGE GATHERINGS.", 'The space', 'The space
2,500 Sq Ft | Custom Furnishings | Outdoor Dining Area with a Grill & Fire Pit

Nestled in a quaint Springfield neighborhood, this contemporary home is perfect for couples traveling together or families in need of a relaxing escape and a taste of luxury!

Master Bedroom 1: California King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: King Bed | Living Room: Sleeper Sofa with Pullout Full Bed

OUTDOOR LIVING: Unique architectural vibe, spacious yard, fire pit (1 bundle of firewood provided), patio w/ 6-person dining table, additional outdoor seating, propane grill, and garden

KITCHEN: Fully equipped, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, cooking basics, dish ware, flatware, drip coffee maker, spices, blender, ice maker, toaster oven and waffle maker, 2-person breakfast bar & 4-person table

INDOOR LIVING: Flat-screen Smart TV with Sound Bar and smart speaker, electric fireplace, architectural space plans including sketches, artwork, high-end finishes, stylish decor, open-concept living space

GENERAL: Free WiFi, complimentary toiletries, linens/towels, central heating all spaces, air conditioning in main space (controlled at Thermostat 1), in-unit washer/dryer

PARKING: Carport (2 vehicles), driveway (4 vehicles), trailer parking', '', '']

Title: Charming Wood-roof Simple Survival Earthship
Description:
['About this space', 'A small and humble Earthship nestled in the high desert of Taos, New Mexico. Earthships offer the opportunity to experience off-grid living with the amenities of modern-life but without the strong dependency on a fossil fuel-based grid infrastructure.', 'The space', 'The space
The house was built about two years ago in what is known as the "gravel pit" of the Greater World Community, the largest (legal) off-grid sub-division on the planet! It is situated in a very private place which is perfect for those looking for a retreat.

All of the utilities that one would normally use municipal infrastructure for are taken care of by the house itself. With electricity captured from sunlight and stored, rain and snow melt collected into large cisterns, and a wall of thermal mass, charged by the sun, that keeps the house at a relatively constant 72¬∞F all year round.

With all of that, there is a full-sized fridge, a stove and oven for cooking your delicious meals, Internet access, and a standing shower.

There is a single full-sized bed that can comfortably fit two and an air-mattress that can fit another two.

The house is about 20-25 minutes to the Ski Mountain and 15 minutes to get into downtown Taos. Close enough to town for access, but far enough away in nature for contemplation.', '', '']

Title: HIDEOUT HORIZON - Eco Bamboo Home
Description:
['About this space', 'Hideout Horizon is the largest addition to the Hideout Family. The most adventurous all-bamboo home is ready to welcome those seeking a little jungle adventure in East Karangasem. Your perfect little staycation in Bali is right here. We take relaxation seriously.

Now more than ever, we can be your safe hide-away from the world epidemic. Special discounts running now!

Follow our social media hideoutbali for the special promo!', 'The space', "The space
Fun! Unique! Adventurous! Open! Bamboo! Those are all the words that will be buzzing in your head when you stay in the Horizon. :) Well-known open bamboo house is ready for you and your friends for a quick staycation. Make it your basecamp once you explore Karangasem region, we will make sure you will have the best time. We are most happy with environmentally thinking guests, who treat this little bamboo home with love and care.

If you read further, you can find much important and interesting information, but for those in a hurry, these are some key points to know! :)
1. Breakfast is included in the price, served in the house (Lunch and Dinner can be ordered from Hideout Bistro for an extra charge, vegan options as well.)
2. Scooter for free during your stay!
3. There is an equipped kitchen, unlimited drinking water, fridge filled with cold Bintang.
4. Two places to sleep - main round bed (dominant in pictures) with two-layer mosquito net, and two single beds (can be put together) with mosquito net on the top floor.
5. There is wifi, music stereo system in the house, and a hot shower!
6. We can help to arrange your transport, find you the right guides, give you the best Balinese massage in-house or organise a great cooking class at Hideout Bistro.
7. Check-in from 3 pm, please no late-night arrivals. Check-out at 11 am.
8. We are in the middle of the jungle, please expect some wildlife. :)

IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Due to the ongoing pandemic of COVID19:
- All guests will be measured by a professional no-contact thermometer for their body temperature. If their body temperature is repeatedly measured as above 37,5 Celsius, they will not be allowed to check-in as this can be a sign of ongoing illness such as COVID19.
- All guests will sign a declaration of their current health status.
- All guests need to wear a face mask during check-in/check-out or when in contact with our team.
- Houses are cleaned and sanitized after each guest.
- We provide hand sanitisers in the house.

THE SPACE
Horizon is our most adventurous all bamboo-home with open space design, on the ground floor, you can find a neat, fully equipped kitchen with stove and smaller fridge, cozy living/relaxing area (with extra hanging hammock), bathroom with outdoor shower, and indoor-outdoor plunge pool, covered from rain by large overhanging grass roof.
There is no private bedroom in Horizon, all space is open, so the traveling party should be well accustomed to sharing the house together. It is a very playful and adventurous space - with large net overhanging the pool, you can climb up there by bamboo shelves or get there through the master bed.
Following the bamboo ramp, it leads you to a large round bed (240cm wide) with two-layer mosquito net, providing safety and privacy. And extra two guests can share the very top of the building, climbing the bamboo ladder leading from the ramp. There are two single beds there, that can be used for any kind of relaxation during the day if you are only two travellers. What a place for reading, cuddling and relaxing, the perfect place for meditation. Bamboo is well-known for its temperature stability, thanks to natural ventilation, there is no need for AC or a fan. It can be very cold up here. :)

At your arrival, you can be looking forward to a welcome basket full of seasonal fruits. In the kitchen, you will always find Balinese coffee, tea, oil, sugar, and salt. If you don't feel like cooking, don't worry, we have a delicious Hideout Bistro - a kitchen concept! We provide breakfast (included in the price), lunch and dinner, and all are brought to your house. We do not yet have restaurant seating, but you can enjoy the meals in the privacy of your Hideout.

Scooter for free! During your stay, you will have available one simple, basic and older, scooter with two helmets. If you are a motorbike racer you might be disappointed :). Towels and beddings are also provided."]

Title: Naturalist Boudoir
Description:
['About this space', 'Nestled in the heart of the Big Thicket, our Naturalist Boudoir B&B has everything you need to revitalize your senses. Extremely private area for the naturalist with outdoor hot tub and shower. We welcome all guests to experience our lovely Naturalist Boudoir and reconnect with your special someone. Located in Lumberton, Texas.

Should your dates not be available for this cabin, please check out our two additional cabins...Naturalist Boudoir Too and Naturalist Boudoir on Point.', 'The space', 'The space
Ready to unplug and get back to nature, come check out Naturalist Boudoir.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Naturalist Boudoir is an unusual space where one can get back to nature in a peaceful, private setting.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note

Title: Forest Garden Yurts
Description: ['About this space', 'Glamping at its finest! Forest Garden Yurts are wooden yurts designed and built by Bill Coperthwaite in the 1970s for Tom Hess and Lory Brown as home and pottery studio. Tucked away in 4 acres of Ozark forest, the yurts are simple in nature yet abound with artistic details. The home yurt has a kitchen, bedroom, and a nook living room. The bathroom yurt is separate but has a covered walk. Unconventional and unique, with hobbit hole doors and low clearances in places.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nThere are 4-acres of woods to roam, that are either along the road or fenced, so there is no chance of wandering off of the property. There are also fire pits, camp chairs and roasting sticks available.']

Title: Luxury Dome Villa Eclipse
Description:
['About this space', 'Floating above an ocean of green palms, Makalele Dome Villas has one of the most spectacular settings in the world. Perched atop a verdant bukit peninsula cliff overlooking a sea of azure blues with volcano views.

Custom 3 leaf clover shaped infinity edge pool looks directly out to the ocean and volcano views with one of a kind sunset vista experience.', 'The space', 'The space
Inspired by the surrealist artist Wolfgang Widmoser a prodigy of Salvador Dali, unique dome architecture provides floating ocean and volcano views right from the bed. Each dome villa has a custom king size tear drop on the ground level and a single Day Bed in the second level loft.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Our friendly staff on site is available to help and assist you with whatever you need from 8am till 9pm.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
PLEASE NOTE, THIS PROPERTY IS SURROUNDED BY NATURE. THE PROPERTY IS THOROUGHLY CLEANED DAILY (INCLUDING THE BEDS STRIPPED AND SWEPT), BUT THE ODD ANT, FROG, GEKO, BUTTERFLY OR ANY OTHER LOCAL CREATURE MAY ENCROACH ON OCCASION. IF YOU ARE SQUEAMISH, SENSITIVE OR HAVE ANY KIND OF AVERSION TO SUCH A POSSIBILITY, THEN WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU CHOOSE ANOTHER OF THE LOMBOK LOCATIONS THAT IS NOT SO MUCH A PART OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT.']
