Title: The Cabin at Fernwood Hills
Description:
['About this space', 'Looking for time away to disconnect from the city and reconnect. The Tiny Cabin (107 square feet) at Fernwood Hills might be the perfect spot, nestled in the heart of South Western Ontario, in a beautiful forest. Quiet, cozy, romantic- in the lush sanctuary of nature.

Note: No washroom in the cabin but one a short distance up the lane.

*NEW* Check out our Airbnb profile to book our other Cabin (Bracken) listing or The Studio Loft

Check out more about Fernwood Hills fernwoodhills.com', 'The space', "The space
We started off offering this tiny space for day use so people just like you, could come away from their office or their work, and clear their mind. Just a couple years ago, there were several couples, that asked us if they could stay overnight and have the experience of quieting their minds. Their heads were spinning because they just needed to disconnect from all the chaos and for a day or overnight, listen to their breathing and look out the windows to nature and wildlife. Here, you are in the forest, but not the dense part and it overlooks green space and trails. Retreat, re-wind, and re-fuel by yourself or with your significant other. Maximum of TWO people and both must be adults.
Important to NOTE: NO Washroom in the Cabin. There is a nice washroom, with a shower, but it is NOT inside the cabin. It is a TWO MINUTE drive up the lane or if you decide to walk it will take longer.

You have the option if you want to add on food delivered to your door. There might be restrictions on availability due to Covid or allergies or other situations. Just keep on reading and see further below.
Fernwood Hills offers retreats for the individual and small groups, wedding ceremonies, proposals, and elopements, and certainly anniversaries as well. We can help you with any of these or other ideas you have for your stay. Why not, let us help you make a total experience!! We would love to hear from you! Ideas? Birthdays, anniversaries, proposals, getaways, surprise outings. Let us help you create the experience.....
Add on Options:
Romantic Night? Date Night? Celebration? Make this a part of your experience!!
Add on Option: $175 paid when you are here via cash or etrans
Pretty tiny lights and flowers in season in your space and a lovely food grazing board consisting of several cheeses, crackers, fruit, veg in season, nachos/dip, apples/caramel, stuffed mushrooms, pulled pork or beef on a bun, a few other hot apps, Hot home made soup in season and a home made dessert.
Delivered to your space upon arrival. Some allergies cannot be accommodated. Must be ordered and confirmed before your arrival.

PLEASE CHECK WITH US BEFORE ORDERING AS SOME THINGS MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE AT CERTAIN TIMES.
The Tiny Cabin is in fact tiny at only a little bit over 100 square feet. It is intended for quiet relaxation and not for camping or parties or events. We are happy to let you have a small campfire in the provided fire pot and there is a lot of firewood around you can collect. (weather permitting- if the weather is windy or has been dry, this is not possible)
*NOTE* to photographers, creatives and other business owners:
Our space has become popular with photographers and other business owners for its natural light with large windows, and we love working with them. However, this space is not to be booked through airbnb for business uses, including use as a photography studio or a work studio if you are having others or clients come in to have business with you. Those inquiries are welcome and we do that, but it must be an inquiry through our fernwoodhills.com website and details will be given and pricing and availability.
You might also want to have our photographer take photos of you for a short time example: engagement or proposal, then that is allowed to be requested here through airbnb. If you need clarification on this or any other questions please let us know.
This listing is ONLY for 1-2 people to book this space. No guest or person under 18 and one of them has to be over 25. All other inquiries will be directed to go to our website.

We are an agriculture property as well as a private park focused on regenerative agriculture and sustainable agriculture practices focused on health, wellness, education and events related to these activities.  Helping to expose and immerse individuals and groups in nature and allowing others to better connect with and understand the natural world around them. We are passionate about what we do here and the opportunities we have to help others each day through our property.
Romance, quiet, and cozy are keywords that describe our spot.
Even if you are single the importance may not be on romance but certainly on the quiet, mindfulness and disconnecting. One of our passions is personal growth and understanding yourself better as well as others. We want you to be able to ignite your dream again, believe in yourself again, and believe you make a difference in this world. You were made for a special purpose and we hope our quiet spaces help you to discover this in a deeper way. No live flame candles in any of our spaces
Can't wait to meet you!!", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You have access with a key to the cabin. It is a tiny space, just 100 square feet but has large windows and is very up-to-date and kept well. The setting is incredibly relaxing in the woods but overlooking greenspace. Not in the "dense" woods, not totally remote, yet private, but rather just in a very relaxing green space area. It is right off close-by trails so access to the forest is just steps away. In the winter months when the "public washrooms are closed," the main lovely washroom is just a two minute drive on the property up the lane. Up until recently we rented the cabin out for 6-8 hours "day-use" for relaxation, writing, reading, painting, re-balancing or whatever quiet you need. It is still available to be rented for day use, however many people have asked to have the "overnight cabin" experience.

We heat it all winter with an electric heater, however, we want to encourage you when it is very cold to bring a sleeping bag or extra blankets and extra warm clothes so you will be "warm" all the time.

If you would like to upgrade your booking you have a couple options.
Is this a surprise for a special someone? Or for each other? Or are you coming by yourself and you would just like to relax and enjoy some food, without having to go out and get it all?

Romantic Night? Date Night? Celebration? Make this a part of your experience!!



Otherwise you still have the option of "just the airbnb" booking of the space. .....Either way, just want to tell you about our add on option if someone wants it. We do have to know about allergies at booking, we do accommodate vegetarians, and but are not doing gluten free or vegan at the moment.
Just let us know if you're ok with doing just the space or if you'd like anything added on.
Please check with us, during Covid as to the format for the food offerings. All food will be brought to your space.
Otherwise you still have the option of "just the airbnb" booking of the space. Either way, just want to tell you about our add on option if you would like it. We do have to know about allergies at booking to make sure it can be accommodated.
Just let us know if you're ok with doing just the space or if you'd like anything added on.

Just write and let us know by messaging us when you are booking.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Washrooms are not in this building but are nearby a short distance. This space is designed for day use or overnight. We have a double bed in the Cabin, and it sleeps two (cozy). Again, please note, it is not for parties, camping, or events. It is only for one person or max 2, but as noted already it is a "disconnect" spot to enjoy quiet.
It is also important to note that we are a total SMOKE FREE/Vape free location, and sorry, no pets because of allergies to other guests.']

Title: Magical Hobbit Treehouse Nestled in the Jungle
Description:
['About this space', 'Experience your childhood dreams of staying in a treehouse, even better since this one is inspired by the Hobbit movies, with round doors to enter and to access the deck. Imagine the adventure of arriving to your Hobbit treehouse by crossing a suspension bridge 15 meters up.

Wake up to a symphony of bird songs and the occasional view of monkeys. Order room service from our restaurant and enjoy it on the deck or roof-top terrace. Later, go for a guided trek to a nearby secluded waterfall.', 'The space', 'The space
My husband and I own one of Bali‚Äôs most unique boutique eco-resorts, Sebatu Sanctuary, which includes the Hobbit treehouse, and eight other distinctive accommodations.

We‚Äôve designed the Hobbit Treehouse for adventurers with one-of-kind features that includes a suspension bridge that leads to the rooftop terrace, a loft for kids (at least 7 years old), a queen-sized swing sofa on the ground floor, a balcony to enjoy breakfast with a view, a semi-outdoor bathroom, and a bedroom with arched windows on three sides providing views of the surrounding forest and terraced rice paddies.

Begin your day with a sumptuous breakfast choosing from an array of Balinese and western dishes prepared by our in-house chef. Room service is available and you can dine either on your balcony or go even higher up to the roof-top terrace and enjoy sublime views of the terraced rice paddies across the valley. At the end of the day, tuck yourself into a top-of-line queen-size bed, 400 thread count cotton sheets. Our boutique eco-resort is compliant with the Green Globe and Earth Check sustainability standards. To reduce our environmental footprint, the treehouse doesn‚Äôt have air conditioning, but does have a high quality ceiling fan. We‚Äôre 600 meters above sea level and nights are typically quite cool.', '', '', '', '']

Title: UNIQUE SUMATRAN KARO HOUSE
Description:
['About this space', 'SPECIAL MONTHLY RATES

Our Bali based jungle creation. Space and home for all-around creatives and life explorers. Welcome to be a guest in a tropical vibe. Stay, create, rest, enjoy and meet each other.

This 60-year old traditional Sumatran Karo house made of ‚Äúeternal" teak wood is a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couple.', 'The space', 'The space
This 60-year old traditional Sumatran house made of ‚Äúeternal" teak wood is painstakingly renewed by hand without missing a bit of its authenticity.

The declined walls were originally meant to keep the wild tigers away, the floor lifted off the ground was supposed to save food kept indoors and the little path around the house was made especially for guarding spirits of the household.

This unique house is beautifully decorated with rugs, batik cushions and furniture made of recycled wood ‚Äî a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couple.

All the facilities are situated in a next building but are used privately by the tenants of the house.', '', '']

Title: Eclectic Cliffside Den with Hanging Living Area
Description:
['About this space', 'This underground den offers a one of a kind experience. Relax in the giant outdoor net bed or literally hangout in the suspended living room or enjoy the cliffside BBQ and fire pit area. Whatever you choose to do, every option has magnificent views of the ocean and the dynamic rolling hills that were shaped by it.
It is next to another Airbnb. Please keep in mind this might not be a place for kids nor older people (we have a lot of stairs).', 'The space', 'The space
Rooms are not separate by walls, the 2 Queen beds are the sofas in the living room, they are pull from the wall when you need to use them.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
We charge 50dlls per pet.
If we find your pet's hair on the blankets or furniture, an extra charge of 20dlls will be charged for cleaning. Pets are not allowed on furniture or beds.

-We have a gas refrigerator, it is not electric so it does not cool like an electric one, it cools enough to keep the food in the best condition, it is not for making ice or having frozen fish.

Please make sure to read the house rules. Thank you."]

Title: Hobbiehouse - tiny house on Fjone
Description:
['About this space', "Have you dreamed of staying in a Hobbit house, but with luxury? The opportunity can be found at Fjone, in Nissedal municipality.

The cabin is equipped with kitchen (2 hotplates, fridge, sink and everything you need), coffee machine is ready for use, beds are made up and towels are ready.

This summer you can enjoy sandy beaches by the lake Nisser, marked mountain hikes, climbing, museum, Norway's smallest cable ferry and much more. This winter there are nice cross-country skiing opportunities and there is a short way to Vr√•dal and Gautefall Ski Center.", 'The space', 'The space
Our Hobbit House is one of very few of these mini-houses in Norway. The house is private, but easily accessible. Spacious parking space is located right by the house. Natural outdoor area with fireplaces and cozy seating. Within 10 minutes walking distance there is a sandy beach, otherwise good hiking opportunities in a direct area. The nearest shops are in either Nissedal (ferry over Nisser) or Treungen (2 miles). Caf√©/restaurant and beer brewery we have at Fjone.', '', 'Guest access', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note']

Title: Architectural wonder in the woods
Description:
['About this space', 'Unique experience ! Clean/Sanitize and secluded.
Enjoy a weekend or a few days eco-friendly retreat in an architectural, geometric masterpiece on 30 preserved acres just minutes from all that Rhinebeck and the Hudson Valley have to offer.
The house is an open plan, and though it has zero bedrooms, it can sleep 3!', 'The space', 'The space
At the entry porch, an orb of wood carved out of the house will welcome you into a play of geometry. Situated around one main volume and open to the second level, the kitchen is placed in the center.
There is a futon queen bed, 1 sleeper futon sofa, one single futon bed.
Instead of fossil fuel, the house is heated geothermally. Instead of grid power, the house has electricity from the sun. We are sensitive to the environment and respect its ecological balance.
There is A HYBRID HEAT/COLD unit on the2nd floor.
The wood stove is highly efficient and keep the space warm in the Hudson Valley winter. Guest have access to a large supply of wood stacked outside the house. (Tip about the stove : Build the fire like a tipi and add wood in a vertical position to make sure the fire will be strong and well maintain)
The design allows the air to flow when all the doors and windows are open, in addition the floor heat is connected to be cooling in the summer.
Outside of the kitchen there is a dinning table with 4 chairs and a Charcoal BBQ (we do not provide charcoal or starter ).
We do not accept Pets of any kind, guest bringing pets will be charge an extra 200$ cleaning fee.', '', '', '', '']

Title: One 90 by the golf@kensville
Description:
['About this space', 'Its a rustic,heritage,iconic villa spread across 20000 sqft of land right on golf course, Kensville, a 18 hole international standards.An ideal place to get lost in the greens, woods, stones, a perfect family get away destination,ideal for pre wed shoots,webseries shoots,ad films, small films..Its a vintage/modern piece of crafted space.A cosy fireplace, a gazebo facing golf, barbecue in open to sky patio, two decks open to sky,8500 sq ft carpet area,24by7 inhouse chef team awaits you for stay!', 'The space', 'The space
Villa is on 650 acres of golf greens.Almost centrally AC,leaving just one lobby as a yoga or meditation space.
It has a gazebo facing golf, fireplace in the villa as well as can be arranged out also, open to sky patio ( coffee corridor) , two open to sky decks , barbecue set up, 16000 sq ft sprawling lawns , board games , reading facility, private pool,fully functional kitchen facility , 24 hrs in-house expert chef and helper( they can cook all cuisines as well maintain house ), 24 hours power supply with 15 kv diesel genset installed , upto 5 cars personal parking,A complete privacy zone!', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
We have a private pool.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Private transportation service needs to be hired to reach to the place.We shall provide to and fro transportation service upto 4 person at 2700/-
Pick up and drop off at SG Highway nearest to Iskcon cross roads']

Title: One of only three Silos in Tennessee on AirBnB!!!
Description: ['About this space', 'Turner‚Äôs Grain Silo!!! 25 minutes from downtown Nashville: This converted grain silo is absolutely one of a kind!!! In fact, we are only 1 of only a few silos in the United States offered by AirBnB!....pretty cool!! Tucked away among the trees, you‚Äôll be able to relax in our unique home. We are just far enough away from the hustle & bustle of the city to rest your mind & body, but close enough to be able to enjoy all that our great community has to offer!', 'The space', 'The space\nSECLUDED! WE ARE NOT IN A NEIGHBORHOOD!!! The inside of the silo is not at all like the exterior! We offer modern conveniences with contemporary style! This labor of love took 5 months & we have put our hearts into every aspect of this silo! Spray foam insulated with central heat & air conditioning! The kitchen is stocked with pots, pans, cooking utensils, dishes, a 2-burner stove-top, microwave, full-sized fridge & an assortment of spices. Lots of snacks including breakfast items are provided. All the toiletries one could imagine are available as well as full-sized shampoo, conditioner & body wash-high quality too, not the off-brand stuff!! We hope our guests enjoy the serenity of the location & ask that respect is given to other guests on the property. Because of the uniqueness of the structure, no children under the age of 13 are allowed to stay.', '', '']

Title: Pine Needle Treehouse at Tudor in the Pines
Description:
['About this space', 'TUDOR IN THE PINES

Hidden amidst the dense foliage of Baguio City‚Äôs pinewood forest, Tudor in the Pines is a remarkable estate in the Philippines compromising of seven (7) unique residences within a gated property, accommodating a maximum of 30 guests. With the convenience of multiple road accesses to and from the city, and to different highland provinces of the Cordilleras. Tudor in the Pines is perfectly located as your home base to travel the Northern wonders of the Philippines.', 'The space', 'The space
The space
Tudor in the Pines features a variety of amenities exclusive to our guest. During your stay in our calm and peaceful estate, stroll through our private garden, enjoy a picnic with a fully equipped barbecue pit, share stories around our roaring fire pit, have a tea in our Glasshouse Lounge, and make memories with our lush pine forest sceneries, majestic mountain views, and breathtaking sky views from our Black Tower.

PINE NEEDLE TREEHOUSE
Dwell amongst the pine trees across a hanging bridge and timber deck 30 feet above the ground is quite an experience for the adventurous.

The Pine Needle treehouse features full view of expansive pine tree forests.

Immerse yourselves among the fresh pine trees across the hanging bridge or dine in the timber deck, 30 feet above the ground, a truly unique experience for the adventurous. Within the gated estate of Tudor in the Pines, the Pine Needle Treehouse can accommodate a MAXIMUM of 2 guests.

Guest Reminder: Expect some movement to the treehouse because it is attached to the Hanging bridge.', '', '']

Title: Cozy Hobbit House on charming Bainbridge Island
Description:
['About this space', '‚ÄúIn a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit. Not a nasty, dirty, wet hole, filled with the ends of worms and an oozy smell, nor yet a dry, bare, sandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat: it was a hobbit-hole, and that means comfort.‚Äù -J.R.R. Tolkien
Hand-built by our family, this warm and cozy in-hill cabin located in the lower area of our property is something right out of a Tolkien novel. Beautiful territorial views. Very LGBTQ+ and BIPOC friendly. Hope you enjoy our Shire!', 'The space', 'The space
This one room Hobbit Hole has everything in it's 7.5x15.5' (cozy): Comfy convertible bed/couch complete with linens, a small table with 2 chairs for playing games and eating, puzzles, games, snacks, hot water kettle, coffee maker, bluetooth speaker, electric fireplace (warm and cozy) , books, sketchpad with colored pencils, and more! A rustic wooden floor (with some paint splatters) and a braided rug give you a feeling of comfort and home. On site we have a private portable bathroom complete with hand-washing station, and an outside combination fire pit and charcoal barbecue with a grill top and s‚Äômores sticks provided so you can cook over a wood fire or coals! And an outdoor table and chairs that are super comfortable!

The house itself is heated, insulated, and has working electricity/outlets for computer or phone charger. Clean bedding and pillows provided, washed in fragrance-free detergent between each guest. We provide a full water jug with spigot, hot water kettle, teapot, assorted teas, an empty growler to use, 2 pint glasses and 2 mugs. Private area of the yard with plenty of room to relax. We have a disc golf goal and discs to use as well.

Firewood is available for purchase onsite for $7/milk crate full. This comes with a kindling kit.

Territorial views of the tree line and sunset views to die for! We are located near Meigs Park as well as a 10-minute walk from Manitou beach and an easy bike ride to the ferry that goes to Seattle! 2 miles from the Grand Forest and 3 miles from Battle Point park. We are exactly 3 miles from the ferry terminal in a convenient mid-island location.

NEED TO KNOW (managing expectations):
A note on the bathroom: the hobbit hole is small and will not fit a bathroom or plumbing. Your nearby private portable restroom (about 150 feet away) is cleaned thoroughly between each guest and serviced (pumped out) weekly. We consider our listing to be ‚Äúglamping‚Äù.
Also our property borders a local 2 lane highway and you can expect road noise mostly during the day and evening. While it is a private setting you can expect to hear the road. Weekends and evenings it is quieter, and when the door is closed it is quiet.
There is no cooking inside the Hobbit House however we have a combination fire pit and charcoal BBQ that you can use to cook on. Bring your own dishes.

We are on Insta hobbithouse98110 and there are videos of the space to give you a solid look at what is in the space.

On you tube we have a nice video giving a tour of the property and the hobbit hole. Look for "Hobbit House Bainbridge Island".

The Hobbit House is strictly limited to 2 guests or 2 adults and a small child that can share the bed. The bed is a queen size, and we can't allow sleeping on the floor as the door opens inwards and is a safety concern. However,
additional guests are welcome to bring a tent and camp outside, for $20/tent, up to 6 additional guests or 2 tents, whichever is smaller. Let me know when you are booking that you'd like to bring additional guests and we will adjust the costs accordingly.

We look forward to hosting you!', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Your own private parking space is about 50 yards from the hobbit house. We have wheelbarrows available to use to for your belongings. Portable potty with hand washing station about 50 yards from the hobbit house.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
-This is an unusual listing, please read the description thoroughly!
-Additional tent camping available for guests.
-Cooler provided, arrange for Ice if desired.
-We have wheelbarrows for bringing down your belongings.
-We do not have WIFI as the Hobbit House is built into the ground. We've found cell phones work just fine here."]

Title: 'Ndida (The True Bushveld Experience)
Description:
['About this space', "Unique, secluded and very close to the Crocodile River, 'Ndida is the ideal nature-escape for those who enjoy privacy, quality and style. This is the true bushveld experience.

The river is just a 1-min walk, so listen-out for Hippo and Elephant by day, and Lion and Hyena by night.

Two traditional bedrooms (1 queen & 2 single beds) with another queen on the mezzanine ‚Äì house sleeps 6. Two toilets, 1 bath and 3 showers (2 outdoor).

The resident Bushbuck, Warthog and Bushbaby await your arrival.", 'The space', "The space
Architectural gem set deep amongst the trees, and only a 1-min walk from the Crocodile River, and the World-reknown Kruger National Park.

Spanning two 2000m2 plots, and bordered on all sides by large areas of pristine bush/parkland, the house offers a level of privacy that is difficult to match anywhere in Marloth Park.

The house also sits on the confluence of two dry riverbed systems, so is completely surrounded by dense, jungle-like, riparian woodland ‚Äì providing much-needed shade in Summer, and exceptional privacy all-year-round.

But these tangled vines hoisted between mature Leadwood, Knobthorn and Marulas don't only benefit humans, they're also fantastic cover for birds, and for all the other animals that call 'Ndida home ‚Äì e.g. Eastern (Yellowspotted) Nicator, Giant Plated Lizard and, the night's most enthusiastic guest (and the cutest), the Lesser Bushbaby (who love banana btw).

The heated outdoor showers are a must ‚Äì even during the mild Lowveld Winter, it's a true privilege being out there whilst a troop of Banded Mongoose scurry past on their daily raid (searching for insects, reptiles and rodents).

One of the best locations within Marloth Park ‚Äì very close to the Crocodile River, but without compromising on privacy. Again, 'Ndida is the true bushveld experience.

'Ndida launched on 29th October 2018, so almost everything inside the house is pretty much still brand new, and also top-quality. Please let us know (in your review) if there's anything we've missed from our inventory ‚Äì we want it to be perfect.", '', '', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
IMPORTANT: Marloth Park has a very strict NO NOISE policy ‚Äì this means NO loud music, NO parties, NO shouting, etc. Law-Enforcement and the Community Policing Forum respond to noise complaints immediately with a fine of R3,500.

PLEASE NOTE: Power outages / load-shedding is a very serious problem in South Africa, and Marloth Park is also being badly affected. Please make sure you bring your own torches and that you locate the candles provided as soon as you arrive at 'Ndida.

Although the bush poses its own dangers and threats to adults (snakes, scorpions, etc.), it is obviously even riskier for little ones. In addition (see photos), the property has a partially exposed mezzanine level, stairs (without a banister), a raised swimming pool and raised decked patio (without handrails) ‚Äì so please, please keep a close eye on littler children.

Also, proper wifi coverage hasn't reached the area yet, so sadly wifi isn't an option. Also, for now, we have decided to keep the environment as natural as possible, so there is no TV or DVD either ‚Äì however, if our valued guests are critical about this in their reviews, we will obviously do something about it."]

Title: Phoenix Earthship - Experience off-grid luxury
Description:
['About this space', 'The Phoenix OFFICIAL Earthship cannot be compared to any other rental in this world. This home‚Äôs jungle greenhouse creates its own microclimate in the high mountain desert and is completely off-the-grid, exquisitely detailed and outfitted with modern amenities. The outer greenhouse features towering banana trees, grape vines, birds, turtles and even a fish pond. The inner living spaces are cozy and quiet. The Phoenix Earthship was featured in 2014 as one of Lonely Planet‚Äôs Top Ten Eco-Stays.', 'The space', 'The space
The Phoenix is a work of sustainable art that has been featured in countless television shows and print articles. Besides the two bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchen and common area it features:

A teeming greenhouse
Fish pond
Birds
Food garden
Earthship-inspired chicken coop and run
Outdoor fire pit with seating
BBQ grill and outdoor eating and sitting area

All of which exist within the Phoenix complex, regardless of the time of year.

A cozy fireplace with water fountain, free WiFi and TV with Netflix are also available and like everything in the Phoenix, completely solar-powered!', '', '']

Title: ‚ÄúWhimsical Stone Abode‚Äù - Boston Magazine
Description:
['About this space', '‚ÄúThe best possible combination between the postcard-perfect cliffside suites of Santorini (Greece) and a hobbit house...The white stone cottage flows around 900 sf, which contains a nice bathroom, full kitchen, and plenty of nature-inspired furnishings.‚Äù Boston Magazine - Travel.

You are the only guests in the domes which are attached to our home, a stone cottage with eye brow architecture. Enjoy gardens, meadow, woods and mountain views.

We are 25 minutes from Manchester and Bennington VT.', 'The space', 'The space
‚ÄúThe best possible combination between the postcard-perfect cliffside suites of Santorini and a hobbit house.‚Äù Boston Magazine
You will be the only guests! The entire place is yours! The domes feature free WiFi, a kitchen with microwave, stove/oven, refrigerator, drip and single serve coffee maker, tea, snacks and a bathroom with heated tile floor. The bedroom has a queen size bed and the full bathroom includes a shower/tub, heated tile floor, hairdryer, soap and shampoo. You will enjoy sitting by the thermostatically controlled propane-fueled ‚Äòwood‚Äô stove when there is a seasonal chill in the air.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The domes are completely private. You alone have use of the interconnected domes. We live in a completely separate living space. Outside you have access to an outdoor gas grill, patio and our 10 acres of woodland and meadows. Take a walk on the road that leads to the town hall just over a mile away.', '', 'Other things to note
Check out our Guidebook!
Getting around - 10 minutes to Arlington, VT, 25 minutes to Manchester, VT, 25 minutes to Bennington, VT, and less than an hour to Saratoga Springs, NY, 4.5 hours to NYC and under 4 hours to Boston. The Battenkill River is 3 minutes away for swimming, fishing, kayaking and canoeing. Hiking the base or up to the summit of the highest peak in southern Vermont, Mount Equinox, is a popular activity. Afterward head into Manchester at the base of the mountain, a great place for brews, dining, art galleries and shopping. The Appalachian Trail is within a 5 minute drive from Manchester. In the winter season, downhill and X-Country skiing are within an hour. The two closest downhill mountains are Bromley (35 minutes) and Stratton (50 minutes).']

Title: 360 degree Himalayas view
Description: ['About this space', 'Heavot Caves ( Not all those who wander are lost ) will let you enjoy and live a true fairy tale experience it is part of a retreat located at a distance of only 10 km from Shimla . This place is personification of Tranquility , surrounded by lush green mountains located perfectly to give you a 360 degree view of the Himalayan mountain ranges . Rarely do you find a retreat that is embodied by the essence of nature, taking your mind off everything that is apparent . Enjoy Peace and serenity .', 'The space', 'The space\nComfy Dome Shaped Room with a lawn in front and surrounded by Himalayan mountain range Our place is surrounded by the whistling pines and the Room are situated in the middle of a green Valley . We are far away from the city hustle- bustle. You will enjoy an exceptional beauty of landscape, including birds and a great variety of flora. The scenic view, the refreshing air and the dazzling sight of the sun descending behind the mountains adds to the solace. It is a perfect getaway and if you are looking for rejuvenation and a surreal experience, this should be your holiday destination. Space consists of a bedroom with an attached Bathroom the bathrooms are well tiled and fitted with modern Sanitary Ware . everyday toiletries and bath linens are provided . the room has a wall mounted flat screen LED TV and a big lawn in front .', '', 'Guest access\nOne Bedroom in a beautiful resort , Lawn , restaurant , Small nature trails around the property , Parking Area .', '', 'Other things to note']

Title: Iconic Union SKYHOUSE with Hood Canal views
Description:
['About this space', "Iconic 1970's PNW home on Alderbrook Creek with Skyroom views of the Hood Canal and Olympic Mountains. Surround yourself in nature with two levels of wrap-around decks, or walk amongst the treetops on the Skyroom balcony. This one-of-a-kind home sleeps 11, with three bedrooms and 3.5 baths. Perfect for a group retreat, family getaway, or reunion!

** Please read all listing descirptions & photo captions before booking instantly, to make sure the space suits your needs. **", 'The space', 'The space
Recently renovated with modern comforts and decor, this house retained many of the original 1970s fixtures and designs that have been preserved to keep this home as unique as when it was built! At over 2,400 square feet, the Skyhouse features several options for gathering indoors or out. All sleeping spaces have doors, and no bedrooms share walls, allowing for privacy even for large groups. The primary bedroom has a king bed and full sized sofa bed. There are two sleeping spaces on the lower level: a pull out sofa & cot in the "rec room" (which has a door for privacy); and a cozy bedroom with a king bed. There is also a guest suite with a queen bed, private entrance, 3/4 bathroom, and wet bar. The guest suite, master bedroom/bathroom, kitchen, and dining room are all on the main level (for guests who avoid stairs). The climb to the top of the tower is about 98 steps, depending on where you start your climb. At the top, the Skyroom features 8 foot sliders with views to the north, east, and west. Enjoy views from the Skyroom's wrap-around balcony. There is a half bath just below the Skyroom, so you can enjoy the views as long as you'd like!', '', '', '', '']

Title: Heavenly Highlands Mountain Property
Description:
['About this space', 'A house surrounded by spectacular views, vegetation and hiking trails in the middle of the mountains of the Central Valley Wind Farm. It is more than a house, it is a unique experience in Costa Rica. You can relax in front of a firepit with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean.
For breakfast you can enjoy collecting fresh eggs from our chicken coop, totally a unique experience!
Heavenly Highlands is your choice!', 'The space', 'The space
A house surrounded by expectacular views,', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
*Private Hike
*Fire Pit
*Chicken coop', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Key information

Although it was very difficult to have internet on the property, we did it! But on some occasions when there is very heavy rain and dense fog, the signal weakens. However, it is momentary and they are the perfect times to disconnect and enjoy nature.

The access road to the house is 100% safe, however, the street is narrow and very steep, so it is advisable to drive slowly and with caution. The last kilometer is not paved and it is necessary to come in an SUV (4x4 is not necessary) to facilitate driving. In short, it is the price of being in the middle of nature!']

Title: Peacock Tiny House near Las Vegas
Description:
['About this space', 'We have a unique tiny home located in Sandy Valley NV. One hour outside south Las Vegas off US 15. This is one of two tiny home on a dude ranch with horseback riding, cattle drives and rodeo events ( When available ) Search Sandy Valley Ranch. Come stay at our beautiful desert hideaway. Enjoy the tranquility of the Mojave Desert and gaze at the sea of stars. We are near Death Valley, Tecopa hotsprings and GoodSprings home of the famous Pioneer Saloon.', 'The space', 'The space
Our tiny house / the Peacock has a flushing toilet, shower with hot water, a stove, a fridge and a comfortable queen size bed. The couch also pulls out to become a bed, it is a little larger then a twin but smaller then a queen. You can enjoy watching the sunset and sitting under a sea of stars from our roof top patio.
We do allow pets but charge a $10 pet fee. per night. We ask that you do not leave your pet un attended if you travel off property. We proudly donate a portion of our pet fees to the SPCA.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Please let us know if you are going to be arriving after check-in so we can give you instructions.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Breakfast, lunch or dinner can be served in the ranch house next to the tiny house. If you are interested in any meals please let Terry the ranch host know. You can also book a horse back back ride through the desert. Rob and Sandi built own the tiny house and on most days are there for your assistance. It is the most beautiful peace of property with happy helpful staff if needed. Other wise, sit back, enjoy and come and go as you please. There is $10.00 pet fee per nightm']

Title: The Bunkhouse at Love's Hideaway
Description: ['About this space', "Unique stay in the bunkhouse grain bin this bunkhouse is a 15 foot round grain silo that has been transformed into a loft one bedroom tiny home, this tiny home does have natural well water the property is shared with the property owner although you will not see very much of them they will drive in and out of the driveway on the 27 acres, you have your own seating outside with a fire pit area if you're traveling for business or just a nice getaway Come and stay at Love's Hideaway.", 'The space', "The space\nThis one bedroom is a tiny home, though this is unique, the height upstairs is 5. 7 when you get to the top of the stairs so you do have to lean over, so you do not hit your head on the ceiling light, there is a TV upstairs and one downstairs there is A washer dryer combo, the home has everything you need sheets, towels, dishes, coffee pot, a Keurig K-cup silverware pot and pans Due to events that have happened with our farm animals pets are not allowed anymore that includes Service animals we are very sorry for this inconvenience. Also Due to some recent events with some of our guests, we do now have Ring cameras that look on the parking near the tiny house, this is just to see when people come and go there are some trail cams on the walking trails back in the woods to take pictures of the dear's.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note']

Title: Enchanted Tree House Concept off of Main st. Tub!
Description:
['About this space', 'Imagine being immersed in a small enchanted forest only 100‚Äôs of feet off of Main street. Nestled into live oak trees that gently sway in the breeze, under dark skies with bright stars, and curated to both inspire joy and create presence.

Welcome to our little magical treehouse and landscape resort in Fredericksburg. The amazing stays in our secluded forest are only minutes to all of the beautiful shops, cafes, restaurants, bars, and Vineyards.

A magical stay that we hope you will love.', 'The space', 'The space
Awe inspiring designed modern Tree house concept surrounded by a magical forest. Imagine laying in the soaker tub perched into the forest as wild turkeys and deer stroll past you, a fire pit looking at the stars, or relaxing on your private deck

The unit demonstrates immaculate views and a nature immersive experience that will be both exciting and calming. Thousands of Live oak trees across the property, manicured paths, whimsical evening lights and friendly wildlife bring a sense of wonder and serenity to the space.


Our whimsical property offers a community of eight unique structures from treehouses to safari tents to geodesic domes. Scattered about through a 13 acre enchanted forest in town!

Privacy inside of the units and after nightfall you should feel very secluded as each unit is 50-200 feet apart.

During the day you may see people walking around, general maintenance happening etc, but if you refer to our reviews the experience is AMAZING.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Area 51 Futuro house
Description:
['About this space', 'Free pickup in new TESLA! Starting from late March.
This amazing 1974 Futuro house (1 of only 50 in the world) has just been fully restored and is ready to offer you an amazing experience now! : ) the spaceship is massive and offers genuine rare furniture from designers such as verner panton and Luigi colani. The property has a pool, spa , sauna, outdoor shower-and a 1968 concord caravan for extra sleeping if required! We are also in the process of building a gamesroom/gym. You will be AMAZED.', 'The space', 'The space
25 minutes from Christchurch cbd and Christchurch airport. Amazing 1974 Futuro house which has been restored Meticulously to its original condition with no expense spared. Beautiful large landscaped grounds with swimming pool, spa pool, outdoor sauna and outdoor shower plus many other amazing retro/vintage items scattered around the property including the 1970s/80s McDonald‚Äôs playground! You will feel like you have been transported back in time yet into the future !', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Electric entrance gates into the property (very private and secure)', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Free pickup and drop off from Christchurch airport in a brand new black TESLA if you book for two nights or more! This service will be available beginning at the end of March.']

Title: slube am Stadthafen Neustrelitz // slube Home
Description:
['About this space', 'Excellent location at Neustrelitz harbour, yet an exceptional adventure ambience: the slubes not only offer functional comfort, but also a new experience with an original atmosphere.', 'The space', "The space
More comfortable than thought and at the same time an intelligent space miracle - that's what the slube Home could be called. After all, who would have thought that there would be a double bed, seating areas, a table and a separate bathroom with shower and toilet in the two-storey slubes?

The minihotel has sealed windows, is sound- and heat-insulated and can also be heated comfortably on cooler days.

In the lower area there is a seating area and a small but fully equipped bathroom. A staircase leads to the upper floor of the sludge, on which the double bed is located.

Free Wi-Fi is available everywhere. In addition, you can control light and heating in the slube via your own mobile phone with the slube app.

If you are looking for modern accommodation in a unique atmosphere, slubes am Stadthafen Neustrelitz is the place to be."]

Title: Naust by the lake on Sokn,  Stavanger
Description: ['About this space', "Naustet is brand new and part of the marine environment towards Soknasundet. It's a jetty with fishing opportunities. Buildings and furniture are made by the renowned architect Espen Surnevik. If you come by boat, there's plenty of room for the boat at the pier. There is also an RV rental (300.- /day) in addition to the necessity.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nLodging rooms downstairs are available from the outdoor area. Exclusive use can be agreed.']

Title: Guard Tower #2 with Pool
Description:
['About this space', 'The ULTIMATE "Tiny House" experience! Featured on HGTV: The Castle House Estate Guard Tower brings Tiny Home living to another level, located in the heart of Joshua Tree and minutes from the National Park. This unique medieval piece of architecture blends indoor-outdoor living with an emphasis on entertaining. The Castle House Estate is situated on eight picturesque acres, surrounded by many more private undeveloped acres.', 'The space', "The space
Guard Tower 2

3 LEVELS ¬∑ 1 BED ¬∑ 120 SQF

The Castle House Guard Tower is a custom three level living space & loft. Each piece of furniture has been custom made to fit this unique round space which includes a queen sized bed in the loft. Did we mention 1500 thread count sheets and Pure Care Plush memory foam pillows?

The full glass door and windows have been placed strategically to catch the desert light.

For outside adventurers step up to the rooftop hatch to enjoy your views or bring your sleeping bags and sleep under the stars. ***WEATHER PERMITTING***

Each tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning fire-pit and two chairs perfect for enjoying the outside elements of Joshua Tree & where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast s'mores. Each tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning fire-pit, grill top and two chairs, perfect for enjoying the outside elements of Joshua Tree & where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast s'mores. Included in each tower is a mini-refrigerator and Nespresso coffee maker. The restroom facility is just 20 steps away and has two private toilets, two hand sinks and urinal. Two outside showers and one outdoor sink. Nothing can be compared to showering outside with 365 degree views of The National Park.

Instagram: @TheCastleHouseEstate", '', '']

Title: Moleiro Shelter
Description:
['About this space', 'Classified as a national monument, this emblematic Peniche mill has, since 1895 and for decades, had agricultural and industrial use. Currently, completely renovated and under the name "Shelter of the Miller‚Äù it is intended to be a welcoming space for tourists from all over the world providing unique memories to those who stay in it. To complete the experience, guests also receive breakfast, delivered to the door.

The perfect place for those looking for a different experience!', 'The space', 'The space
When booking a stay at the Shelter, guests will have access to the entire space, i.e. 3 floors : kitchen and living room, bathroom, bedroom 1 and bedroom 2', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire mill (3 floors), its surrounding area and parking', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Diversified breakfast delivery every morning.', 'Licence number', 'Licence number
79462/AL']

Title: Beautiful, Secluded Private Mountain-Top Modern Retreat, Dog-Friendly with Hot Tub and AMAZING Views
Description:
['About this space', "Retreat to your own private, modern oasis with the best views in all of Tennessee. Perched on top a private 36-acre hilltop (the highest outside the Park!), Belltop offers unparalleled views of Wears Valley and the Smoky Mountains. With 360-degree views from floor-to-ceiling windows and a rooftop walkway, you won't miss a single sunset! Unplug and unwind as you sit in your private hot tub or curl up in front of the stunning, open-hearth, wood-burning fireplace. Perfect for families or friends.", 'The space', "The space
This custom-built, modern 4 bedroom/2.5 bath house sleeps up to 6 guests. A secluded, natural retreat -- perfect for couples, families, reunions, or small groups of friends. Perched atop a private 36-acre hill, the house offers spectacular views of the Smoky Mountains and the valley, both indoors and outdoors.

Guests will take the private driveway to the top of the hill. Please note, the driveway is gravel, windy, and reasonably steep -- so anxious or new drivers may not be comfortable -- and, in the winter, guests should plan to arrive in 4-wheel or all-wheel drive automobiles. As you pull up to the house, you'll catch a glimpse of the beautiful views the house offers.

Step inside the front door into the modern, open-concept living room. Anchored by a beautiful, open-hearth fireplace and framed by panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows, the living room offers plenty of room to relax, unwind, and catch up with friends. It is complete with a piano, record player, library, and a selection of games for guests to enjoy. The living room opens up to the dining area and the kitchen. You'll find stunning views from all three areas. The exterior walls of the room are all glass, and there are several doors to the patio and yard for easy indoor-outdoor living. An outdoor grill and dining table are perfect when the weather is nice. Behind the kitchen is a small laundry room, which guests are welcome to use, and there is also a half bath off the living room.

Want to see the best views? Take the spiral stairwell next to the front door to the observation deck. Step outside at the top, and take in the best views in Tennessee! With unblocked, 360-degree views, you can see the whole area. Because the stairs are long and there are open areas on the observation deck (see photos), guests with mobility issues and young children should skip the observation deck. Don't worry -- the views at main level are incredible too!

Step off the living room or walk down the hall to access the master suite. Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, a custom king-sized bed, expansive closet space, and a spacious bathroom, the master suite is a perfect retreat. The master suite offers the best access to the hot tub, which is neatly tucked away on the private patio.

Beyond the master suite, guests enter the second half of the house, which is home to three additional bedrooms, a full bathroom, and a play/lounge loft. A small bedroom at the front, with a twin-sized daybed, is a great option for a younger guest. At the back, there are two additional king-sized bedrooms, each with a private patio. They share a full bath, which has a separate bathing room, so multiple guests can use the facilities at the same time. In the hallway between the bedrooms, there is a metal staircase (see photos -- not ideal for bad knees or toddlers), which leads to a secluded loft space -- perfect for teens, it offers a variety of games, a television, and a sleeper sofa.

We aim to deliver the most comfortable stay possible. All of our beds are equipped with new memory foam mattresses, which promise wonderful nights' sleep.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
24/7 no-contact self check-in.
House access is via electronic lock, so guests will be allowed to come and go at their convenience.

Because of the driveway, we do recommend guests try to plan their arrival during the daylight hours. While certainly not impossible, it can be a bit uncomfortable climbing the driveway for the first time at night.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Internet: The house is on intended to be a retreat, offering guests an option to unwind and unplug. The house is remote and does NOT have unlimited internet. While there is wifi, we generally ask guests to keep its use to a minimum. If you are planning to do a lot of online work or streaming during your stay, this may not be the best option for you.

Pets: Well-behaved, house-trained dogs are welcome. However, because dogs create a bit more mess and require more cleaning time, there is an additional pet fee of $20 per dog per night. You can include your pets as adults in your guest count, or if your pets push your total guest count over our maximum (6), please let us know, and we will send a separate request after booking for the pet fee. We do ask that guests: (1) clean and pick up after their pets while on the property and (2) do not leave their pets unattended for extended periods of time. If you bring your pet, you are also assuming full responsibility for them and any damage they may cause. Additional cleaning or repair fees may apply if your pet is destructive.

Guest Count: Please make sure your guest count is accurate and includes all guests (including children) who will be joining you during your stay, as your guest count will affect the price of your stay. We welcome groups of up to 6 people. The nightly rate reflects the price for our standard occupancy, 1. For each additional guest beyond the first (up to 6, total), we charge an additional guest fee of $20 to cover additional cleaning, utilities, and wear and tear.

Parties: We do not allow parties at the house. No guests, outside of those included in the reservation, are permitted on the property during your stay. Please make sure that your guest count accurately reflects the number of people you have invited to the property with you. If you plan to have additional guests for only a portion of your stay, please let us know so that we can adjust the guest fee accordingly.']

Title: Hobbit House of Pawling
Description:
['About this space', 'One of a kind, cozy hobbit house with hot tub.
Beautiful setting offering you the ultimate getaway. 5 minutes from the village of Pawling with Metro North railway access.
2 bedrooms w/ king size beds, 2 bathrooms each with walk in shower. A queen size pull out couch in living room. Electric fireplace in living room.
Perennial gardens, 3 patios, waterfall, bbq grill, 2 hammocks, and 2 fire pits.
**No children under 12.
**No pets. (Due to allergies)
**No parties.
Ring Quests upon request!', 'The space', 'The space
Our house is a cozy, private getaway.
We do not allow children under 12 for safety reasons.
We do not allow pets. (Due to allergies)
We also do not allow parties or smoking at the hobbit house.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
We do have WiFi but access may be spotty due to our private location.']

Title: Panoramic Views & Dog Heaven at The Silo!
Description:
['About this space', 'Welcome to The Silo. Once grain storage bins on a working dairy farm, these twin silos have been re-purposed into a brand new 2-story living space in the heart of the Bitterroot Valley. Three out of four original generations still make their home on this location which is transitioning from a full-time dairy farm to a host property. Acres on which to roam with your dog leash free (pet fee), a pond stocked with fish, incredible scenery, and delightful small towns strung along the HWY 93 awaits!', 'The space', "The space
As much privacy, or interaction as you choose. Optional activities for booking: English Afternoon Tea in The Parlor Tearoom on premises.

TO NOTE: The Silo is situated on an 80+acre lot that is home to the host's family and one rental tenant. While your time here can be as private or interactive as you choose, please be aware that there will be other people, dogs and automobiles coming in and out of the property.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guest are free to roam the 80 acre property with dogs. Please note that you many encounter other wildlife, people and pets.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
There is a nominal fee per pet per visit which will be requested once your booking is confirmed. More details under ‚ÄúHouse Rules‚Äù.']

Title: WORLDS GREATEST BEACH HOUSE
Description:
['About this space', 'WORLDS GREATEST BEACH HOUSE', 'The space', "The space
Southern California is more than just a lifestyle, it is a vibe, a connection, a mood and most of all a glorious undertaking in enjoying all life has to offer in a great climate bounded by sun, surf and sand. We humbly submit that if you rent this home, you will agree that from the desert to the sea throughout the entire state there is, quite simply, no finer home to experience the dream of southern California. Buckle up folks, you are about to enter the Water Tower Experience.

(For a video of the home, please click on the video box in the photo montage)

The name says it all ‚Äì THE WATER TOWER - for the those unfamiliar with perhaps the most famous beach-front landmark in all of California, let‚Äôs start with a little history. Located in one of Americas tallest ground to ceiling residential structures and serviced by a commercial elevator that whisks you upwards of close to one hundred feet in the sky; this almost 3,000 square foot home was, in fact, southern California's first man-made tourist attraction. Long before Knotts and Disneyland, indeed, before the first automobile was registered in Orange County, the Water Tower stood marveled at by visitors and locals alike as a wonder of engineering and architectural bravado.

As for the structure, it stands over 85 feet tall and has three stories with windows on all sides. This amazing home is beyond well-appointed, it has been professionally renovated and decorated with first class amenities, appliances, thousand-thread count linens and top-shelf accoutrements, so that your experience in southern California beach living is not only first-class in every conceivable way, but a memory you treasure forever. No detail has gone unnoticed as the owners endeavored to create a home that will reward every person who enters an indelible lifetime memory. The interior designers charge was simple; pay tribute to the history of the Water Tower and when finished we wanted every guest who stays in the home to leave and tell everyone they know about the magic of the Water Tower Experience. As you can see from the photos, we believe the decorators and designers hit this one out of the park. The home has two garages, an elevator, four bedrooms, three and one-half bathrooms, a fully stocked kitchen, bar, laundry room and the most amazing living room you will likely ever encounter with 360 degree views of southern California and beyond.

Now that we have the structure out of the way, let‚Äôs get to the fun stuff ‚Äì the Water Tower Experience ‚Äì as natives know, the debate has raged for years over what is more ‚ÄúSo Cal‚Äù, Orange County and its miles of pristine beaches or LA with a bit more traffic, but mountains and beaches and a whole lot of glitz. As you enter the Water Tower Experience this won‚Äôt be an issue ‚Äì you are part of both. Tower locals, however, might argue as to whether or not she resides in Sunset Beach or Seal Beach as they both claim her. It really doesn‚Äôt matter as, make no mistake about it, while, like the beaches, the Water Tower belongs to all Californians. It is the love child of Sunset Beach, but Seal Beach is very much the proud Father. As you stand on the sidewalk, please take a moment to look up and take in the grandeur of this magnificent 19th century landmark which was once the tallest structure in Orange County and today stands as the second tallest residential home in the United States.

As you enter you will see the fine artwork on the doors and plaque detailing some of the history of this home which was built to service the railroads in the last half of the 1800‚Äôs as the steam engines required a tremendous amount of water to power the locomotives. The Tower could hold up to 75,000 gallons of water which weighed over 37 tons so don‚Äôt worry about whether or not the she is strong enough to support your family. The entry way is a tribute to the Tower and the workers who built her. From vintage tools and a water fall to the Burlaps and Barrels bathroom you will feel the history of the Water Tower as soon as you cross the threshold into a home experience like non-other. You will also be introduced to the tower mascot ‚Äì Mr. Wally Tower. As your stay unfolds, enjoy finding the hidden ‚ÄúWally‚Äôs‚Äù around the home. There are several intriguing finds on this floor including a bedroom with a ‚Äúsecret‚Äù room located behind a bookshelf (where some folks believe the ghost of Wally resides). After taking in the entry level, get in the elevator and start your stay.

On the second floor you will be thrilled to find a wonderful lounge, dining area and fully stocked kitchen with all new state of the art appliances and cookware. The view is nothing short of stunning as walls are in fact mostly windows revealing the entire Pacific Ocean. Slide open the doors and walk around the entire tower or simply sit on the deck and enjoy the view of the beach and Catalina. This is the lowest indoor floor of the Water Tower, yet you are still 60 feet in the air with a majestic view. Throughout the Tower you will find a number of treats and architectural gems including magnificent stained glass windows and custom wood-work. This floor is no exception. Look up at the ceiling or simply give a listen for the whistle of the trains circling around the ceiling. These trains are replicas of those serviced by the Water Tower over a century ago. The lounge has not only amazing scenery, but we believe some of the most comfortable chairs you will ever have the pleasure of sitting in as you enjoy the view and your stay. This floor also hosts a bedroom with bunk beds dedicated and decorated in recognition of a little know part of California history ‚Äì Pirates. That‚Äôs right, Pirates. Specifically, Hippolyte Bouchard who after raiding Monterey, plundered Mission San Juan Capistrano while cruising up and down the coastline.

A short trip up the beautiful winding staircase leads to the two master suites. Facing towards Los Angeles you will find the Whale Lovers Bedroom with a view of Huntington Harbor, Bay of Los Angeles and White‚Äôs Point which is the land jetting-out from the end of San Pedro to form the outline of our Los Angeles coastline. This room not only has all new fine linen, but a world class shower sunken with an equally impressive view to enjoy while you experience this wonderful rain shower. On the other side of the floor you will find the Dolphin Bedroom with a view towards Huntington and Newport Beaches. We think you will find this suite equally impressive with unapparelled views and a bathroom shower with a view of the San Gabriel Mountains. All bedrooms are equipped with brand new HD televisions with Direct TV.

Now it is time to journey to the top floor or Rotunda Room of the Water Tower. This room which stands over 80 feet above sea level offers a 360-degree view of all of southern California. From the Hollywood sign to San Clemente Island for as far as the eyes can see you will have an unobstructed view. If for some reason that is not enough for you, we have numerous magnifying devices including a custom-made viewfinder so if you are curious about what the crew of a passing sailboat looks like, just zoom in and take a gander. The room itself is designed to entertain and be enjoyed by up to 20 people. There are four large screen curved HD televisions so you can watch all the games. Or if you simply want to sit on the custom leather chairs or new couch and enjoy the view then don‚Äôt forget to take in the 100 gallon fish tank or be certain to look up at the stain glass ceiling. As you look up you will see propellers. Those too are part of the history of the tower and its unique role as a coastal landmark during World War II. This floor includes a custom bar, video station with over 600 different games and a lifetime of breathtaking views.

Now that you have seen a glimpse of the inside of the Water Tower Experience, we invite you to think about spending a little time on the exterior. Just a few short steps and you will find yourself on an elevated outdoor deck 50 feet above the ground with everything you need to enjoy the views and the beach without stepping off the lot. The deck boasts not only a jacuzzi and BBQ, but also the amazing Breakfast Bar perfect to take in the sunrise or, our favorite, the Sunset Bar which provides perhaps the best view of the sunset over Catalina in all the land. Indeed, we would put a view of the sunset from the Water Tower, up against any other on the planet ‚Äì it is that spectacular.

Of course, we do not expect you to spend all of your beach vacation indoors so we have provided beach cruisers, stand up paddleboards, body boards and an array of beach toys. While you are less than 50 yards from the beach, we also provide a wagon so you can pack your toys for an easy jaunt to one of the best beaches on could ever hope to enjoy."]

Title: The old mill, Chinon
Description:
['About this space', 'Old mill (walnut oil) restored by combining the modern with the charm of stone.
This 27m2 house is located in the upper part of Chinon, not far from the royal fortress. Located 1.3km from the city centre (25min walk, free lift)', 'The space', "The space
The accommodation consists of an equipped kitchen (oven, stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, dolce gusto coffee maker, coffee, tea and basic condiments for cooking are available on site), living room with sofa bed and TV.
In the bathroom, you will have access to a washing machine.
The bedroom is on a mezzanine level (accessed by a ladder) and has a double bed. Bed linen as well as sheets are provided.
The old mill has private parking as well as a terrace with barbecue for sunny days.
The accommodation can accommodate 2 people.

The cleaning is not included in the price, you will have on site all the necessities to leave the accommodation in the same condition as when you arrived. If you don't want to do this, you can book a cleaning service in advance for ‚Ç¨50.", '', 'Guest access

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M4
Description:
['About this space', 'Leafy Greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends. It is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind. We work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature. That is why the cob houses are the right choice for us. Not only the buildings are eco-friendly but also the garden is organic. Visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment. It is a perfect place to getaway!!', 'The space', "The space
This clay house was built for meditation course and It was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple. The house is 35 square meter with essential facilities. It might be considered as a tiny house, yet it‚Äôs comfortable for 3 people living together. It got 2 stories:-2 futons on upper area and 1 bed on the ground floor. The entire of the house was made by clay (earth), it is not only eco-friendly building but also good for our health. We believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earth, this means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out. It is very special house for us, too special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone. Hope you would love it like we do.

DO NOT CLICK ON THE AIRBNB LINK FOR DIRECTIONS
Please only use our provided location to get here, otherwise, you might end up to other places.

PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR PLACE SURROUNDED BY NATURE
Our place is full of flowers and trees, you might see part of nature like birds, crickets, frogs, lizards, butterflies, bugs and insects in our garden, don't worry, they are harmless. However, if you are afraid of these creatures, our place might not suit you. We do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect net, please keep it close every time during stay.

Please note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet reception, so the internet might get slow sometime.

Please note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr. However, you would do our best to help you out. To check-in, it is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrive.

We have cat in our property. If you are allergic to cat or do not like them, our place might not a good fit for you.

If more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the room, additional fee and penalty will be charged.(Children over 3 years old is also count as 1 person).

No commercial photography shoots allowed", '', '']

Title: golf, relaxation, jacuzzi, sauna
Description:
['About this space', 'The villa is located in the picturesque Drahan hillside. It is located at the golf course in Roots. Your mission is to ensure guests are comfortable during their stay. The villa has three bedrooms, a spacious living room and three bathrooms. In the atrium of the villa there is a private whirlpool bath for 4 people. You can also enjoy a private Finnish sauna in the garden of the villa.
The modern interiors and sommelier hand-picked wines are guaranteed to capture you. For an additional fee, you can order breakfast at a villa or a full body massage.', 'The space', "The space
A private whirlpool bath will be at your disposal. The interior design equipment combined with French natural cosmetics L'Occitane will ensure that you will be pampered from the very first moment. Would you like a glass of good wine? Then you chose the right one ‚Äì equipped wine cellar is a matter of course. Villas are non-smoking and comfortably accommodate six people in each villa. Pets can also be taken with you for a fee.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The whole villa will be at your disposal.']

Title: Ecodomes Double 1
Description:
['About this space', 'Open in 2020 after two years of construction, Ecodomes are the last addition to the gardens of Villa Morocco. Built with the utmost respect for sustainability, the eleven elegant rooms are a unique and innovative example of hospitality. Each eco-mome gives a sense of serenity and tranquility to its local.', 'The space', 'The space
A wedding of cultures
When Cornelia Hendry and Abderrahim Ezzaher met, thirty-eight years ago, it was, beyond a love at first sight, a meeting of two disparate cultures. Cornelia learns about Morocco, as well as the Maghreb through the eyes of Abderrahim, who introduced her to the mores, customs, and history of her home country.
It was during a vacation in the small port city of Essaouira that the former cooking teacher and the former engineering engineer decided to build their lives in Morocco. A change in every way as they both started into a new career where they knew nothing yet: that of hoteliers.
Open in 2020 after two years of construction, Ecodomes are the last addition to the gardens of Villa Morocco. Built with the utmost respect for sustainability, the eleven elegant rooms are a unique and innovative example of hospitality. Each eco-mome gives a sense of serenity and tranquility to its local.



Based on a sustainable architecture model, ecodomes are built from local materials, using only what one can find in the Essaouira region. The round buildings are naturally anti-seismic and autonomous energy. Each room is an individual eco-modome, ensuring the privacy of each of our guests.']

Title: Glass House & SPA - DCA Certified -
Description:
['About this space', 'A glass house located on a beautiful hill in the heart of Monferrato (UNESCO World Heritage Site), Glass House offers an incredible 360 view, a bedroom full of comfort, an elegant living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a Tuscan marble bathroom, Sauna and Hammam.
It is equipped with state-of-the-art home automation technology, fireplace, TV etc.
Nearby: excellent restaurants, 36 hole golf, horses and excellent cellars.
Staying at Glass House 7* is truly a unique experience!', 'The space', 'The space
The only Glass House in Italy. Great comfort, security and privacy, surrounded by nature. A truly unique experience in Italy. Perfect for a couple for a birthday, anniversary, special moment, honeymoon, wedding night, etc.
Thanks to its magical panorama, the Glass House is perfect for romantic weekends, for the first wedding night, to celebrate an anniversary, for a company award, as a gift for a special birthday, or simply to live an unforgettable experience. The Glass House is DCA certified and received the award for best Bio Spa in Italy in 2021.']

Title: Ocotillos Village A-Frame | Stargazer Lyra
Description:
['About this space', "Ocotillos Village is a truly unique camping experience located right in the heart of Terlingua. Our A-frame wooden tents are equipped with a door and ceiling made of plexiglass that allows you to stargaze at night and see incredible views of the Chisos mountains in the day! Best sunrise you'll see!", 'The space', 'The space
This is a great stay to enjoy a comfortable night under the stars. The view is absolutely incredible! This is a wooden A-frame structure, with a roof made of plexiglass to stargaze in comfort at night. The wall facing the mountains (which includes the door), is all made of plexiglass as well, for an amazing view of the mountains.

Please note: Make sure you bring what you need. We do not provide linens or bedding for your stay - please bring your own.

IMPORTANT: This Stargazer is further from the bathhouse than some of our other Stargazers. The distance from the Stargazer to the bathhouse is about 300 feet. You are more than welcome to drive down to the bathhouse and use the parking lot near there if needed. This Stargazer is closer to the street than our other Stargazers so there could be more road noise.

There is wifi on the property, but it can be spotty in the Stargazer.

The space includes:
Queen mattress with mattress protector (no linens/bedding), electricity, mini split AC/heat unit, mini-fridge, single k-cup coffee maker, k-cups (no mugs or water), rug, LED lights, fire pit, shared bath house with hot showers (2 indoor and 1 outdoor) and 4 flushing toilets.

The space does NOT include:
Pillows, bed linens, towels, coffee mugs, chairs, flashlights, food, soaps, cooking supplies, cleaning supplies.

There is no lock on the inside of the Stargazer, but has a rope latch from the outside and inside to close it.', '', '', '', '']

Title: The Silos at Prairie Vale- lil Silo on the Prairie
Description:
['About this space', 'Come experience TINY HOME living SILO STYLE on a family owned Missouri farm... complete with Nigerian Dwarf goats, miniature donkey, chickens, and more.
The Silos at Prairie Vale are between Sedalia, Missouri and the little town of Green Ridge, Missouri. The farm is only about 12 miles from the Missouri State Fairgrounds in Sedalia and 2 1/2 miles on paved road from the Katy Trail.', 'The space', 'The space
The silo apartment has a full kitchen with a refrigerator, microwave, stove, and some utensils/ pans. There is a kuerig coffee maker along with a selection of coffee, tea, or other beverage pods for you to enjoy. The silo has its own onsite bathroom with a shower, linens, and hairdryer for guests to use. There is a double bed in the loft and a futon that expands into a second double bed on the lower level. The silo will comfortably sleep four people. Please use caution as you ascend and descend the staircase. It was made to fit the space available and the steps have varying widths.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
Guest check-in is flexible. The silo will be open and ready for registered guests on their arrival. We live on the farm and are only a few yards away. Please do not hesitate to call on us for anything that you might need. We would love to visit with you. You are welcome to come to the farm house. Wendy LOVES tea, so we have a coffee and tea bar in the kitchen. Wendy has every flavor of tea imaginable and she is always brewing a pot (coffee is available too) for anybody who wants to share one with her. We have a large library of movies for guests to borrow. Guests are welcome to sit on the patio or on the big wrap around porch and play with our outdoor farm cats (they are VERY FRIENDLY!)
We have several bikes that Katy Trail riders can rent for the day. We also have fishing poles that can be borrowed if fishing in the pond sounds fun. There is a fire pit by the pond that guests can use. We have roasting forks that can be borrowed...and probably the makings for smores...if our youngest daughter hasn't eaten all the Graham crackers."]

Title: StarsBOX in the Alpi Marittime Natural Park
Description:
['About this space', 'The StarsBOX¬Æ is located on the shores of Lago delle Portette at an altitude of 2388 meters, in the heart of the Maritime Alps Natural Park. The access path starts at Terme di Valdieri, and it takes about 3 hours to reach the StarsBOX¬Æ. Once you reach the E. Questa mountain refuge, you will be welcomed by the Host Marco who will show you the way to reach your StarsBOX¬Æ, just a few minutes away. The shelter near the StarsBOX¬Æ offers a kitchen and access to services.', 'The space', 'The space
StarsBOX¬Æ strives to embody a lighter and more conscious way of experiencing nature, thanks to its immersive design. StarsBOX¬Æ is more than just a shelter: it combines the concept of home with travel and represents a box of dreams, where you can admire the stars and experience a fresh new dawn. Part tent and part hut, it offers shelter but can open to the sky to reveal all the beauty nature has to offer.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
From the parking lot of Terme di Valdieri an hour-long hike along a dirt road leads to the Rifugio Valasco, once a hunting fort of the kings of Italy. From here the road continues as a mule track up to an altitude of about 2000 meters where, at a larch tree, a path branches off to the left and leads to the E. Questa mountain refuge. The walk from the parking lot of Terme di Valdieri takes about 3 hours in total.

From the larch tree it is also possible to continue on the mule track and reach the refuge with a less steep but longer path passing by the lower lake of Valscura; the walking time is about one hour longer.', '', 'Other things to note
Mountain trails can be difficult for inexperienced hikers. Be sure to take a look at the trail before you begin your adventure and bring a printed map, as cell phones may not work.']

Title: Seaside getaway in √ñ√∂d mirror house
Description:
['About this space', '√ñ√∂d house is an ideal getaway for couples. Very isolated location with sea view creates a special kind of vibe. Great hiking trails or option to go horseback riding nearby offer plenty of opportunities for enjoying the scenic outdoors.

We are located an hour car drive away from Tallinn, in a tiny seaside village called Alliklepa on the North coast of Estonia. Here you will find an ideal mix of lush forests with plenty of hiking trails or seaside with sandy beaches ideal for swimming.', 'The space', 'The space
√ñ√∂d mirror house is one of the most unique experiences you can imagine for being one with nature while at the same time enjoying all the comforts of a tiny cabin. The 18 m2 house has full glass windows on three sides, giving you a panoramic view to the surrounding nature straight from bed. The house has a comfy bed for two, a fireplace, remotely controlled floor and air heating systems, water toilet, a shower. Fully equipped tiny kitchen with refrigerator and a stove for cooking gives you the perfect opportunity to spend undisturbed time here without leaving to the city for days.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Make sure you have enough food and drinks to fully enjoy your stay as the closest shop is 20min drive away. Tap water is perfectly drinkable.']
