Title: Spend Ski Season at Sypes Canyon Adventures Silo 2
Description:
['About this space', 'Welcome to the Sypes Canyon Silos! This listing is for silo #2 on the right side. Located just 5 miles from downtown Bozeman, 8 miles from Bozeman/Yellowstone Airport, and 2 miles to the conveniences of Target, Costco, and other big box stores, the Silos exude the quiet of the country life. Nestled at the base of a ridge in the Bridger foothills, you have easy access to both Bozeman and the great outdoors.

Bridger Bowl-18mi
Big Sky-48mi
Yellowstone-90mi', 'The space', "The space
What's more unique than sleeping in a former grain silo? Cozy and eclectic, this unit has all the comforts and conveniences you need to enjoy your time in Bozeman. Wifi, Smart TV, full kitchen, washer/dryer. Please note that there is a short ladder to access the bedroom/loft space (imagine a 5 rung stair/ladder hybrid).

The silo on the left can be combined with this one.", '', 'Guest access
Full unit and patio, hiking trails on 42 acre property, fire pit, visit with the animals!', '', 'Other things to note
Please keep in mind that all beds are in the same space: 1 queen, 1 full size sofa sleeper, and 1 floor mattress that is actually a foam floor chair that flips into a single bed. Also, the ceiling height in the bedroom is much lower near the walls. Please mind your head!']

Title: Quirky land boat close to the beach with donkeys!
Description:
['About this space', 'Nesbitt is a land boat set in its own private garden, overlooked by 3 donkeys. She has electricity, full cooking, toilet and showering facilities on board, albeit all quite compact!
Ideally suited for a couple or small family.
A peaceful and quite getaway surrounded by animals, trees & farmland just 10 mins drive from Kinsale and 5 mins from some fantastic beaches. An ideal base for exploring the south of Ireland. Somewhere quirky and different. Great for little ( & big) imaginations.', 'The space', 'The space
Nesbit is a 37ft land based boat. She was destined for the scrap heap but we completely transformed her over an 18 month period. Almost everything in her has been recycled. She is bright, cosy and a funky little place to stay to enjoy the beautiful local countryside. She has full self-catering facilities. There is a bedroom with a triangular shaped double bed, a galley kitchen with sink, hob, grill, microwave, kettle, toaster, and small fridge. The living space has a comfortable seating area with a table that converts to a single bed suitable for an adult. Also on board is a bijou bathroom/wetroom with toilet, wash hand basin and electric shower.
The living space is all on one level. There is electric heating in the boat so it is suitable for winter living. There is a big private garden area with the boat with a picnic bench and sand pit.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The boat with its own private garden overlooked by donkeys
and the occasional cow. There is an electric fence between the boat garden and donkey field and we would ask guests not to enter the field with the donkeys.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Nesbitt is available on a self catering basis only.
The table in the seating area converts to make a single bed.
The ceilings in parts of the boat are a little low.
A travel cot is also available if you need one.
We are happy to accept a small to medium sized dog in the boat but we would be grateful if they did not sleep on the furniture and are kept on a lead at all times as we have donkeys, cattle and free roaming hens in close proximity.']

Title: Beachfront retreat with a private hot tub, WiFi, AC, shared pool & lagoon views!
Description:
['About this space', ' ', 'The space', "The space
*Gold Standard Certified

Make your Belize getaway truly unforgettable when you stay at this unique Placencia vacation rental. Situated right on the lagoon and 50 yards from the beach, and boasting upscale amenities, including a shared pool, this vacation rental is perfect for a couple, small family, or a solo traveller.

The newly constructed Swan Villas complex sits within a mile of fantastic restaurants like Maya Beach Bistro and a supermarket for home cooking. It's about seven miles from Placencia Village, where you'll find more restaurants, bars, and grocery stores. Spend an afternoon lounging by the pool before putting on your snorkel gear and getting into the ocean.

This villa's intriguing organic architectural style is sure to delight you and your loved one. It's designed to mimic the harmony between nature and humanity. The open-concept kitchen is well equipped for cooking, so you can easily put together a romantic dinner for two. This home also has a private washer/dryer and hot tub. There's a half bathroom on this floor; head upstairs to find the bedroom and the breathtaking naturalistic shower. If you're travelling with another group of travellers, please be aware that you can rent several suites within the Swan Villas together.

The romantic Belize getaway of your dreams starts with this exquisite one-bedroom vacation rental. Make your reservation today!

*The twin bed is not a mattress but a foldable cushion meant for children.

*Please note that the property has a security guard at night and security cameras at the common areas in the property.

Parking Notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. There is a parking lot in the property, about 30 yards from this unit.

Dock Details: Shared floating dock at the property

No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval."]

Title: Striking contemporary by Andrew Geller
Description:
['About this space', 'The Antler House

Striking contemporary by Andrew Geller

3BR/2BA w/ large outdoor entertaining deck, great room, one-of-a-kind vacation experience

Designed and built by famed architect, Andrew Geller, in 1968, the Antler House was fully restored and updated in 2019 and has been featured in Dwell Magazine (Nov/Dec 2019), DesignBoom, Archinect, Curbed, etc.. The home also won an AIA Honor Award for restoration in 2020. The house has never been offered for rent and is a true gem for lovers of midcentury modern architecture and design. You can expect a 'one of a kind' vacation experience in this internationally recognized architectural masterpiece with impeccable interior design including designer finishes, period correct details, and . The way the Hamptons was supposed to be with a focus on escapism, back to nature and total privacy. The home is like living in your own Wes Anderson movie with it's whimsical, adventurous, even wild spirit. It is one of a handful of Andrew Geller houses that still exist in the Hamptons and one of a few that have been restored to better than new condition. The Antler House is a 3-story, 3-bed, and 2-bath with a large outdoor entertaining deck. An 'upside down' house with two bedrooms on the first floor, a great room and entertaining deck up on the second story and surrounded by a forest canopy, and a private 3rd story loft bedroom up above the tree tops. Just a few blocks from the beach, but nestled in a woodsy forest, the home is the best of both worlds - a modernist beach house and a cozy cabin. Set on a very private 1.1 acre lot on the Amagansett/East Hampton border of Historic Springs it's an easy drive or Uber to all the best hotspots and just down the street from the famous Springs General Store as well as kid-friendly and picturesque Louse Point beach.

Rental ID: #20 - 879

This property has a max occupancy of 6

Bedrooms

Bedroom 1: One Queen Bed, First Floor/Main Floor, Air Conditioning, Ensuite Bathroom, Closet, Balcony/Deck

Bedroom 2: One Queen Bed, First Floor/Main Floor, Air Conditioning, Closet, Balcony/Deck

Loft Bedroom: One Queen Bed, 3rd Floor, Air Conditioning

Bathrooms

Bathroom 1: Full Bath, First Floor/Main Floor, Ensuite, Handicap Accessible, Shower

Bathroom 2: Full Bath, First Floor/Main Floor, Shower, Tub

Outdoors
Deck/Patio, Lounge Chairs (4 Chairs), Patio Furniture (Table, Chairs, Umbrella), Grill (Gas), Beach Chairs (2 Chairs), Beach Umbrella, Beach Toys, Cooler, Paddle Board, Fire Pit (Wood), Balcony, Bicycle (4 Adult Bikes)

Amenities
Bed Linens, Bath Towels, Pool/Beach Towels, Hair Dryer, Washer, Dryer, Air Conditioning, Heating, Hot Water, Wood Stove, Kitchen, Stove, Oven, Refrigerator, Coffee (Pot), Toaster, Blender, Dishes and Silverware, Pots and Pans, Living Room, Internet (Wifi), Television, Smart TV, Speaker System (Bluetooth Speaker, Sonos, Stereo), Private Entrance, Parking (4 Cars In Driveway), Carbon Monoxide Detector, Smoke Detector, Fire Extinguisher, Dishwasher

Special Features
Andrew Geller was one of the premiere midcentury architects remembered most of all for his playful beach houses in the Hamptons. This home, the Antler House, is one of his most published and celebrated homes, including recent articles in Architectural Digest, Dwell, Archinect, etc.. Staying in this home is a once-in-a-lifetime vacation experience. Private and protected by the surrounding oak forest, yet just blocks from Louse Point beach, it is the best of both worlds - a woodsy cabin and a stylish beach house. During summer, the giant oaks create a cocoon for the property, hiding it away from the rest of the world. Set equidistant between Amagansett and East Hampton, the private yet close to town(s) location gives you all the best summer options without having to deal with traffic on Montauk Highway. Even during the peak of summer, Montauk is just a short 15 minute drive through backroads. It's a perfect getaway for couples or families who value midcentury architecture and decor, as well as those who like to entertain on the large outdoor deck with dining, bbq, and stunning treetop views. The property is child safe with two bedrooms on the ground floor and no pool. A full ground up restoration was completed in 2019 including adding all modern conveniences including HVAC, heated bathroom floors, and a full cinematic experience with a 120" movie screen and 4k laser projector.

Location

Nearby Beaches:
Louse Point is within walking distance or an easy bike ride.

Nearby Grocery Stores:
Springs General Store and Old Stone Market are both within an easy bike ride.

Nearby Restaurants and Bars:
Amagansett main street and East Hampton are both less than 3 miles away.

Other Location Information:
On the border of Amagansett and East Hampton and a short walk from Springs Historic District.

Other FAQ‚Äôs

Backyard Fenced In: No

Estimated Square Footage: 1,500

Suitability: Not suitable for multiple families, unrelated guests, and persons with disabilities.
Primary renter must be at least 30 years old.

Pet Policy: Pets are strictly prohibited at this property.

Utility Disclaimer:
Normal usage of the following utilities is included in the total reservation amount:
Pool Heating (if applicable), Pool/Hot-Tub Maintenance (if applicable), Heating Oil/Propane/Natural Gas, Electricity, Cable/TV/Internet/Phone, and Garbage Removal

If the cost of utilities exceeds $40.00/night, guest will be responsible for the difference. Cleanings during a guest's stay and pay-per-view orders are not included in the cost of utilities.

Cleaning Disclaimer: All reservations longer than one week must be professionally cleaned once per week, the cost of which is borne by the guest. For clarity purposes, the cost of in-stay cleanings are separate and above the fees collected at the time of booking.

Additional Persons: No additional persons beyond the max occupancy of this listing are permitted.

Events Policy: Events are prohibited

Off-Season Disclaimer: It is typical that spring cleanings and updates do not take place until late April / early May. If your booking falls outside of Memorial Day to Labor Day, please inquire as to whether or not outdoor furniture and equipment will be available for use prior to booking.

StayProtected Insurance: Property damage insurance is procured for your reservation for this property. It is supplemental to, not a replacement to, any security deposit collected.

The guest experience for this property is managed by StayMarquis, a local vacation rental management company. By booking this property, you will receive a dedicated ‚ÄúGuest Experience Manager‚Äù who can help facilitate any request, from grocery shopping to organizing a private chef. You will also have access to 24/7 support that can assist with any question that might arise during your stay. It is important to note that any maintenance tasks are performed by the owner of this property.', 'The space', 'The space

Title: TAMANCO TUBISMO
Description:
['About this space', 'Sleep in the round, wake up with songbirds and sunshine in our Tubismo Tube. We transformed eight reclaimed, concrete tubes into cosy rooms with a view. Plunge into our saltwater pool, escape to our garden-like campground and embrace the fresh air and a great night‚Äôs sleep under a starry night sky. Wether you are seeking refuge, looking to meet other travelers or hang out with friends: we have the right vibe for you!', 'The space', 'The space
Tamanco is a campground hostel in the green heart of the Costa da Prata, between Porto and Lisbon. A unique base to explore the center of Portugal. Visit the many special monuments and places in the region, browse local markets, discover Portuguese cuisine and drink ‚Äòum caf√©zinho‚Äô in one of the many pastelarias. Go hiking in pristine green or along the secluded beaches or endless sand dunes that stretch from Figueira de Foz to Nazar√©, which with the highest waves in the world, can rightfully be called the mecca for surf enthusiasts.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
A Cantina Caf√© & Eatery: a meeting point for everyone!
We serve 'home made comfort food at ‚ÄòA Cantina‚Äô, our onsite caf√© and eatery. You can also check out our ‚Äòmake your own pizza nights‚Äô, or join in for our ‚Äòfree soup for everyone‚Äô evenings. Fancy just a drink at the fireplace? You are more than welcome.

Tamanco Tubismo comforts :
- Pick up service for travelers by train
- Communal outdoor kitchen with BBQ
- Saltwater pool
- Wi-Fi
- Laundry service
- Bread delivery
- Books and boardgames
- Farm grown fruits and vegetables for sale

Title: A Unique Spring Retreat near the Beach
Description:
['About this space', 'Spring is a magical time to visit the Outer Banks!

Relax, enjoy the beach and the quiet at the unique Retro Round House. An all inclusive beach experience.

A perfect place to escape for a romantic getaway or to spend fun time with friends and family. Located only 100 yards from the beach path!

Your stay includes use of 2 beach bikes, 2 kayaks, a surf board, 4 skim boards, beach cart and cooler, and beach chairs. Everything you need to enjoy your vacation. Almost Home!', 'The space', "The space
During Peak Season: CHECK-IN ON FRIDAY and avoid the typical change-over traffic in the Outer Banks! The Retro Round House is just a 2.5 hour drive from the D.C. area.

This is the perfect space for a family or 3 couples to enjoy time together. The 3 bedroom 2 bathroom beach house is cozy, about 850 square feet, but very well laid out for maximum family fun and interaction. However, this little Round House is limited to 6 people!

The Round House is a place to relax! Yet, if you need to work, we have reliable/highspeed WIFI for your use. Yes, you can get away from it all and stay connected at the same time.

You will find the open floor plan fun, inviting and incredibly comfortable.

THE KITCHEN

The fully stocked kitchen features a large family dinning area with banquet seating.

~Propane Stove/Oven
~Dishwasher
~SMEG Drip Coffee Maker
~Tea Kettle
~Coffee, tea, sugar, cream
~Coffee Bean Grinder
~Microwave
~Toaster
~All Clad Pans
~Crock Pot
~Mixing Bowls
~Roasting Pans
~Cutting Boards
~Charcuterie Board
~Wooden Spoons, Tongs etc
~Blender
~Salt, Pepper, Common Spices, Olive Oil
~Dishtowels
~Pot Holders
~Paper Towels
~Dish Soap
~Dishwasher Soap
~Washing Machine and Dryer
~Washing Machine Soap
~Sponges
~Garbage Bags

The comfy living space features an electric fireplace, turntable and a large screen Art TV. We also supply games, books and video arcade table!

OUTDOOR SCENE

Outside, we created wonderful seating areas so you can enjoy time listening the waves, gazing at the stars and enjoying the sun and the fresh air!

~Large screened in porch featuring hanging chairs a dining table and bar area.
~A deck featuring 2 Hatteras Hammock Rocking chairs, a high top table with 2 chairs.
~Lower deck with unique built in Hammock for star gazing!
~Large yard for outdoor games. Corn Hole Supplied!
~Big Green Egg Grill charcoal supplied.
~Gas Grill
~Gas Fire Tower to keep you warm on cool nights
~Out Door Shower for 2
~Outdoor sink, fridge and fish cleaning station.

TOY CLOSET
~2 Beach Bikes
~2 Kayaks
~9'10 Soft Top Surf Board
~2 Boogie Boards
~4 Skim Boards
~6 Beach Chairs
~Cooler
~Big Tire Beach Wagon
~2 Shade Tents
~Kites
~Corn Hole
~Sand Toys

LOCATION

We are located in the town of Salvo, NC in the Outer Banks. This is a quiet beach community where you will find some of the most beautiful beaches and scenery in the world. The Round House is located only 100 yards from the beach access path. A short easy walk.

PETS

We love dogs and can host one dog. There will be a $100 pet fee. Unfortunately, we cannot allow cats because of a severe family allergy.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The Round House is located in an ideal neighborhood setting. Kids can safely ride their bikes, skateboards or scooters and you can take a nice jog around our sleepy two mile loop.

Also, Salvo has a wonderful walking/bike path so your can ride bikes to the day use area or to one of several wonderful local restaurants.

As for the BEACH....We are only 100 yards from the beach path on the ocean side of the street. No roads to cross. You can hear the waves from our deck!', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
1. Hurricanes are a possibility. Please understand this when you book your vacation rental. We do not provide refunds due to Hurricane evacuation. However, we will work with you by providing mid-season complimentary days to match days missed if an evacuation occurs.

2. We suggest paying for your reservation with an American Express Card. Several American Express Cards will cover the cost of your trip should a Hurricane evacuation become necessary.

3. We do allow dogs with a 100 dollar pet fee. Unfortunately, we cannot allow cats because of a family allergy.

4. The Round House does require climbing steps. As is true of most beach homes in the area, the house sits on pilings.

5. The Wifi in the Round House is suitable for remote work to include Zoom calls.']

Title: Yome Away from Home
Description:
['About this space', 'Come experience glamping at its finest in our beautiful yome! (FYI, glamping is still camping, just a little more comfy!) Locally made, a yome is a yurt/geodesic dome hybrid. You‚Äôll love the ultra comfortable queen mattress, mini kitchen, dining area and the warmth of the propane heater*! Enjoy all the comforts of home plus the adventure of camping. Nestled in the woods, yet only 10 minutes from downtown Weaverville, 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 20 minutes from Asheville.', 'The space', 'The space
Embrace glamping to the fullest! Our yome is off-grid: no WiFi, no electricity, no running water and spotty cell service. Instead, we have battery-powered LED lights, solar lights and candles, providing mood lighting - if you need bright lights, I suggest bringing a lantern - a solar shower with privacy enclosure and a very clean porta-John for your use.

There is a small grill that is BYOB - bring your own briquets :) (and lighter fluid). I do provide tongs.

The mini-kitchen consists of a 2-burner propane stove (with propane), frying pan, tea kettle, French press, cooking utensils, dishes/silverware, grater, peeler, wine key, organic coffee, organic olive oil, sugar, creamer, salt & pepper.

The driveway is not very long, but it is gravel, steep in places and can be very bumpy! Careful if your car is low to the ground! Any car will be able to make it - we have a Jetta and a Camry in our family - but those with AWD/4WD will certainly have an easier time.

We have two dogs that have free reign of our property, including at night. While they fancy themselves watchdogs - and are sure to cause a ruckus when they first meet you - they are the biggest sweethearts and nothing to be afraid of! Nellie is the small one and Maisie is the larger.

Our house is visible from the yome, however, there is much more distance - about 150 feet - than you would find between sites in a campground. Or a neighborhood!

Please keep in mind that because this is a tent, you will be more subject to the elements/nature that you would be in a conditioned space. So, check the weather before you come and dress/pack accordingly! Expect bugs, spiders, etc... Despite the fact that I remove all of them each time I prepare the yome for a guest, some will inevitably find their way back in.

*The propane heater is provided October-March. Includes (1) 1lb canister of propane per night of stay.', '', '']

Title: Otter Landing on Santa Fe River, 13 private acres
Description: ['About this space', 'Spend all the time you want at home in Nature relaxing or recreating. This unique treehouse home is set high up in the trees and on 13 acres of natural habitat on the banks of the Santa Fe River. The Santa Fe has so much wildlife, and we are near the famous crystalline Ichetucknee River and miles of public trails. We share our kayaks, a canoe, and many amenities for your stay. So go for a solo paddle, join local guide trips to various springs, or hike on the property and at nearby parks.', 'The space', "The space\nThe property is an amazing 13 acres located on 1000' of waterfront on the wildlife-rich Santa Fe River. The forest includes many big old trees on both floodplain and bluff habitats, offering great opportunities for serious or casual bird-watchers and botanists. We are only about 2 miles upstream of the mouth of the Ichetucknee River and we are less than a mile from 1600 acres of Wilderness Public Land for Wildlife. There are about 4.5 miles of hiking trails just a short walk from property. Much of the river frontage is located on an island that you are free to wander. At times our island‚Äôs bridge can be under water during high water floods, so do ask about conditions. Though some guests love to canoe through the trees at high water! Otter Landing's Round House is always dry. You have access to free kayaks and a canoe from property. Free Coffee K-Cups for all guests. Don‚Äôt forget to bring your firewood for the awesome fire pit.", '', "Guest access\nVery safe neighborhood of family homes. We will send instructions for entry via lockbox after reservation is confirmed. Plenty of parking for your own car and boat should you choose to bring. No RV's or camping, please, with due respect to the neighbors.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note']

Title: Boatel
Description:
['About this space', 'Be under no illusion this is like camping under a wooden roof! Not glamping or an hotel.
Boatel guests share the boat roofed shed with other guests and residents and no one has exclusivity on this structure.
The boat is old and dusty with the occasional spider, an unusual and quirky experience!!
The views are stunning. Sorry no dogs but there are two friendly dogs that live here. And cats and ex caged chickens.', '', 'The space
Set in an acre of wild flowers and up a mountain in the beautiful Dyfi Valley Biosphere the Boatel is literally a bed in a boat! Not to mention a beautiful open plan cooking and living space ‚Äì all in a shed AKA the Boat Roofed Shed. Recognised for its amazing and unique qualities, it even won the infamous Cuprinol‚Äôs Shed of the Year in 2013. It‚Äôs our absolute pride and joy and we love sharing it with our guests!
We‚Äôve hosted comedy festivals, exclusive concerts and curious tourists in our little mountain hideaway and Alex (aka DJ Badly) uses it to prepare his sets for festivals such as Glastonbury.
We built the shed in 2012 using recycled materials and it was our first major project. Alex is normally a rubbish DIY person, so designing and building the whole thing ourselves was a great achievement and we couldn‚Äôt have been happier to win both the ‚ÄòShed of the Year‚Äô Unique Category and the Overall category in 2013.
From the shed you can see across Cader Idris (part of the Cambrian Mountains of Snowdonia). It‚Äôs so beautiful even in the maddest of weathers, you can close the door, light the candles, pop some kindling in the wood burner and be snug and warm in moments.
Our guests all love staying in the Boatel - they love the peace, the location, the structure, the ambience, and the curios (Alex is a big collector and has been on Antiques Roadshow with his Poole Pottery collection!). As well as the relentless throwing of Frisbees for the dogs!
We supply all bedding but do not supply towels or breakfast.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Eco-Lush Mayan Dome in Family  Jungle Place
Description:
['About this space', 'Nested in between the Mayan Jungle and the crystalline waters of Soliman Bay beach and 10 mins driving north from the Bohemian Town of Tulum stands NahKu, surrounded by sparkly Cenotes and impressive Caves in what is known as the lower Mayan Jungle. Here we offer you your own private space in deep connection with the natural forces that surround us, plus the opportunity to embark on new adventures with private cenote visits just steps away!', 'The space', 'The space
Bienvenido!

OVERVIEW- We welcome you to our sacred space, our brand new D'OM is waiting for your presence .... Located 10 min before ariving to Tulum stands NahKu, close by to the ocean bay of Soliman Beach, over 70 cenotes and more , 4 archelogical sites near by, Akumal Bay, and many more places and sacred sited to visit without the harsh noise pollution, traffic and construction of the downtown core, this gives an enormous advantage to our place as strategically you can plan your trip around the most attractive places without losing comfort and commuting time.

Our D'Om Maya is the first of its kind, made out of an innovative and sustainable material called Aircrete you can rest assure that the energy in this dome will deliver a power and harmonious vibration for your rest and comfort. Staying in this dome goes beyond expectations as its finished with an ancient stucco finished called Chukum to insulate and keep it fresh. Our Dome has 1 Luxury Queen size bed with high quality linens and pillows, electrical outlets, running water, sink and wi-fi.


-Towels are included

Tulum is a town with great biking infrastructure, you can always move from NahKu by walking 10min to the highway and taking the "collectivo" or van and for $20 pesos you'll be in downtown in 5min.

KITCHEN- Inside your Dome you'll find a counter top with a sink

BATHROOM- Eco Outdoor toilets and showers ensure the natural efficiency and legacy of our jungle by avoiding water contamination and clearing of land for water infrastructure. Enjoy comfortable Eco-Lushy private showers.

THE DOME- The D'OM Maya is the first one of its kind in the Mayan Riviera, giving you a wonderful brand new feeling of knowing that the impact of your visit in this Natural Paradise is reduced by the type of Sustainable construction method we use .

Inspired in the Mayan culture and its legacy the D'Om was born.. from its Hand-Crafted stone work mixed with the wood of its furniture and the fine textiles from the Mayan Lands. You will feel inspired to keep exploring this Ancient Lands.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
Once you have turned from the highway to the dirt road continue till you find the fish rock, once there you'll have arrive. Park your car next to the other and follow the path to your dome. We will be here to help you.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
-There is limited amount of power and we encourage all our guest to me mindful of turning lights off when not in use, and unplug electrical devices when not in use.

-There is no hot water in the premises, be ready to enjoy a fresh water jungle shower.']

Title: La Casa Naranja
Description: ['About this space', 'Five minutes from the village, Casa Naranja offers a magnificent view over the Alto de los Migueles Valley, from the balcony in the living room. Three comfortable bedrooms, each with its private bathroom and roomy closets are sure to make the sojourn of the travelers a pleasant one. The interior garden with unusual succulent plants and fossil stones faces the social area, bathed in the colors that gave the house its name. A modern kitchen is available for those who enjoy cooking.', 'The space', 'The space\nGuests will find good books in three languages, good cuisine if they wish and a welcoming hostess who will recommend the best restaurants, the most original shops and boutiques, fun gatherings and events.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nThe entire House and garden.']

Title: Spaceship Destination!
Description:
['About this space', "726 square feet of one of a kind 1960's futuristic lodging, set down on 5 acres in the rural Hockinson hills.", 'The space', 'The space
Next to a year around creek, among trees, with hills and meadows to explore
Spaceship amenities include a wet bar(Lunar Lounge) with fridge, gamma ray microwave, and Mr. Fusion coffee maker.
Two futon sofa/full size beds with up to four cots available, bathroom with shower, TV, bluray, "Laser" disc/CD player, stereo, and WiFi, PLUS a pair of freezing tubes(for 5+ year stays).', 'Guest access', "Guest access
The Spaceship landed only about 30 feet from the hosts living quarters, and can be driven right up to it's front door entry hatch after traveling down a 1/3 of a mile private driveway.
After unloading, parking is provided via the lower deck hangar doors on the north side of the ship.", 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Friendly natives abound!
The nearest sign of civilization is only about 1 & 1/2 miles away due west, and over the hill. The Hockinson Market provides fresh made pizza, and has it's own Tap room. The Chevron Market provides fossil fuel.
Hocinson Meadows, and Alderbrook Park's are 3 & 1/2 and 2 miles away respectively.
Further afield and to the northeast, is the city of Battleground featuring restaurants, a library, antique shops, and several breweries."]

Title: Spacious Dome Architecture
Description: ['About this space', 'Main dwelling - 34 ft diameter, rustic wooden floors & 5 1/2 ft round windows over looking great views! Large kitchen, open plan space; king bed in main living area, queen bed in open loft. Retreat-writing, meditation, yoga, dancing, playing, fun! Location-location!! 4 miles to town', 'The space', "The space\nArchitecturally elegant and unique design situated with beautiful views. This was a big home that has been duplex-ed and is about 1100 square feet. It was designed for privacy, so the entry door for the other home is on the opposite side of the house from where you enter. Very peaceful and quiet - the only house on the street. I call the area 'country suburbia' with houses peppered in the neighborhood about 1/4 mile away. This is a monolithic dome which means a huge balloon was blown up and sprayed with concrete before the balloon was popped. That part of the house is 34 ft diameter with rustic wooden floors & two 5 1/2 ft round windows over looking great views & yard. (The yard is not totally secure for pet safety.) Large kitchen, very roomy open plan space; king bed/queen bed in the loft, a smart TV and selection of DVDs for your entertainment. The picture shows a ladder going to the loft but it is now a stair case. The loft has an artsy 2 1/2 foot 'picket fence' as a wall. There is sight privacy, but due to it being a half wall, there is no sound privacy. Parents note: Please look at the pictures to decide if this room is child-safe for your needs. About 2 % of folks decide it's not right for them.I imagine it should be no problem unless they are climbers when you're not looking! Please ask for details if you're unsure. This is a wonderful space for retreats, writing, meditation, yoga, dancing, playing, fun! The sister dome is about 1000 square feet - and renting both sides is excellent for smallish events/retreats. There have been a few weddings held here. Location-location!! 4 miles to town.", '', '', '', '']

Title: Loch Lomond Oval
Description:
['About this space', 'We don‚Äôt fit easily into the categories that Airbnb has, so for a clear picture, read on...
Loch Lomond Hideaways is an exclusive collection of individual getaway properties consisting of four luxury indoor/outdoor cabin rooms with sheltered decking and outdoor cooking and eating facilities. The Hideaways are dog-friendly.', 'The space', "The space
Three of the Hideaways are wooden cabins which also have a secluded private outdoor bath, while the fourth has a double sized indoor bath. All four surround a fairytale lit garden with private outdoor areas outside each one, and you‚Äôll find individual listings on Airbnb for each one for booking- click on my pic top right and select 'profile'.

The Hideaways are a short distance from Loch Lomond, and even shorter distance from the West Highland Way, the John Muir Way and the Devil‚Äôs Pulpit, so plenty of opportunity to get out and about, or to walk your dog. There is a restaurant in the village (Croftamie, a couple of hundred metres walk) and shops, restaurants and pubs in nearby Drymen (2 miles). If you‚Äôre arriving from Glasgow Airport, it‚Äôs about a 40-minute taxi ride.

Each property overlooks the garden, with its own entrance, cosy indoors and even outdoors with their own individual outdoor wood burning stoves.

The rooms have a kingsize bed (the Garden Room has a kingsize four-poster, and the others have the option of kingsize or two singles) an ensuite shower and w/c. The Garden Room has a fabulous double bath in the en-suite and the Tree House, Oval and Arch have fantasy outdoor baths.
The Tree House

* Kingsize bed or two singles
* Ensuite W/C and shower
* Private secluded outdoor bath
* Luxurious dressing gowns and towels
* Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker
* Microwave, toaster, kettle, Nespresso coffee machine, tea, coffee, hot chocolate
* Outdoor barbecue, dining table and chairs
* Outdoor wood-burning stove with cosy seating on the deck
* Blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when you‚Äôre sitting outdoors
* Breakfast of porridge, pastries, jam, butter, fresh milk, shortbread

The Oval

* Kingsize bed or two singles
* Ensuite W/C and shower
* Private secluded outdoor bath
* Luxurious dressing gowns and towels
* Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker
* Microwave, toaster, kettle, Nespresso coffee machine, tea, coffee, hot chocolate
* Outdoor barbecue, dining table and chairs
* Outdoor wood-burning stove with cosy seating on the deck
* Blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when you‚Äôre sitting outdoors
* Breakfast of porridge, pastries, jam, butter, fresh milk, shortbread

The Arch

* Kingsize bed or two singles
* Ensuite W/C and shower
* Private secluded outdoor bath
* Luxurious dressing gowns and towels
* Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker
* Microwave, toaster, kettle, Nespresso coffee machine, tea, coffee, hot chocolate
* Outdoor barbecue, dining table and chairs
* Outdoor wood-burning stove with cosy seating on the deck
* Blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when you‚Äôre sitting outdoors
* Breakfast of porridge, pastries, jam, butter, fresh milk, shortbread

The Garden Room

* Kingsize four-poster bed
* Ensuite W/C and shower
* Ensuite double bath
* Luxurious dressing gowns and towels
* Television
* Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker
* Microwave, toaster, kettle, Nespresso coffee machine, tea, coffee, hot chocolate
* Outdoor barbecue, dining table and chairs
* Outdoor wood-burning stove with cosy seating on the deck
* Blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when you‚Äôre sitting outdoors
* Breakfast of porridge, pastries, jam, butter, fresh milk, shortbread

The Store

* Not accommodation, this houses all the essentials like milk, dishes, cutlery, extra tea and coffee, etc. You can buy soft drinks, crisps and sweets, and occasional souvenirs. The recycling is here, and there‚Äôs a collection point for your used dishes. You‚Äôll also find information about the surrounding area here.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Your parking is beside the main house (The Witches Hat) and signed Loch Lomond Hideaways Car Park. The house is on the outskirts of the village of Croftamie, just a short walk away, and a couple of minutes drive from the larger village of Drymen, with shops, traditional pubs, restaurants, etc. Loch Lomond is a further short drive to Balmaha on the east shore or Balloch on the south west. And we are only 45 minutes by car from Glasgow city centre or Glasgow International Airport.']

Title: Glamping-Sky Dome Yurt-Tiny House-2 by Lavenders
Description:
['About this space', 'This is our second tiny house concept- Yurt! Glamping!

We're in a gated community close to everything! Guests have been enjoying the view! The sunsets! The stars! The Ocean breeze! The off-grid feeling!

If you are thinking about buying a Yurt, try ours out. You will enjoy the entire yurt by our baby lavender fields with a covered patio, "outdoor shower" (it's really insides), and a modern compost toilet in the attached restroom right by the door.

The Yurt is built in wonderful 2020~ New&Fun', '', "The space
Our Yurt is a 294 sqft comfortable room with a queen-size memory foam bed, a sofa bed, a kitchenette, portable AC/heater unit and etc. It's linked to the 200+ sqft patio and the attached restroom right by the door.

It's about a 100 ft walk from the parking spot to the yurt on the boardwalk.

If you need an extra bed for the 4th guest, we can provide a folding camping bed.", '', '', '', '']

Title: Rondavous Land Yacht - Tin Valley Retro Rentals
Description:
['About this space', 'Tin Valley‚Äôs first ‚ÄúClothing Optional‚Äù campsite! No need to worry about tan lines. PET FRIENDLY!
Tin Valley Retro Rentals was featured on Nat Geo‚Äôs documentary show ‚ÄúBadlands, Texas, and has caught the attention of travelers all over the world. 90 private acres nestled in the foothills of surrounding mountains. Perfect for stargazing! Located near Big Bend National & State Park and the Rio Grande. Families, solo travelers, couples, photographers, weddings, are all welcomed!', 'The space', 'The space
This beautiful land yacht is the newest addition to Tin Valley and the first ‚Äúclothing optional‚Äù campsite. She is now docked on her own desert island. I have the cost of the rental at a lower price due to the "work in progress"; however, I think you will be pleased. Great for families. Lots of privacy! Large fire pit, charcoal smoker/grill, and sand pit area large enough for an additional tent or two. One bedroom, with kitchen. Until we get the toilet issues worked out a composting toilet is provided outside, and a shower house/flushing toilet nearby. (approx 1000 feet away.) Solar lights all around. Propane provided for the heater, cooker, and light. Running water for sink & shower. Incredible look-out upper deck, and ramp that gives you the feel of walking onto a docked boat.

There is a $30.00 non-refundable pet fee due upon check in', '', 'Guest access
Property is:
*35 miles to Terlingua, Terlingua Ghost Town, Study Butte, and to the front entrance of Big Bend National Park.
*5 miles to the back entrance of Big Bend National Park, but high clearance and/or 4-wheel drive is needed for this route.
*4 miles to Terlingua Ranch Lodge, (available to you) which has a swimming pool, full service restaurant, shower house, and laundry facility.
*20 miles to the closest grocery store.
*35 miles to the closest gas station.', '', '']

Title: Skylight Cabin
Description:
['About this space', 'It is a cozy room with some comforts here at our Laitila home. We have built a comfy skylight dome house, perfect for camping. Visitors can also enjoy the wood burning sauna, terrace for grilling, and the firepit if you enjoy the campfire experience. There are numerous walking paths you can take if you are looking for an adventure, our property is surrounded by open fields and woods, with a swamp nearby. Only 50km from Turku downtown.', 'The space', 'The space
We are a Finnish-American couple and love our home so much. We are happy to have people from all over come visit us to experience the life here and to also learn from others.

Laitila is a quiet place about 50km from the heart of Turku. Our skylight cabin is small but at the same time spacious and very comfy. The room includes a mini fridge and microwave for quick and easy meals and a small heater in case it is cold. You will also have access to a firepit nearby the cabin where you can camp out and grill too. There is a terrace if you prefer for grilling and sitting as well on the other side of the lot by the main house. There is a wood burning sauna and shower in a seperate building, and there is a warm and clean outhouse.

Our property is set up as growing farm, Niiralan Tila. The farm was established in the summer of 2019 and we are always looking for ways to improve and expand.

Enjoy beautiful walks through the village, woods, fields and even the swamp nearby. If you do not wish to go alone, we are more than happy to join you and show you around. Depending on time of the year there are chances to gather fresh berries and mushrooms to enjoy. Much wildlife can have a chance to be seen like deer, moose, fox and perhaps even wolves. There is also lake with small beach and a pier 7 km away for swimming.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Enjoy nature in a Unique container/bamboo house
Description:
['About this space', 'A unique opportunity to discover the rural side of Northern Thailand. Live in the wilderness, amidst rice fields and far away from typical tourist sites.

Stay in an atypical property, a fusion of recycled container and bamboo. It offers you open space to enjoy the countryside of Northern Thailand, enjoy typical village food (see "The Neighbourhood" below) , meditate or work. A closed but bright compartment gives you the possibility to withdraw.

See guest‚Äôs review
https://youtu.be/-TB84DtuDsY', 'The space', 'The space
The house is located on a large piece of land, which you will have for yourself. You are free to stroll around, enjoying beautiful views on the countryside. A creek runs around the property.

*** PLEASE NOTE ***
Part of the charm of our property is its remote location and simplicity. We provide comfortable mattresses, but you are free to bring your own, or camp in the garden. All essentials (bed sheets, soap, toilet paper, pillows, towels) can be found in the house. There is no kitchen, but we provide a microwave. There is no public transport to get to the property, but we can assist with renting a motorcycle.', '', '', '', '']

Title: The Island House of the Marais de Larchant
Description:
['About this space', "The Marais de Larchant, a labyrinth of canals with a view on the medieval Saint Mathurin basilica, lies just West of the Fontainebleau forest, close to the famous bouldering spot of la Dame Jouanne. The house rented is fully independent, with 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 1 kitchen, 1 dining room and a large drawing room. It has its own linen, kitchenware and cutlery. It also has its own internet connection. We'd be happy to host you (English spoken) !", 'The space', "The space
Based on an architect's design, the house's main feature is its vaulted hall. At the heart of the marais' canals, it is perfectly quiet.
The island on which it is located will be at your disposal but the rest of the natural reserve is closed to the public.", 'Guest access', "Guest access
The entire house and the island on which it is located (surrounded by canals) is at the guests' disposal. Walks in the marsh and canals can be organised depending on availabilities.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The house is already booked on the dates of your stay ? Try the other house on the property, the Courtyard House of the Marais, also on Airbnb.

Bookings of 5 days and more will be given priority during holiday season.']

Title: Exposed Rock From Hillside In House, 5200SF, Views
Description:
['About this space', 'One of a kind 4BR 3BA 5,200 sqft home. Stunning views of the CO Ntl Mnt and entire Grand Valley. Our grandpa, a home builder, designed this rustic house as a masterpiece for his family. He wanted it to be part of nature, so he fit it between trees and inside left exposed the massive sandstone slab on which it‚Äôs built. This large house has entertained our family and friends for generations, and we‚Äôre thrilled that now you can share it with yours, too. Be in nature but minutes from downtown!', 'The space', 'The space
Our grandpa designed and built this unique home in a way that captures the rugged terrain on which it sits and compliments the stunning natural beauty of the Colorado National Monument that serves as the backdrop. He made it so every room has its own stunning view. Look closely at the photos to see the rock and wood detail throughout. The sandstone slab of the hill on which it‚Äôs built actually makes up the entire wall of the downstairs family room and the floor of the room above. Grandpa had artistic vision, creativity, and the craftsmanship to put it all together and he built this house from his heart. (He was still building furniture for us well into his 90s!). It has served as a cherished place for family gatherings, and we invite you to enjoy your vacation the way we have enjoyed this home throughout the generations. Have breakfast in the kitchen or on the giant deck, while enjoying unobstructed views of the Colorado National Monument and the way the morning sun hits the red rocks. Spend evenings by the massive fireplace watching the sun set over the Bookcliffs and the Grand Valley. During the summers you might catch a lightning storm over the grand valley as the thunder echoes off the massive canyon walls behind the house. We also have a charcoal grill so you can BBQ outside and take in the views from the deck. Take leisurely walks through the neighborhood or drive/bike to get to everything that Grand Junction has to offer. (See list below!)

See our video tour: search "House on the Rock" and "Grand Junction" on that big video platform that everyone uses (stated in a way that gets around a ban on mentioning websites here). :)

While most of the home furnishings are rustic and cozy in a way that preserves the years of fond memories, we made sure you had enough upgraded guest amenities to make your stay as comfy as can be: we just remodeled our showers, have hotel-quality linens, plush towels, and plenty of toiletries. You get to enjoy a vacation with maybe the most gorgeous views in the Grand Valley, in a house full of charmingly-old stuff spanning generations, but you still get to sleep as if you were staying in a great hotel.

Please note- we try our absolute best to keep the house clean for you and all of our future guests. For this reason, we ask that you note our rules for no pets and no groups or gatherings of over 10 people. Thanks!

Layout of the house:

Main Floor:
Kitchen (new fridge and stove)
Breakfast nook
Formal Dining Room
Living Room and Fireplace
Laundry room (washer/dryer, iron)
Bedroom 2 (queen bed)
Bedroom 3 (two twin beds, travel crib)
Bathroom with bathtub and shower

Upstairs- Entire floor is Master Suite (up a small staircase from the living room)
Master Bedroom (king bed)
Attached full bathroom with clawfoot bathtub, shower
Sewing room attached to master bedroom (full bed)

Downstairs:
Family room with built-in wet bar
Playroom/Office (full bed)
Bedroom 4 (queen bed)
Bathroom with shower

Nearby Attractions:
Colorado National Monument East Entrance (5 min drive) - close to Serpent‚Äôs Trail, Devil‚Äôs Kitchen hikes, etc.
Mountain Biking on Tabeguache trail systems which includes the "Lunch loop", "Andy's trail" and many more (5 min drive)
Redlands Mesa Golf Course (5 min drive)
Two Rivers Winery (10 min drive)
Historic Main Street with restaurants, shopping, art galleries, and summertime Farmer‚Äôs Market (15 min drive)
Powderhorn Ski Resort (50 min drive)
Take a day trip in your car to Moab, the Grand Mesa, Glenwood Springs, Aspen, Ouray...', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Entire house', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Please make yourselves at home while being respectful of this family treasure and peaceful neighborhood. No rowdy parties. If you need anything at all during your stay, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact the property manager, who lives just down the street. Also, we are listed as five bedrooms because AirBnb doesn't quite have the listing options needed for a full picture of our house. There is one bedroom off of the master bedroom that has a bed, but used to be a sewing room. It's a little smaller, and has a little less privacy than a normal bedroom. Also, the office has a bed, but we didn't list that as a bedroom. Thanks for understanding. :)"]

Title: Buff and Fellow Eco Coconut 7 (6 sleeper)
Description: ['About this space', 'The Eco Coconut is nestled on the banks of the dam overlooking the Mountains. It offers a fully equipped kitchen, living room with fireplace, dinning area with braai and a patio with wood-fired jacuzzi. 2x Ensuite rooms, 2x Outdoor showers & bath. Extra sleeper coach with separate bathroom and shower. Sleeps 6 guests.', 'The space', 'The space\nThe one of a kind design of the Eco Coconut makes it truly unique experience in South Africa. It almost feels like you inside a coconut on a tropical island beside a lake and overlooking the Outeniqua Mountains. The interior is calming and neutral with a bohemian flavour. The fully equipped kitchen with gas stove, oven, microwave, fridge and Woki Ware cutlery is the perfect place to create a family meal. Cuddle up at the fireplace or relax in the wood fired hot tub.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nThe Eco Coconut is totally private and is exclusively yours for your stay. The farm is a paradise with wildlife like Buffalos, Rhinos and other animals.']

Title: Fairytale Treehouse Turret at Santarella Gardens
Description:
['About this space', 'The newly renovated magical turret on the Santarella Estate in the Berkshires, Western Massachusetts. This unique loft with turret bedchamber offers guests a fairytale experience. The open concept living space filled with plants brings the outdoors inside and offers ample room to relax. Guests can spend the day exploring the grounds, nearby lakes, trails, and many nearby Berkshire towns.', 'The space', "The space
Enter through a second story entrance into a large open space with a sitting area with a sofa, hanging chair, television, and windows that offer views out into the gardens. A bohemian bedroom with full-sized bed is hidden behind a sliding door. The 'Turret' section has a suitable kitchenette with microwave, fridge, small oven, hot plate and coffee maker. There is also a cozy eating area with table and chairs. A large bath contains a double vanity, huge shower and private water closet. The third story bedchamber awaits up a winding staircase and sleeps two in a queen-sized canopy bed.

The Fairytale TreehouseTurret is situated on 4 acres including lovely gardens, beautiful lily pond, a running brook and wooded area. Absolutely unique, storybook experience for up to 4 quests.

Our lovely grounds are open to our guests. There are garden paths, brook with stone bridges, loveliest of lily ponds, stone bench seating area with 'chiminea' and firewood for guest's use.

While we do not allow pets, we will consider requests to allow 1 small pet with prior approval and acceptance of rules and policies."]

Title: Self-Contained Pyramids in the Australian Bush
Description:
['About this space', "Find peace and quiet at our large family property. Hidden close to the township of Adaminaby, in the Snowy Mountains of NSW, is our surprising and unique accommodation - two pyramids set in our 40+ acres of pristine alpine Australian bushlands and flowering wildflower style gardens, all here for you to discover on your retreat from the city. A peaceful retreat, hand built by our grandparents in the 90's, located close to Cooma and a short drive from Canberra Airport. Privacy and peace await you!", 'The space', "The space
Built from scratch by our grandparents, this property is truly unique and special, you won't find pyramids set in the Australian bush land anywhere else! Two self-contained pyramids rest within established gardens overlooking undeveloped Australian bush. Surrounded by tranquility, use the pyramids as a base to explore the surrounding ski fields, or use your holiday to completely relax away from it all. From the hand-cut slate tiles, to the pink granite surrounding the property, there is so much to discover at 'Rocky Corner'. Please note there is mobile phone reception predominantly on the Telstra network, but there is no WIFI.", 'Guest access', "Guest access
The pyramids are fully self-contained buildings that sit within our larger property, which is called 'Rocky Corner'. Our house is a little further up the hill, so you'll have privacy if you wish so. You'll have your own parking at the front of the pyramid, and there is plenty of space to park further vehicles as required. The road to our property is unsealed and is suitable for normal vehicles (2WD) to travel on.
Please note: The Snowy Mountains is a rural area. There is A LOT of wildlife around all the time....please be aware if you choose to drive in the dawn or dusk this increases your risk of hitting wildlife, so please do not speed or take unnecessary risks travelling to visit our property. If you hit an animal, please call the local council who can direct you what to do.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note', '', '']

Title: Foxbriar Inn
Description:
['About this space', "A most unique home in the lovely pines of northern Arizona. Foxbriar is historical, charming, and unlike any house you've ever seen. Nestled at the foot of Thumb Butte mountain, Foxbriar has a million-dollar view and set in a beautiful rural neighborhood. It is only two miles from downtown Prescott . One-of-a-kind furnishings and all the conveniences of home, as well as outdoor gardens and dining areas, and a gypsy wagon, too. Experience an original living adventure!", 'The space', "The space
Staying at Foxbriar is better than a Disneyland adventure. It is unique and thoroughly charming, with all the modern amenities. Guests may opt for a small charge, a tour of a Pirate Ship treehouse off-site, too, which was featured on TV's Animal Planet: Ultimate Treehouses II. As well, there is a Gypsy Wagon on-site at Foxbriar. It can be rented for sleeping, too. It features a double bed, but no bathroom. The additional charge is $80 charge per night.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
There is a large parking area in front of the house, which is off the street and private.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Foxbriar is close to downtown, where there are many restaurants and other activities available year round.']

Title: Upstate NY - Willow Glen House
Description:
['About this space', "Stay in a beautiful contemporary architect house in a case study house style, with floor to ceiling windows, our cats, and nature on your doorstep it's an absolute experience of living indoors/outdoors with nature. Close to farmers market in nearby towns, concert halls and CCS at Bard, music venues in Kingston and Basilica in Hudson it's the perfect hideaway from the city. For true nature & cat lovers only!

MAY & JUNE 2022 open for longterm rental - ideal for remote work or nature retreat!", 'The space', "The space
Our home is an architectural concept house and a gem, though please note that it is a concept house and therefore not without imperfections so for the ones who appreciate architecture and design, it is not a perfect airconditioned clinical space as it's situated in nature and nature is very present, which in the summer means that you have animals and insects around (and yes some come into the house, the insects that is) and in winter there is snow and ice and in NY state that can be plenty. So not for the faint of heart or the squeamish as it's a modern house but located as a cabin in the woods, at the house you will truly feel nature and nature is on your doorstep for both good and bad. Note to dog owners, we are big fans of dogs but sadly the house can't accommodate any dogs during your stay.
With our house come four companions - our cats will be delighted about every guest who loves and appreciates animals and is willing to take care of them. Nothing extraordinary but feeding twice a day and some of the usual care and attention", '', '', '', "Other things to note
We have four lovely cats who live in the house. They go in and out and are fairly independent but look forward to your company and some care and attention.

We have fresh herbs in our front garden for you to enjoy, and if you come in the right season, also home-grown zucchini, tomatoes, arugula etc. Just water them in the evening and you'll get all the great harvest as reward."]

Title: Historic Ball-Paylore House
Description:
['About this space', 'The Ball-Paylore House is captivating - offering guests a true Tucson mid-century modern experience. A stay in the Ball-Paylore lets you step back in time. Widely published, the 1200 sq. ft, two bedroom architectural landmark has been named one of the most significant examples of Modern Architecture in Arizona. Centrally located within the Historic Catalina Vista neighborhood, the property is close to the UofA and major attractions, entertainment and shopping.', 'The space', "The space
In 1952, librarians Phyllis Ball and Patrica Paylore commissioned legendary Tucson architect Arthur T. Brown to design a bespoke, one-of-a kind home. One that embraced the tenets of the modern movement, responded to the environmental conditions of the Sonoran Desert and offered both beauty and function.

The result was an architectural masterpiece - considered one of the most important buildings of Brown's design career. The avant-garde design of this noted and forward-thinking project embraced geometry and siting to create a pioneering and early passive solar home. The south facing floor-to-ceiling windows shed light on the authentic mid-century interior. Bold original colors are punctuated by pale wood finishes and earth toned polished concrete floors. The primary living areas radiate off the central fireplace - like the petals of a flower. The dark colors of the bedrooms, with sloped low beam ceilings, create intimate and comfortable spaces.

This significant historic property was purchased at the end of 2019 and meticulously restored by Tucson Historic Preservation Foundation. The property retains its classic charm. The 1200 sq. ft. architectural plan is based on the geometry of the hex - featuring two bedrooms plus a shared bathroom. Much of the original modernist furniture by George Nelson for Herman Miller and custom Tucson furniture maker John Kelso are extant. Recent upgrades have introduced contemporary amenities - including air conditioning and wireless high speed internet. Each bedroom features a TV, and Tuft and Needle mattresses.

Step back in time. Spend easy afternoons reclined in a chaise lounge on the ‚Äúrevolving terrace,‚Äù or enjoy the Tucson weather as the sun sets over the Tucson Mountains. Take shelter from the mid-afternoon days while relaxing in the bright sitting areas. Experience 1950s Tucson.", '', '']

Title: Brand-New, Seaside Luxury Suite with WiFi, AC, Shared Pool, and Beach Access
Description:
['About this space', ' ', 'The space', "The space
*Gold Standard Certified

Swim, play and relax when you stay at this unique, Gaudi-Esque villa in Belize. With two bedrooms and two bathrooms, this unique vacation rental features fantastic architectural touches, access to a shared infinity-edge pool, beach views, and plenty of room for up to four guests. Please note that this suite is the bottom floor of a two-level villa.

Even though it may be difficult to leave this tropical retreat, the Placencia Peninsula has lots to offer. If you have never experienced underwater wildlife, now is your chance to rent scuba gear in the nearby town and book a guide to view the beauty under the sea. In addition, you can take a boat trip to view some manatees, visit the ancient Mayan ruins, take a hike through lush jungles, or simply lounge on the beach with your favourite straw hat!

This rental suite has two bedrooms, each with a round king-size bed and its own en-suite bathroom. You might especially enjoy the jetted tub, also round to compliment the overall decor, so you can relax in some bubbling hot water before heading to bed. You will also have complimentary WiFi and a laundry room for your convenience. In the centre of the house, the spacious living room and full kitchen make for a fabulous gathering space. Cook nightly meals - perhaps your day's catch - and enjoy fresh breakfasts each morning.

Perfect for couples travelling together, or a small family looking for a memorable vacation, look no further than the Lion Fish Retreat. Make Belize your destination, and this home will make it into a vacation!

*Please note that the property has a security guard at night and security cameras at the common areas in the property.

Belize Tourism Board license # 1930/2016

Parking Notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. There is a parking lot in the property with space for two cars, about 30 yards from this unit.

Dock Details: Shared floating dock at the property

No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval."]

Title: Temple House 3bds Eco Bamboo House Pool River View
Description:
['About this space', 'A remarkable multi-level bamboo home nestled in tropical forest above the sacred Ayung River. Traditional Balinese materials combine with astounding design to create a place of utmost peace that is nothing like you have ever seen before. Temple House is the perfect exotic place to stay during your vacations in Bali!', 'The space', 'The space
Temple House in a remarkable Bamboo House, set near the top of a river valley landscape along Bali‚Äôs sacred Ayung River. Constructed in 2010, it sits amongst a master-planned community of spectacular Bamboo houses with distinctive blonde roofs. Entering this house is a feast to the eyes and a showcase at how bamboo can be combined in all shapes and patterns to create a stunning collection of luxurious floors, walls, ceiling, stairs, and railings.

The home features 3 air-conditioned bedrooms, including a children‚Äôs bedroom. Each bedroom also has an en-suite bathroom.
The modern kitchen comes fully equipped with all cooking utilities, accompanied by an open lounge and dining area that captures views of the organic landscape surrounding the house.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
All the rooms on the house are yours, except for some locked room, those are the storage and staff private room. You can also enjoy the pool and a fully equipped private kitchen. There is also a common area like the spacious garden and the bar that you can order food at.']

Title: Boho Hideaway
Description:
['About this space', 'Welcome to the Boho Hideaway‚Äîa charming bungalow located in the sought after Montrose district! Minutes away from some of Houston‚Äôs best coffee, dining & nightlife. What‚Äôs our favorite thing about this home? The location! There‚Äôs plenty to see and do within walking distance or bike ride! Quick access to I-59, I-45 & 610. Within a 10 minute drive or less, you can easily get to The Galleria, Downtown and Texas Medical Center.', 'The space', 'The space
Hip, comfy and clean. Soak up the vintage flair of this 1920‚Äôs bungalow overflowing with art, house plants and eclectic furnishings. Our home has a private entrance and keyless access for an easier check-in experience! Boasting 4 comfortable queen beds, 2 full bathrooms & Roku TV‚Äôs, High-Speed Wifi. We pride ourselves in stocking our homes with everything you may need for a comfortable stay, including high-quality linens, full kitchen, coffee bar, towels & so much more. Should you need anything else during your stay, please contact us! We are more than happy to accommodate you & ensure you have the perfect #HideawayHouston experience!

PARKING: Parking is only available on the street directly in front of the home.

SLEEPING: There are 3 bedrooms total in the home. One of the bedrooms has two queen beds and the rest each have one bed.

COOKING: Use our pans & utensils to chef up something yourself, or reheat leftovers in our microwave. We have K-cups and a coffee maker for those early mornings, too!

CHECK-IN: Check in anytime after 4pm. We have keyless entry for a more convenient check-in process. Early check-ins are on a case by case basis depending on availability. If you need to drop off your luggage earlier, please contact us and we can accommodate you.

CONCIERGE SERVICE:
Anything you need is at your fingertips with our concierge add-ons like stocking your fridge, luggage storage or decorating for your celebration! Let us make your trip to Houston the best trip ever!

CLEANING FEE:
We pride ourselves on providing a clean home for our guests. We hire cleaners that not only work hard, but are family and friends of ours. They treat the property as their own and we pay them well, resulting in a slightly higher cleaning fee. It goes back to them, not some major company paying their workers minimum wage. If during your stay, anything isn‚Äôt up to your standard please let us know and we will address it immediately!

The home is located in a residential neighborhood‚Äîwe ask that you please be mindful of our neighbors. Please keep any noise down after 10pm. We do not allow parties or events! Max total guests is 8 people. Additional guests MUST BE APPROVED by the host. Failure to communicate with the host about extra guests will result in violating your booking terms. Please note, we have security cameras on the exterior of the home to ensure the safety of our guests, our home & your vehicles.

Pictures are worth a thousand words so please feel fee to browse through our photo gallery and message us if you have any questions! We look forward to hosting you for your next Houston stay!

Some of our favorite places nearby:
The Pitt Room - .3 mi away
UCHI - .9 mi away (The BEST sushi)
BCN Taste & Tradition - 335 ft away (One of our favorite date night spots)
Siphon Coffee - .4 mi away (Seriously, best coffee ever!)
The Menil- .7 mi away (One of our favorite museums)', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Keyless entry & street parking available directly in front of home.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
We have worked very hard to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Please respect, care and be mindful of the surrounding neighbors so that guests can continue to enjoy the space for many years to come.

- Quiet hours start at 10 PM. We do not allow loud noises/music, parties in the house.

- There are security cameras at the perimeter of house. There are no cameras inside the house.

- Please do not smoke, vape, use marijuana or drugs in the house.

- Street parking available directly in front of home. No parking in the driveway.']

Title: A Grass-Roofed Earthen Hobbit Hut
Description:
['About this space', "This uniquely constructed cob hut was crafted by sculptor Miguel Elliott of Living Earth Structures, and is one of a kind. The thick walls provide natural insulation, keeping it cool in summer and warm in winter. It was constructed out of Adobe bricks from the property and features a living grass roof, while the rustic decor transports you to Middle Earth.

*Update : Sadly due to Covid-19 restrictions we aren't able to host your beloved animal companions at this time.", 'The space', "The space
We invite you to partake in the spiritual life which is the heart and soul of Isis Oasis Sanctuary by joining us for daily noon rites in the Small Temple, Sunday Salons under the Great Tree, or by simply meditating at any of the numerous shrines and altars at our beautiful sanctuary! Our temple and theater are always open if you seek a moment of peaceful reflection or a place to give offerings or prayers.

Isis Oasis Sanctuary is an exceptional place to stay if you are visiting wine country and looking for a singular spiritual experience. Our cob huts offer a unique approach to lodging that you won't find anywhere else! Crafted by sculptor Miguel Elliott of Living Earth Structures, these small standalone structures are built with natural self-insulating materials and inspired by magical fantasy stories that are well known and loved by many. They live tucked into an intimate corner of our wooded campground, with a small picnic area and bamboo privacy screens. Bathrooms and rustic outdoor showers are just a few meters down. Perfect for those who want a remote camping feel, but with some added creature comforts!

Free Wi-Fi and a coffee and tea bar are available for all guests to use in our spacious dining pavilion. A small library, collections of puzzles and games, and a gas fireplace provide a cozy setting in which to relax and unwind.

Visit our community garden, or request an animal tour to see our menagerie of exotic rescued cats, birds, and reptiles! We are a licensed 501(c) non-profit and any tax-deductible donations go towards the care and upkeep of our animals and grounds.

Whether you are coming alone or with company, you will find Isis Oasis a refreshing departure from the traditional hotel or motel.

**NOTE: If you're coming as a group, multiple spaces can be rented out simultaneously and some buildings can be rented in their entirety for larger parties. Ask about our catering options! Please note that if other huts or campground areas are rented, you will be sharing the facilities/amenities with other guests. We do offer a number of other rental options on property if you prefer more privacy. See our full listing options by typing 'Isis Oasis Sanctuary' in your AirBNB search bar.**", '', '']

Title: 3 Bedroom Heavot Caves | Fairytale Experience
Description: ['About this space', 'Heavot Caves ( Not all those who wander are lost ) will let you enjoy and live a true fairy tale experience it is part of a retreat located at a distance of only 10 km from Shimla . This place is personification of Tranquility , surrounded by lush green mountains located perfectly to give you a 360 degree view of the Himalayan mountain ranges . Rarely do you find a retreat that is embodied by the essence of nature, taking your mind off everything that is apparent . Enjoy Peace and serenity .', 'The space', 'The space\nComfy Dome Shaped 3 Bed Room with a lawn in front and surrounded by Himalayan mountain range Our place is surrounded by the whistling pines and the Room are situated in the middle of a green Valley . We are far away from the city hustle- bustle. You will enjoy an exceptional beauty of landscape, including birds and a great variety of flora. The scenic view, the refreshing air and the dazzling sight of the sun descending behind the mountains adds to the solace. It is a perfect getaway and if you are looking for rejuvenation and a surreal experience, this should be your holiday destination. Space consists of three bedrooms with three attached Bathroom the bathrooms are well tiled and fitted with modern Sanitary Ware . everyday toiletries and bath linens are provided . the room has a wall mounted flat screen LED TV and a big lawn in front .', '', '', '', 'Other things to note']

['About this space', "On the 1000 Ponds plateau, there is a small Hobbit style house on the edge of a quiet pond on the hiking trails. It's a small wheeled construction with a dry toilet.
For up to 4 people, there are 2 140 x190 bunk beds.
Guests have a terrace and barbecue.
No fishing allowed.", 'The space', 'The space
Bilbon Sacquet invites you to its small Hobbit style house. The neighborhood is very quiet sometimes broken by a frog concert.
The accommodation has a dry toilet inside the bathroom.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
We also offer for rent: the Elves cabin (2pers), a trailer (2pers) as well as a tiny house for 4 people.']

Title: Private Loft Casita In Historic Downtown Phoenix
Description: ['About this space', 'Large 800 square foot open concept casita located in quiet historic neighborhood in downtown Phoenix - walking distance from restaurants, bars, shopping, events, and light rail. One loft bedroom overlooking large living room. Kitchen and bathroom with unique glowing shower and large closet. Fold out sofa bed in living room for additional sleeping space. Dedicated washer/dryer.', 'The space', 'The space\nUnique architectural features throughout: glowing green shower, three large salvaged arched windows, custom sconce lamps, exposed wooden trusses in two-story living room, custom colored concrete countertops in kitchen and bath. Functional kitchen with refrigerator, freezer, and two-burner glass cooktop.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nGuests have exclusive access to the casita, which is located in the backyard. Full privacy from the street and the house in front. Access is through a punch code side gate.']

Title: Unforgettable Pyramid home in sunny Florida 7046
Description:
['About this space', "Don't miss your chance to stay at this unique and exciting pyramid that features a natural spring water lake! ! This home is perfect for couples, families, or close friends who are looking for a fun vacation.
We are Located about 15 miles from most beaches and central to all local attractions in a quiet and safe community.

Some highlights-
* 2 queen bedrooms/ 1 bathroom
* self check in
* Free WIFI
* Beach gear, washer/dryer, full kitchen, private grill, patio", '', '', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
This pyramid is situated with just enough privacy while still being only a short walk to the lake. Your main patio from this unit overlooks the lake.

It is thoughtfully furnished with fun and cozy furniture that is sure to please everyone. For your comfort, the pyramid is supplied with a hairdryer, iron and ironing board, beach chairs/ beach towels/ cooler, coffee/tea appliances, washer/dryer, microwave, and a gas grill. The unit is stocked with some mini "starter" supplies such as shampoo, conditioner, soap, coffee, and toilet paper. Additional supplies can be purchased from one of the many drugstores or grocery stores within a short drive away. We have a pack n play and high chair available upon request. If you would like to request these items, please let me know upon booking and we will do our best to accommodate.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
This pyramid is in a wonderful location in Southwest Florida. It is just a short drive away to many beaches, shopping, restaurants. Some of the highlights in the area include Sanibel Island, Naples, Ft Myers Beach, Bonita Beach, Coconut Point shopping center, Lakes park, and Miromar Outlet mall, Koreshan State Park, and a few local kayak places.

Please note- this is a quiet and relaxing community. We ask that guests respect the village and other guests on site. No excessive noise or parties will be allowed , especially at night .

*No pets allowed at this time, No smoking/vaping, sage inside


The village was built 20 years ago , so please understand these pyramids have some slight wear and tear. Keep in mind it is a tropical and humid environment located on a natural spring lake. For those travelers who have sensitivities and allergies these pyramids might not be perfect for you. We are not representing these homes would compare to an elite hotel or resort, but an alternative to other vacation options.']

Title: Wonderful Casa de Playa in Huentelauquen, Nueva.
Description:
['About this space', 'Wonderful and cozy house with panoramic ocean view. Bright house, with large common areas just meters from the beach. It has a Protected Patio, and terraces with spectacular views. Five bedrooms, two and a half bathrooms with solar energy system and backup generator if required. Woods, Charcoal grill, Trampoline, Stove, 12 beds.', 'The space', 'The space
A quiet place with incredible views of the sea in semi-desert vegetation meters from two quiet beaches. House of 250 m2 on a plot of 5000 meters. The house has 3 bedroom wings, creating independence between sectors. Ideal side entrance to get from the beach with shower to take off the sand and leave the beach things.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
We deliver an informative document with the necessary indications for the use of the energy system. Take care of the ecosystem of the area and use the water without abusing it. Do not use energy-intensive electrical appliances, such as hair dryers or blenders, as solar energy is not available.
The house has 8,000 litres of non-potable water per week. In case the water runs out, it should be purchased by contacting the tanker truck supplier.']

Title: The Shed House
Description:
['About this space', 'The barn house, completed in 2021, was built entirely from wood and is located on the site of an originally agricultural barn.', 'The space', 'The space
The barn house, completed in 2021, was built entirely from wood and is located on the site of an originally agricultural barn. The barn house was designed as a barn and is now used as an exclusive holiday home. The spacious architecture of the house convinces with modern and reduced design elements. The bright and open living room impresses with an undeveloped view of the pastures behind the house and the tranquil tating. The cottage has a full bathroom with free-standing bathtub and indoor sauna, a fireplace and guest toilet. In 3 bedrooms up to 6 people can sleep in 2 double beds (140x200 & 180x200) as well as 2 single beds. The large free-standing cooking island makes you want to spend hours cooking and then eating at the large dining table under the glazed roof gable. Open the large sliding doors to the terrace and enjoy the special ambience - making every breakfast special. Upstairs are 2 bedrooms which are connected to the enchanting bathroom via an open bridge.

The large terrace in the south of the barn house adjoins the meadow surrounded by a small sand dune. In front of the house there is space for 2 cars.']
