Title: Horizon View (UKC1577)
Description:
['About this space', 'Just 50 yards from the beach and with stunning sea views, this property is perfect for a family holiday on the south coast.. Ground Floor:
Bedroom 1: With kingsize bed and en-suite with shower cubicle and toilet.
Step to...
Sun room: With electric wood burner and French doors leading to patio.
Separate toilet.
First Floor:
Open plan living space: With laminate floor and patio doors leading to balcony.
Living area: With Freeview TV.
Dining area.
Kitchen area: With electric oven, electric hob, microwave, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and washer/dryer.
Open-tread stairs to...
Second Floor:
Bedroom 2: With double bed.
Bedroom 3: With double bed.
Bedroom 4: With single bed and single trundle bed (can be double bed on request).
Bathroom: With shower over bath, shower attachment and toilet.. Gas central heating, electricity, bed linen, towels and Wi-Fi included. Welcome pack. Doggy extras. Enclosed garden with sitting-out area. Balcony with outdoor furniture. Private parking for 2 cars; additional public car park, at cost. No smoking. Please note: No children under 5 years old, including babes in arms. . Offering stunning panoramic sea views over to the Isle of Wight, this light and spacious town house is set over three floors. The bright and airy open plan living area has been tastefully styled with white furnishings and patio doors, which span virtually the whole width of the living area, open onto a balcony from which the ever changing nautical vista can be savoured. Upstairs on the top floor, the master bedroom captures the mesmerising view from a greater elevation, offering breathtaking scenery from the huge picture window which is interesting to watch day or night. The bedroom also has a sofa bed and a kettle/tea tray, making it a perfect place to relax and unwind. Hayling Island is accessed by a bridge, so you can drive straight over, making it very accessible for visitors and easy to get to many places of interest. The owner even supplies a dog lead, dog towels, treats, poo bags, water bowl a dog bed on request and an information pack on dog friendly beaches and parks. The beaches of this popular isle are surrounded by sheltered waters across from the Isle of Wight, making it ideal for water sports activities. It is renowned for its windsurfing and sailing activities, kayaking, power boating, jet ski-ing, kite surfing and wake boarding. Local paddle-boating and windsurfing lessons are available close by. Every year there is a national windsurfing event, and a hive of sailing and nautical activity can be seen along the coastline.
Many activities can be enjoyed locally for all ages, including a seaside railway, fun fair and West Beachlands, great for sandcastles at low tide! Free play includes beach volleyball and adventure play areas. For the sports enthusiast, Seacourt is also worth a visit, with five racket sports. Other nearby activities include golf, horse riding, boat trips and scenic walks along the waters edge, or walks along the South Downs National Park which is within easy reach. Chichester, with its beautiful cathedral, festival theatre, pedestrianised shopping, leisure centre, Roman villa and Goodwood or Fontwell races, is definitely worthy of a visit. Visit Portsmouth, with its waterside dining, ferry trips to the Isle of Wight, designer outlets, Natural History Museum, leisure facilities, Spinnaker Tower and HMS Victory, or explore the maritime history of Southampton. Winchester, with its cathedral, abbey and The New Forest, are within easy driving distance. There are plenty of National Trust houses and gardens to also be discovered. Beach 50 yards. Shop, pub and restaurant 800 yards.
Free WiFi']

Title:
Luxury seafront flat with balcony 
(New!)
Description:
['About this space', 'My seafront flat is set back from road and enjoys fabulous sea views in a very convenient location.
There is an underground carpark directly in front (cost about ¬£8 per day).
The flat is in the newly trendy America Ground area of Hastings, close to the pier, ten minutes walk to either the Old Town or St Leonard‚Äôs.', 'The space', 'The space
You will have the principal rooms of the flat to yourself. The rest of the flat is locked off.
There is a bedroom with super-king (6 foot) bed, a small cupboard for hanging your clothes and a small sofa.
The main room of the flat (7m x 5m) has a large dining table with benches, a very well equipped kitchen and a sitting area with sofa, armchair and a 43‚Äù Samsung TV with Netflix and other internet stations.
There is a shower room.
There is a balcony running the entire width of the flat at the front with a small table and chairs. The balcony gets sun in the morning through to
mid afternoon.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
There is a lockbox by the front door where the keys will be ready for your arrival.
The flat is on the first floor up the spiral staircase.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
This flat is my own home, which I enjoy letting through Airbnb when I am travelling (which I LOVE to do, and am away often). You will have the flat to yourself, but some of the rooms (with my personal stuff in them) are locked off.
I have another dedicated Airbnb in the same building which is let all through the year.']

Title: The Beach Side - 100 Yards Beach - Sleeps 4.
Description:
['About this space', "The Beach Side is a well maintained, comfortable two bedroom chalet just 50 yards from the beach which gets regular good reviews...

Fresh linen and towels are included.

With one double bedroom and a twin The Beach Side sleeps up to four people and has a shower, wc, wash basin etc.

There's a sitting room that leads to a fully equipped kitchen.", 'The space', "The space
The Beach Side has many return visitors who enjoy the location and peaceful aspect, an easy flat walk to the village, and as well as the beach fifty yards away just three hundred yards away is the free to use Hersey Nature Reserve...

Latest Reviews:

The Beach Side is an absolutely delightful little holiday home. The location is perfect - steps away from a gorgeous beach and lovely walks in both directions. The bungalow itself is small but very cosy and was perfect for our family of four plus dog for a week's stay. The communication and welcome we received from Roger was exceptional and most definitely set the tone for a special week on the island. Thank you Roger! Sally & Family 30th October 2021

Thank you for renting us your holiday home, we had a lovely two weeks. The location is superb and fell in love with Seaview. Karen & Adrian, 10th October 2021

My parents had a wonderful weeks stay here on their first holiday in 8 years! Roger was really helpful and easy to communicate with and we were grateful for the discount booking ferry tickets. Very nice bedlinen and towels and fully equipped accommodation. Had everything needed. The place was clean and quiet and location is faultless. My parents enjoyed long evenings sat on the decking enjoying sea views. Would not hesitate to recommend to others or stay here ourselves again. Viktoria, 23rd September 2021

What a great place! Would highly recommend. The deck area in front of the house has a beautiful view over the beach towards Portsmouth. We had a great time with our 2 year old son, popping over to the beach and back all throughout our stay. Roger was the perfect host, helped with ferry bookings and told me everything I needed. Gary and family 19th July 2021

A nicely decorated, tasteful cosy cottage just by a wide spanning beach. There are a number of relatively close shops if you don't mind a short walk through the nice seaside town of Seaview. The place itself was well fitted with a full kitchen and all the bits and bobs you need on holiday. There are a multitude of sites to visit around the property, with a beautiful nature reserve just a hundred metres from the front door. The shore changes from sandy beaches to shingle beaches, with a welcoming setting no matter your preference. Inside The Beach Side you'll find all you need with a TV and stable WiFi . The two bedrooms were comfortable and quiet at night and the living space has a modern sliding window out onto the communal gardens and the path out to the sea (only 30m or so away). Overall, a great place to stay while you explore what the Isle has to offer. Monica 12th July 2021

We had a lovely stay on the Isle of Wight. The accommodation was perfect for our needs. The location was fantastic, in a very quiet peaceful area with lovely coastal walks nearby. Roger‚Äôs communication was fantastic, he rang before our trip and arranged discounted ferry tickets. Helen 30th June 2021
Seaview is pretty with local eateries that are very good. Not too far a walk to Ryde where there is the bus station and hovercraft giving access to the whole island and a 10 minute trip to Portsmouth.Beach in Ryde was glorious in the sunshine.We had a lovely week, ate out, had take away and cooked at The Beach Side too.Would recommend and hope to return Margaret & Friends 22nd June 2021

Hi Roger,  Many thanks for everything.  We had a great stay and really enjoyed staying at The Beach Side. Lovely place to stay 2 minutes from the beach in a quiet complex. Best Ian. 12th June 2021

Great stay at Seaview. Lovely accommodation.Very clean. Would definitely book again. Marilyn 29th May 2021

The Beach Side has everything you need - Fantastic stay. Very good location for a getaway. Beach is very close. Martha, 30th April 2021

We (family of four) had a great stay at The Beach Side. It's very well appointed and the extra folding chairs and fluffy blankets for cool evenings were a nice touch. The location is absolutely perfect, and although you can't see the sea from the deck unless you are standing up, it's only 50yds to take your morning or evening coffee over the road to the sea wall. Lucy & Family 17th April 2021", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The whole bungalow']

Title: Beach Garden - 4 bedroom seaview apartment
Description:
['About this space', 'A beachfront dream on the coast of Pevensey Bay. This property offers a truly tranquil getaway with amazing views over the English Channel.

Pevensey Bay is a small town located just outside of Eastbourne, it has its own delicious restaurants and cafes that are just minutes from your front door.

The property has four bedrooms sleeping up to eight in total and dogs are considered.

Parking and free WiFi is also included.', 'The space', "The space
Enter by your own private door and up a flight of stairs to the first floor. On this level you'll find a glorious open-plan living space with incredible sea views - plus a balcony where you can really soak up the sea air.

The modern kitchen is fully equipped and includes a dishwasher, fridge-freezer, oven, hob and microwave. A separate utility room houses a washing machine and tumble dryer.

This floor also boasts two bedrooms and a bathroom. One bedroom is a kingsize, while the other can be set up as a super king or with twin beds. The bathroom on this level has both a bath and a separate, walk-in shower.

Up on the top level you'll find a huge master suite. This has a super kingsize bed (which can be split into twin beds if preferred). There is an ensuite shower room, and also an adjoining twin bedroom with gorgeous sea views that is ideal for children wanting to be close to their parents (as guests to this room have to walk through the master bedroom to reach it).

The property also has its own private garden which directly extends onto the glorious stretch of beaches, for outdoor lovers this property is a must. There is bench seating up to eight people plus a parasol to enjoy - you will want to take in those views as often as you can! A well-behaved small dog may be considered - please discuss in advance (supplement applies).

There is private parking for one car off road, and more on street parking available nearby. This stunning Exclusively Eastbourne property is booked from Saturday to Saturday in peak season, but flexible arrival days and/or short stays may be possible last minute or out of season.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Both floors of this private, split-level maisonette are yours to enjoy. The owners live in a separate flat below this maisonette, so are on hand should you need help.']

Title: BRIGHTON BEACH APARTMENT FREE PARKING
Description:
['About this space', 'Prime Seafront Location The Apartment situated in Royal Crescent offers a luxury stay with complimentary Parking on site with EV charger if required. Master Bedroom with Heals Four Poster SuperKing Bed & Rainfall Shower Spacious Open Plan Lounge Netflix Cable Television & WiFi Well Equipped Kitchen with Range Cooker FridgeFreezer Dishwasher Coffee Machine etc The Apartment has its own sole entrance with key box for contactless entry Private Residential Garden', 'The space', 'The space
Free Parking & self check in with sole access along with the open plan lounge and dining space which features a Panasonic flatscreen television where guests can enjoy cable television and Netflix free of charge. WiFi free also included. For coffee lovers we have a Dolce Gusto Coffee Machine. With a generous sized table in the lounge ideal to use as a work/laptop area. The Super king sized Heals bed is heavenly comfortable. A super efficient Fired Earth Rain Shower with plenty of towels. The Apartment is spacious with plenty of seating We do have a residents private garden for guests to use which faces onto the seafront. It is laid to lawn and has seating. We offer sun loungers to use during your stay ! There are a number of Independent cafes a road away for everything from breakfast lunch through to dinner! We have a well equipped kitchen with SMEG range cooker and a dishwasher along with washer/dryer.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Parking - The Apartment comes with a parking space allocated for our guests sole use during their stay if required. Being located ideally for the beach and Brighton City Centre as well as Brighton Mariner. There are independent shops Restaurants & Bars two minutes from The Apartment in Kemp Town a group of wonderful traders offering unique products and dining experiences including an antique centre!', '', 'Other things to note
Royal Crescent has a great historical past with the Late Sir Lawrence Olivier the famous actor having lived at No 4 Royal Crescent with his wife owning No 5 - Joan Plowright an actress of the time. The Crescent is uniform to the front but each house is very original in there own right and The Apartment is part of the main house which has remained very close to its original floor plan.Deliveroo and Uber Eats offer take away from breakfast lunch & dinner to everything in between!']

Title: Southern Bell (30426)
Description:
['About this space', 'Unique converted railway carriage located on Hayling Island, ideal for a beach holiday.. All on the ground floor.
Open plan living space.
Living area: With Cable TV, streaming services and iPod dock.
Dining area: With patio doors leading to garden.
Kitchen area: With gas/electric range, microwave, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and washer/dryer.
Living room 2: With Cable TV and X-box.
Bedroom 1: With kingsize bed and en-suite with shower cubicle and toilet.
Bedroom 2: With kingsize bed.
Bedroom 3: With double bed.
Bedroom 4: With single bed and pull-out single (for flexible sleeping arrangements).
Bedroom 5: With single bed.
Bathroom: With shower over bath, and toilet.
Office: With desk.. Gas central heating, gas, electricity, bed linen, towels and Wi-Fi included. Travel cot and highchair available on request. Welcome pack. Enclosed garden with sitting-out area, garden furniture and barbecue. Home office. Bike store. Private parking. No smoking.. This super, unique, detached beach house includes two converted railway carriages, one of only a few to be seen along the south coast and enjoys a fabulous location directly on the seafront. Step onto the pebble beach via your private gate from the enclosed garden and enjoy miles of pebble/sandy beach ‚Äì a haven for all ages, including children and dogs all year round! From the front it is deceptive, having been substantially extended, but once you approach the side entrance, the original features can be easily seen. Inside, the traditional carriage doors remain, and many of the rooms are set inside the former train carriages. Southern Bell offers tastefully styled, light, and airy holiday accommodation for families - with an enclosed patio garden, plenty of off-road parking and a short walk from the local shops, eateries/pubs, and harbour/sailing club. Hayling Island is renowned for its kitesurfing and sailing activities and local paddle - boarding and windsurfing lessons are available close by. Every year there is a national kitesurfing event, and a plethora of sailing and nautical activity can be seen along the coastline. Many activities can be enjoyed locally, including golf, fishing, cycling, boat trips and scenic walks along the water‚Äôs edge or along the South Downs National Park which are within easy reach. Chichester with its beautiful cathedral, festival theatre, pedestrianised shopping, leisure centre, Roman Villa and Goodwood or Fontwell races is worthy of a visit. Visit Portsmouth with waterside dining, ferry trips to the Isle of Wight, designer outlets, leisure facilities, Spinnaker Tower, Historic Dockyard including HMS Victory and the Mary Rose, or the maritime history at Southampton. Winchester, with its cathedral and abbey, and The New Forest are within easy driving distance. Plenty of National Trust homes and gardens can also be discovered nearby. Beach 5 yards. Shop 500 yards, pub and restaurant 500 yards.
Free WiFi']

Title: Sea Dreams - seafront apartment with fab sea views
Description:
['About this space', 'Sea Dreams has wonderful views over the English Channel and is literally moment from the promenade and beach.

It is ideal for friends and families who want to escape to the sea for fresh air, a dip in waves and a break from hectic lives.

The apartment is located in a prime spot close to the beach, theatres and town centre and also the sought-after Meads area, with independent shops, cafes and restaurants.

WiFi provided, plus towels and linen.', 'The space', "The space
The open-plan living area has the windows facing the sea and there are doors out onto a balcony overlooking the sea.

The lounge includes a large Smart TV with FreeSat (so comes with access to channels such as YouTube and iPlayer as well as traditional TV) and the kitchen, with a huge window, provides arguably the finest views whilst washing up you are ever likely to encounter!

The kitchen is fully equipped with oven and hob, microwave and washing machine, and there is even a Nespresso machine for coffee lovers (bring your own capsules).

It has a master bedroom with a double bed, while the second bedroom has a single bed, plus an extra pull-out single that can be set up for families of four (or combined into a second double). Both bedrooms have picturesque inland views over Lower Meads and the distant South Downs.

There are two bathrooms. WiFi is provided, along with all towels and linen. Parking is unrestricted on street. Bookings run from Sunday-to-Sunday in peak season, although flexible arrival days may be possible out of season.

Talk to the Exclusively Eastbourne team if you've any questions that can help you reach a decision or check out our own website for more photos and alternative places to stay in the area.", '', '']

Title: Seaviews Sovereign Harbour - adults-only apartment
Description:
['About this space', "Throw open the French doors, step on your balcony and breathe in those glorious sea views.

This beautifully presented two-bedroom, two-bathroom, adults-only apartment has stunning panoramic vistas from the lounge, master bedroom and private balcony.

Set on the fourth floor, yet with handy lift access, this stylish holiday apartment is ideal for couples on a romantic break or friends sharing. The bars, cafes and restaurants of Sovereign Harbour's Waterfront area are just a short stroll away.", 'The space', "The space
This tranquil flat has an air of relaxation with a calming colour palette throughout.

The dining lounge has two comfy sofas positioned in front of the smart TV and DVD player, so you can unwind with your favourite box set if you can drag your eyes away from the view. A small dining table is set against the wall in this room and can be extended to seat four, with additional chairs stored in the second bedroom.

Double French doors from this room open to your private balcony with views of the outer harbour and sea beyond. A small table and chair set can be set out so that you can enjoy your morning coffee while watching the boats sail in and out of the marina.

The kitchen is small yet well equipped, including a gas hob, oven and grill, fridge-freezer, dishwasher, microwave and a washing machine, as well as plenty of crockery and equipment. An arched shape window between this room and the dining lounge means you aren't out of the action while cooking and can still glimpse those lovely sea views.

The master bedroom is a double with an ensuite shower room. This sea-facing room has a window with water views, plus a single French door giving access to the balcony. A built in wardrobe includes a chest of drawers, and with two bedsides, you've plenty of storage for your holiday clothes.

The second bedroom is also a double and boasts two double, built in wardrobes, another good-sized chest of drawers plus bedsides. There is a separate bathroom off the hall with a bath that has a hand-held shower attachment.

You'll appreciate the allocated parking space and there are further visitor spaces if you have a second vehicle. WiFi is provided in this Exclusively Eastbourne apartment, plus linen and regular towels (bring your own beach towels).

Changeover on a Friday in peak season although flexible arrival days and shorter stays may be possible out of season or last minute.

Talk to the Exclusively Eastbourne team if you've any questions that can help you reach a decision or check out our own website for best prices and alternative places to stay in the area.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You can easily walk to the restaurants and bars of the Waterfront area and also the Sovereign Harbour retail park, which boasts an Asda superstore, Boots pharmacy and various stores.

However a car is handy if you want to make the most of the day trips possible in the surrounding Sussex region. You have an allocated car parking space.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
This is an adults only property.']

Title: The Beachfront seaview appartment
Description: ['About this space', 'Situated on Southend seafront with free parking at the rear, this spacious first floor apartment right on the Sea front. . It is a short walk from the main attractions yet in a quieter residential area. Suitable for couples (2 persons) it has a seperate bedroom with a king size bed, bathroom and lounge-kitchen with Sea views. A small balcony overlooking the beach.', 'The space', 'The space\nSituated on the Seafront in Thorpe Bay the affluent part of Southend', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nThis is a single bedroom appartment with Lounge with extensive sea views, Kitchen and Bathroom.']

Title: Direct Beach Access Modern Bungalow Sea View
Description:
['About this space', 'Situated directly on the beach in Pevensey Bay, this stylish detached seaside home offers luxury throughout and boasts an amazing outlook to sea. At low tide, the sea retracts to leave behind a beautiful and vast sandy beach, so why not kick off your shoes and feel the sea between your toes. Ideal for families, surfers, or romantic couples alike.', 'The space', "The space
Key Features
# Beach-fronted
# Outdoor Furniture & Fire Pit
# BBQ
# Walking Distance to the Village
On arrival at the property there is plenty of parking for two cars. A set of wide steps with handrail leads you to the front of the property where you enter a welcoming open lounge/kitchen/diner.
The kitchen area is well-equipped for family entertaining with an electric oven and hob, fridge with ice compartment, wine cooler, dishwasher, microwave, coffee machine and washing machine. Relax at the breakfast bar or move to the lounge area which offers the perfect place to snuggle in on the comfy corner sofa (which can be made into a sofa bed on request) and catch up on your favourite TV programmes or Netflix on the Smart tv, listen to the DAB radio or play one of the board games.
The dining table with seating for six overlooks the rear beach garden and the wonderful views beyond. There are two bedrooms with TV's, double with an en-suite shower and WC and a super-king-size zip-and-link (which can be made into a twin on request). The property is completed with a modern family bathroom that has a shower over bath and WC.
In the garden that leads directly onto the beach is a dining table with 6 chairs and sun umbrella, BBQ, fire pit, swinging chair and reclining chairs. There is also a storage shed with body boards, buckets and spades and ball games for use on the beach.
To the front of the property there is an additional seating area with a table and chairs, a great place to catch the evening sun and enjoy a glass of wine.
When booking with us your stay will be protected by a deposit guarantee and public liability provided by our risk management partner, SUPERHOG. To benefit from this protection, you will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself or you can also go via their website, superhog.com to start the verification. To view the SUPERHOG privacy policy use this link: https://superhog.com/privacy-policydata-protection-policy/
We are now required by UK Gov to take the name and address for the main person making the reservation and the names of all other guests over the age of 16.", '', '', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
A damage deposit of ¬£200.00 is payable . For direct bookings with beachside holiday rentals, this amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departure.
We allow one small dog to stay in the property.

The cleaning fee covers all cleaning, laundry/towels and bed linens which we provide for your stay.']

Title: Beautiful sea front two bedroom apartment
Description:
['About this space', 'Welcome to my beautiful seafront escape. A light and spacious two bedroom apartment situated directly on the seafront. During your stay marvel at the sea views, relax on the beach, or enjoy the cafes, restaurants, galleries and shops that St Leonards has to offer less than 10 minutes walk away.', 'The space', 'The space
-Two double bedrooms at the back of the apartment which both overlook the beautiful green cliffside
-A modern kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook for yourself and a dining table that seats four
-The living room is spacious, light and airy with spectacular sea views from both windows and includes a smart TV and board game cupboard for days when you wish to stay at home.
-Stylish Bathroom with shower and bath
-There are beach chairs provided for you to relax on the beach in comfort', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
-Free on street parking directly outside and a paid car park across the road.
-Guests will be welcomed on arrival and I am always available if there are any issues - otherwise I will leave you to enjoy your stay!
-Local amenities all within walking distance
-Accessible by car or train with 2 local train stations within 15minutes walk (St Leonards Warrior Square and West St Leonards).', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please note the apartment is on the 4th floor and there is no lift so may be not suitable for people with mobility issues or really young children.

Unfortunately at the moment there is scaffolding on the front of the building and therefore the view is partially obscured.']

Title: Coastguard cottage in a coastal nature reserve
Description:
['About this space', 'Solent Cottage is a historical Victorian-era coastal property which has been substantially renovated to modern standards. As well as fantastic sea views from one side, and gorgeous views of the neighbouring nature reserve from the other, guests will enjoy the lovely period feature such as original Victorian flooring, and the wood burning stove, as well as the modern fully-equipped kitchen.', 'The space', "The space
In such a fabulous location, it's all about the outside. There are three outside spaces to enjoy: the rear (woodland facing) garden is perfect for morning and early afternoon sun, a great space for al-fresco breakfast and for lunch. In the evening the sun appears at the other (sea-facing) garden, which is ideal for BBQs, or just enjoying a glass of wine as the yachts sail by and the sun goes down. And that second garden opens out to a very large green or third garden, where wild rabbits roam in the morning and kids play in the afternoon.

Both the living room and the master bedroom have amazing and direct views over the Solent, and it's especially lovely to wake up to the fresh air, open the curtains and imbibe the stillness and tranquility of the morning sea. The two smaller bedrooms overlook the gardens and woodland nature reserve to the rear. The area feels safe, secluded, but also friendly.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
There is a dedicated off-road parking spot for Solent Cottage in the cottage car park next door, and if you are bringing more than one car, free parking at Fort Victoria a couple of minutes away. There is plenty of walking or cycling around the area - there are cafes and restaurants on the doorstep, shopping and pubs a short 15 minute walk along the coast to Yarmouth, and a bus stop which connects you to the island bus network at the end of the road (Westhill Lane).', '', '']

Title: Panoramic sea views in beachfront apt w/balcony
Description:
['About this space', '‚Ä¢ Newly refurbished seafront apartment ‚Ä¢ 2 bedrooms ‚Ä¢ Sleeps up to 5 ‚Ä¢ Balcony with panoramic views of the sea ‚Ä¢ Iconic listed building ‚ÄòThe Royal‚Äô ‚Ä¢ Open plan lounge/dining area/kitchen ‚Ä¢ Master bedroom with sea views ‚Ä¢ Outstanding location close to town centre and pier ‚Ä¢ All rooms beautifully presented ‚Ä¢ Book your stay today ‚Ä¢', 'The space', 'The space
Staying beside the seaside doesn‚Äôt get much more enjoyable than this. Here‚Äôs a 2 bedroom apartment with amazing panoramic views of the sea and Bognor Regis pier from the balcony at the front of the property. And it‚Äôs a property that‚Äôs an iconic, listed seafront building with pillars at the entrance that‚Äôs been recently refurbished throughout.

The balcony is accessible from the apartment‚Äôs open plan living room/dining area and kitchen. This features comfy seating from which you can enjoy that amazing sea view. And the view of the flatscreen TV is pretty good too! There‚Äôs also a dining table with room for 4 to sit and enjoy any snacks or meals you choose to prepare in the kitchen that features modern countertops, cupboards and appliances.

One of the two bedrooms is at the front of the apartment, with amazing sea views to wake up to every morning. The second bedroom is at the back, with a double and single bed. Both bedrooms have plenty of storage space for your belongings.

In between the bedrooms is the bathroom, a space that‚Äôs been recently refurbished, featuring a tub with shower overhead plus a washbasin and WC.

Sleeping Arrangements
Bedroom 1 - 1 double bed
Bedroom 2 - 1 double bed and 1 single bed', '', '', '', '']

Title: Amazing views ‚òº High end beachfront 3bed sleeps 7
Description:
['About this space', "Enjoy the incredible views of the ocean from this modern, high end family home that sleeps up to 7. If that's not enough, there is an 80inch TV and full size pool table to keep everyone happy during your stay! This amazing property not only has views of the ocean and has great access to the sea front just down stairs and around the building and you are at the water. Evenings are catered for too as in only a few minutes walk you are at some of the islands best bars and restaurants.", 'The space', 'The space
Located on the first and second floor, this newly renovated house has a huge open plan kitchen, living and dining room which is great for family life. The slick modern kitchen comes fully equipped with everything you could need for a home from home visit including a dishwasher so no washing up! The large dining room table transforms into a fantastic pool table and can even be used for ping pong. The living area has a large comfy sofa so everyone can gather round to watch Netflix on the big screen. The whole room overlooks the sea though large patio doors which open out to a balcony with additional seating., perfect for an evening drink and watch the sunset.

Upstairs there is a master bedroom with the same fantastic view and a king size bed. The second bedroom is also a double and both have built in storage. The third bedroom has bunk beds and a further pull out bed so sleeps 3. There is an upstairs laundry cupboard with a washing machine.

Outside there is off road parking and a quick walk around the building gets you to the seafront.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Spacious 1 bed Hove apartment 200m from the beach
Description:
['About this space', 'This bright and spacious 1 bedroom apartment is situated only 200m away from the picturesque beach front of Hove.

This quaint setting is perfect for a memorable weekend getaway or a great base whilst you experience the natural beauty of the South Downs.

With high ceilings and stunning sea views, this property offers a comfortable nights sleep for up to 4 guests.

Enjoy exploring the plethora of independent cafes, restaurants and pubs of Hove - less than a 10 minute walk away from the flat.', 'The space', 'The space
The property is a converted Victorian villa with period features, situation less than 200m from the sea. The rooms are bright and spacious with high ceilings and sash windows.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
We can provide daily parking permits for a charge. Please message us if you would like to request one. There is paid parking available through the PayByPhone app for on-street parking outside the flat, however this is 4 hours no return.']

Title: Casa Blanca Beach House, Sleeps 10+2, Camber Sands
Description:
['About this space', 'Get your Nantucket vibes in Casa Blanca, an exquisitely styled New England beach front home, bought and refurbished during lockdown. This stunning property is deceptively large and sits discreetly on the Camber Foreshore. It has been sympathetically and cleverly styled to create the most wonderful space for guests to enjoy the best of both the house and the landscape.', 'The space', 'The space
Sleeping 10 guests in four bedrooms, and the possibility of another two in the reading room on a sofa bed, it is the perfect home to celebrate or gather with friends and family for a truly memorable escape.

Arriving at property you enter into a roomy hallway, sit down kick off your shoes, hang up your coat and let the stress of life melt away.

If you want to cook up a storm, you won‚Äôt be disappointed ‚Äì the large open plan kitchen boasts a Range Master oven with 2 ovens, separate grill with an 6 ring induction hob including induction griddle plate; a microwave; two Bosch dishwashers; a large double Samsung fridge freezer with ice machine and a separate wine fridge. A nutribullet, bakeware, but more importantly for those coffee lovers a Sage Oracle touch coffee machine, bean to cup (full on arrival) with an integrated milk frother ‚Äì you won‚Äôt be needing to go anywhere for coffee (you won‚Äôt be wanting to go anywhere).

A bespoke 3 metre oak table, that seats 12 invites long lazy lunches or decadent dinners. If the cocktail hour takes hold, there is a plethora of options from the Honesty Bar ‚Äì cocktail shakers and martini glasses glint in the sunlight waiting to be shaken and stirred, all we ask is you top it up when you leave! The bifold doors allow the outside in.

Moving into the sitting room, the soft muted tones with large corner sofa and natural planters is the perfect place to while away the hours staring out to sea. There is a 75‚Ä≥ smart TV, together with all the apps, Netflix, Amazon Prime etc if you feel the need for some downtime, if you can drag yourself away from the view. Sonos provides the sound throughout the ground floor.

Casa Blanca is an all year round property ‚Äì with its large conservatory with hot tub overlooking the beach (it is serviced and water changed every week if ordered). To the rear of the room is a pool table and darts board for extra entertainment. There is access into the garage which has been converted into a small gym (at your own risk) and has a table tennis table permanently set up. Two paddle boards are available for your enjoyment.

Taking yourself upstairs you will find four bedrooms and a reading room, two ensuite walk-in shower rooms and a large family bathroom. The master bedrooms and reading room all enjoy access onto the upper terrace ‚Äì an amazing place to sit and watch the kitesurfers fly by.

The rear double, with a four poster King bed with built in cupboards and dressing table, is next to the sizeable family bathroom with walk in shower, a large oval bath with hand shower, and double basin vanity unit. A haven for kids, with its four cabin beds (all 3ft wide) is the fourth massive bedroom, each bed comes with their own lights and USB plugs. You will also find a Playstation 5 (a number of games) and 42‚Ä≥ smart TV to keep the little (& big ones) entertained and a three seater sofa to chill. For the little ones, the house is equipped with a baby monitor, stair gate, high chair, bottle steriliser & travel cot.

The reading room is a small beach front room, where you can sit for hours and indulge in a chapter or two ‚Äì the sofa turns into a sofa bed and whilst the most amazing spot to wake up is not promoted as a bedroom but as an add on if you want a guest for an odd night or two.

Outdoor living is just as stylish as the inside; with a dining area (with the same table as the dining room), a built-in BBQ and Pizza oven you can enjoy eating alfresco whilst enjoying the breath taking and ever changing scenery or collapse in the comfy sofas, hammock or loungers. Every inch of Casa Blanca has been thoughtfully styled. Given the wealth of activities both on and off the water you may never want to leave!

We also welcome up to two dogs to the property - it is ¬£35 for the stay. You can add these at the time of booking.']

Title: The Little Lookout
Description:
['About this space', 'This memorable place is anything but ordinary. Formally the old coastguard tower on Littlehampton seafront, this small and unique stay is a little gem. Newly renovated the space is modern, light and airy. Situated directly on the seafront next to the harbour entrance, with incredible views from the 3rd and 4th floor balconies.

In the heart of West Sussex, only a 90 minute train ride from London & 15 mins from near by attractions Brighton, The south downs, Goodwood, Chichester & Arundel.', 'The space', 'The space
Originally built in 1931 the tower was left derelict for over 10 years or so before being fully renovated and refurbished, with the works only recently completed by ourselves in June 2021. The space has been cleverly split over 4 floors, each floor accessed by the new addition of a spiral staircase extension. As you enter the ground floor level you will find a small entrance hall that leads into the kitchen which is a bespoke handmade plywood kitchen finished off with a super cool gold Lusso Stone sink and tap and stunning stone worktops. On the first floor is the luxurious bathroom, in herringbone marble stone with a walk in shower and a full sized bath tub looking out to the sea & the river mouth. On the third floor you will find the bedroom with double doors leading out onto a cosy balcony, lay in bed at night and listen to the calming sound of the ocean, and finally on the top floor you will find the beautiful vaulted ceiling living space, with widows either side and double doors leading out onto a larger balcony again over looking the sea and the river mouth. There is a super comfortable double futon sofa bed on the top floor that can accommodate extra guests.

Each floor is carefully thought out and styled to a high standard with gorgeous throws and soft furnishings so even on a dark and stormy day you will still enjoy curling up and soaking in the incredible sea views.', '', '']

Title: King's View - Emsworth
Description:
['About this space', "King's View is a stunning town house with water front views in the centre of the charming and popular village of Emsworth. On your doorstep you can enjoy the fantastic restaurants including Fat Olives, 36 on the Quay or treat yourself to a night at JJ's restaurant and bar. All of the village pubs offer wonderful food and there are many independent cafes to enjoy too. The village has many independent shops with PO10 being a must visit featuring beautiful pieces made by the many local artists inspired by this scenic area.

Entering the property there is a utility area with washer/drier and shower and WC to the rear. Going up to the first floor into the sitting room you are greeted by the direct views of the water, this room is filled with comfortable furnishings to relax in while you enjoy your surroundings. Of an evening you can sit out on the balcony in the sunshine with a glass of wine or in the winter months, snuggled under a blanket taking in the stunning views across the marina and over Chichester Harbour. To the rear there is a kitchen dining area overlooking Slipper Pond. The kitchen has been thoughtfully equipped with everything you will need to self cater including Krups coffee machine, dishwasher, large 6 ring range, fridge and freezer and a kettle and toaster.

Taking the stairs up to the second floor there is a beautiful double bedroom with ensuite shower. The second bedroom has twin beds and the third has a single. There is a family bathroom with shower over the bath on the second floor.

Outside to the rear there is an open paved garden looking our over slipper pond

There is parking to the front of the property on the driveway for one car."]

Title: Panoramic sea view apartment
Description:
['About this space', 'This 2nd floor flat is located on the seafront, 100m from the beach. You will be in the heart of Kemptown village, 12 minutes walk from the centre of Brighton.
5 fantastic local pubs, all within 5mins from the flat, The Palace Pier is 8mins walk from the house, along with many other sights of Brighton.
There is a Bus stop literally opposite the house (just after Bedford Street) that can drop you off from the station, or take you into town and many other destinations in the area.', 'The space', 'The space

Title: Cosy 1 Bedroom Cottage in Yarmouth
Description:
['About this space', 'Our one bedroom, fully furnished, holiday cottage is located on the outskirts of the popular and historic harbour town of Yarmouth, Isle Of Wight. Set in 15 acres of landscaped grounds and pathways, which are gated and child safe.
An open plan living space runs the full depth of the cottage, with a kitchen at one end and a living space at the other.
A dining table and chairs is located inside along with an external seating area on the decking at the rear.', 'The space', 'The space
Kitchen area also has a dining table and chairs.
The lounge has a 2 seater sofa and an arm chair with doors leading to the decking area at the rear.
Bathroom has a shower over the bath.
Bedroom has a double bed, large fitted wardrobe and door leading to the rear of the property.
External decking at the rear has a table and chairs.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Parking is free on site in one of two car parks both of which are approximately 100m from the property.
The property is situated in 15 acres of landscaped grounds in a quiet area. Outside the grounds is a bus stop allowing access to the rest of the island. Local taxi firms are also available.']

Title: ‚òÖ Chic apartment right by the beach ‚òÖ Sea views ‚õ±
Description:
['About this space', 'Come and stay By Brighton Beach in our cute and comfortable apartment, complete with seafront views of the pier and Kemptown, just ten minutes walk from the centre of Brighton.', 'The space', "The space
The apartment has two spacious rooms, a bedroom and living room as well as a full kitchen and gorgeous bathroom with shower. Both of the main rooms have stunning views of the beach and across Brighton. There's also exclusive guest-only access to the magnificent gardens in Marine Square.", 'Guest access', "Guest access
There's lots of street parking available in the square and of course on the main beach road. Parking is limited to 4 hour slots, but there are a number of long-term car parks you can use too. Or, if you'd like to arrive by train, it's about a 15-20 minute amble through North Laine and Old Steine, down to the pier and along the seafront.

Our apartment is within a stunning Regency-style block, built around 1826. Everyone who visits really enjoys the ride in the original lift... think all those classic novels you've read about the Victorian days!", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please note we are 100% kid friendly and can provide a travel cot, kids plates, bowls and cutlery and even games for our younger guests!']

Title: New & Luxury 3 Bedroom Apartment - Mayfair
Description:
['About this space', "Live the life of luxury in London's most desirable neighbourhood in this beautiful and specious 3 bedroom apartment.

A stay in Mayfair offers everything from Art Galleries, Museums and the finest dining experiences and arguably some of the best shopping in the world, all within a moments walk or short cab ride of this luxury serviced apartment. Title: Idyllic beachside cottage next to nature reserve.
Description:
['About this space', 'Fabulously located between the beach on one side and a woodland nature reserve on the other, this cottage is perfect for families who like the outdoors, or couples and friends looking for an idyllic getaway retreat. The cottage has fantastic sea views from both master bedroom and living room; gardens to both front and rear, where there is a small gate that open directly onto a woodland nature reserve and the Isle of Wight coastal path; and in the winter months, a lovely cosy log burning fire.', 'The space', 'The space
The cottage was built to house married officers stationed at the Victorian-era coastal fortress next door, and many original features remain. It has been recently renovated to a very high standard, with a new custom-built kitchen, new bathroom, modern electric heating system, double-glazed timer sash windows and full redecoration throughout.

The rear (woodland-facing) garden receives sun in the morning until mid-afternoon, so is the perfect spot to enjoy al-fresco breakfast or lunch. In the late afternoon/early evening, the sun is out at the sea facing garden, where you can enjoy a glass of wine (or cup of tea) watching the yachts sailing by. Sunsets over the fort are fabulous.']

Title: Beachfront home, perfect for families and friends
Description:
['About this space', 'A bright, welcoming and family-friendly four bedroom house right on the East Beach of Selsey. Enjoy sea views from the lounge balcony and two of the second floor bedrooms and a gorgeous sunset in the garden at the end of the day.
Guests can enjoy use of the whole house, with wifi, smart tv and a fully equipped kitchen.
Follow us on Facebook @No4Kingsway for more info, pictures and updates.', 'The space', 'The space
No. 4 Kingsway is the perfect place for family and friends to relax and enjoy time together. The owners have catered for families and groups of friends alike.
An amazing local photographer and an incredibly talented artist feature throughout to brighten the walls of the house.
Three bedrooms on the second floor offer a Super king bed, King sized bed and Bunk Beds. The ground floor bedroom has a Double bed and double doors onto the patio. There is a family bathroom, with separate shower on the second floor and a separate toilet and wash basin on the ground floor.
The kitchen is fully equipped with plenty of dining space, with plastic plates, cutlery and cups for the kids.
The lounge is spacious and bright, the perfect place to relax with breathtaking views from the balcony.
The garden is simple and provides a relaxed area to spend time with a large dining table, our fabulous mud kitchen for the kids will keep them busy for hours!
There is also a large shed that guests may use during their stay which is perfect for your water sports equipment or bikes - you will need to provide your own padlock.', '', '']

Title: BEAUTIFUL DOUBLE ROOM AVAILABLE IN BEACH HOUSE
Description:
['About this space', 'This beautiful double bedroom with en-suite, with amazing seaviews for you to relax and have the beach life. This benefits from having direct sea views with on-suite shower room. The host Richard who lives there will be providing you with a delicious breakfast each morning. You also can use the downstairs living areas too and chill out on his lovely decking, use his outside bath and take in the sea views. Please note the decking area is till 11 pm as we have to respect the nearby residents.', 'The space', 'The space
You will have your own double bedroom overlooking the sea with en-suite shower room. The sitting area downstairs can be used and use of the sun terrace but the rest of the house is where the owner lives.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
With a small car this can be parked on the driveway', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please note Richard does have two small well trained dogs on the property. Also regarding the decking area is till 11 pm as we have to respect the nearby residents.']

Title: Oceans 37 ....Stunning panoramic views.
Description:
['About this space', 'Oceans 37
A stunning Victorian apartment with panoramic views overlooking the English Channel located in St Leonards on sea, Hastings.', 'The space', 'The space
Our apartment is newly decorated with a modern feel while still keeping the beautiful Victorian features. The views are spectacular, especially sun rises & sunsets.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please note the two beds in the living room are good size single futons. We also have a travel cot & mattress available.

Please be aware that there are two flights of stairs to the apartment.

The 32 inch TV in the living room has free view and is also a smart
TV + HD DVD Player

Beach towels, cool bag + freezer blocks with picnic set provided + 2 beach chairs, all set for a day at the beach.

Free use of the safe.']

Title: A relaxing haven with superb views
Description:
['About this space', 'The space
Location, location, location.... this stunning studio apartment situated in historic Rottingdean certainly gets three ticks for that.
You are literally seconds from the seafront and ideally situated to explore your beautiful surroundings.
The apartment boasts a fully fitted kitchen with modern appliances, a bath with a shower and a spacious uncluttered living area that provides a feeling of space and tranquility. There is a double pull down bed which folds away easily.
Sitting at the table in front of the window you are treated to unspoilt panoramic views.
Rudyard Kipling made Rottingdean his home and the old house adjacent to Kipling Gardens is still standing. Rottingdean is also notable for the black wooden windmill on the hill.
It boasts many pubs including the Ye Old Black Horse which dates back to 1513 making it the oldest pub in Rottingdean.
For your convenience there is a Tesco Express, a pharmacy, cafes, bakers, fishmonger, butcher and much more all in Rottingdean High Street. Car parking is less than than three minutes walk away in a council run car park.
Just 4.2 miles from the vibrant city of Brighton, access is easy with an efficient and regular bus service.
This gem of an apartment offers you the best of both worlds.']

Breathtaking direct sea views and a balcony from the master is perfect for watching the sunset with a glass of bubbly.

Seaford is the perfect location, with Brighton, Eastbourne and Lewes all nearby.

With the seven sisters trail nearby and a stunning 3 mile beach in front of you this house is for a staycation.', 'The space', 'The space
Cosy and modern']

Title: Beachfront self-contained one bedroom annexe
Description: ['About this space', 'Come and stay at this tranquil beachfront hideaway. This is a self-contained one bedroom annexe with its own en suite bathroom, kitchen and patio. You will have direct access to the beach and a sea view. Famous for its crab and seafood, sold at beachside huts, Selsey is also a short drive from the sandy dunes of The Witterings, Goodwood Estate and Racecourse, and historic Chichester. The 350-year-old, renowned Crab & Lobster pub is our local.', 'The space', 'The space\nThe annexe has one bedroom with a king size bed, an en suite bathroom with a wet room shower, a sitting room/kitchen (with a TV on the wall) and a seafront patio.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access\nThere is free, on-street parking outside the house. The nearest train station is Chichester, with bus services to Selsey. We are a five minute walk from the bus station. Taxis are also readily available at Chichester train station.']

Title: Marine Court,  Bognor Regis
Description:
['About this space', 'Over looking Bognor Regis sea front Marine Court is the perfect holiday destination throughout the year. Enjoy the bright sunshine on the balcony in summer or cosy down and watch the waves crash in the winter. No matter the time of year; with these spectacular views of the sea you will never be bored of sitting in this living room.

Turn left out of the apartment and you can walk the coastline and be at Bognor Regis pier in only 5 minutes. A fantastic fish and chip shop can be found here also! Turn right out of the coastline and you can continue along the coast to Aldwick and even onto Pagham .

The large living space is light and airy with a window spanning the entire width of the room. The kitchen is partially open plan giving your a window to the sea views also. Carefully refurbished this apartment makes the most of the stunning views on offer.

The living room includes dining space and large television for cosying down with a movie after a busy day of exploring. Bognor Regis has many local eateries (Mustards is a favourite) to dine out or order in and enjoy in the comfort of your holiday home. With plenty of takeaway deliveries on offer you will be spoilt for choice. If you prefer to have a shop delivered this well equipped kitchen has everything you need to cook up a feast while away.

Marine Court has two bedrooms and bathroom with shower between. Free wifi included. Parking space is available at rear but the drive is narrow and may not suit wide vehicles. Free parking is available locally if you would prefer.']

Title: Stylish apartment with amazing sea views
Description: ['About this space', 'The Lookout is situated directly on the sea front between Southend on sea and Thorpe bay. We have stunning sea views and our balcony is the perfect place to watch the sunset over Southend pier. The beach is right outside our front door and a 15 min walk along it will take you to Southend sea front, with its many arcades and Adventure island.\nThe 1 bedroom luxury apartment has a king size bed, south facing balcony, full kitchen, stylish wet room, 50" curved tv, free wifi and a log burner.', 'The space', 'The space\nRecently refurbished, beautifully decorated and modern one bedroom apartment. Perfect for couples looking for a romantic break. Located directly on the seafront where you are able to take a nice stroll to one of the many restaurants or towns nearby such as Southend on sea and Thorpe bay.']

Title: Amazing views! 2 bed central apartment ‚òºsleeps 4‚òº
Description:
['About this space', "Watch the ships and the sea from the comfort of your own living room all whilst only minutes from the main bars/restaurants of Southsea. This spacious two bed apartment that sleeps up to four is perfect for a weekend away. With a modern kitchen, newly fitted bathroom with walk in shower, two spacious double bedrooms and uninterrupted views of the sea, all set within a beautiful period property. Fantastic access to the best of Southsea's attractions, Gunwharf Quays and Old Portsmouth.", '', 'The space
Upon entering this imposing period property you will climb the stairs to the third floor. There is a communal hallway which leads to the apartment which has a large open plan kitchen, living dining room perfect for time with the family. There is a large smart TV and even a Nintendo Wii! There are two large double bedrooms with storage facilities and the master bedroom has an amazing view across the the common and out to the sea. There is a high spec family bathroom with plenty of room.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
The apartment is a stone throw away from all the best bars, restaurants and cafes of Southsea. You are within minutes from Gunwharf Quays, IOW ferry, The Historic Dockyard and also you can see victorious festival from your window!

Southsea Common Car Park is located 50m from the property and is pay and display. Due to it's central location there is not any onsite parking for this property and the street parking is limited.

**Note that there is not any lift access and this apartment is on the 3rd floor of the building so guests must climb stairs**

**There are traditional sash windows which open from the bottom so please ensure children are not left unsupervised if open**", '', '']

Title: Salty Lodge,  (No.50)
Description:
['About this space', 'Cool chic and newly refurbished bungalow on the beach.

All you need for a perfect holiday at home, quiet road with magnificent views of the Solent and plenty of places to eat and drink nearby.

We are located down a quiet private road, but within 100m of a convenience store, pubs, and takeaways.', 'The space', 'The space
An enviously unique beach front position with all new fixtures and fittings.
Fabulous outdoor facilities for that perfect staycation!! Relax in the comfy New England Chairs or sunbathe on the padded sunbeds, book in hand and G&T in the other.

A charcoal barbeque at your disposal with outdoor table and chairs.

Inside the space is tastefully furnished with brand new comfortable chairs and sofas where you will be able to look out at the boats on the Solent.

The kingsize bedroom has its own patio door leading onto the deck with fabulous views again of the Solent, which can be enjoyed with your early morning cuppa!

The well equipped kitchen has a fridge freezer, oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine to make your stay easy and relaxing.

We have an outside 13amp plug for easy EV charging. This is by prior arrangement only and a fee of ¬£10 per charge needs to be paid directly to us.']

Title: 5 Bedroom Beach Front Property
Description:
['About this space', 'A wonderful 5 bedroom house - Offering uninterrupted views of the Thames Estuary. The beach and seafront are a stones throw away with some amazing restaurants, cafes and ice cream. Southend Seafront includes its own 1.3mile long pier with arcades,seafront casino, plus Adventure Island and Sealife Centre. Old Leigh is just a 15 min walk along the seafront where you can enjoy my favourite dog friendly pubs, fresh seafood, beautiful tea gardens and often live music and art.', 'The space', 'The space
Huge 5 bedroom beach front property with kids playhouse, ping pong table and parking for 5 cars. The property is full of character with high wooden paneling and handmade bespoke tables and stylish vintage furniture .

The beach and seafront are a stones throw away with some amazing restaurants, cafes and ice cream. Southend Seafront includes its own 1.3mile long pier with arcades, seafront casino, plus Adventure Island and Sealife Centre. Old Leigh is just a 15 min walk along the seafront where you can enjoy my favourite dog friendly pubs, fresh seafood, beautiful tea gardens and often live music and art.']

Title: Stunning East Sussex 4 Bed House, Private Beach
Description:
['About this space', "White Water House- a stunning 3 storey Edwardian property, boasting 4 dble bedrooms plus 3 bathrooms. (There's also a child's bed and travel cot available.)
This exquisite hideaway is ideal for families, couples or groups of friends seeking sanctuary from busy, bustling cities.
A peaceful location set in historical 1066 country, the property overlooks Pevensey Beach & features a decked front garden with alfresco dining area plus Beach Hut leading onto a private beach.", 'The space', 'The space
"a sleepy haven in which to take in the sea views as you wander along the shingle beaches and enjoy the invigorating air"

Recently refurbished & set directly on to Pevensey Beach, White Water House is ideal for beach side getaways & provides a cosy base all year round. Getting there couldn‚Äôt be easier, with it being an hour and half from London by car plus Eastbourne or Pevensey rail links being just 15 minutes and 5 minutes away respectively.

The main Living Space is a large through reception room with two large sofas plus a love seat set around a fireplace. The dining area includes a 10 seater table complete with banquette seating. French doors lead on to the beach side garden.

The well equipped kitchen includes double oven, coffee machine plus all other mod cons,
and there are several farm shops nearby, so you can cook some delicious local produce after a day spent at the beach.
Rear door leads on to a decked rear garden complete with Jacuzzi.

Stairs lead up to :

Master Bedroom: Stunning views directly on to the beach, this beautiful light and airy bedroom has a central Kingsize bed and ensuite bathroom. Dressing table & wardrobe.

Family Bedroom: Again with views on to the beach, this large bedroom includes a kingsize bed plus toddler bed. Dressing table & wardrobe.

Bedroom 3: Two single wooden sleigh beds, with wardrobe, overlooking rear garden.

Bedroom 4: Kingsize bed with wardrobe, overlooking rear garden.

Two further bathrooms.

All bedlinen and towels are Hotel quality.', '', '']

Title: Sea, surf & views
Description:
['About this space', 'At the end of a small cul de sac is a hidden gem. You will feel like you are holidaying on the beach itself, with nearly every room having stunning sea views. This beautiful three story house has a very large open plan kitchen, dinning and sitting room looking directly South opening out onto the sun terrace. It also has two additional balconies decadently furnished to watch the world go by.', 'The space', 'The space
The house has three floors.

It has a stunning top floor with top balcony. It‚Äôs bedrooms are all good sizes and furnished to facilitate two families very comfortably. The middle floor balcony accessed though the snug is such a comfortable spot for both dining and lounging. The ground floor has a large corner sofa and TV unit as well as dining and open plan kitchen with all the commodities.

This house is perfect for two families to holiday together as it is less than a stones through to the stunning Hayling beach with safe swimming and lots going on to see and do.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The house has space for off road 4 space parking.

Access to the beach at the bottom of the garden.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
You are allowed one well behaved dog but please do keep it off furniture, and be responsible owners on the beach.']

Title: Luxurious Beach House With Direct Beach Access
Description:
['About this space', 'Beach fronted large detached family house commanding spectacular sea views from the rear and superb far reaching rural views from the front. A truly luxurious getaway by the sea.', 'The space', 'The space
Key Feature
# Direct Beach Access
# Fenced Decked Area
# Outside Table & Chairs
# Charcoal BBQ
# Sun-Loungers
# One Dog welcome
# Travel Cot, Stair Gate & High Chair
On entering the property there is a ground floor entrance hall, separate utility room housing a washing machine and clothes airer, a double bedroom with a king-sized bed and large wardrobe, with views to the countryside. Adjacent to this bedroom there is a ground floor shower room with a walk-in shower cubicle, pedestal wash hand basin and lower level wc.
The rest of the accommodation is situated on the first floor including a 19‚Äô1 x 10‚Äô8 lounge looking out to sea, an impressive 23‚Äô8 x 8‚Äô3 second reception room with a dining table and chairs to seat 8 guests, also enjoying sea views. The property boasts a good sized and well fitted modern grey kitchen housing a full range of utensils, plates, pots and pans along with a toaster, microwave, kettle, American fridge freezer and microwave. The open plan kitchen and dining area leads into the spacious lounge which has a 70 inch flat screen tv, a large leather corner sofa and additional lounge chair and a bar area with two raised bar stools, with French doors opening onto a superb two-tiered sundeck with spectacular sea views and leading down directly on to a private beach. The sun deck has a modern rattan table and chairs along with four sun loungers.
There are three additional bedrooms on this level, one has a king-sized bed, one has a double bed and the other has two single beds, a travel cot and all with plentiful storage facilities for clothes.
There is an additional family shower room with a shower area, pedestal wash hand basin and a low level wc adjacent to one of the bedrooms.
At the front of the property there is off-road parking for several cars, along with a mature garden with shrubs and plants and a raised sun patio enjoying a rural outlook.
Pevensey Bay has a dog friendly shingle beach, it is a seaside resort in miniature, a good place to take a holiday and really unwind. We allow one small dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the beds.
When booking with us your stay will be protected by a deposit guarantee and public liability provided by our risk management partner, SUPERHOG. To benefit from this protection, you will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself or you can also go via their website, superhog.com to start the verification. To view the SUPERHOG privacy policy use this link: https://superhog.com/privacy-policydata-protection-policy/', '', '', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
A damage deposit of ¬£200.00 is payable . For direct bookings with beachside holiday rentals, this amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departure.
We allow one house trained dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the beds. For guests who may struggle with the internal 12 stairs there is a flat way into the property just a few houses down and along the beach which brings you into the back entrance. The majority of the house is then on one level. Please ask if you require any clarification on access or layout.

The cleaning fee covers all cleaning, laundry/towels and bed linens which we provide for your stay.']

Title: Climping Beach House - a perfect beach getaway
Description:
['About this space', 'The Beach House is a tranquil space overlooking Climping Beach, perfect both as a chance to spend some time on this lovely part of the coast at an unspoilt beach and as a great base for exploring. The light is stunning, the air is clear and guests who arrive all feel the relaxing benefits of being so close to the sea.
With two large bedrooms, peaceful living area and a light & airy bathroom, the Beach House has views over the sea and South Downs.', 'The space', 'The space
Self contained and sleeps two or four, the Beach House has views over the sea and South Downs.
Upstairs there is a large bedroom with king sized bed, a bathroom with loo, basin and bath (no shower), a second bedroom that can be made up as either twin beds or a double (this bedroom is open to the staircase), and a large dining area with a kitchenette with fridge, kettle, microwave, toaster and crockery etc.
Our wifi is not the always the fastest because of the location down a country lane right at the beach but we are hoping you will come here for some time away from life online.

To be clear, you will have a separate, self contained unit whilst not the entire building. There is another room, accessed separately, but within the same building.

We are sorry but this space is not suitable for young children under 7.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The Beach House is not suitable for small children. We suggest a lower age of 7 years old, but are happy to chat about whether it would be suitable for your child before you book.
The bedrooms and bathroom are up a flight of stairs so this not suitable for people who cannot manage stairs - sorry.']

Title: Serenity  "your calm seafront retreat"
Description:
['About this space', "'Serenity' is a luxurious two bedroom house with breathtaking views of the sea. The property is located right on the seafront which means you can go from the lounge to water within a minute.

This completely self contained property has access to one private parking space. The private decking area at the front of the property has views of the breathtaking sunsets and sunrises daily- perfect for alfresco dining or a peaceful morning coffee.

This property is managed by Air Premier", 'The space', 'The space
This property can comfortably host four adults as both the bedrooms contain double beds. This property has an open plan modern kitchen which leads onto the outside decking area. The lounge is bright and has stunning views of the sea- as does the master bedroom.

The master bedroom has a large private balcony and an electric fan.

Coffee machine Bosch tassimo']

Title: Seascape
Description:
['About this space', 'Step straight on to the beach and enjoy spectacular views out to sea in this spacious property - perfect for a couple, family or small group of friends to get away from it all.

The property comprises a large bright kitchen/living room overlooking Seaford beach, a spacious double bedroom, a second bedroom with bunk beds, and a newly fitted bathroom.

Seaford is surrounded by stunning countryside. The train station is 5 mins walk, and the property enjoys free parking outside the flat.', 'The space', "The space
The flat has easy access on the ground floor. It's perfectly located for people-watching on the Esplanade, or spotting the ferry to Dieppe.

It has been refurbished with a new bathroom and a well-equipped kitchen. Everything you will need for a comfortable break at the seaside is provided.

There is free parking on the road outside the flat. Seaford town centre is only 3 minutes walk away and many walks across East Sussex can be started from the door."]

Title: Family holiday home with amazing panoramic views
Description:
['About this space', 'Waters Edge is a nordic style water front house with its own private sea shore and panoramic views of the Solent. The house is suited for family holidays or groups with 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a large open plan sitting / dining room extending to a deck over looking the Solent.
It is ideally positioned on the edge of Yarmouth where beaches, walks and various activities can be enjoyed. West Wight is fast becoming a foodie haven with a plethora of options from cafes through to fine dining.', 'The space', 'The space
This is our much loved ‚Äòhome from home‚Äô that is set up for our young family and guests to enjoy.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
All areas except for the garage.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The coastal defence gabions are dangerous not for walking or climbing over.
The tide in the Solent is extremely strong, therefore swimming off the jetty is at your own risk and children must be kept away from the seafront.
The gardens at the seafront are open. Guests should not venture in front of our neighbours houses and should respect their privacy.']

Title: Home By The Sea | Free Parking & Prosecco!
Description:
['About this space', "Tucked away at the tipping point of Kemp Town, this cosy apartment provides a great launch pad for a break-away to explore Brighton's bohemian vibes.

The kitchen/living space filled with sunshine in the morning, you can enjoy a coffee with a glimpse of the sea. A big cozy Casper bed in the bedroom which is a quiet sun trap in the afternoons. However you choose to take your break - this apartment allows you to explore, retreat and nest all at the same time.", 'The space', "The space
While the apartment is cosy, it has everything you need. In the kitchen, there is a fridge/ freezer, washer/dryer, and a dishwasher for those lazy evenings. The hob while it's small, can take 3 pans at once, enough to cook a small banquet!

The apartment is set up and ready to go. There are USB charging points throughout the flat to charge your phone. There's a Bluetooth speaker in the bathroom, for a shower singalong. There's an Amazon Fire Stick in the living room for accessing Netflix and Amazon Prime.

The bedroom has lots of storage so that you can unpack and make yourself at home. There's a side lamp for late-night reading and goose-feather duvet and pillow to keep you sufficiently snuggled. Extra blankets, pillows and central heating are prerequisite. You'll also find some bonus paddle boards and roller skates in the wardrobe you're very welcome to try out if the sea is calm for the weekend :)", '', '', '', '']

Description:
['About this space', 'Our variety of Standard and Premium Lake Lodges offer the perfect accommodation for those seeking lets in the historic town of Chichester. Title: Stylish house on Winchelsea beach, near Camber
Description:
['About this space', 'Sitting on the shores of Winchelsea Beach is Cloudbreak ‚Äì a new contemporary build, with stunning views of the sea and easy access to the beach that is directly on the doorstep of this modern property, built beside the bike path and walkway along the beach. It is a short drive from the medieval town of Rye with all its history ‚Äì Cloudbreak is perfectly situated to explore the surrounding area.', 'The space', 'The space
Turning the house upside down, it benefits from the spectacular views of the beach ‚Äì the open plan living allows its guests to fully relax in sumptuous luxury. Attention to detail, top notch kitchen facilities and stylish furniture encourages our guests to fully enjoy seaside living. The sitting room boasts a 65‚Ä≥ smart TV with a Sonos soundbar to maximise alternate viewing, if required! Off the kitchen, sits a tiny snug, an escape from the day, with a 55‚Ä≥ smart TV with PlayStation4, and a vast library of DVDs.

For the chef, the kitchen is beyond well equipped to knock out a perfect meal; with a Neff double oven, Neff induction hob, microwave, Nespresso Coffee Machine ‚Äì top of the range saucepans and baking equipment it is a delight to cook in ‚Äì nearly as good as the view! The balcony stretches the length of the property, floor to ceiling sliding doors allow the outside in and you can watch the world go by!

The sound of the sea always encourages a peaceful nights rest ‚Äì the master bedroom on the middle floor overlooks the sea, with a superking bed, dressed with 600 thread count linen, styled in muted colours, a dressing room leads onto the ensuite shower room. With curtains and sheers for privacy, the bedroom is an oasis of calm.

There are two further bedrooms, both with king beds, one has and ensuite shower room and the family bathroom with bath/shower sits between the bedrooms. All beautifully furnished for your complete comfort.

Entering Cloudbreak on the ground floor, there is a garage that is fully insulated and houses the games room ‚Äì with full size table tennis table, and perfect place to store bikes, surfboards etc. Another fridge freezer is housed in the garage so that you can keep a well stocked supply! The hallway has a large cupboard to hang your coats. Beyond the stair case is another snug room - an escape for teenagers (with sofa bed), next a utility room with shower and loo together with Bosch Washing machine and dryer. The snug also leads out onto the enclosed sunken courtyard ‚Äì with BBQ and outdoor seating via a glass french door. The large sofa bed that can accommodate two extra guests ‚Äì once the bed is down, access to the bathroom is compromised.

We allow up to two dogs - please add them to your booking.']

Title: Little Beacon Beach House ,  Selsey
Description:
['About this space', 'Set on Selsey sea front overlooking our beautiful south coast‚Äôs blue seas, Little Beacon is a wonderful retreat quite literally a stone‚Äôs throw from the water‚Äôs edge with direct access to the sea via a private gate only available to two of properties in the quiet cul se sac. With an abundance of independent restaurants, cafes and shops Selsey has everything you will want while on your holidays and with a regular bus service running from Chichester a car is not necessary.

Little Beacon Beach House has a large open plan living room with flat screen television, free Wi-Fi and amazon fire stick so you can login and cosy down in the evening after a busy day of exploring. Overlooking the beach and with sea views this is the perfect spot to unwind.

The dining room leads on from the lounge and has room to seat your party comfortably. The dining room is open plan to the beautifully light conservatory which leads out to the courtyard garden. The garden has four sun loungers and an outdoors dining table with seating.

Little Beacon Beach House has a well-equipped kitchen with everything you will need to effectively self-cater during your stay. This includes dishwasher, fridge, freezer, microwave, toaster, cafeti√®re and washing machine.

Little Beacon Beach House has two bedrooms, one double bedroom over looking the sea and one double bedroom over looking the garden with a shower room en-suite. The first floor has a family bathroom with shower cubicle and bathtub. There is a further WC on the ground floor.

Off road parking for two cars.']
