Title: Stunning sea views at a charming character cottage
Description:
['About this space', 'Coastguard cottage in a idyllic location between the beach and a woodland conservation area on stunning coastline. Beautiful walks, fantastic views, gorgeous sunsets over a historical Fort next door. Perfect for family holidays and groups of friends.', 'The space', 'The space
The best things about Wight Cottage are waking up in the master bedroom to a fabulous and uninterrupted view of the sea, and sipping a glass of wine or a cup of tea in the sea facing garden at sunset while watching the boats sail by. There are also great views over the sea from the living room downstairs.

The cottage itself was built in 1855 and is packed with original features, including an open log burning fire and original doors. It has been renovated for 2017, including a new heating system with modern electrical heaters for maximum comfort.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Sorry but Wight Cottage does not accept dogs at the moment, but we do have other cottages which are dog friendly.']

Title: Spacious Modern Beach House
Description:
['About this space', 'Sleeps 8. Sleeps 8. A large Beach House situated right on the waters edge.
3D Tour copy this link into your browser: https://vt.ehouse.co.uk/7Ft3Ekkm3MH
(Please note the 3D video shows our listing with an additional bedroom with en-suite attached but on this listing for Driftwood 8 the reservation does not include access to this bedroom, you would need to book through Driftwood 10 to have access to this facility).
Newly renovated Jan 2021 to a modern and contemporary style throughout, with its own gated beach garden to the rear and an additional secluded courtyard garden to the front of the house offering some privacy and a place to enjoy the evening sunset.', 'The space', "The space
Key Features
# Beach-Fronted
# Enclosed Decked Area
# Four Bathrooms
# Travel Cot, Stair Gate & High Chair
# Safe
# Pool Table
Arranged over three floors and offering well laid out and generous living accommodation, this is the perfect holiday home for a large family or group. This property really does make the most of the breath-taking views on offer.
The house has a garage for one car at the front with additional space for two parked cars in the forecourt. Beyond the double garage there is a secluded large courtyard garden that has a wooden table and chairs, a wooden bench and nice area to enjoy some privacy and of course the sunset in the evenings, this than leads us to the main house. Inside the front door which is accessed via the courtyard garden, there is a lobby and a utility room on the left containing a washing machine, dryer, iron, ironing board, washing line etc..., a shower room and WC, and on the right is a bedroom with a triple sleeper bed.
From the lobby there are stairs leading up to the main floor, which is on the same level as the beach, there is a large open plan sitting room that inter-connects with the dining area through to a newly fitted kitchen with everything you need to comfortable prepare and cook your owns meals, a second sitting area which looks out to sea which contains two double sofas, a triple corner sofa, two arm chairs, side tables with lamps and a TV with DVD player. Having been completely refurbished in Jan 2021 to a modern and contemporary style, truly a room you will not want to leave. The floors are wooden giving you a real seaside feel, there are two double bedrooms on the same floor, one of which has an En-suit bathroom. There is also a fully fitted family bathroom just of the lounge area with bathroom with a bath/shower, hand wash basin and WC.
The beach is accessed directly from the lounge area with concertina doors opening onto a large decking area with an outside dining table and benches, two armchairs with a coffee table, a 3-seater hammock swing, 2-seater bench with beach accessories stored underneath, all over the beach garden with uninterrupted views towards the coast.
A wooden staircase leads to the top floor which has a double bedroom with a super king-size bed and En-suite bathroom with the benefit of heated flooring, a WC, shower and heated towel rail, on the same floor there is also another lounge sitting area with an additional TV & DVD Player, a Bluetooth Stereo system, loads of DVD's and books for all ages to keep the family entertained indoors too, an HP printer if you want to connect your laptop and some USB cables to charge up your Phone, the lounge then leads on to a balcony that has two three seater benches to sit and enjoy the far reaching and uninterrupted views towards The English Channel.
There is a hotel style wall mounted safe in the master bedroom for safekeeping valuables.
Bed linen and Towels provided. On each bed you will find a set of towels per person. Travel cot, highchair and child safety stairgate is available upon request. Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Free use of Kayak (at users‚Äô risk), please only use in safe waters and under adult supervision. life jackets provided.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Entry instructions will be provided 4 days prior to your arrival date.
Covid-19 Guidelines
All guests are responsible for meeting any U.K current Covid-19 guidelines in place whilst staying in one of our
properties.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
A damage deposit of ¬£200.00 is payable . For direct bookings with beachside holiday rentals, this amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departure.
Lost keys will be charged at ¬£25.00 per set.

The owner supplies a welcome starter of tea, coffee, sugar, dishwasher tablets, washing up liquid, kitchen roll, salt, pepper, oil, dishcloth, and pad. One bath towel per guest and an additional hand towel in each bathroom along with the first toilette roll & kitchen roll.']

Title: A proper beach house with great views
Description:
['About this space', 'My place is close to Rye, Hastings, the sea, great walks. You‚Äôll love my place because of its location right on the beach, the light and its open feel. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).', 'The space', 'The space
The house is a two-storey 1980s house re-clad in Siberian larch. It is situated in the small hamlet of Pett Level and is one of only twenty houses on the beach; all the houses are different styles and sizes.

The house has been comfortably furnished as a home for the owners. It is an upside down house - there is a large living room upstairs ‚Äì which includes kitchen and dining room with a terrace overlooking the sea. It easily sleeps eight people; it has two double rooms, two twin-bedded rooms and one bathroom and one shower room. It is centrally heated.
The house is situated in the most fantastic position ‚Äì stunning sea views in one direction, the end of the South Downs the other ‚Äì over which you get some amazing sunsets. The garden leads straight onto the beach.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
There's one parking space outside the house and ample parking on the other side of the road. The beach is accessible from a gate at the end of the garden"]

Title: The Smugglers Retreat
Description:
['About this space', 'Beautifully presented south facing sea front apartment with exceptional panoramic views out over the English Channel and the beach on its doorstep. Located at the heart of Hastings, seconds from the town centre and only minutes‚Äô walk from Hastings station, this perfect seaside retreat is ideal for a short break to Hastings.
To the front of the apartment is a large, bright living-dining room with sofa bed, double height ceilings, floor to ceiling windows and French doors leading to a full width south facing balcony, ideal for evening drinks or al fresco dining. Adjacent is the fully equipped modern fitted kitchen complete with Nespresso machine, dishwasher, microwave and full range of cutlery and crockery.
To the rear are two spacious double bedrooms, the master featuring a king-sized bed, and both fitted with wardrobes for storage. The apartment is complete with a stylish contemporary bathroom with part tiled walls, pedestal hand basin and shower.
This fantastic seaside home has recently undergone extensive restoration and the attention to detail is evident in every room with high quality finishes and luxury furnishings throughout. Ideal for anyone looking for a stylish seaside retreat.
This apartment can be booked in conjunction with our other stunning seafront holiday let apartments, ideal for larger groups or families or events as all of our short break apartments are situated in the same building.
Our holiday homes come complete with an on call service should you need us during your stay
Hastings is home to the largest beach-launched fishing fleet in Europe, the remains of the first castle in England to be built by William the Conqueror , A Stunningly beautiful and preserved old town and a strong local arts community.
Hastings is really three towns in one joined by a level promenade; the Old Town to the east, the bustling contemporary shopping town centre in the middle and St Leonards to the west featuring the classical elegance of James Burton‚Äôs architecture and the fashionable Norman Road ‚Äì recently named as the new ‚ÄòPortobello Road-on sea‚Äô by The Times` and offering a great collection of antique shops and vintage galleries.
Hastings has grown in popularity as a seaside destination attracting many visitors and holidaymakers over the summer season. With multiple festivals and attractions taking place not to mention the huge music and arts scene there is always plenty to do. sign up to our news letter or check out our blog to keep up to date with what is going on.', '', '']

Title: Compact studio minutes from the seafront
Description:
['About this space', 'Centrally located around the corner from the sea front, the West pier, and just off of Western road, this compact and stylish studio flat is the perfect place for a quick getaway in Brighton. Easily accessible by foot to all the attractions. 10 minutes from train station.
The space itself is very small but includes kitchen facilities, (fridge, stove, microwave, grill). You have lots of storage space for your belongings.', 'The space', 'The space
A lovely little studio moments from the seafront. Light, bright and really cosy. It is a very small space so not really suitable for a couple for more than a few days. Ideal for a short break where you just need somewhere to rest your head. Shops, bars & restaurants nearby, the location is hard to beat.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
The "little room" is a small bedsit located in between the ground and first floor flat in the building. The building is a quiet residential building so not suitable for loud parties. If that is what you are looking for, please find another booking.']

Title: * Sea View * Stylish * Love * St. Leonards *
Description:
['About this space', "This stylish, bright and airy flat sits at the end of the Marina seafront in West St Leonards on the first floor of a Seafront Victorian property, with a balcony. Facing the sea is the large living area with open plan kitchen, brand new gas range stove, fridge, freezer and dishwasher. We have good working WIFI.", 'The space', 'The space
Beautiful modern living space with uninterupted views of the sea.
Walking distance to happening St Leonards, Marina and Hastings.
Historical town with fantastic art scene.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Fully contained apartment to enjoy.']

Title: Stunning beach front location with roof terrace
Description:
['About this space', "A period townhouse set on the seafront in St Leonards-On-Sea. This stunning Grade II listed home has been lovingly restored and refurbished throughout to a high standard.

Situated in the popular 'Marina' area of the seafront at St Leonards-On-Sea, the property is in a prime position with access the cycle path and the promenade giving you walking access to to the arts quarter of Norman Road, the Pier, Hastings Old Town and the Jerwood Gallery.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access

Title: Bennett‚Äôs End guesthouse
Description:
['About this space', 'A private guesthouse at the bottom of our garden for you to enjoy a break from home. It has a lounge and kitchen area with a separate bedroom and ensuite bathroom. The kitchen has a mini fridge,microwave, toaster and kettle. We provide tea, coffee, sugar and milk. Entrance via lockbox, I will email details prior to arrival.
There is street parking or you can park in the garden (depending on size of vehicle). Our guest house is only one bedroom and is not suitable for children or pets.', 'The space', 'The space
We live on a quiet street yet minutes away from plenty of things to do and see. To see how close we are to the sea go to you tube and type in Bennett‚Äôs End guest house and see a video taken by one of our guests Stephen Bells drone.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You have your own private patio at the side of the garage with chairs, table, parasol and barbecue to sit outside to enjoy the sun.']

Title: Hove Prom large sunny 2 bed 2 bath sleeps 4.
Description:
['About this space', 'A very spacious and sunny 2 double bedroomed South-facing seafront garden flat. Huge open plan living/dining/study room 25x21 feet max. 9 foot by 7 foot L shaped leather sofa, and new dining suite. Bespoke luxury fitted kitchen. Both rectangular bedrooms have en-suites, walk-in wardrobes, and brand new pure cotton bed linen. Over 900sq.ft in total floorspace. If you are using airbnb for the first time, please message us with the names, ages, occupations etc of your party and have verification.', 'The space', 'The space
‚Ä¢The flat is located directly on Hove seafront. Just cross the road to the promenade and the beach opposite.
‚Ä¢ If you are booking Airbnb for the first time, please message us with the full names, ages, occupations etc of your party - a little information about yourselves - and the nature of your trip. Please have your verification process complete.
‚Ä¢ Seafront location.
‚Ä¢ 950 square feet.
‚Ä¢ South facing flat with a private front garden and patio complete with bistro furniture.
‚Ä¢ Huge, bright and airy 25x21 feet L-shaped lounge/dining/study room with two big South facing sash windows overlooking your private front garden and patio. Relax on the massive new 9 feet by 7 feet L- shaped leather sofa.
‚Ä¢Two double bedrooms both with luxury en-suite bath/shower rooms. Underfloor heating in both en-suites. The bath is double ended and the shower cubicles are double size.
‚Ä¢ Luxury custom built walk-in dressing room to master suite, and walk-in wardrobe to second bedroom.
‚Ä¢ Super fast fibre optic Broadband with 4k Firestick HD TV, Netflix app and all the players.
‚Ä¢ Family friendly.
‚Ä¢ Recently refurbished.
‚Ä¢ Luxury 11x6 fitted kitchen with huge solid Walnut worktops, and soft close cupboards, Samsung fridge freezer new 2021, brand new washing machine, gas hob with wok burner, fan oven grill, combination microwave convection oven and underfloor heating.

‚Ä¢ Entire property externally decorated summer 2019.', '', '']

Title: Annex By The Sea
Description:
['About this space', 'Brand new beautiful modern self contained studio room.

Perfect for couples or small family (travel cot available) looking for an escape by the sea.', 'The space', 'The space
- Private Off road parking.
- WiFi.
- Own private entrance with access to outside decked area & garden.
- Outside table & chairs & Egg Chair.
- 1 King size bed, 40 inch smart TV, wardrobe, Sofa, Coffee Table.
- Private shower room, with toilet.
- The Body Shop toiletries.
- Fully equipped kitchen with mini fridge, microwave, mini oven, hob, kettle, toaster.
- Tea & Coffee provided.
- Travel Cot & Highchair available on request can stretch to other baby items if needed please let me know.
- Close to Town Centre (5 minute walk), beach (7-10 minute walk) & train station (7-10 minute walk).
- Closely located to south downs for walks and historic town of Arundel.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
- Private Off road parking.
- Private entrance with access to outdoor space.
- Keycode box for self-check in.
- Owner always available to assist with any queries.
- Check in: 2pm.
- Check out: 11am.
***can be flexible on check-in/out if no back to back booking so please do contact me to discuss***', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Littlehampton Beach.
West Beach - opposite side of River with Sand Dunes.

- Kite Surfing, paddle boarding, sailing, fishing.
- Tennis courts.
- Pitch & Putt & Crazy Golf.
- Swimming Pool & Gym.
- Restaurants and cafe's.

Further afield:
- Historic Arundel.
- Golf courses.
- The South Downs.
- Goodwood & Fontwell Racecourses.
- Goodwood Festival of Speed & Revival.
- Brighton.
- Chichester."]

Title: Seafront balcony, lovely spacious relaxing flat
Description:
['About this space', "This recently renovated spacious flat is on St Leonards seafront, close to the new pier, Warrior Square, Hastings, the Jerwood gallery etc, many restaurants, the beach, and all sorts of other activities. It has amazing views from its roomy balcony, high ceilings and a great location. It's laid out in shabby chic style, bare floorboards, rugs, open plan, etc. It's a very comfortable space and place to relax in. A wonderful antidote to city life...a few minutes here and you're relaxed!", 'The space', "The space
The flat comprises a beautiful and very large room (with two windows and a sizeable balcony looking straight onto the sea, comfortable sofas, an indoor viewing platform (which you can sleep on at your own risk!), and at the back the kitchen area), the bathroom and the double bedroom. It's a really wonderful place to relax and enjoy yourself in. You can, incidentally, hear the soft and lovely sound of the waves as you sit in the flat.

PLEASE NOTE - I've instant booking turned on but I'd prefer an enquiry first if possible. Also, the instant booking says seven days notice, but it's worth asking me if you want to book within seven days as sometimes it may be possible. Thanks", 'Guest access', "Guest access
You have the whole flat to use to yourselves. It's on the fourth floor by the way - there's a two person lift that takes you up there...or stairs of course if you're keeping fit.", 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
As it's a lovely quiet space (in a building with a flat on each floor) please have respect for neighbours. I don't have a TV so please bring a computer if you want to watch iplayer via the wifi. I have and ipod/mp3 players and a radio."]

Title: Sea views from rooms üèñ Beachwalks & caf√© culture
Description:
['About this space', 'Situated in Leigh on Sea, a stunning 2 bedroom maisonette a stones throw from the beach. You have clear sea views from both bedrooms, kitchen and sitting room

There is a private balcony leading from both bedrooms and also from the sitting/dinning room. All balconies have seating to allow you to relax and read a book or have your morning cuppa.
Whichever way you walk you will find tasty restaurants and cute coffee bars within minutes.
Available on the beach-sup lessons, photography & yoga.', 'The space', 'The space
Spacious sea views.
The maisonettes is bright and airy with fabulous views. It has all the luxuries you would require of a home.
You will find a fully equipped kitchen, coffee machine, bullet and all the utensils you may require.
The bathroom consists of a deep bath and a modern overhead chrome shower.
There is a large table with stunning new knocker back chairs with a beautiful chandelier above for that special evening meal.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests will have sole access to all areas-one double bedroom and one single bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, sitting room and dinning room and 3 fantastic balconies with views across the Estuary.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Your holiday home is extremely clean, comfortable and welcoming.
I am happy to arrange restaurants, celebration cakes or anything else I can help you with to ensure you have a fabulous stay.
I will offer discounts for longer stays.']

Title: Cottage by the beach with fantastic sea views
Description:
['About this space', 'Coastguard cottage in a idyllic location between the beach and a woodland conservation area on stunning coastline. Beautiful walks, fantastic views, gorgeous sunsets over a historical Fort next door. Perfect for family holidays and groups of friends.', 'The space', 'The space
The best things about Sea View Cottage are waking up in the master bedroom to a fabulous and uninterrupted view of the sea, and sipping a glass of wine or a cup of tea in the sea facing garden at sunset while watching the boats sail by. There are also great views over the sea from the living room downstairs.

The cottage itself was built in 1855 and is packed with original features, including an open log burning fire and original doors. It has been renovated for 2017, including a new heating system with modern electrical heaters for maximum comfort.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Sorry but Sea View Cottage does not accept dogs at the moment, but we do have other cottages which are dog friendly.']

Title: "Ocean Waves " Beach House  on the Sea front
Description:
['About this space', 'Renovated seafront house 10 minutes walk to local village shops, pub, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Local water sports: surfing, windsurfing, kite surfing, kayaking & boogie boarding.
20 min drive to Chichester, 25 min drive Goodwood.', 'The space', "The space
SITUATED ON A PRIVATE ROAD Ocean Waves has been refurbished to create a cosy and relaxing beachfront family home.

On the first floor, you'll find it easy to relax in the upstairs lounge, with unobstructed views of the sandy beaches and ocean.

The house has a large open plan kitchen/dining area with plenty of seating for ten people and patio doors which can be opened to enjoy the sound of the waves. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you will need to self-cater during you stay. The kitchen includes a dishwasher, oven, hob, microwave, fridge and freezer with ice maker.

The downstairs lounge is a separate space which is ideal for relaxing with a book or playing games with the family. The room has a piano and a comfortable sofa bed, if needed.

Ocean Waves has 5 bedrooms, two on the ground floor, one of which is a large super king (this can be configured in to 2 separate single beds if requested at time of booking), and the other with adult sized bunk beds. On the first floor there are three additional bedrooms which consist of one double, one king and one super king (the super king has unobstructed sea views.)

The first floor also has a spacious family bathroom with a shower (no bath). An additional shower room and separate toilet can be found on the ground floor.

Outside, you can relax on the private sea front terrace. The property also has a front and back garden with access to the beach and parking for 4 cars.

Carbon Monoxide and Smoke Detectors are situated on both ground and first floor.

WiFi and Sky TV included", '', '', '', '']

Title: Right on the beach
Description:
['About this space', 'The Bitter End beach house sits on the beach facing the sea with nothing between you and the water except sand and shingle. At high tide the sea is about 30 feet from the deck, low tide the sandy beach is almost half a mile wide. Camber Sands is 3.5 miles from the historic town of Rye in East Sussex. The house looks out over Rye Bay to the west and Dungeness to the east. For the best rate book direct through Julie at camberbeach dot ukay.', 'The space', 'The space
Our home is a four bedroomed two storey detached beach house, at the end of a private un made up lane. It is nestled next to the dunes, a site of special scientific interest (SSSI). No traffic noise, just the sound of the ocean. As at Sept 2020 ours is one of only three houses in Camber to rent through Airbnb that sits on the beach with direct access to it.

Sitting room with wood burner, baby grand piano and pool table. Dining table seats 8.
Kitchen with range cooker, American fridge freezer, dishwasher and washing machine.

Four bedrooms; one with a 6' super king bed, one with a 5‚Äô king bed, one with a 4'6" double bed and the fourth bedroom has a 5' king sized double bed and a single bed.
Bathroom with bath and loo downstairs, separate loo also downstairs, shower room with loo upstairs.
Deck outside with table to seat 10. Wet suits, body boards, kites and beach toys provided.

The house is clean, tidy (our personal belongings are all packed away during rentals) and warm (full central heating and a wood burner) but please bear in mind that it is our family home and so it is equipped as we like it, rather than as one might for a full time rental. For example, there is the usual 'essential' stuff in the drawer of the kitchen table - bits for things that no one now recognises but that we are afraid to throw away.

As it is a beach house the floors downstairs are painted concrete which is easy to sweep but please consider bringing slippers; we have some hotel ones to use if you forget and clean dressing gowns on the backs of doors.', '', '', '', '']

Title: Sunny room with view of the sea.
Description:
['About this space', "Beautiful, large, sunny bedroom available in 1930's Art Deco block right on Worthing seafront. The room has a direct view of the sea, so you can sit back and relax watching the sunrise and sunset, the fishermen and kite surfers. The flat is in a convenient location for walking into Worthing and traveling to Brighton.", 'The space', "The space
I am renting a double bedroom in my lovely 1930's Art Deco flat on Worthing seafront. The views are stunning and the sea is forever changing. The room has loads of space, including a wardrobe for hanging clothes, table and comfy lounge chair. The double bed base has a futon mattress, so is firm and comfortable.

The bathroom is shared, and there‚Äôs a separate toilet, which is also shared. A kettle and tea/coffee is provided in the room. Guests are welcome to store food in the fridge in the kitchen.

It‚Äôs easy to get to Brighton and Hove on the 700 bus, which goes from directly outside the flat every ten minutes. Access to the Downs, Chichester and surrounding areas is excellent by either train or car.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Excellent free parking available at the front of the property.
Please contact me so we can make specific arrangements for your arrival.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please be aware that the flat is on a busy coastal road and there‚Äôs some light traffic noise. However, the room has double glazing so reducing the noise level.']

Title: MARINA VISTA THREE SEAFRONT APARTMENT
Description:
['About this space', 'Four Exclusive Seafront Apartments available on a per night basis. Perfect for Short Stays / Hoilday lets, These apartments start from great prices.', 'The space', 'The space
Main front door leading to one flight of communal stairs taking you up to the apartment.Entrance to the apartment to inviting long hallway, First door on your left leads to a good size Double Bedroom with King Size Bed, 2x Bedside Tables, Chest of Drawers, Mirrored Wardrobes & Flat screen TV.Second door on left leads to the Bathroom with brand new suite to include Shower/Bath, Basin & W.C. Special feature within this carefully crafted designer bathroom is the built in TV. UNFORTUNATELY THE TV IS NOT WORKING AT THE MOMENT. Third door on the left gives a convenient storage cupboard for all your coats, bags, shoes or a pushchair.Straight ahead from the main entrance leads directly into the bright & welcoming open plan kitchen & living space. Furnished and decorated to a high standard with a flat screen TV, bluetooth speaker, sofa bed, table & 4 dining chairs. Brand new quality kitchen, fully equipped with Fridge/Freezer, Bosch Induction Hob, Extractor Fan, Bosch Oven, Kettle, Microwave, Built-in Water Filter Tap, Knife Block Set, Pots, Pans, Cutlery, Glasses, Cups, Plates & Bowls. Books, DVDSThe Apartment has wooden floorboards, neutral walls & ceilings throughout.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guest will have full access to the whole apartment.', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
We have no parking spaces available with these apartments, but we can leave parking permits for you when you arrive. Please take note of these important details about the parking permit.
We do charge ¬£2.50 a day per vehicle, Please leave money on side when you depart

-We are Zone A.
-Make sure you are in the right zone to avoid parking tickets.
-One permit is required per calendar day and only valid for the date validated.
-Scratch off the day, date, month, and year.
-Daily visitor permit hours is 9:00 am to 6:00 pm (Monday to Saturday)

Here's the list of the roads where you can park. Please check if these are still Zone A as we will not take any responsibility for any parking tickets.

Please make sure you read the road sign and it clearly says you are in the ZONE A area

If you head towards M&S take your 2nd right which will be West buildings then 1st right into Augusta place this area is all ZONE A

OTHER ZONE A ROADS YOU CAN PARK DOWN
NEW STREET
AUGUSTA PLACE
CHANDOS ROAD
LIVERPOOL GARDENS
SHELLY ROAD
BUCKINGHAM ROAD
GRAHAM ROAD
SALISBURY ROAD

If you still are unable to park anywhere there is a multi-storey car park above the bowling alley called Grafton Multi Storey

** Please note, we will not be held responsible if a parking fine is given to you **

Not suitable for anyone who struggles to climb one flight of stairs."]

Title: Family home on the beach
Description:
['About this space', 'Our beachside family home is the ideal getaway for families. With 4 bedrooms (1 superking, 1 double and 2 bunkbeds- top bunk only suitable for children), 2 bathrooms and large living/dining area and fully kitted kitchen- you will find all the space you need for a holiday on the beach. The enclosed private garden leads directly onto the beach. There is parking for 2 cars which is on a private road. The house is within walking distance of the town centre with many pubs, restaurants and shops.', 'The space', 'The space
Leading directly onto an area of private beach, our home is the ideal getaway all year round. The garden is enclosed making it safe for our younger guests. In the winter we have a wood burning stove to ensure cosy evenings.
Our house is in a very quiet residential area so we do ask you to respect our neighbours, which is why we have a strict no parties or events rule.
Please check out all the photos before booking.
üîπPlease note- at this time we are requesting that all guests bring their own bedding and towels due to Covid protocols and guidelines.
This is a well loved family home.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You have access to the whole house, except the private garage', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
No dogs allowed
No parties or events allowed.
The house is at the end of a private road. Please be very aware when parking as the road is only accessed by 3 houses each with private parking areas. Please do not block or obstruct access to the other properties at any time.

This is a family home, and you will find personal items stored.
Please respect our privacy and do not use these.

We are asking all guests to bring their own bedding and towels, due to Covid protocols and guidelines. The health and safety of our guests is very important to us.']

Title: Fairhaven, East Wittering
Description:
['About this space', "Fairhaven is in a gorgeous position overlooking the Booker Green greensward, the shoreline and the sea. The property has direct beach access and its south-facing sun balcony has glorious sweeping views across the Solent and along the coast. If this isn't enough, it is also a quick walk to East Wittering village centre for the shops and cafes.


Fairhaven is beautifully cared for and ongoing upgrades constantly enhance the guest experience. It is a distinctively constructed house with a striking pitched roof sloping low on either side to frame the sun balcony and the patio.

The interior layout is mixed between the two floors to make the most of the far-reaching views, with bedrooms and sitting rooms both up and down stairs.

It is available all year round for holidays and is equally lovely for lazy days on the beach and balcony, for autumn al fresco dining on the patio, or for coast strolling in the fresh December air.

Dogs allowed, please ask for permission from the office.
No smoking.", '', '', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Whole house']

Title: Stunning Seafront Penthouse, Private Sun Terrace
Description:
['About this space', "Small but stunning seafront facing penthouse right at the front and the top of this iconic 1930's Grade II* listed building. Enjoy uninterrupted panoramic sea views from the living room, bedroom, and private sun terrace (accessed from both the living room and bedroom). A very special place, very well equipped with everything you may need for your stay including White Company towels and Egyptian cotton bedlinen. On-site parking also available at an additional nightly rate, a rarity in Brighton.", 'The space', "The space
Situated right at the top and front of this beautiful iconic Grade II* listed building, this small but stunning penthouse apartment directly faces the sea enjoying panoramic uninterrupted sea views from the living room, bedroom, and the 7.3 x 1.7m private sun terrace (with doors opening directly onto the terrace from both the living room and bedroom). The apartment offers a great value alternative to seafront hotel rooms, often twice the price for just a bedroom/bathroom with either a tiny or no balcony. On-site parking is also available at a nightly rate, a rarity in Brighton.

There are lifts to take you up to the top floor and the apartment is furnished and equipped to a very high standard with everything you may need for your stay, including high quality Egyptian cotton bedlinen and fluffy White Company towels. Fast wi-fi is available throughout the apartment and there are wall-mounted LCD televisions in both the living room and the bedroom with Virgin cable TV and Netflix. On sunny days the large private sun terrace enjoys the sun all day long and even in winter the sunsets from the terrace and the apartment are absolutely stunning.

The beautiful bespoke Italian blue granite kitchen is very well equipped for self-catering and the stunning bespoke designer bathroom has luxurious under-floor heating and a rainfall shower. We're delighted to be in Tripadvisor's top 5 guest-rated of all holiday apartments in Brighton and Hove and to hold their coveted Certificate of Excellence for the fourth year running.

Embassy Court is a beautiful and historic listed 1930s Modernist building and the apartment and its top floor neighbours were the first ever purpose-built penthouses in the UK so it has a lovely architectural significance. The architect, Wells Coates (who also designed the famous Isokon building in London) made pleasure and making the most of the wonderful top floor views his top priority for the apartment: the private sun terrace and the windows and glass doors run the length of the apartment giving wonderful light and a stunning sense of openness and space with the panoramic views. You'll see from the photos that the bedroom is small but looking right out to sea you can sit up in bed and look out at the amazing views!

Please note that the while the apartment can sleep four (with use of the sofabed by prior arrangement) it is small and best suited to two adults with up to two children. We are unable to accept bookings for three or four adults.

LIVING ROOM (4.2m x 3.2m)
Directly faces the seafront with sea views stretching across the entire length of the room and doors opening onto the lovely private sun terrace. Real Scandinavian wood floors, sofa seating for four, wall-mounted LCD TV, dining table and chairs for four, two glass electric radiators.

KITCHEN (2.6m x 1.9m)
Fully fitted and well equipped kitchen with Italian blue granite surfaces and Siemens appliances (dishwasher, washer-dryer, fridge-freezer, microwave, glass convection hob and oven), plinth heating. Far-reaching views across the rooftops of Brighton and Hove to the Sussex Downs. Real Scandinavian wood floors.

BEDROOM (2.7m x 2.5m)
Directly facing the seafront, very small bedroom with enormous stunning sea views along the length of the room and doors opening onto the lovely private sun terrace. Double bed, wall-mounted LCD TV, small wardrobe, real Scandinavian wood floors, glass electric radiator.

BATHROOM (2.4m x 2m)
Bespoke Italian fully tiled bathroom with luxurious under-floor heating and deep bath with rainfall shower over.

SUN TERRACE (7.3m x 1.7m)
Directly facing the seafront with breathtaking panoramic views, fully tiled private sun terrace with designer planters from Chelsea Flower Show award winner Fernando Gonzalez, dining table seating for four.

Step out of the front door of the building and you are on the seafront. The flat is located close to central Brighton with all its attractions, shops, restaurants, the Pier, the i360, and The Lanes, and has many fantastic amenities on its doorstep including one of the best restaurants in Brighton (The Gingerman). Waitrose, Sainsbury's, and the wonderful Taj supermarkets are a few minutes walk and there is a small convenience store next door to the building. Brighton and Hove stations are five minutes by taxi, Gatwick Airport thirty minutes by train and London fifty minutes by train.

On-site parking can be arranged in advance at an extra nightly rate cheaper than on-street or the local car parks. There is lift access but as a listed building with some steps and the lifts being very small we regret that there is no wheelchair access. For children we happily provide the following free of charge: travel cot with mattress, highchair, wooden bed safety rails, children's plates, cups, bowls and cutlery.

If you are interested in staying with us please let us know a little about yourself and your trip along with any questions you might have and we‚Äôll get back to you asap.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
You are booking the entire apartment to enjoy.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please note that the apartment is small and best suited to two adults and up to two children. We‚Äôre unable to accept bookings for three or four adults.']

Title:
1 Bed Garden Flat.
1 minute walk away from beach
Description:
['About this space', 'Less than 1 minute walk from The beach, this is your perfect seaside retreat with a bath and garden for pure relaxation.

Also just a 15 minute walk to the famous Rockwater roof terrace restaurant and Hove high street full of lovely bars and restaurants. Alternatively, walk 45 minutes along the seafront to be in Brighton.

The Flat comes with a lovely decked garden with use of fitness equipment and plenty of activities for at home or the beach I.e bat&ball, Jenga, Rounders.', 'The space', 'The space
The apartment is a homely, warm, seaside retreat in the most perfect location for your break:
Walk 1 min to the beach, 1 min to Hove Lagoon for play park, paddling pool or water sports activities (I.e paddle boarding, wind surfing etc..) or grab a ‚Äòsocial bicycle‚Äô (also 1 min away) and cycle into Brighton (15mins) to enjoy everything Brighton has to offer.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
No parking access on road of apartment it is permit only. However pay by display parking on the next down down on seafront, or parking permits can be requested (depending on availability) for ¬£5 per day so please drop me a message.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Flat can come with travel cot if required']

Title: Yarmouth Holiday House - Sea View & Coastal Style
Description:
['About this space', 'Stunning Solent views from this four bedroom detached coastal property with private garden. Less then ten minutes walking distance along the waterfront from beautiful Yarmouth and all its shops & restaurants. Easy access for the Lymington to Yarmouth Ferry. Fantastic walks a few minutes from the house. Enjoy a sundowner on the balcony as yachts glide past, perfect for watching the Round the Island race. Grab a towel & cross the road for a dip in the Solent!

Follow us on IG @watersedgeyarmouth', 'The space', "The space
Water's Edge has been our much loved family holiday home for over 15 years. It is in a wonderful location overlooking the Solent. There is a little upside down living here, with the main living room being on the first floor to maximise the view. There is a small bar area adjacent, with a little fridge perfect for chilling drinks. Also on the first floor are a full bathroom which is shared between the main double bedroom and the kids bunk bed room.

On entering the ground floor through the front door, you find another double bedroom on the right and a twin room on the left. There is also a separate Utility room with a Belfast sink, washing machine and tumble dryer - plus hooks for hanging up coats. Across the hallway, there is also another full bathroom. At the end of the entrance hallway is the door to the dining area and kitchen on the right. Here you will find another tv, small sofa and coffee table alongside the dining table. The cupboards also have various board games and cards to use. Off the dining area is small conservatory leading into the enclosed garden. It is a lovely place to sit and has a small garden sofa and chairs. It is quite an old structure and although it is regularly fixed, may leak in heavy rain. This won't effect the main living area as it is completely sealed off by what would have been the original back door. Plus all the furniture is weather proof! We often see red squirrels running around the garden and lots of interesting birds too. The kitchen has a Rangemaster double oven, dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space. There is also a small breakfast bar with a couple of stools. We feel the kitchen is very well equipped as I want it to be home away from home. A highchair can be provided if requested.", '', '', '', '']

Title: Stunning sea views from spacious 2 bed apartment
Description:
['About this space', 'The self-contained 2 bedroom apartment is located on Hastings seafront with wonderful views to Hastings pier and the English channel. The accomodation has just been completely refurbished with new carpets, freshly painted, new bathroom and ensuite bathroom to the master bedroom. There is an open plan kitchen & living area with dining table allowing wonderful views of the English channel throughout the open plan living. There are two large double bedrooms & one with own ensuite bathroom.', 'The space', "The space
There is direct beach access - a short stroll across the coastal road and you're on the beach or on the promenade.
The apartment is within walking distance to Hastings town centre and the historic old town, land based fishing fleet and allows for a pleasant walk along the promenade to Burton St Leonards with its collection of antique shops, art galleries, and restaurants.
Weather permitting you can have enjoy the beach and spend a day swimming or a family picnic on the beach. Walking and cycling are great ways to explore, keep fit and enjoy the long promenade. Using the 7km beachside traffic-free route is the perfect way to discover the extensive Hastings seafront ‚Äì with plenty of fascinating places to stop and explore along the way.
The accommodation has double glazing throughout and GCH.
The apartment is located on the third floor (it's a period building with no lift) but the climb is worth it to enjoy the magnificent views.
The holiday flat is immaculately presented, after just completing refurbishment in April. It has a modern, bright, simple and uncluttered feel.
Both bedrooms have huge wardrobes which are ideal for families or friends to store clothing etc.
The dining table extends to comfortably seat 6 people.
The open plan nature of the accomodation allows either family or friends to enjoy the holiday together.
The communal hallway and stairs leading to the holiday flat are scheduled to be redecorated in the winter.", '', '']

Title: 50 Seagate Court, East Wittering
Description:
['About this space', 'If it is breathtaking views in a peaceful and tranquil setting you are wishing for, then 50 Seagate Court has it all. With a dual aspect living room and balcony with far reaching, breathing taking views across the Solent from a penthouse location. 50 Seagate is perfect for all ages as there is a lift up to the apartment if you need it, it has been beautifully designed with a twin and double bedroom and a family shower room.

Sleeps 4.
Seafront.
No smoking.
Sorry no pets.
WiFi.', 'The space', 'The space
Hall.

Open plan Living/Dining Room with patio doors leading out to a balcony with views across the Solent.

Living Room. Free Wi-Fi. Flat screen TV

Kitchen. Electric oven and hob with extractor fan. Microwave, dishwasher, fridge/freezer.

Bedroom 1: Super King size double Bed

Bedroom 2: Two single beds

Bathroom: Large walk in shower. Wash basin and wc.

Duvets and pillows to all beds.

Electric heating

Unallocated Parking.

LINEN is included and comprises bed linen made up on the beds, bath sheets and hand towels. Beach towels are not provided.']

Title: Scandi Beach
Description:
['About this space', 'A stunning and unique Scandinavian inspired architectural house right on the beach, Shoreham-by-sea.

360 views of the sea and the Downs behind the town. Spacious accommodation with six bedrooms; superbly equipped kitchen, magnificent bar, stylish dining area, cosy seating downstairs with entrance on to patio leading to barbeque/firepit sunken garden.

Upstairs, spectacular lounge with magnificent outside terrace. Large screen television on both floors. Ample parking

We also offer catering', '', 'The space
Designed by award winning architect, the villa is spacious and delightful to be in.', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests can access the whole of the villa including the front drive and back garden. The villa is situated on the beach itself', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
SCANDI BEACH
SHOREHAM BEACH
Please can you ensure all guests have read the house rules.

Welcome to SCANDI BEACH, we hope you have an enjoyable stay.

NOISE & OUTSIDE AREAS
Keep your noise at a tolerable level especially when eating, drinking & entertaining.
When entering or leaving property please be respectful to our lovely neighbours and do not congregate in the street.
We ask guests to refrain from excessive noise outside the property after 10.30pm, and any complaints from neighbours about guests disrespecting this will receive a ¬£150 fine. Please keep noise inside the property also to a minimum after 10.30pm and continuing festivities to be moved to the more private first floor and balcony.

KEYS & CHECK OUT
On check-in we provide you with 2 sets of keys.
Ensure all doors are locked when leaving the property and when retiring for the evening.
Please leave our lovely property as you found it, we provide all cleaning products and have a hoover and mop within the property. Please do not move furniture as scratches the floor.
If you spill drinks on the wooden floor please mop up as it will stain if left to settle.
Leave 2 sets of keys on departure (¬£75 charge/set unreturned)
No candles or naked flames please.
Please do not download any illegal music or films on our internet please.

FOOTWEAR
Please NO stilettoes at all. We have beautiful wooden flooring so kindly ask you to refrain from spoiling with shoes.

SMOKING
If you need to smoke please do so in the back garden preferably exiting from the SouthWest patio door so to be a distance from the neighbours. Smoke on the balcony on the first floor after 1030.

DECORATIONS
If you put up decorations please do not use sellotape or blue-tac as it damages the paint work. Any decorations left such as glitter, or confetti an additional ¬£50 will be added to the cleaning fee subtracted from the damage deposit.

IF CONFETTI GETS WET IT STAINS AND SUBSEQUENTLY RUINS FLOORS

RUBBISH & RECYCLING
Please do not leave rubbish inside the property. The recycling and and refuse bin are outside at the entrance.

COMPLAINTS
You are staying at the heart of Shoreham Beach; a very tight community. This is also a residential area with families living close by so please be mindful of your noise and behaviour.

Councils enforce specific rules regarding noise and behaviour within short terms lets. If we receive a complaint from the neighbour this will result in deductions from your deposit.

If we receive a complaints regarding these house rules we will deduct ¬£150 from the security deposit, 2 complaints your whole deposit with be withheld. Three complaints during your stay will result in an immediate eviction from the property.']

Title: The Blue House on the Beach in Camber
Description:
['About this space', "The Blue House is a truly stunning house - it's location is spectacular - situated on the miles of sandy beach in Camber, close to Rye within easy access from London. Finished to the highest standards with bespoke kitchen, Apple TV, luxurious beds and sofas - it is an ideal escape for a coastal retreat. Good for couples, families, big groups, and furry friends (pets). Please do get in touch!", 'The space', 'The space
Want a beach holiday, with sand between your toes from the moment you arrive ‚Äì this stunning beach house is built on the foreshore of Camber Sands offering a truly luxurious escape. Please read the access information before booking.

This stylish and contemporary air conditioned house sleeps 8 guests in four bedrooms.

This property brings the sea to your doorstep, immerse yourself in water activities, jaunts in the dunes or collapse on the deck, or if its a little cool or windy snuggle up on the sofa in the living room with a good book or pair of binoculars ‚Äì Apple TV and in built ipad Sonos system are available when you get bored of the view!

Downstairs the living room over looks the deck, there is a bespoke kitchen (dishwasher, oven, micro/grill oven, fridge/freezer and separate drinks fridge) which offers plenty of scope to cook up a storm, eat at the handmade dining table overlooking the beach, or fire up the BBQ on the deck. There are two bedrooms downstairs; a large superking bedroom (Surf) with wardrobe and a twin bedroom with 3ft beds and Apple TV, sharing a double shower wetroom. The laundry room is equipped with a washing machine and separate dryer and has a side entrance for access to the house.

Upstairs the two stunning superking bedrooms (Beach & Dunes) are both beautifully appointed with free standing baths and the front bedroom with an additional shower, and USB ports by the bed. All linen is white superior Egyptian Cotton. Beautifully decorated throughout in muted colours that don‚Äôt jar with the incredible view.

Simply put it is the perfect retreat in all weathers ‚Äì a log burning stove for cosy autumnal and wintery escapes, sliding doors onto a decked terrace enclosed to offer security and privacy.

Dogs are very welcome but please be aware of the dog restrictions on the beach between 1 May ‚Äì 30 September. There is an additional charge of ¬£35 for 2 dogs.

*New for 2021 stays - Smokeless wood burning fire pit and Ooni Pizza oven* .

ACCESS INFO

The Blue House is accessed from the car park via the beach, if you have a 4√ó4 you are allowed to drive onto the beach and park ONE car in front of the house at the discretion the beach inspector in peak periods (high tides and full beach) . Do not park between the houses as this is owned by the neighbours. there is a car pass that enables one car to park for free in the car park for the duration of your stay. There is a barrier that the beach inspector will put up if there is deemed a risk to beach goers and will prevent access ‚Äì this is usually at high tide with a full beach or servere adverse conditions.

WE DO NOT ADVISE LEAVING ANY CAR ON THE BEACH IN BAD WEATHER AS THE SALT AND SAND COULD SERIOUSLY DAMAGE THE PAINTWORK AND IT IS ENTIRELY AT THE OWNERS OWN RISK.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
Access to The Blue House is across the beach - one (proper) 4x4 may park drive across the beach and park in front of the house (150m) - if you don't have a 4x4 there is one pass for the car park - other free parking is available in Camber but not guaranteed."]

Title: "A little piece of heaven"
Description:
['About this space', 'SEAFRONT RETREAT
"A little piece of heaven" stylish artists apartment in between St Leonards and Hastings perfectly situated to easily reach the heart of both communities. With stunning sea views and Hastings pier in sight this is a wonderful bolt hole to escape to.', 'The space', 'The space
White, bright and fresh it makes a great base from which to explore this ever changing seaside resort with new shops, cafes, bars, restaurants and galleries opening up at a record pace!
The apartment is very comfortable with everything you could need to enjoy your stay.
We have a king size bed with two mattresses for extra comfort, a brilliant showtime side lit mirror, brilliant if you want to get glammed up for the evening!
Curl up in the swinging chair with a glass of wine and watch the ever changing tides, fishing boats and kayaks.
Stroll into the Old Town and browse the antique shops,quirky bars and lovely restaurants or walk to Norman Road St Leonards and sample the delicious food at the Russian bar/restaurant Kino Teatr or watch a movie in their wonderful theatre  ', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Guests have use of whole apartment', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
To get to the breathtaking views on the second floor there are 4 flights of stairs to climb so maybe not suitable for some :-)']

Title: Mayfayre - 2 Bed Cottage Beside the Beach
Description:
['About this space', 'This luxurious two bedroom cottage is right beside the sandy beach. There is a spacious open-plan lounge (inc wood-burner) and dining area.

The two double bedrooms have built-in wardrobes on the ground floor and stairs to a mezzanine suitable for children with two single sofa-beds.

The kitchen is fully equipped including a washer, drier, fridge freezer and all crockery and cutlery.

The ground floor bathroom has bath (with shower), sink & WC.

Outside is a large family garden, table & chairs.', 'The space', 'The space
Pet friendly. Free WiFi. Seconds from the Beach. Large garden with BBQ, table & chairs.
** Please Note: there is a ¬£10 per pet fee']

Title: Fabulous Regency Flat Right on the Sea Front
Description:
['About this space', 'This recently refurbished, grade 1* listed Regency flat is located on the sea front and offers gorgeous panoramic views over Hove lawns and sea.

It is beautifully decorated throughout and boasts high ceilings, a grand light-filled living room; a fully equipped kitchen; mezzanine dining area; master bedroom with en-suite; second double bedroom and additional shower and bathroom and balcony.

This flat is perfect for couples, friends, and families to enjoy a stylish stay in Brighton!', 'The space', 'The space

Title: The Seagull Nest - 180 degrees sea view penthouse
Description:
['About this space', "Welcome to our lovely penthouse with amazing views of the sea, completely refurbished. Spacious, stylish and ready for you to relax. You can't be closer to the sea!

Lift available (with stairs to access from street)
Free street parking available nearby (with stairs)", 'The space', 'The space
The flat sleeps 2 people in a peaceful bedroom located at the back of the flat, with a brand new modern bathroom including a generous bathtub to relax after your hike, swim or busy week.

The big lounge and kitchen are bathed with natural light and all windows have an 180 degree sea view. There is a big comfy sofa and a gas fireplace for those cosy evenings. The promenade right in front is a great place to walk, run, stroll, skate, bike,...

The balcony easily accommodates 2 people and overlooks the sea.

Lift available
Fully equipped kitchen
Fast wifi available']

Title: Marine Parade, Worthing
Description:
['About this space', 'Get-away with Sea Views
Make yourself at home in this 2 bedroomed First Floor Regency Apartment HOLIDAY LET on Worthing‚Äôs vibrant seafront. Listen to the seagulls and sounds of the buzzing promenade. Enjoy stunning views while relaxing on the large comfortable sofa in this ideal holiday home for a family or friends.', 'The space', 'The space
The lounge/kitchen/diner has impressive floor to ceiling sash windows with panoramic views across the promenade and sea. There is a large family sofa and dining for 4 people. The well-equipped kitchen includes oven, hob, microwave and fridge/freezer. There is a smart tv with Amazon and Netflix and free wi fi.
The comfortable master bedroom has an oak bed, large wardrobe, armchair and an en-suite shower room. This bedroom window has a distant sea view.
The second bedroom has two 3-foot wooden single beds and an open wardrobe.
Next to the second bedroom is a bathroom with a washer/dryer.
The property benefits from central heating.']

Title: Lancing Beach Apartment
Description:
['About this space', 'An apartment directly on the beach at Lancing, West Sussex, with a whole wall of glass facing the continually changing view of the sea and sky. Easy access to Brighton, Worthing & Shoreham - Trains / buses / roads. Located above the award winning Perch on Lancing beach restaurant - pop downstairs for an early morning breakfast or bring your coffee back to the balcony to enjoy the view.', 'The space', 'The space
This is a brand new purpose built apartment in a modern design low energy eco building, which is situated directly on the beach, It is on the first floor, with an outdoor balcony over looking the beach and sea. There is a cafe / restaurant on site as well as a well equipped gym, the gym can be used by purchasing a day pass for only ¬£5, the usual day rate is ¬£10. There is a kite surfing school on this beach. Also this coast line boasts wonderful off road walks and cycling along the coastal path with Shoreham to the East and Worthing to the West, both in easy walking distance.', 'Guest access', "Guest access
The apartment has it's own front door and a shared locked entrance lobby where cycles or water sports equipment can be stored safely. There is an entry phone access for safety. There is a large car park adjacent to the Green where you can park for ¬£1.50 a day.", 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
The cafe is open every day and some evenings during the summer months. There is a local pub, chippy, Greek, Chinese and Indian restaurants all in very close walking distance. Worthing is less than 2 miles away and there are restaurants & cafes of every type, a large shopping centre, a museum, 2 cinemas, a theatre and well stocked library. There is a local hospital with an A & E department less than 2 miles away. The vibrant & cosmopolitain town of Brighton is only 11 miles to the East.
We keep a variety of guide books for people new to the area.']

Title: Apartment
Description:
['About this space', 'Light roomy space with outside garden 5 minutes walk from seafront', 'The space', 'The space
5 minutes walk to seafront , 20 minutes walk to Brighton pier and 2 minutes from Hove seafront.
Rock water is nearby as is Hove lagoon', 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Owing to covid and stringent regulations we cannot provide parking permits at this time. The local council will only issues‚Äù permits by signature post or personal collection by the property owner who does not live locally. We are hoping to be able to provide permits by March 2022.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
Please can guests be aware that an elderly lady lives above, thank you.

The heating is programmed on a timer but can be overridden using the + and - buttons on the timer control in the hallway. Also there is a controller in the kitchen beneath the boiler. Press the button on it and the boiler will kick in. Any issues with that just call!']

Title: Sea front flat with a stunning view!
Description:
['About this space', 'This specious two bedroom flat on the sea front with an amazing view is the perfect place to relax and unwind.

Explore the sights and local attractions of St Leonards on Sea - there is so much to see and do here.', 'The space', "The space
You will have this second floor flat to yourself.
The open-plan lounge/kitchen is filled with light and air.

As a self-catering apartment, you'll find everything you need for a perfect stay.

The kitchen has a fridge/freezer, a hob, an oven, a kettle, a toaster, a microwave and a washing machine.

This two bedroom flat contains one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with a king size bed.
Main bedroom has a desk and a chair.

There is one bathroom, which has a bath, a separate shower and a sink and there is a separate WC.

Linen and towels are all included to make your stay more enjoyable.

The Welcome Pack includes information on local eating places, amenities and attractions."]

Title: MP713 - Camber Sands Holiday Park - Sleeps 6 + 1 small dog - 2 Bedrooms - Quiet Area
Description:
['About this space', 'With all the modern amenities, our contemporary accommodation will allow you to relax and unwind, whilst being only a few minutes walk to 7 miles of sand and sea. If you are looking for fun, the Holiday Park boasts facilities such as Swimming Pools, Restaurant, Go-Karts, Mini Golf, Soft Play and plenty of evening entertainment for all the family.
As of 1st January 2021 all bookings include linen and towels dressed onto the beds plus a cleaning pack.', 'The space', 'The space
Modern 2 bedroom luxury caravan with patio doors leading out onto a gated wrap around decking area. This is the perfect caravan to relax and enjoy the surrounding countryside. This caravan has everything you should need including a dishwasher, washing machine, free WiFi, Smart TV in living room and a master bedroom with a TV and en-suite bathroom. The caravan is located over the back part of the park where its nice and quiet, but only a short stroll to the facilities or beach. Parking is located nearby in allocated parking bays.

LOUNGE ‚Äì Bright living area, with double french doors opening up onto decking, Plenty of comfy seating, smart TV with freeview. Additional sleeping with pull out sofa-bed.

KITCHEN ‚Äì Lots of worktop and cupboard space equipped with everything you may need if you choose to stay in and cook, freestanding table and chairs.

BEDROOMS ‚Äì Spacious Master bedroom, with TV and en suite bathroom. Second bedroom with 2 single beds. Sofa bed in living room

BATHROOMS ‚Äì Main bathroom has good size shower, toilet and sink. En suite in master bedroom with toilet.

PARKING - Short distance away on a first come first served basis

DISTANCE TO PLAY AREA - 3-4 minute walk
DISTANCE TO BEACH ‚Äì 4‚Äì 5 minute walk.
DISTANCE TO ENTERTAINMENT - 3-4 minute walk

PETS - 1 small pet allowed (¬£25 additional surcharge)

As of 1st January 2021 all bookings include linen and towels dressed onto the beds plus a cleaning pack.

PLEASE NOTE ENTERTAINMENT PASSES ARE NOT INCLUDED WITH YOUR STAY AND WOULD NEED TO BE PURCHASED EITHER IN ADVANCE OR UPON ARRIVAL. YOU REQUIRE THESE TO HAVE ACCESS TO RESTAURANTS, BARS, OUTSIDE AREAS AND ALL OTHER FACILITIES AFTER 5PM. YOU WILL ALSO REQUIRE ENTERTAINMENT PASSES TO ACCESS SWIMMING POOLS AT ANY TIME.', '', 'You will enjoy access to the full holiday home with no shared access', 'Other things to note', "Other things to note
Important Information
*Bars, Restaurants, shops and all facilities including Evening Showbar Entertainment and swimming usually starts from February Half Term through to the start of November and require passes for access after 5pm. Passes are also required for the activities and are bookable via Parkdean Resorts Office upon arrival, we aren't able to assist with this as we are completely different companies. Slots are not guaranteed and are subject to their availability.
The exact season start and end date is not guaranteed if you are booking early or late in the season, Please check the dates and schedule before you book.
The passes can be purchased via us at the same price as park and we leave them in the property for you for when you arrive. If you would like a quote for us to provide these please message.

*Linens and towels will be provided for all guests listed on the booking - so please ensure the guest details are correct on your booking.

*The park is BBQ friendly but we do not supply or hire BBQ's, you will need to provide your own. They are not permitted close to the properties & must NOT be on the decking (if applicable).

*Camber Getaways are a local agent who look after privately owned properties for their owners. You will be sent checking in and property details 1-2 weeks prior to your arrival via email, so please ensure you check your messages and emails."]

Title: Unspoilt Sea View Family Beach House
Description:
['About this space', 'Sleeps 10. A large Beach House with bedroom above the garage as an ancillary to the main house. Please note this space cannot be rented out separately.
3D Tour copy this link into your browser: https://vt.ehouse.co.uk/7Ft3Ekkm3MH
Newly renovated Jan 2021to a modern and contemporary style throughout, with its own gated beach garden to the rear and an additional secluded courtyard garden to the front of the house offering some privacy and a place to enjoy the evening sunset.', 'The space', "The space
Key Features
# Beach-Fronted
# Outdoor Furniture
# 5 Bathrooms
# 5 Bedrooms
# Pool Table
# Travel Cot, Stair Gate & High Chair
# Safe
Arranged over three floors and offering well laid out and generous living accommodation, this is the perfect holiday home for a large family or group. This property really does make the most of the breath-taking views on offer.
The house has a garage for one car at the front with additional space for two parked cars in the forecourt. Beyond the garage there is a secluded large garden that has a wooden table and chairs, a wooden bench and nice area to enjoy some privacy and of course sunset in the evenings, this than leads us to the main house. Inside the front door which is accessed via the courtyard garden, there is a lobby and a utility room on the left containing a washing machine, dryer, iron, ironing board, washing line etc..., a shower room and WC, and on the right is a bedroom with a triple sleeper bed.
From the lobby there are stairs leading up to the main floor, which is on the same level as the beach, there is a large open plan sitting room that inter-connects with the dining area through to a newly fitted kitchen with everything you need to comfortable prepare and cook your owns meals, a second sitting area which looks out to sea which contains two double sofas, a triple corner sofa, two arm chairs, side tables with lamps and a TV with DVD player. Having been completely refurbished in Jan 2021 to a modern and contemporary style, truly a room you will not want to leave. The floors are wooden giving you a real seaside feel, there are two double bedrooms on the same floor, one of which has an en-suit bathroom. There is also a fully fitted family bathroom just of the lounge area with bathroom with a bath/shower, hand wash basin and WC.
The beach is accessed directly from the lounge area with concertina doors opening onto a large decking area with an outside dining table and benches, two armchairs with a coffee table, a 3-seater hammock swing, 2-seater bench with beach accessories stored underneath, all over the beach garden with uninterrupted views towards the coast.
A wooden staircase leads to the top floor which has a double bedroom with a super king-size bed and En-suite bathroom with the benefit of heated flooring, a WC, shower and heated towel rail, on the same floor there is also another lounge sitting area with an additional TV & DVD Player, a Bluetooth Stereo system, loads of DVD's and books for all ages to keep the family entertained indoors too, an HP printer if you want to connect your laptop and some USB cables to charge up your Phone, the lounge then leads on to a balcony that has two three seater benches to sit and enjoy the far reaching and uninterrupted views towards The English Channel.
There is a hotel style wall mounted safe in the master bedroom for safekeeping valuables.
There is a room above the double garage which is available for larger bookings of more than 8 guests. It comprises of a king-sized bed, sofa and shower room with sink and WC. There is a Juliet balcony to the front which commands spectacular views over the fields.
Bed linen and Towels provided. On each bed you will find a set of towels per person. Travel cot, highchair and child safety stairgate is available upon request. Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Free use of Kayak (at users‚Äô risk), please only use in safe waters and under adult supervision. life jackets provided.
When booking with us your stay will be protected by a deposit guarantee and public liability provided by our risk management partner, SUPERHOG. To benefit from this protection, you will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself or you can also go via their website, superhog.com to start the verification. To view the SUPERHOG privacy policy use this link: https://superhog.com/privacy-policydata-protection-policy/
We are now required by UK Gov to take the name and address for the main person making the reservation and the names of all other guests over the age of 16.", 'Guest access', 'Guest access
Entry instructions will be provided 4 days prior to your arrival date.
Covid-19 Guidelines
All guests are responsible for meeting any U.K current Covid-19 guidelines in place whilst staying in one of our
properties.', 'Other things to note', 'Other things to note
A damage deposit of ¬£200.00 is payable . For direct bookings with beachside holiday rentals, this amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departure.
Lost keys will be charged at ¬£25.00 per set.

The cleaning fee covers all cleaning, laundry/towels and bed linens which we provide for your stay.

The owner supplies a welcome starter of tea, coffee, sugar, dishwasher tablets, washing up liquid, kitchen roll, salt, pepper, oil, dishcloth, and pad. One bath towel per guest and an additional hand towel in each bathroom along with the first toilette roll & kitchen roll.']

Title: Sea Scene's ,  Hayling Island
Description:
['About this space', 'Sea Scenes is a homely two bedroom groundfloor apartment located on Hayling‚Äôs beautiful stretch of beach and perfectly situated for stunning views across the Solent.

Hayling Island is ideal for holiday makers and families as it retains all the attractions of a traditional seaside resort. One of the biggest attractions is the Funland Amusement Park at Beachlands, which has everything from roller coasters to a games arcade and a soft play area. The Hayling Seaside Railway that runs from Beachlands to Eastoke Corner is equally popular.

The island is also well known for its watersports ‚Äì in fact windsurfing was invented here ‚Äì and miles of glorious seafront. The local water is perfect for sailing, windsurfing, power boating, jet skiing and more.

There are various great places to eat if you don‚Äôt feel like cooking, from nice restaurants to pubs and of course a wide range of takeaways. Hayling is also well served by shops, so anything you need during your stay is right on hand!

However, if you feel like venturing out and exploring nearby areas, the attractions of Portsmouth, Southsea, Emsworth and Staunton Country Park are all close by.

The property itself is well furnished and feels comfortable and welcoming.

The living/kitchen area is open and spacious with amazing views overlooking the sea. The living area consists of comfortable sofas and a smart TV. The kitchen area is well equipped with a kettle, Nespresso maker, cafetiere, cooker, fridge, freezer, microwave, toaster, washing machine and dryer, along with a wooden dining table that seats four.

The master bedroom has a queen size bed, a stylish dressing table and a smart TV. The second bedroom has a single bed which can be pulled out to make a comfortable king size bed, please note: once the bed has been pulled out there is limited room in the bedroom.

There is a stylish walk in shower and a separate WC.

There is no BBQ provided for the garden, however, you are more than welcome to bring your own and enjoy the amazing scenery.

WIFI is included with this property and there is enough parking for 2 cars.']
